1b1: rgya gar skad du/ many+dzu shrI dz+nyA na satwa s+ya pa ra ma aR+thA nA ma saM gI tI/ bod skad du/ 'jam
1b2: dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
1b3: pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // gdul dka' 'dul ba rnams kyi mchog/ dpa'
1b4: bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal/ / rdo rje dbang phyug gsang ba'i rgyal// rnam rgyas pad ma dkar po'i spyan//
1b5: pad ma rab tu rgyas pa'i zhal// rang gi lag gis rdo rje mchog/ yang dang yang du gsor byed pa// khro gnyer
1b6: ldan pa'i rlabs la sogs/ / lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po// dpa' bo
1b7: 'jigs rung gzugs can dang / / rdo rje rtse mo rab 'phro ba// rang gi lag gis gsor byed pa// shes rab
1b8: thabs dang snying rje che/ / 'gro don byed pa rnams kyi mchog/ dga' mgu rangs pa'i bsam pa can// khro bo'i
2a1: lus kyi gzugs ldan pa/ / sangs rgyas phrin las byed pa'i mgon// lus btud rnams dang lhan cig tu// mgon po bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal te/
2a2: thal mo sbyar ba byas gyur nas// spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad gsol// khyab bdag bdag la sman pa dang // bdag don bdag la thugs brtse'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// byang chub ji ltar bdag
2a3: thob mdzod/ / nyon mongs pas ni sems dkrugs shing // mi shes 'dam du bying ba yi// sems can kun la sman pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// bcom ldan ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'gro ba'i
2a4: bla ma bshad du gsol/ / dam tshig chen po de nyid mkhyen// dbang po bsam pa rig pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes sku'i// gtsug tor chen po'i tshig gi bdag/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'
2a5: yi/ / ye shes sku ste rang byung ba// don zab don ni rgya che zhing // don chen mtshungs med rab zhi ba// thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// mtshan yang dag par brjod pa mchog/ 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
2a6: gsungs/ / ma 'ongs rnams kyang gsung 'gyur la// da ltar byung ba'i rdzogs sangs rgyas// gang yang yang yang gsungs pa gang // rgud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'dir// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang sngags 'chang /
2a7: dpag med rnams kyi dgyes pa yis// gang yang yang dag rab gsungs pa// bdag kyang 'di ni gzung bar bgyid// bsam pa brtan pos nges 'byung bar// mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas kun gyi// gsang
2a8: dzin ji ltar bdag 'gyur bgyi/ / nyon mongs ma lus bsal ba dang // mi shes ma lus spang ba'i phyir// sems can rnams kyi bsam pa yi// khyad par ji bzhin rab bshad 'tshal// gsang dbang lag
2b1: na rdo rje yis/ / de bzhin gshegs la de skad du// gsol btab thal mo sbyar byas te// lus btud nas ni spyan sngar 'dug/ gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug go// de nas bcom ldan shAkya
2b2: thub/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ nyid kyi zhal nas ljags bzang dge// ring zhing yangs pa brkyang mdzad de// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // bdud bzhi'i dgra rnams 'dul byed pa//
2b3: 'jig rten rnams kyi ngan song gsum// sbyong bar byed pa'i 'dzum bstan nas// tshangs pa'i gsung ni snyan pa yis// 'jig rten gsum po kun bkang ste// lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gsang dbang la ni slar
2b4: gsungs pa/ / legs so dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // lag na rdo rje khyod legs so// 'gro la phan pa'i don du khyod// snying rje che dang ldan gyur cing // 'jam dpal ye shes sku yi mtshan// yang dag
2b5: brjod pa don che ba/ / dag par byed cing sdig sel ba// nga las nyan par brtson pa ni// gsang ba'i bdag po khyod legs so// de phyir 'di ni ngas bshad bya// khyod ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bcom/
2b6: ldan de ni legs zhes gsol// lan gyi gsung tshigs su bcad pa drug go// / de nas bcom ldan shAkya thub// gsang sngags mtha' dag rigs chen po// gsang sngags rig pa 'chang ba'i rig/
2b7: rigs gsum la ni rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i rigs// 'jig rten snang byed rigs chen dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rigs mchog dang // gtsug tor chen po'i rigs chen no//
2b8: rigs drug la gzigs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so// // gsang sngags rgyal po drug ldan zhing // gnyis su med par 'byung ba dang // skye ba med pa'i chos can 'di// tshig gi bdag pos tshigs
3a1: bcad gsungs/ / a A i I u U e e o o a~M aHsI to hridi dz+nyA na mA ti ra haM bud d+ho bud d+hA nAM t+yAd+ha brti nA oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na duHkhats+tshed pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUd+ha ye/ dz+nyA na kA ya wA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA
3a2: ya te na maH/ / sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rim pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum mo// // 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas a yig byung /
3a3: a yig yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ don chen 'gyur med dam pa yin// srog chen po ste skye ba med// tshig tu brjod pa spangs pa ste// rjod pa kun gyi rgyu'i mchog/ tshig kun rab tu gsal bar byed// mchod
3a4: pa chen po 'dod chags che/ / sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// mchod pa chen po zhe sdang che// nyon mongs kun gyi dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// mchod
3a5: pa chen po khro ba che/ / khro ba chen po dgra che ba// mchod pa chen po chags pa che// chags pa thams cad sel bar byed// 'dod pa chen po bde ba che// dga' ba chen po mgu ba che// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste/
3a6: kha dog che zhing lus bong che// ming yang che zhing rgya che ba// dkyil 'khor chen po yangs pa yin// shes rab chen po'i lus 'chang ba// nyon mongs lcags kyu che ba'i mchog/ grags chen snyan grags chen po
3a7: ste/ / snang ba chen po gsal ba che// mkhas pa sgyu 'phrul chen po 'chang // sgyu 'phrul chen po don grub pa// sgyu 'phrul chen po dga' bas dga'// sgyu 'phrul chen po mig 'phrul can// sbyin bdag chen po
3a8: gtso bo ste/ / tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba mchog/ bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa ste// brtson 'grus chen po pha rol gnon// bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas// shes rab chen po lus 'chang ba/ /
3b1: stobs pa tsha la thabs chag// smon lam ye shes rgya mchos// byabs chen rang bzhin dpag tu med// snying chen pa bram mchog/ shes rab chen po banan ldan// thabs cher byed pa chen
3b2: sku 'phrul chen pa stabs dang ldan/ / shugs chen mgyogs pa chen pos// rdzu 'phrul chen po che grags pa// stobs can pa rol gdon pa pa// srid pa'i rig chen po 'joms/
3b3: mkhregs shing rdo rje chen po 'chang // drag po chen po drag shul che// 'jigs chen 'jigs par byed pa po// mgon po rigs mchog chen po ste// bla ma gsang sngags che ba mchog/ theg pa
3b4: chen po'i tshul gnas pa/ / theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshogs su bcad pa bcu bzhi pa'o// / sangs rgyas rnam par
3b5: snang mdzad che/ / thub pa chen po thub chen ldan// gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba// gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can// pha rol phyin bcu thob pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu la gnas/
3b6: pha rol phyin bcu dag pa ste// pha rol phyin pa bcu'i tshul// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ste// sa bcu la ni rab tu gnas// shes bcu rnam dag bdag nyid can// shes bcu rnam dag
3b7: 'chang ba po/ / rnam pa bcu po don bcu'i don// thub dbang stobs bcu khyab pa'i bdag/ kun gyi don ni ma lus byed// rnam bcu dbang ldan che ba po// thog ma med dang spros med bdag/ de bzhin
3b8: nyid bdag dag pa'i bdag/ yang dag sgra zhing tshig gzhan med// ji skad smra ba de bzhin byed// gnyis su med dang gnyis med smra// yang dag mtha' la rnam par gnas// bdag med seng ge'i sgra
4a1: dang ldan/ mu stegs ri dgas ngan 'jigs byed// kun du 'gro ba'i don yod bgrod// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yid ltar mgyogs// rgyal ba dgra rgyal rnam par rgyal// 'khor
4a2: lo sgyur ba stobs po che/ / tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi gtso// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dbang dang ldan// mthu chen gces pa 'dzin pa ste// tshul chen gzhan gyis 'dren pa min// tshig rje tshig
4a3: bdag smra mkhas pa/ / tshig la dbang ba tshig mtha' yas// tshig bden bden par smra ba dang // bden pa bzhin ston pa po// phyir mi ldog pa phyir mi 'ong // bse ru so so 'dren pa ste// nges 'byung
4a4: sna tshogs nges 'byung ba/ / 'byung ba chen po rgyu gcig pa// dge slong dgra bcom zag pa zad// 'dod chags bral ba dbang po thul// bde ba rnyed pa 'jigs med thob// bsil bar gyur pa gos pa med/
4a5: rig pa dang ni rkang par ldan// bde gshegs 'jig rten rig pa mchog/ bdag gir mi 'dzin ngar mi 'dzin// bden pa gnyis kyi tshul la gnas// 'khor ba'i pha rol mthar gnas pa// bya ba byas
4a6: bskams sar gnas/ / ye shes 'ba' zhig nges 'byung ba// shes rab mtshon chas rnams 'joms pa// dam chos chos rgyal gsal ba ldan// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa'i mchog/ chos kyi
4a7: dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal/ / legs pa'i lam ni ston pa po// don grub grub pa'i kun rtog ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad// chos dbyings dam pa zad pa med/
4a8: bsod nams ldan pa bsod nams tshogs// ye shes ye shes 'byung gnas che// ye shes ldan pa yod med shes// tshegs gnyis tshogs dang yang dag ldan// rtag par kun rgyal rnal 'byor can/
4b1: bsam gtan bsam bya blo yi bdag/ so so rang rig mi g.yo ba// mchog gi dang po sku gsum 'chang // sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can// khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag/ sangs rgyas lnga bdag
4b2: cod pan can/ / spyan mnga' chags pa med pa 'chang // sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa po// sangs rgyas sras po dam pa mchog/ shes rab srid 'byung skye gnas te// chos kyi skye gnas srid mthar byed//
4b3: gcig pu sra la khregs rdo rje'i bdag/ 'phral du skyed pa 'gro ba'i bdag/ nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba// shes rab ye shes me bo che// 'od chen rnam par snang bar byed// ye shes snang ba lam
4b4: me bas 'gro ba'i mar me ye shes smon/ / gzi brjid chen po 'od gsal ba// rig pa'i rgyal mchog sngags dbang po// gsang sngags rgyal po don chen byed// gtsug tor chen po rma dbyung gtsug
4b5: nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs ston/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po mchog/ 'gro ba dga' ba'i mig dang ldan// sna tshogs gzugs can skyed pa po// mchod 'os rjed 'os drang srong che// rigs gsum
4b6: 'chang ba gsang sngags ldan/ / dam tshig chen po gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo dkon mchog gsum 'dzin pa// theg pa mchog gsum ston pa po// don yod zhags pa rnam par rgyal// 'dzin pa
4b7: chen po rdo rje zhags/ / rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa che// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa rkang pas dman pa nyi shu rtsa lnga'o//
4b8: rdo rje 'jigs byed 'jigs par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// mig drug lag drug stobs dang ldan// keng rus mche ba gtsigs pa po// ha lA ha la gdong brgya pa// gshin rje
5a1: ma thar byed bshegs kyi rgyal/ / rdo rje shugs can 'jigs par byed// rdo rje grags pa rje 'asrung // sgyu 'phrul rdo rje gsus pas// rdorje' sgra gnas rdorje'i dbang // rngan snying po mkha'
5a2: 'dra ba/ / mi g.yo ral pa gcig/ bsgyings pa// glang chen lpags parlon pa 'chang // drag chen hA hA zhes sgrogs pa// hI nI zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// gang mo chen mo gang rgyangs can// rdo rje
5a3: gangad mo cher sgrogs pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po bde ba che// rdo rje gtum po dga' ba che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM gi gzugs// rdo rje mda' yi mtshon 'chang ba// rdo rje ral gri
5a4: gcod mdzad pa/ / rdo rje kun 'chang rdo rje can// rdo rje gcig pu g.yul sel ba// rdo rje 'bar ba gtsigs pa'i mig/ mgo skyes rdo rje 'bar ba ste// rdo rje 'bebs pa 'bebs pa che// mig brgya pa ste rdo rje'i
5a5: mig/ rdo rje'i spu ni myu gu lus// rdo rje'i spu ni lus gcig pu// rdo rje'i rtse mo sen mos brtsams// rdo rje snying po lpags pa 'khregs// rdo rje phreng thogs dpal dang ldan// rdo rje rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/
5a6: gad rgyangs hA hA nges par sgrogs// yi ge drug pa rdo rje'i sgra// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni sgra che ba// 'jig rten gsum gcig sgra chen po// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug sgra// sgra dang ldan pa rnam/
5a7: kyi mchog/ me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa rkang pa dang bcas pa bcu'o// / yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid// yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med// stong nyid smra ba'i khyu
5a8: mchog ste/ / zab cing rgya che sgra sgrogs pa// chos kyi dung ste sgra chen po// chos kyi gaN DI sgra be che// rab tu mi gnas mya ngan 'das// phyogs bcu'i chos kyi rnga bo che// gzugs med gzugs ldan dam
5b1: pa ste/ / sna tshogs gzugs can yid rang bzhin// gzugs rnams thams cad snang ba'i dpal// gzugs brnyan ma lus 'chang ba po// snang ba med cing che bar grags// khams gsum dbang phyug
5b2: chen po ste/ / 'phags lam shin tu mthol gnas// chos kyi tog ni cher 'byung ba// 'jig rten gsum po gcig gnon lus// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan
5b3: 'chang ba/ / sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes// slob dpon 'jig rten yon tan shes// 'jig rten slob dpon 'jigs pa med// mgon skyob 'jig rten gsum khyab pa// skyabs dang skyob pa blan
5b4: med/ / nam mkha' khyab par longs spyod pa// thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes mtsho// ma rig slong nga'i sbubs 'byed pa// srid pa'i dra ba 'joms pa po// nyon mongs ma lus zhi byed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya
5b5: mtsho pha rol son/ / ye shes dbang bskur cod pan can// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan// sdug bsngal gsum gyi sdug bsngal ni// gsum mtha' mtha' yas grol gsum pa// sgrib pa
5b6: thams cad nges par grol/ / mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid la gnas// nyon mongs dri ma kun las 'das// dus gsum dus med rtogs par gnas// sems can kun gyi glu chen po// yon tan
5b7: zod can rnams kyi zod/ / lhag ma kun las rnam grol ba// nam mkha'i lam la rab gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu chen po 'chang // khyab bdag rin chen kun gyi mchog/ dpag bsam shing chen
5b8: rgyas pa ste/ / bum pa bzang po che ba mchog/ byed pa sems can kun dor byed// phan 'dogs sems cad mnyes gshin pa// bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa// khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan//
6a1: dus shes sems can dbang po shes// rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po// yon tan ldan zhing yon tan shes// chos shes rab zhi bkra shis 'byung // bkra shis kun gyi
6a2: bkra shis pa/ / grags pa dpal mo snyan pa dge/ dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che// dga' ba chen po rol pa che// bkur bsti rim gro phun sum tshogs// rab tu dga' ba grags bdag
6a3: dpal/ / mchog ldan mchog sbyin gtso bo ste// skyabs kyi dam pa skyabs su 'os// rab mchog 'jigs pa chen po'i dgra/ 'jigs pa ma lus sel ba po// gtsug phung phud pu ral pa can//
6a4: ral pa mgo reg cod pan ldan// gdong lnga gtsug phud lnga dang ldan// zur phud lnga dang ldan pa'i thod// mgo zlum brtul zhugs chen po 'chang // tshangs par spyod pa brtul zhugs mchog/ dka'
6a5: thub mthar phyin dka' thub che/ / khrus ldan gau ta ma mchog/ bram ze tshangs pa tshangs pa rig/ tshangs par mya ngan 'das pa thob// grol ba thar pa rnam grol lus// rnam grol zhi bzhi pa nyid// mya ngan 'das
6a6: zhi mya ngan 'das/ / legs par nges 'byung mthar byed pa// bde dang sdug bsngal mthar byed gnas// 'dod chags bral ba brtags pa zad// thub pa med pa dpe med pa// gsal min mi snang gos
6a7: pa med/ / cha med kun 'gro khyab pa po// phra mos sa bon zag pa med// rdul med rdul bral dri ma med// nyes pa spangs pa skyon med pa// shin tu rab sad rnam sad bdag/ thams cad ye shes kun rig
6a8: mchog/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid 'das// ye shes gnyis med tshul 'chang ba// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa// sangs rgyas thog ma tha ma med//
6b1: dang po'i sangs rgyas rigs med pa// ye shes mag gcig dam med// ye shes lus cad bzhin gshegs// chag ga dbang phyug smra na// swA ba gyis mchog smra kyil// smra ba'i dam pa
6b2: mchog gi gnas/ / smra ba'i seng ge thub pa med// kun dulte/ ba'i mchog tu dga'// gzi brjid phreng ldan pastan sdug/ 'od 'bring ba dbang pal gyi po'o// snang ba gsil bar byed pa'i 'od// sman
6b3: pa che mchog gtso bo ste/ / zug rngu 'byin pa bla na med// sman rnams ma lus ljon pa'i shing // nyon mongs nad kyi dgra tshob// sdug gu 'jig rten gsum gyi mchog/ dpal ldan d+hu skar dkyil 'khor can/
6b4: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng // 'gro ba'i gdugs gcig yangs pa ste// byams dang snying rje'i dkyil 'khor can// dpal ldan pad ma gar dbang phyug/ khyab
6b5: bdag chen po rin chen gdugs/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun bdag dngos po 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa gcig/ rdo rje rin chen
6b6: dbang bskur dpal/ / rin chen kun bdag dbang phyug ste// 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje kun 'chang mnga' bdag ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs lag nas/
6b7: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku che ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtsho dang ldan// rdo rje nyi ma snang ba che// rdo rje zla ba dri med 'od// chags bral dang po chags pa che/ kha dog sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// rdo rje dkyil dkrud
6b8: rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sangs rgyas brjod pa'i chos 'dzin pa// dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad ma skyes// kun mkhyen ye shes mdzod 'dzin pa// rgyal po sgyu 'phrul sna tshogs 'chang // che ba sa ngas
7a1: rgyas rig pa 'chang/ / rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// rnam par dag pa 'gyur med mchog/ theg pa chen po sdug bsngal gcod// mtshon cha chen po rdo rje chos// rdo rje zab mo 'dzin 'dzig/
7a2: do po gros don bzhin rig/ pha rol phyin pa kun rdzogs pa// sa rnams thams cad rnam par brgyan// rnam par dag po bdag med chos// yang dag ye shes bla 'ongad bzang // sku 'phrul drab rnal
7a3: 'byor che/ / rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ ma lus rdo rje dkyil dkrung ste// ye shes sku rnams ma lus 'chang // kun tu bzang po blo gros bzang // sa yi snying po 'gro ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas
7a4: kun gyi snying po che/ / sna tshogs sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'chang // dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin// skye med chos de sna tshogs don// chos kun ngo bo nyid 'chang
7a5: ba/ / skad cig gcig la shes rab ches// chos kun khong du chud pa 'chang // chos kun mngon par rtogs pa ste// thub pa blo mchog yang dag mtha'// mi g.yo rab tu dang ba'i bdag/ rdzogs/
7a6: pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub 'chang // sangs rgyas kun gyi mngon sum pa// ye shes me lce 'ong rab gsal// so sor gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so//
7a7: 'dod pa'i don grub dam pa ste// ngan song thams cad rnam sbyong ba// mgon po sems can kun gyi mchog/ sems can thams cad rab grol byed// nyon mongs g.yul du gcig dpa' ba// mi
7a8: shes dgra'i dregs pa 'joms/ / blo na skrag 'chang dpal dang ldan// dpa' bo mi sdug gzugs 'chang ba// lag pa'i dbyug pa brgya bskyod cing // rkang pa bskyod pas gar byed pa// dpal ldan
7b1: lag pa brgyas gang la/ / nam mkha' khyab par gar byed pa// rkang pa gcig gi mthal gnon pa// sa skang ba'i mthil la gnas// tshangs pa'i stong nga'i rtse mo gnon// nang 'brebs na mo
7b2: la gnas pa/ / don gcig gnyis med chos kyi don// dam pa'i don de 'jig pa med// rnam rig sna tshogs rang bzhin don// sems dang rnam shes rgyud dang ldan// dngos po ma lus don dga'
7b3: ba/ / stong pa nyid dga' mchog gi blo// srid pa'i 'dod chags la sogs 'das// srid pa gsum po dga' ba che// dag pa sprin dkar bzhin du dkar// 'od bzang ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od// nyi ma 'char
7b4: ka'i dkyil 'khor mdzes/ / 'dod chags chen po'i sen mo'i 'od// zur phung bzang po 'thon ka'i mchog/ sku mchog 'thon ka chen po 'chang // nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal// sangs rgyas
7b5: sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ / 'jig rten khams brgya kun bskyod pa// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa stobs chen ldan// de nyid dran pa chen po 'chang // dran pa bzhi po ting 'dzin rgyal// byang chub yan lag me tog
7b6: dga'/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan mtsho// lam gyi yan lag brgyad tshul rig/ yang dag sangs rgyas lam rig pa// sems can kun la shas cher chags// nam mkha' lta bur chags
7b7: pa med / / sems can kun gyi yid las skyes// sems can kun gyi yid ltar mgyogs// sems can kun gyi dbang don shes// sems can kun gyi yid 'phrog pa// phung po lnga don de nyid
7b8: shes/ / rnam dag phung po lnga 'chang ba// thams cad nges 'byung mtha' la gnas// thams cad nges par 'byung ba mkhas// thams cad nges 'byung lam la gnas// thams cad nges 'byung
8a1: ston pa po/ / yan lag bcu gnyis srid rtsa bton// dag pa rnam pa bcu gnyis 'chang // bden bzhi'i tshul gyi rnam pa can// shes pa brgyad po rtogs pa 'chang // bden don rnam pa bcu
8a2: gnyis ldan/ / de nyid rnam pa bcu drug rig/ rnam pa nyi shus byang chub pa// rnam par sangs rgyas kun rig mchog/ dpag med sangs rgyas sprul pa yi// sku ni bye ba 'gyed pa po// skad cig thams cad
8a3: mngon par rtogs/ / sems kyi skad cig don kun rig/ theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis// 'gro ba'i don ni rnam dbye can// theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung ni// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas/
8a4: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag/ las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa// chu bo rgya mtsho kun las rgal// sbyor ba'i dgon pa las byung ba// nyon mongs nye nyen kun nyon mongs// bag chags bcas pa rab
8a5: spangs pa/ / snying rje chen po shes rab thabs// don yod 'gro ba'i don byed pa// 'du shes thams cad rab spangs don// rnam shes don ni 'gog pa 'chang // sems can kun gyi yid kyi yul// sems can kun
8a6: gyi yid gnas pa/ / sems can kun gyi yid nang gnas// de dag sems dang mnyam nyid son// sems can kun yid tshim par byed// sems can kun gyi yid dga' ba// grub mtha' 'khrul pa ldan pa min//
8a7: 'khrul pa thams cad rnam par spangs// don gsum the tshom med pa'i blo// kun don yon tan gsum gyi bdag/ dus gsum phung po lnga yi don// skad cig thams cad rnam bsgom pa// skad cig gcig mngon
8a8: rdzogs sangs rgyas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin 'chang // lus med sku ste sku yi mchog/ sku ni bye ba rnam par 'byed// gzugs rnams ma lus kun du ston// nor bu chen po rin chen tog/ mnyam pa
8b1: nyid kyi ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa bzhig/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs byag// sangs rgyas byang chub blan med// gas sngags skye gnas yi ge med// gsang sngags chem
8b2: rigs gsum pa/ / gsang gags don pan mye ba'o// thig sa na po la ma // gong chen po yigs// rdeg mi slong ba mi rmA/ rnam pathams cad rnam pa med// bcu drug phyed phyed thig le
8b3: 'chang / / cha med cha ldan las 'das pa// bsam gtan bzhi pa'i rtse mo 'chang // bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing // ting 'dzin rigs dang chud rig pa// ting 'dzin sku ste sku yi mchog/
8b4: longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal// sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog/ sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba// phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed// ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa// lha'i dbang po lha/
8b5: yi lha// lha min dbang po sbyin byed pa dag/ b+h+rUM yi bla ma 'i tsho ming dbang // rab 'joms rab 'joms dbang phyug go// srid pa'i dag ni pa las rgal ba// skyon pa gcig pu 'gro ba'i bla// 'jig rten phyogs bcur
8b6: rab grags pa/ / chos kyi sbyin bdag cheb bo// byams pa'i go cha chas paste// snying rje yi ni ya lang bgos// shes rab la gyi mda' gzhu thogs// nyon mongs mi shes g.yul ngoso la// dpa' bo bdud dgra
8b7: bdud 'dul ba/ / bdud bzhi'i 'jigs pa mthar byed pa// bdud dpung thams cad pham par byed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'dren// mchod 'os bstod 'os phyag gis gnas// rtag tu rim gro bya ba'i
8b8: 'os/ / bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog/ phyag byar 'os pa bla ma mchog/ 'jig rten gsum po gom gcig bgrod// mkha' ltar mtha' med rnam par gnon// gsum rig gtsang ma dag pa ste// mngon
9a1: shes drug ldan rjes dran drug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdzu 'phrul chen po 'jig rten 'das// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mtha'// shes rab kyi ni de nyid thob// bdag
9a2: rig gzhan rig thams cad pa/ / kun la phan pa'i gang zag mchog/ 'jig rten dpe las 'das pa ste// shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog/ gtso bo chos kyi sbyin pa'i bdag/ phyag rgya bzhi po 'dzin ston pa/
9a3: 'gro ba'i bsnyen bkur gnas kyi mchog/ nges 'byung gsum po bgrod rnams kyi// don gyi dam pa rnam dag dpal// 'jig rten gsum gyi skal bzang che// dpal ldan 'byor ba kun byed pa// 'jam pa
9a4: dpal dang ldan pa'i mchog/ bya ba grub pa'i ye shes kyi tshigs su bcad pa bcwa lnga'o// / mchog sbyin rdo rje mchog khyod 'dud// yang dag mthar gyur khyod la 'dud// stong nyid snying po khyod
9a5: la 'dud/ / sangs rgyas byang chub khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas chags pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'dod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dgyes pa khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas rol la phyag 'tshal
9a6: 'dud/ / sangs rgyas 'dzum pa khyod la 'dud kha rgyas pa dang bakhyod pa lung / ngas rgyas rnang sa phyag 'tshal 'dung // sangs rgya sathugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// dngos med las byung khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud//
9a7: nam mkha' las byung khyod la 'dud// ye shes las byung khyod la 'dud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas gar mdzad khyod la 'dud// thams cad thams cad khyod la 'dud// ye shes chu ni khyod la
9a8: 'dud do / / ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ye shes kyi bstod pa tshigs su bcing pa lnga'o// / lag na rdo rje rjerje 'chang // 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes kyi sku dang /
9b1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang / 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ma 'dres pa yongs su dag pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'o// khyod kyi bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab
9b2: tu dang ba dang / mgu ba chen po yang dag par bskyed pa'i don dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / yongs su ma rdzogs pa dang / yongasu ma dag pa'i sa dang / üha
9b3: rol tu phyin pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i phyir dang / bla na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir dang / ma thob pa thob
9b4: pa'i phyir dang / ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang / bdag gis bstan pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bshad pa dang / rnam par bgrol
9b5: ba dang / rnam par phye ba dang / rab tu gsal bar byas pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'o// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang 'di ni ngas khyod kyi rgyud la gsang sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs/
9b6: kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o// 'di ni 'khor lo dang po'i rjes su bsngags pa'o// / gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni
9b7: shin du yongs su dag pa/ / yongs su byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bo//
9b8: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'o// rgyal
10a1: ba rnams kyi bdud kyi stobs thams cad pam par byed pa'o/ / sogs bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs bcu'i skabs su gyur pa'o// thams cad pa khyed pa'i ye shes rnams kyi
10a2: thams cad mkhyen pa'o/ / chos thams cad kyi lung ngo // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang dag par kun chub pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drim med pa shin du yongs su dag pa'o/
10a3: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rab tu skye ba'o// lha dang mi thams cad kyi phun sum tshogs pa'i zhing ngo // theg pa chen po'i
10a4: rab tu gnas pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 'byung khung ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yang dag pa'i mthar thug pa'o// rnam par grol ba rnams kyi brtag pa'o// nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi skyed
10a5: pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud mi 'chad pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rigs dang rgyud rab tu 'phel ba'o// pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad kyi tsher gcod pa'o// mu stegs pa
10a6: thams cad kyi rnam par 'joms pa'o/ / bdud bzhi'i stobs dang dpung dang sde rnams kyi pham par byed pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi yang dag par sdud pa'o// nges par 'byung bas bgrod pa thams
10a7: cad kyi 'phags pa'i lam yongs su smin pa'o/ / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin no// sems rtse gcig pa rnams kyi bsam gtan no// lus dang ngag dang yid mngon par sbyor
10a8: ba rnams kyi rnal 'byor ro/ / yang dag par sbyor ba thams cad kyi kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba'o// nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi spong ba'o// sgrib pa thams cad kyi nye bar
10b1: zhi ba'o/ / 'ching ba thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'o// lhag ma thams cad kyi thar pa'o// sems nye bar 'phro ba thams cad kyizhi ba'o// 'byor pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas so// rgud
10b2: pa thams cad kyi rab tu 'joms pa'o/ / ngan song gi sgo thams cad kyi 'gabs pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i grong khyer gyi lam dam pa'o// 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'i rab tu mi 'jug pa'o// chos kyi
10b3: 'khor lo yi rab tu skor ba'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rab tu sgreng ba'o// dam pa'i chos ston pa'i lhag par gnas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'
10b4: sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa spyod pa rnams kyi myur du grub pa'o/ / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sbyor ba rnams kyi sgom pa lhag par rtogs pa'o// gnyis su med pa so sor rtogs pa sgom pa mngon
10b5: par sbyor ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'o/ / pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshogs thams cad kyi skyed pa'o// yongs su dag pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'o//
10b6: yang dag pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams kyi so sor rtogs pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi po rnams kyi chos thams cad gcig pa'i sems so sor rtogs pa'o// mtshan yang
10b7: dag par brjod pa 'di ni ji srid sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad kyi yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar ro/ / 'di ni 'khor lo gnyis pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so//
10b8: gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun du spyad pa'i sdig pa ma lus pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// sems can
11a1: thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'o/ / ngan 'gro thams cad zlog pa'o// las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'o// mi khom pa brgyad du skye bar
11a2: 'gyur ba thams cad kyi mi skye bar byed pa'o/ / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad nges par sel ba'o// mtshan ma ngan pa thams cad rnam par sel
11a3: bar byed pa'o/ / ltas ngan pa dang bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// bdud kyi dgra'i lus thams cad thag ring du byed pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'phel
11a4: bar byed pa'o/ / tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o// rgyags pa dang nga rgyal dang dregs pa dang ngar 'dzin pa thams cad nges par 'jom par byed pa'o// sdug
11a5: bsngal dang yid mi bde ba thams cad mi skye bar byed pa'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o// nyan thos dang
11a6: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen du gyur pa'o/ / phyag rgya dang sngags thams cad du gyur pa'o// chos thams cad brjod du med par smra ba rnams kyi dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par skyed pa'o//
11a7: bla na med pa'i shes rab dang yid gzhungs par byed pa'o// nad med pa dang stobs dang dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par byed pa'o// dpal dang dge ba dang zhi ba dang legs pa rab tu 'phel bar byed pa 'o/
11a8: grags pa dang snyan pa dang tshigs su bcad pa dang bstod pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa'o// nad dang 'jigs pa chen po thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'o// shin du dag pa rnams kyi shin du
11b1: dag pa'o/ / shin du gtsang ba rnams kyi shin du gtsang ba'o// shin du 'byor ldan rnams kyi shin du 'byor ldan no// shin du bkra shis pa rnams kyi shin du bkra shis pa'o// skyabs 'dod pa rnams kyi
11b2: skyabs so/ / gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas so// skyob pa 'dod pa rnams kyi skyob pa'o// dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen no// gling 'dod pa rnams kyi gling du gyur pa'o// rten med pa rnams kyi
11b3: bla na med pa'i rten du gyur pa'o/ / srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol du 'gro ba rnams kyi grur gyur pa'o// nad thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyir sman pa'i rgyal po chen por gyur pa'o// blang bar bya ba dang dor bar
11b4: bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dbye ba'i phyir shes rab tu gyur pa'o/ / lta ba ngan pa'i mun pa'i smag rum thams cad bsal ba'i phyir ye shes kyi snang bar gyur pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang 'dod
11b5: pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bur gyur pa'o/ / 'jam dpal gyi ye shes kyi sku rab tu thob pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur pa'o// spyan lnga rab tu thob pa'i
11b6: phyir yongs su dag pa'i ye shes gzigs par gyur pa'o/ / zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa dang chos kyi sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba nyid kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa'o// bsod
11b7: rnams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyis sa bcu rab tu thob par gyur pa'o/ / gnyis kyi chos dang bral ba'i phyir gnyis su med pa'i chos nyid/ khyag par blo 'dag pa dang bral
11b8: ba nyid kyi phyir de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin dang gzhan ma yin pa'i chos nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku yongs su dag pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin nyid
12a1: do/ lta ba ngan pa'i tshang tshing ma lis pa nges par sel ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad chen po stond pa nyid kyi rang bzhin nyid do/ / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di ni 'di ltar gnyis su med pa'i
12a2: chos nyid kyi don dang ming yang dag par 'dzin pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis chos thams cad brjod du med par gyur pa'o/ / 'di ni 'khor lo gsum pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gnyis so// //
12a3: gzhang yang la thun rdo rdo 'chang // rigs kyi bu'i ma rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sngags rgya gyur spyod pa spyod pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i ye shes kyi klu/ de ba'i na gshegs
12a4: pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku gnyis su med pa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs pa/ ma tshang ba med pa/ dum bu ma yin pa/ tshigs
12a5: su bcad pa dang / tshig dang yi ge 'di rnams nyid kyis nyi ma so sor dus gsum du 'dzin par byed pa dang / rjod par byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / gzhan rnams la
12a6: yang dus ji lta bar rgyas par ji lta ba bzhin rab tu gsal bar byed pa dang / mtshan gyi don gzhan dang gzhan re re zhing yang 'jam dpal ye shes kyi sku mngon du byas te/ yid rtse gcig pas sgom par byed
12a7: pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / de kho na yid la byed pa dag gis kun nas sgo'i gnas pas gnas pa dang / chos thams cad so sor rtogs pa dang / mchog tu gyur pa dang / rnyog pa med pa dang /
12a8: shes rab kyis rjes su 'bigs pa dang / dang pos yang dag par bgrod pa de la ni// dus gsum du dus med par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par 'dus te/ yang
12b1: dag par gshegs shing yang dag par byon nas chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams nye bar ston par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid sgom pa nye bar ston par byed do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
12b2: thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rlung la yang dag par byin gyis rlob par byed do/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su 'dzin pas kyang
12b3: rjes su 'dzin par byed do/ / chos thams cad la mi 'jigs pa'i spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub par byed do// dgra bcom pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i chos
12b4: la sdug pa'i bsam pa nyid kyis bdag gi dngos po yang nye bar ston par byed do/ / gdul dka' ba 'dul ba po rnams kyang khro bo'i rgyal po chen po dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po la sogs pa 'gro ba yongs su
12b5: skyob par gyur pa gzugs sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i sku rnams kyis mdangs dang stobs dang gzi brjid zil gyis mi non pa nyid dang / sngags dang phyag rgya dang mngon par rtogs pa dang dkyil 'khor
12b6: rnams nye bar ston par byed do/ / sngags dang rig pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa dang / bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud dang ngag phyir rgol ba dang gzhan gyis mi thub pa chen po thams cad kyang / mtshan mo dang
12b7: nyin mor bcas par skad cig so sor spyod lam dang lam rnams su yang / srung ba deng skyob pa dang / sbed par byed do// tshangs pa dang / dbang po dang / nye dbang po dang / drag po dang / sred med
12b8: kyi bu dang / kun 'gyed gzhon du dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / smad drug gi bu dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / 'phrog ma dang /
13a1: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten skyong ba gang yin pa de rnams thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu mtshan mo dang / nyin mor bcas pa 'gro ba dang / gnas pa dang nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang / gnyid
13a2: log pa dang / gnyid sad pa dang / mnyam par bzhag pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / gcig pur gnas pa dang / skye bo mang po'i nang du son pa dang / ji srid grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang
13a3: ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang na gnas pa dang / dbang po'i phur pa dang / sgo khang dang / lam srang dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo dang / grong khyer gyi bar dang / tshong khang gi nang du
13a4: gnas pa dang / ji srid khang stong dang / ri dang dgon pa dang chu klung dang dur khrod dang / nags tshang tshing du nye bar son pa dang / 'bags pa dang / ma 'bags pa dang / myos pa dang / rab tu myos pa na rtag tu thams
13a5: cad kyi 'tshe ba thams cad du mchog tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyin mo dang mtshan mo mchog tu bde legs su byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
13a6: dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang / gzhan yang gang gza' dang rgyu skar dang ma mo dang / tshogs kyi bdag po rnams dang / gang
13a7: yang ma mo bdun po rnams dang / gang yang gnod sbyin mo dang srin mo dang sha za mo rnams te/ de rnams thams cad lhan cig 'thun par lnga dang bcas pa dang / 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ spyod lam dang
13a8: lam rnams su yang mchog tu srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang de'i lus la mdangs dang stobs rab tu 'jug par byed do// nad med pa dang / stobs dang tshe 'phel ba yang
13b1: nye bar sgrub par byed do/ / 'di ni 'khor lo bzhi pa'i rjes su bsngags pa bcu dgu'o// // gzhan yang lag na rdo rje rje rje 'chang // mtshan yang dag par brjod pa gtsug gi nor bu zhes bya ba 'di ni nyi ma so sor ma
13b2: nyams pa yang dag par blangs te/ mgrin par gnas pa lan gsum du kha don du byed pa dang / glegs bam du chud pa klog par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems
13b3: dpa'i gzugs la dmigs te/ de'i gzugs kyi rjes su sems par byed pa dang / de'i gzugs kyi rjes su bsam gtan byed pas de nyid sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku yis yun mi ring ba nyid las gdul bya'i dbang
13b4: nye bar bzung nas mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sna tshogs pa'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sku dang / lhan cig gnas pa nam mkha'i mthil na bzhugs pa rnams kyang
13b5: mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / sems dpa' chen po de'i skye ba ji ltar gyur kyang ngan 'gro dang / ngan song du ltung ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs ngan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// yul mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo
13b6: skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ / dbang po dman par mi 'gyur ro// dbang po mtshang bar mi 'gyur ro// log par lta ba'i rigs su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su skye
13b7: bar mi 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang nges bstan pa'i chos spong ba dang lkog tu gyur par mi 'gyur ro// lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro// mu ge dang nang dang mtshon gyi bskal pa rnams la skye bar
13b8: mi 'gyur ro/ / snyigs ma lnga'i dus rnams la skye bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po dang chom rkun dang dga'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgud pa dang dbul ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'thung bar mi 'gyur
14a1: mi bsngags pa dang / skur pa 'debs pa dang / smod pa dang / mi snyan pa dang / grags pa ngan pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// skye ba bzang
14a2: po dang / rigs dang rus phun sum tshogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun nas mdzes par gyur pa dang / gzugs dang kha dog dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// 'jig
14a3: rten pa rnams kyi sdug pa dang / yid la 'bab pa dang / 'grogs na mchog tu bde ba dang / mthong na dga' bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten pa rnams kyi mdzes pa dang / skal pa
14a4: bzang po dang ldan pa dang tshig bzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// longs spyod che ba dang / 'khor mang ba dang / longs spyod
14a5: mi zad pa dang / 'khor mi zad par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa'i smon lam dang ye shes dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis kyang pha rol tu
14a6: byin pa drug gi yon tan dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la gnas par 'gyur ro// dran pa dang shes bzhin dang / thabs dang stobs dang smon lam dang /
14a7: ye shes dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa dang / smra mkhas par yang 'gyur ro// tshig gsal ba dang / blun po ma yin pa dang /
14a8: xxxxxxxxxx/ xxxxxxxxxx
14b1: blo gsal bar 'gyur ro/ / mkhas pa dang / le le mod pa dang / chog shes pa dang / don che ba dang / sred pa med par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu yid brtan par
14b2: bya ba dang / slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / bkur bar bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sngon ma thos pa'i bzo dang / rtsis dang shes pa dang / bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung las rab tu gsal bar
14b3: yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ro/ / shin du yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'tsho ba dang / kun tu spyod pa spyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// legs par rab tu 'byung ba dang / legs par
14b4: bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi sems rab tu brjod pa med par 'gyur ro// nyan thos dang dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa dang /
14b5: bgrod pa la gnas par nam yang mi 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'khor lo lnga pa'i rjes su bsngags pa lnga bcu rtsa gcig go// / lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / de ltar yon
14b6: tan dpag tu med pa dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// rnam pa de lta bu'i yon tan dpag tu med pa gzhan rnams dang yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / don dam pa'i
14b7: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa 'di yang dag par 'dzin pa'i skyes bu gang zag ni ring po mi thogs par bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs legs par bsags te/ shin du myur bar sangs rgyas kyi yon
14b8: xxxxxxxxxx/ xxxxxxxxxx
15a1: tan rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bskal pa mang por yongs
15a2: su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos kyis sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i chos ston pa po dang / phyogs bcur chos kyi rnga bo che lhag par gnas pa'i chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// 'di ni
15a3: 'khor lo drug pa'i rjes su bsngags pa dpag tu med pa'o/ / / oM sarba d+harma a b+hA ba swa b+hA wa bi shud d+ha badz+ra a AH/ pra kri ti pa ri shud d+hAHsarba d+harmA ya
15a4: du ta sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na kA ya/ many+dzu shrI pa ri shud d+hi tA mu pA dA ye ti a AHsarba ta thA ga ta hrid ya ha ra ha ra oM hUM hrIHb+ha ga ban dz+nyA na mA Ni/ bA g+ni shwa ra pA hA pA tsa/ sarba d+harmA ga ga na a ma la su pa ri shud
15a5: d+ha/ d+harmA d+hA tu dz+nyA na gar+b+ha AH/ sngags dgod pa'o// / de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'tshang // dga' ning mgunas thal mo sbyar// mgon pa bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs/
15a6: rdzogs sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas// rnam mang mgon po gzhan rnams dang // gsang dbang lag na rdo rje de// khro bo'i rgyal po rabacas rnams kyis// gsang bstod nas ni tshig
15a7: 'di gsol/ / mgon po bdag cag rjes yid rang // legs so legs so legs par gsungs// bdag cag yang dag rdzogs pa yi// byang chub thob pa'i don chen mdzad// 'gro
15a8: xxxxxxxxxx/ xxxxxxxxxx
15b1: mgon med rnams dang ni/ / rnam grol 'bras bu 'tshal ba yi// rnam dag legs pa'i lam 'di na// sna 'phrul dra ba'i tshul bstan pa// zab cing yangs la rgya ba// don chen 'gro ba'i don
15b2: byed pa/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul 'di na// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis bshad// nye bar bsgrub// rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyung stu phrul dra ba stong phrag bcu drug pa/
15b3: ting nge 'dzin dra ba'i le'u las phyung ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa'i don dam pa'i mtshan yang dag par brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub
15b4: pas gsungs pa rdzogs so/ / / thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa'i gsung rab thams cad la dbang 'byor pa'i bdag nyid chen po bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka 'drin gyis
15b5: nye bar bskyangs pa/ sgra sbur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong blo gros brtan pas/ bsam gtan gling gi dben gnas su legs par bsgyur cing dag par byas pa'o// sngon gyi sgra bsgyur chen po de dag gis/
15b6: rgyud 'di bsgyur cing kun la grags lags mod// 'on kyang sgra don gtsug lag ji bzhin du// rgud 'di thobartan gnyis bas legs par bskur// zab cing rgya tshe rdo rje theg pa yi// nges don
15b7: ye shes don gnyer skyes bu dag/ chos dang don la legs par ma brten par// gang zag tshig 'bru'i rjes sum 'brang zhig// dge 'o legs so//
15b8: xxxxxxxxxx/ xxxxxxxxxx
16a1: rgya gar skad du/ se kod de sha/ bong skad du// dbang mdor bsan/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// zla ba bzang pos gsol pa/ ston pa dbang bskur rnam bdun dang / rnam
16a2: gsum de bzhin bla na med/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub phyir// mdor bsdus pa yis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig zla bas yang bsrung nga// rnam pa bdun
16a3: dang rnam gsum mchog/ rtsa yi kun spyod rtsol ba ni// mdor bstan pa yis khyod la bshad// chung ngu mdor bstan rnam gsum dang // rgyas par bshad pa rnam gsum 'gyur// rab tu mdor bstan mdor bstan che
16a4: rab tu rgyas par bshad pa gzhan/ / mdor bstan rgyas par bshad pa nyid// rgyud yang dag par bsdus pa brjod// rab tu mdor bstan rgyas bshad pa// bka' 'grel tshig ni 'byed pa'o// mdor bstan chen po rgyas
16a5: bar bshad pa nyid/ / 'grel bshad thams cad don sngon byed// de ni mngon shos thob rnams kyis// bya yi mkhas rnams kyis min nyid// de ltar mtha' drug rnams kyis dag/ rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam bzhi dang /
16a6: rdzogs pa'i byang chub bzhi rnams dang // phung khams skye mched rigs drug rnams// dag pa 'jig rten khams la sogs// le'u lnga yi gzhung rnams kyis// bden gnyis dang po'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// dus
16a7: kyi 'khor lo mngon rjod byed/ / dang por dbang bskur bdun po gang // byis pa rnams ni gzhug pa'i phyir// rnam gsum 'jig rten kun bgyis/ dam pa'i don gyis bzhi pa'o// bden pa gnyis kyi chos rnams kyi/
16a8: rdo rje can bdag gis bstan pa// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa dang // dam pa'i don gyi bden pas so// chu dang cod pan dang dbyangs dag/ rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs che// ming dang rjes gnang yang dag ldan //
16b1: dbang bskur rnam bdun mi yi bdag/ lus ngag sems ni legs dag pa// mngon par dbang bskur gnyis gnyis so// rjes gnang ye shes yang dag dag/ gzhan pa khams sogs dag pa las// chu ni
16b2: khams kyi dag pa ste/ / cod pan phung po rnam skyong byed// dar dbyangs pha rol phyin pa dag/ rdo rje dril bu mi 'gyur che// sangs rgyas skar rgyun mi 'chad pa// nyi zla gcig tu dag par byed// yul dang dbang po legs
16b3: dag pa/ 'pho med rdo rje'i brtul zhugs 'gyur// ming ni byams sogs yang dag dag/ rjes gnang sangs rgyas nyid dag byed// dbang bskur bdun po 'di rnams yin// dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas sbyin par bya//
16b4: bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang // shes rab ye shes mngon rjod pa// slar yang shes rab chen po nyid// de yi ye shes mngon rjod byed// 'gyur dang 'gyur dang de nas 'dzag/ de nas gzhan yang mi 'jog
16b5: pa'o/ / lus ngag sems ni logs dag pas// dbang bskur gsum po rim pa yis// bzhi pa ye shes yang dag dag/ lus ngag sems ni dag par byed// byis pa dang ma de nas rgan// bzhi pa skye dgu'i bdag
16b6: po'o/ / shes rab nu mar yan lag ni// reg pas byang chub sems 'pho'i bde// 'o ma 'dzin pas dbang bskur ba// gang las bde thob de byis pa'o// yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// byang chub sems ni 'pho
16b7: ba'i bde/ / gsang ba'i dbang bskur gsum pa ni// gang las bde thob de dar ma// yun ring gsang bar spros las skyes// rdo rje'i rtse mor g.yo ba'i bde// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba// gang las
16b8: g.yo ba'i bgrod de rgan/ / phyag rgya chen po rjes chags las// skyes pa g.yo med bde ba ni// shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba// gang las g.yo med rtogs pa de// skye dgu'i bdag por rnam shes bya//
17a1: skyob pa thams cad skyed mdzad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang sems gnyis med mi 'gyur ba// 'di ni dam tshig sems dpar 'gyur// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rnam pa bzhi// dus
17a2: kyi 'khor lo 'dir bshad pa/ / rnal 'byor pa yi thar ster byed// 'di nyid kyi ni sgrub pa bya// rab gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// du sogs mtshan ma de rnams kyi// shes rab gzugs brnyan nam mkha'
17a3: mnyam/ / yod dang med las rnam par 'das// rang gi sems kyi rkyen gyi don// rdul phran las skyes tshogs pa rnams// kun nas yongs su dor ba yis// du ba smig rgyu mkha' snang dang // sgron ma 'bar
17a4: ba zla nyi ma/ / mun can cha dang thig le che// sna tshogs gzugs brnyan 'od gsal ba// bkab dang ma bkab mig dag gis// stong par 'di ni rjes brtags min// rmi lam bzhin du gzugs mthong 'gyur//
17a5: rtag tu gzugs de bsgom par bya// dngos med gzugs la skom pa de// rnal 'byor pa yi bsgom ma yin// dngos po dngos med sems kyi min// stong par ma brtags mthong phyir ro// ji ltar bra phab/
17a6: me long la// gzhon nu mas mthong dngos med skyes// de bzhin 'das dang ma 'ongs chos// mkha' la de nyid rnal 'byor pas// 'di las dngos po dngos med 'gyur// dngos po stong pa'i don mthong phyir//
17a7: dngos po dngos med don yod pa// sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin// med pa'i chos can dag la chos// skye ba 'di ni rab tu 'byung // yid bzhin nor ltar mtha' yas pa'i// sems can bsam pa yongs
17a8: rdzogs byed/ / pra phab pa yi gzhon nu mas// ma mthong ba yi rkun po mthong // nyi tshe ba yi mig dag gi/ song nas sgrub pa po yis mthong // gal te yod pa'i gzugs mthong na// rang gi gdong pa cis mi
17b1: mthong / / gal te med pa'i gzugs mthong na// ri bong rA ni ji ltar min// gzhan gyi mig gis mi mthong zhing // rang gi mig gis mthong min pa// skye ba med pa mthong ba ni// gzhon nu ma yi bu ji bzhin// gzugs
17b2: brnyan mthong na de nas ni/ / bar ma chad par srog rtsol bya// steng 'og rtswa gsum po rnams la// lus ngag sems ni 'gog pa las// zla nyi sgra gcan bshang gci dang // khu ba 'bab pa'i lam rnams su// chu me
17b3: stong pas rlung dang / / ye shes khams rnams skyed rnams la// gang zhig zla nyi mun can dang // bshang gci khu ba 'bab ma rnams// srog dang thur sel rim pa yis// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams so// zla ba
17b4: thabs kyi sku yin te/ / nyin mor byed pa shes rab gsung // shes rab sku ni bshang ba'i rtsa// gci ba 'bab ma gtso bo'i gsung // steng 'og thugs kyi rtsa gnyis dag/ mun can khu ba 'bab ma'o// thabs kyi thugs
17b5: ni mun pa can/ / khu ba 'bab ma shes rab kyi// steng 'og rigs drug 'di rnams ni// sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor las// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// lus can kun la yang dag gnas// mchi
17b6: lhas lus ngag rtsa dag la/ / steng 'og lhag pa'i rlung rnams kyis// mun can khu ba 'bab ma la// skye ba dang ni 'chi ba gnas// skye dang 'chi dang 'khrig pa yi// dus su khu ba 'bab pa'o// mun can ma yang steng du
17b7: 'bab/ / nyi ma'i 'pho ba mnyam pa la// dus sbyor 'char ba'i mngon mtshams su// dbu ma nas ni mnyam pa 'bab// rkang pa dang bcas lnga bcu drug/ 'byung dang 'jug pa'o mi yi bdag/ bdun bcu rtsa lngas lhag
17b8: pa yi/ / drug brgya nyin dang mtshan la'o// drug brgya rnams kyis lhag pa yi stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig po'i// 'di yis dman pa gang de rnams// g.yon dang bcas pa'i rtsar 'bab po// phyogs gsum dang bcas
18a1: lo gsum rnams/ / lo brgya rnams las dbu ma'o// steng du g.yon g.yas zla nyi ma// brkyang ma lug dang ser skya gzhan// chu dang me yi rang bzhin can// pad ma rin chen 'dzin pa 'dod// 'og tu
18a2: bshang gci 'bab pa dag/ sa dang rlung gi rang bzhin can// dbu ma'i rtsa dang g.yon pa yang // 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin par 'dod// steng dang 'og tu dbu ma g.yas// sgra gcan khu ba rab 'bab pa// stong pa ye shes rang
18a3: bzhin can/ / rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod// zla ba'i lam gyis bshang ba'i rtsa// nyi mas gci ba 'bab pa ste// skye 'chi mnyam pa chags pa la// sgra gcan khu ba rab tu 'bab// lte ba'i steng du kun 'dar ma// gang de yid
18a4: bzang mun pa 'bab/ / 'og tu khu ba 'bab gang de// mkha' 'gro gdong dang dud can ma// lte ba'i chu skyes snying mgrin dang // dpral ba gtsug tor 'dam skyes la// sa chu me rlung stong pa rnams// rab tu 'bab pa sdud pa yis//
18a5: 'byung 'gyur de ni 'jug pa dag/ skyed pas 'jug ste sa la'o// lte ba nas ni lte ba'i dbus// a ba d+hU tIr 'gro dang 'od// lte gsad nor bu'i chu skyes la// lus ngag sems rnams 'bab pa ni// 'byung dang de ni 'jug pa
18a6: dag/ sdud dang skyed pa'i rang bzhin can// dung can skye bo thams cad kyi// thur sel rlung ni 'bab pa'o// 'di rnams bud med bde ba las// khu ba khrag 'bab dus dag tu// shes rab thabs dngos yan lag gis// steng du
18a7: g.yas dang g.yon ngag dang / / 'og tu bshang gci 'bab pa dang // rdul dang khu ba 'bab pa dag/ rdul 'bab phyir te gtum mo ste// khu ba 'bab byir mkha' 'gro gdong // steng du brjod dus bud med kyi// g.yung mo skyes bu'i
18a8: kun 'dar ma/ / rnam shes la sogs dkyil 'khor lnga// rtag tu g.yon pa'i rtsa la'o// sa sogs g.yas pa'i rtsa la ste// dbus su drug pa 'bab pa'o// lte ba'i pad ma'i 'dab ma la// dkyil 'khor drug bcu rnams
18b1: rim bzhin/ / g.yon dang g.yas pa'i dus sbyor ni// lus sogs glang la sogs pa la// rtsa ba g.yon dang de nas g.yas// steng dang dbus su rim pas rlung // sa sogs dkyil 'khor re re zhing /
18b2: dbyug gus sdug dgapa'o/ ma pas nu chod 'bab pa ni// drug bcu dang bcas sum brgya'i dbugs// bcu phyug bcwo brgyang dbugs de rnams// chu cod ltar ni 'bab pa'o// chu cod drug bcu nyid mtshan du// lus
18b3: la dkyil 'khor rnams zhes pa'o/ / 'dab ma'i dbus dang de nas shar// g.yas g.yon gzhan du rim pa yis// g.yon der rtag tu nam mkha' sogs// g.yas par sa sogs gzhan las so// g.yon
18b4: par rnam shes sogs 'byung ba/ / g.yas par sa sogs sdud pa'o// nub dang shar du 'dzin ma rlung // phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// mthe bong ming med dag gis ni// gang phyir kha la dbang bsgyur ba/
18b5: g.yas dang g.yon du me dang chu// phan tshun shes rab thabs yin te// gung mo 'dzub mo gnyis dag gis// gang phyir ral grir 'gyur ba'o// zla phyed rnam pa'i phyag rgya ni// mche ba gri gug mthe chung ste// stong pa mi
18b6: 'gyur steng 'og tu/ / phan tshun thabs dang shes rab po// dkyil 'khor bcu po yang dag sbyor// sor mo rnams ni phan tshun du// mgo bor lag 'thil sbyar ba la// gri gug dang bcas rtse gcig go// dbu ma'i rtsal mnyam
18b7: pa ste/ / skyeng dang sdud pa'i byed pa po// phung po khams dang rdo rje gsum// gcig nyid dbu mar son pa na'o// zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa 'gags nas/ bshang ba gtso ba'i rtsa 'gag go// sgra gcan rtsa ni 'gags pa na// 'og tu khru
18b8: ba 'bab 'gag 'gyur/ / skyed dang sdud pa'i byed pa can// 'di rnams grol na grol bar 'gyur// srog dang thur sel lam gsum gyis// 'di ni rtsa yi kun spyod do// / g.yon pa 'am ni g.yas pa la// mtshan mo
19a1: gcig dang de bzhin lngar/ / lhag pa'i rlung ni rab 'bab pa// de las lo gsum na 'chi'o// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'chi ltas la// lnga dang phyogs tshes nyi shu dang // de nyid gcig lhag gzhan rim
19a2: pas/ / nyin zhag/ sum bcu gsum rgyun// gsum gnyis gcig lo zla ba ni// drug gsum zung zla nyin zhag tshes// phyogs lnga yon tan gnyis gcig gis// lus can rnams kyi tshe 'gro'o// rtsa ba nas gcig
19a3: lhag pa yis/ / g.yon par zla ba'i rgyu bar 'gyur// nyan zla nyin zhag zla ba dag/ nyin zhag gsum rnams zla ba gsum// nyin la 'chi ltas zla bar dag/ 'phel 'grib de nas 'di dag la// dbu ma'i 'chi ba'i rgyu ba
19a4: ni/ lo brgya yongs su rdzogs pa yis// mnyam dang mi mnyam nyin zhag rnams// skye bar skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// de rgyu g.yas dang g.yon la yang // phyogs gnyis rnam par mnyam pa las// gzhan du 'chi
19a5: bar mi 'gyur te/ / phyogs gnyis yang dag gnas pa na// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i kun spyod dang // dkyil 'khor lnga rnams 'bab pa'i phyir// 'chi ltas mtshan nyid shes nas ni// srog ni thig ler gzhug par bya// a
19a6: bad+hU tI'i zhabs brten nas/ / mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgom par bya// rtag tu rdo rje bslang bar bya// zla nyi'i bgrod pa 'joms pa las// gzhan du kun 'dar yan lag la// srog gi rlung ni 'jug pa med// 'og tu'ang dung can
19a7: mthur sel/ / de ma zhugs las 'chi ba'o// 'chi ltas slu ba rnal 'byor pa'i// 'di ni dga' ba rnams kyis 'gyur// mgo bo'i pad ma gtsug/ tor las// khu ba 'ongs pa dga' ba ste// 'grin pa snying khar mchog dag
19a8: 'o/ / dga' bral dga' ba de nas 'gyur// sna tshogs dga' ba lte ba dang // gsang ba'i pad mar gang 'ongs pa'o// gsang gnas rdo rje nor bu'i bar// lhan pacig skyes dga' mi 'phob// rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa
19b1: min/ chags chen mi 'gyur khyab bdag go/ 'dod chags bral las 'pho med bde// de ni mya ngan 'das rab gnas// khu ba zla 'char gtsug tor du// rdzogs pa gsang ba'i mtsho skyes la// bcu drug cha gang de nor
19b2: bu'i pad mar rdo rje'i rtse mor gnas/ / de steng 'pho ba'i dus su 'gyur// nag po'i tshes gcig 'ongs pa na// 'dod chags bral bas gnam stong la// nyi ma mdzod spu'i gnas su 'gro// de'i cha shas bcu drug ma
19b3: gtsug tor pad mar son pa'o/ / zla ba nyams pa zhes brjod de// chags pa'i bde la chags bral phyir// lus can thams cad 'chi ba na// zla ba bdud rtsi 'og tu 'gro// steng du nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes
19b4: dngos po'i mtshan nyid la/ / de phyir zla ba bdud rtsi ni// steng du bgrod bya mi yi bdag/ 'og tu nyi ma rdul sgra gcan// rnam shes 'gyur med bde ba la// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzod spu yi// pad mar zla ba bdud rtsi nya//
19b5: nyi rdul gnam stong gsang bar te// gtsug tor nor bur de dag go/ zhes pa ston pa'i rdo rje'i tshig/ lus can kun gyi phyin ci log/ rab gnas mya ngan 'das pa min// khams rnams phyin ci log tu 'gyur// nor
19b6: bur thugs dang gsang bar gsung / / lte bar sku ste bde chen las// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'di rnams dag pa'i sku las spro// thabs kyi 'og tu rgyal po'i dbang // shes rab kyi ni steng du 'gyur//
19b7: 'di yi dpral bar sku rdo rje// mgrin snying lte ba'i 'dam skyes la// gsung thugs ye shes rdo rje rnams// sprul pa la sogs 'di rnams spro// phung po khams rnams spro ba ni// sgrib pa med pa'i bde ba las// las
19b8: kyi phyag rgya'i snyoms 'jug dang / / ye shes phyag rgya'i dmigs pa dang // phyag rgya chen po gcig sbyor bas// mi 'gyur ba de 'phel bar 'gyur// 'phel ba'i 'phel bar 'gyur ba med// nyams pa'i nyams pa nyid
20a1: kyang med la nub pa de yi nub pa med/ / 'char ba yi ni 'char ba med// rab tu gsal ba'i rab gsal med// bkab pa'i bkab pa yang med do// skye ba'i skye bar 'gyur nyid med// 'chi ba'i 'chi ba yang med
20a2: do/ grol ba'i grol bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi gnas pa yi mi gnas med// dngos po med pa'i dngos med med// dngos po'i dngos po nyid kyang med// 'gyur ba'i 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'ang med// mi 'gyur ba'i yang mi 'gyur
20a3: med/ rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams kyi// skye 'jig sgyu ma de bzhin no// 'byung rnams 'jig par 'gyur min te// rang bzhin nyid kyis skye mi 'gyur// sna tshogs 'di ni rang bzhin med// dngos po dngos med mtshan nyid
20a4: gcigs rang gi shes rab la 'khyud sems/ / rdo rje nor bu'i pad mar son// der son zla ba g.yo ba dang // mi g.yo ba dang mi 'gyur bsgom// lus ngag sems kyi rtsa rnams su// sku gsung thugs rnams bsgom pa
20a5: ste/ rdo rje gsum rnams legs bsdus pa// ye shes dung can mar bsgom pa'o// shes rab chags pas zhu ba yi// thig le rim pas mgo bo las// rdzogs pa'i gnas su zhugs rnams kyang // 'ching ba
20a6: dam pa'i don gyis so/ / ji ltar zla shar rim pa yis// cha rnams kyis ni rdzogs par 'gyur// grib ma nyams pa rdzogs pa ste// zla ba chad dang rdzogs pa min// de bzhin ye shes shar rim pas// sa rnams kyis ni rdzogs
20a7: par 'gyur/ / nyon mongs la sogs nyams pa rdzogs// ye shes tshad dang rdzogs pa min// ji ltar ri bong mtshan mas dbus// rdzogs par ri bong can mi gnas// de bzhin 'gyur med bde bar sems// 'khor ba'i
20a8: bag chags mtshan ma yis/ / skyed dang rab tu nyams pa'i phyogs// dkar po nag po rab tu gnas// de dag dbus su rdzogs pa gang // de ni rdzogs par mi gnas so// skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas//
20b1: rdzogs pa la ni g.yo mi 'gyur// gang tshe rdo rje nor bur sems/ der skad cig thams cad rdzogs// dkar po'i phyogs la 'di mi gnas// nges 'ga' dkar min la mi 'gro// phyogs gnyis po yi dbus gnas pa/
20b2: rdzogs pa la gnas gnyis su med// gtsug tor las ni shar pa de'i// rdo rje ning dpung rdzogs par 'gyur// de chags bral las cha nyams pa// rdo rje las nyams la rab rdzogs// slar yang gtsug tor du shar ba// slar yang
20b3: rdo rje nong byang rdzogs/ / de chags bral bas cha nyams pa// lus can ye shes nyams pa min// 'di yi bde ba che rang bzhin// rdzogs pa'i sgra yis brjod par bya// dngos po bar ma gzhan thams cad// 'byung dang srud
20b4: pa'i rgyu yin no/ / srid las mya ngan 'das par 'gro// de las slar yang srid par 'ong // rang phyogs ngag las zla bzhin dang // bgrod pa dag las snang byed bzhin// rdzogs par mi g.yo ba 'di ni// sa rnams kyis ni
20b5: yongs rdzogs nyid/ / nyi khri brgyad gnyis brgya yi dbugs// 'gyur med skad cig zos rnams kyis// phyogs gnyis yang dag gnon pa ni// sa rnams kyis ni yongs su rdzogs// bden don rnam pa bcu gnyis pa
20b6: rnam pa bcu drug 'gyur ba med/ / rnam pa bcu gnyis sa rnams kyis// rdzogs pa gnyis su med pa mchog/ cha shas rnams kyis rdzogs pa'i sems// rnam pa bcu drug mi 'gyur ba// don gcig gnyis su med
20b7: pa chos dam pa'i don te 'jig pa med/ / rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs son pa'i sems// kun nas rab tu rdzogs pa'o// chags bral dang po chags pa che// rdo rje lus maung mi 'gyur ro// yongs su rdzogs pa phyogs
20b8: gnyis kyis bag chags rnams kyis mi 'khrud pa'o/ / ji ltar chu bo'i chu zhugs pa// de ni rgya mtshor chung mtshungs pa// de bzhin dngos po'i tshigs 'di de// 'gyur ba med par 'gyur med mtshungs// ji ltar khams kyi
21a1: tshogs pa 'di/ / zos pa las ni ro nyid 'gyur// sa bon rang bzhin sa bon gyis// 'bras bu'i dus su nga rgyal spangs// de ltar dngos po'i tshogs pa yang // mchog tu mi 'gyur zos pa yis//
21a2: mchog tu mi 'gyur ba nyid 'gyur// rnam pa thams cad rang bzhin 'dzin// mche ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ni// dug rdzogs gnas skabs gyur pa na// rma la rig min gzhan du min// yul dang dbang po'i sgo rnams
21a3: kyis/ / de bzhin rnal 'byor dam pa'i bde// sems rdzogs char gyur na rdo rje// nor bur rig mni gzhan du min// yul rnams dbang po'i sgo rnams kyis// ji ltar ro chen lcags rnams kyis// phyogs gcig
21a4: yang dag gnas pa ni/ / lcags la drag po'i mes gdungs na// kun nas kun du 'bigs par byed// de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med bde// phyogs gcig yang dag gnas pa yang // sems la 'dod pa'i mes
21a5: gdungs nas/ / kun nas kun du 'bigs par byed// ji ltar phug pa'i lcags rnams ni// 'ga' zhig tu yang dri ma med// de bzhin du ni phug pa'i sems// 'ga' zhig tu yang bag chags med// lcags ni
21a6: gser nyid du gyur pa/ / me yis dri ma med par 'gyur// de bzhin yang dang yang du sems// 'dod chags me yis dri ma med// ji ltar nor bu che reg las// rdo na rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur// de bzhin 'gyur med/
21a7: bde reg las// sems ni bde ba nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni mang po brjod pas ci// 'jig rten kun rdzob bden pa yis// lcags rnams rab tu 'bigs byed pa// ro yi mthu ni brtag bya min// ci zhig slar yang don
21a8: dam pas/ / glo bur dri mas g.yogs pa yis// sems ni rab tu 'bigs byed pa// ye shes mthu ni brtag bya min// sems la glo bur dri ma med// sems las yun ring dus can min// sems med par ni skye
21b1: ba med/ sems la mi zang gnas pa min// gal te 'di nyid glo bur ba// de tshe sngon du sems dri med// gal te sems la dus ring can// de tshe de ni ci las skye// gal te sems med par skye na// de tshe nam mkha'i me
21b2: tog mtshungs/ / gal te sems la rtag tu gnas// de tshe kun tu thar pa min// ji ltar zangs kyi dri ma ni// ro yi sbyor bas nyams par 'gyur// de yi yod nyid nyams pa med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// /
21b3: de bzhin sems kyi dri ma ni// stong nyid sbyor bas rnam nyams 'gyur// de yi ye shes nyid nyams med// dri med nyid kyis yang dag gnas// ji ltar bcud kyis phug pa'i lcags// lcags nyid du ni rjes 'gro
21b4: min/ / de bzhin bde bas phug pa'i sems// sdug bsngal nyid du rjes 'gro ma ni// chags bral las gzhan sdig pa med// bde ba las gzhan bsod nams med// de phyir 'gyur med bde bar legs//
21b5: mi bdag rtag tu gnas par bya// gzhon nu ma yi dga' ba ni// med per bde ba smra mi nus// lang tsho'i dga' ba thob pa na// bde ba chen po rang gis rig/ de bzhin ting 'dzin dang bral ba'i// bde ba smra bar nus
21b6: ma yin/ / 'gyur med tid 'dzin thob pa na// rnal 'byor pa yis rang rig 'gyur// 'gyur med las skyes bde rig pa// thams cad mkhyen la 'ang the tshom za// de lta na yang yid bde min// chags bral nyid du mi
21b7: bya'o/ / 'phos pa las ni chags bral 'gyur// chags bral las ni sdug bsngal 'gyur// sdug bsngal skyes bu'i khams zad byed// zad pa las ni 'chi bar brjod// shi las slar yang de rnams kyi// srid pa'o/
21b8: srid las slar 'chi 'pho// de ltar sems can gyi srid pa// chags bral las 'byung gzhan du min// de phyir 'bad pa thams cad kyis// 'pho ba'i chags pa rnam par spang // gang gis 'gyur med bde bar 'gyur//
22a1: rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa yis// 'dod ldan yang ni chags bral bar// 'dod pa'i bstan bcos su mi 'dod// bdag gi brjod pa'i chung ngu slar// rnal 'byor bcis sdug bsngal 'dod// khu ba mi
22a2: 'gyur rang bzhin gyis/ / mchog tu mi 'gyur bsgrub par bya// rten ni 'pho ba thob pa na// brten pa'i 'dod chags bral ba nyid// rten dang brten pa legs rdzogs pa// ji srid 'gyur med nyid du 'gro// sems kyi 'gyur/
22a3: med nyid thob na// rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid med// 'gyur med las byung sku yi ni// mdzod spu'i 'khor lor son pa'i yang // A li kA li mnyam sbyor ba// hU~M yig mi 'dod mi yi bdag/ stong pa las byung gzugs
22a4: brnyan rgyu/ / mi 'gyur las skyes bde ba 'bras// rgyu ni 'bras bus rgyas btab pa// 'bras bu rgya yis rgyas btab pa'o// stong nyid gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa rgyu// snying rje 'gyur med 'dzin pa 'bras// stong nyid snying
22a5: rje dbyer med pa/ / byang chub sems ni mi 'pho ba'o// mya ngan 'das pa bral ba'i gzugs// 'khor ba las 'das mi 'gyur ba// de dag sbyor ba gnyis med mchog/ rtag dang chad las nges par grol// dngos med las
22a6: byung mtshan nyid phyir/ / gzugs ni dngos po med pa min// dngos po las byung mtshan nyid phyir// 'gyur ba med pa dngos po min// dngos po dngos nyid yang dag sbyor// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gnyis med mtshe// gzugs dang /
22a7: gzugs min rnam par grol// pra phab me long la bzhin no// gzugs ni srid par mi 'ong ste// 'gyur med mya ngan 'das mi 'gro// phan tshun 'khyud ba zhi ba ste// ma ning gi ni go 'phang mchog/ shes rab rgyu las ma
22a8: byung zhing / / shes rab rgyu las byung ba 'bras// shes rab rgyu las ma skyes phyir// shes rab las skyes rgyu skyes min// de phyir ye shes rgyu skyes min// shes rab ye shes bla na med// 'bras bu rgyu yis gzhan dang gzhan//
22b1: phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// rgyu dang 'bras bu thams cad gang // de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung // phan tshun rgya yis btab pa'i gzugs// skye min mya ngan 'das pa 'ang min// shes rab kun nas mya ngan 'das// skye ba
22b2: mchog tu 'gyur ba med/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu rnam des grol// phan tshun du ni rgyas btab med// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa'i// shes bya gang zhig 'dir mthong ba// de ni rang sems gzhan ma yin// phyi yi shes bya rnam
22b3: 'byed phyir/ / de phyir bdag gis bdag nyid la// 'gar yang rgyas gdab nus ma yin// ral gri chen po bdag nyid la// bdag nyid so yis gcod dam ci// mo gsham bu mo dang 'grogs pas// rmi lam du ni bde 'gyur
22b4: ltar/ nam mkha' las byung gzugs brnyan ni// bsten pas bdag la de bzhin no// shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min// 'di ni lhan skyes shes rab bcas// kun nas bde ba rdzogs pa las// sgrib pa thams cad spangs
22b5: ba ste/ / nam mkha' bzhin du gos pa med// yul dang dbang po spangs pa ni// kun nas 'byung po kun la gnas// gcad du med pa dbye ba spangs// rang byung rdo rje sems dpa' ni// don chen mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// 'dod
22b6: chags chen po sems dpa' che/ / sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang che// nyon mongs zad pa dgra chen po// dam tshig sems dpa' gti mug che// gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje'i
22b7: rnal 'byor khro ba che/ / lha min khro bo dgra chen po// dus kyi 'khor lo chags pa che// 'pho ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// rdo rje mi phyed ces par brjod// 'dir ni don chen bcom ldan 'das// sems dpa' srid gsum
22b8: gcig pa nyid/ / mchog tu mi 'gyur brjod par bya// mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba rdzogs// sa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa yis// 'dod chags chen po sems dpa' che// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// byang
23a1: chub la gnas sems dpa' ni/ / mi g.yo de phyir byang chub sems// nyon mongs la sogs zhe sdang tshogs// zhe sdang chen po dgra che ba// dam tshig zla ba bdud rtsi yi// khu ba 'pho med de za ba// dam tshig sems
23a2: dpa'o rigs pa 'dis/ / gti mug blo ste gti mug sel// rdo rje thams cad gcig pa nyid// shes rab sku dang mi 'gyur bcas// khro bo chen po dgra chen po// khro bo'i gzugs can bdud rnams kyi// 'gyur med bde ba che
23a3: thabs las/ / nam yang sems can don mi 'dor// sems can grol nas chags chen po// 'gyur ba'i chags pa sel bar byed// 'di rnams rnam pa drug tu brjod// mi 'gyur ye shes tshor ba dang // rnam shes gzugs
23a4: dad 'du byed dang / / 'du shes de rnams phung po'i rigs// ye shes me dang nam mkha' sa// rlung chu rnams kyi rim pa bzhin// yid mig rna ba lus dang sna// lce rnams kyi yang de bzhin nyid// sgra re chos kyi dbyings dang dri// /
23a5: reg bya kha dog rnams kyi yang // khro bo'i rgyal po gdong drug 'jigs// rigs drug rnams kyi yongs dag pa// lus dang gsang ba dbang po sems// rtag tu dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum// shes rab thabs kyi rdo rje
23a6: gsum/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni dbang gi sgrub thabs te// mchog tu mi 'gyur sgrub pa'i thabs// rtsa dang rigs dang yang dag ldan// zla ba mdor bstan pa yis bshad// ces pa 'jig rten
23a7: khams kyi le'ur le'u lnga pa mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dbang gi sgrub thabs mdor bstan pa rdzogs s+ho/ / 'di ni kha che'i paN Di ta so ma nA tha dad / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong shes rab grags pas bsgyur zhing zhus te/
23a8: gtan la phab pa las// slar yang rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis dpal nA ro pa'i 'grel bshad dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus te dag par byas pa'o//
23b1: rgya gar skad du/ pa ra ma A di bu d+hod d+hi ta shrI kA la tsakra nA ma tan tra rA dzA// bod skad du/ mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba// dpal dus
23b2: kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ / thams cad mkhyen pa ye shes sku dang nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste pad ma'i 'dab ma rgyas pa'i spyan// sangs rgyas seng ge'i khri la bzhugs lha'i mchog rnams kyis ni btud la rgyal po
23b3: zla ba bzang po yis/ / mgo bos rab tu phyag 'tshal lag pa'i pad ma sbyar ba yan lag mchog la bzhag nas zhus pa ni// rnal 'byor dpal ldan dus 'khor ka phreng ldan pa'i a 'dus su ste mi rnams dgrol
23b4: ba'i don du'o/ / stong pa ye shes kyang ste thig le mchog dang rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas lha dang lha min yang // phyi dang lus dang gzhan la yang ste rang bzhin rnams dang skyes bu nyi shu lnga pa'i bdag nyid dang // lus la
23b5: sna tshogs tshad dang srid pa gsum gyi bkod pa lha dang lha min rnams kyi longs spyod dang / / dkyil 'khor dang ni dbang ste skabs gsum pa dang mi yi bla ma 'di rnams yang dag bshad du gsol// zla ba bzang po khyod
23b6: la bdag mgu gang zhig khyod kyis dris pa nyid ni rab mchog lha rnams dang / / mi dang srin po lha min klu dang chags bral thub mchog rigs rnams ngag gis shes pa min pas so// mya ngan 'das pa la sogs 'dzin pa'i
23b7: mthar thug tshig gi bgrod pa dang bcas sbyor ba mtha' dag ni/ / lus dbus su ste dkyil 'khor dag dang dbang ni bshad par bya yis mi yi bdag po bzang po nyon// dus kyis stong pa rnams las rlung dang 'bar byed chu
23b8: dang 'dzin ma gling dang ri bo rgya mtsho dang / / rgyu skar dang ni nyi zla skar ma gza' yi tshogs dang drang srong lha dang 'byung po klu rnams dang // dud 'gro skye gnas rnam pa bzhi dang / sna tshogs sa dang 'og tu mi rnams dang ni dmyal ba yang
24a1: stong pa'i dbus su yang dag 'byung ste tshul lan tshwa dang ni sgo nga'i dbus su sgong skyes bzhin/ / sku dang ye shes nam mkha' dang ni rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang brtan dang g.yo ba dang // lha ni mthong ba skyed
24a2: min dag dang srid pa rnam bcur gsungs pa rdo rje yi ni sku dag las/ / sngags kyi skye gnas dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur zhing mi yi bdag po slar yang 'di nyid du grol te// de ltar gang gis yang dag rig pa de ni phyugs
24a3: min sems kyi kun du rtog pa dag las grol/ / g.yon gyi yan lag tu ni dkar po 'bar ba 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi'i cha dang g.yas su dmar po'i mdog/ sgra gcan dus me zla ba nyi ma ri bong can gyi bu dang sa skyes dkar
24a4: po bla ma dang / mjug rings dman pa char dang klog dang chu dang rtse mo can te 'bar ba rnams ni zud bdun po// 'jig rten la ni gnas pa nyid te mun pa med pazung gcig dag ni mun pa'i mtha' la'o// rgyab tu ser po yang ni
24a5: skar ma lha gzhus ste de ni rnam gzhi gnyis kyi dbye bas so/ / srog ces bya ba gcig pu'i rlung ni rnam pa bcur 'gyur te spyi bo rtsa ba dag dang mdun du'o// dbus kyi rdo rje'i steng du sa bon rang gi nus pa yon tan tshegs dang
24a6: bcas pa 'og tu gnas/ / kun du ye shes dang ni stong pa'o zhi ba gnas dang bcas pa dngos po kun gyis rnam par grol// a sogs sum bcu'i dbyangs gad ha ya ra wa lar ldan de rnams zla ba'i cha dang nyin byed
24a7: kyang / ka sogs sde rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa nyin zhag stong pa drug dang me yi tshad kyis spyod par byed// ha sogs dbyangs rnams dag kyang chu tshod lha mi gdengs can 'byung po'i skye gnas rnams kyang sngags zhes
24a8: pa/ / a sogs ka sogs ldan pa dag las de ltar khams gsum dag ni nges par skyed 'gyur mi yi bdag/ dbyangs ni ka tsa Ta pa tar ldan rna la sogs pa yang dag sbyar ba rnams kyi skye ba'i gnas// mgrin rkan
24b1: steng gi cha ni mkha' rlung bsreg bya las skyes mchu dang so ni chu dang sa dag go/ a sogs rnams ni gtsug tor 'khor lo snying kha mgrin pa spyi bo lte ba'i 'khor lor rim pas te// sna tshogs nag dmar ri bong can dang gser
24b2: 'dra phung po khams kyi lhag pa'i lha dang ldan pa la'o/ / rlung gi mtha' nas lhun po'i 'tshams su dmyal ba dang ni gdengs can grong la dpag tshad 'bum phrag gnyis// lhun po'i tshad ni 'bum phrag gcig ste gza' yi
24b3: tshogs kyi gnas nas stong phrag dag ni nyi shu lnga/ / mgrin pa'o gdong la lnga bcu brtan pa'i gnas ni g.yo med dag la de bzhin nyid du nyi shu lnga// de yi phyi rol stong pa gcig pu srid pa gsum bral yon tan med cing de nyid
24b4: kyis dman pa'o/ / rlung gi mtha' nas rlung gi 'tshams dang brtan pa 'dzin ma'i gzhi la gling dang ri dang rgya mtsho rnams// bzhi phyed 'bum phrag gnyis te rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor dpag tshad dag ni 'bum phrag gnyis/
24b5: dbus na lhun po gang gi steng du khyim gyi 'khor lo skor bcas nyin dang mtshan mor 'khor ba ste// cha drug la ni 'bum phrag gnyis gnyis srid gsum mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag las rab tu skyes// 'jig rten khams kyi kun
24b6: nas khor yug tu ni thad ka'i tshad kyi sum 'gyur du yang 'gyur ba ste/ / sa yi 'khor yug 'bum phrag gsum dang chu me rlung rnams kyi ni drug dgu nyi ma rim pas so// mi yi dbang po phyi rol srid pa gsum gyi gnas la dpag
24b7: tshad 'bum phrag gcig nyid gang yin pa/ / de ni sa yi steng gi gnas su lus la rang rang dag gi tshad kyis yang dag khru gang // phra rab brgyad rnams kyis ni phra mo 'di gcigaphra mo brgyad kyis skra yi rtse mo phra
24b8: mo ste/ / 'di rnams kyis ni ske tshe shig dang nas te ltos 'gro nas kyis sor dang sor mo nyi ma ni// zung gis khru'o khru ba nas gzhu ste 'dir ni stong phrag gnyis kyi gzhu yis rgyad grags dag tu 'gyur// rgyang grags bzhi rnams
25a1: kyis ni dpag tshad de yis lha yul sa dang nam mkha' dag la tshad yin no/ / dang por chos bzang skal pa zung ni zung dang ldan pa dag ste tshangs dang 'jig rten 'das pa dang // dpal gyi skal pa dkar po'i skal
25a2: pa yang ste shin tu dbang gyur gnas nas 'dod pa bcu gcig go/ / gzugs med dag ni a sogs bzhi po ha 'khrig bral ba rnams te i la sogs pa bcu drug gzugs// ha sogs la mtha' yang ni 'dod pa rnam bcu pa
25a3: rab tu gsal te gsal byed gcig pa ka sa'o/ / srid pa sum bcu rtsa gcig rnams kyis 'dir ni srid gsum du 'gyur khams kyi dbye bas khams gsum mo// srid gsum ma lus 'di yang rdo rje gsum du 'gyur te a
25a4: sogs ka sogs rab tu dbye bas so/ / rin chen snang nas gseg ma'i chu ni dmyal bar nges par brjod te bye ma'i chu ni gnyis pa'o// 'dam gyi chu dang mi bzang du ba dag dang me dang mun pa dang ni ngu 'bod bdun pa dang // lan tshwa
25a5: chang dang chu dang 'o ma zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi'i rgya mtsho bdun te ri bo ni/ / 'od sngon man da ra ri ni ShaT dang nor bu'i 'od dang dro Na gsil ri rdo rje'o// gling ni zla ba 'od dkar dag dang rab mchog ku sha dang ni mi 'am ci dang khrung khrud
25a6: dang / drag po yang ni longs spyod sa ste bdun pa 'dzam bu mi rnams gnas pa dag ni las kyis// shar du rlung ni shin du zlum por 'gyur te mi'i bdag po lde ru ba ni gru nigasum po// byang du chu ni zla ba phyed pa dag dang nub
25a7: gser mchogs ni chu yi gter gyi zur/ / ri rab lhun po stong pa'i rnam pa rdo rje mchog gi rang bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ste// sa yi steng du dpag tshad stong phrag rnams ni ri dang klu dang gzung nga phyogs rnams
25a8: dag tu 'gyur/ / lhun po yi ni steng gi rgya dang sa gzhi dag gi gnas la dpag tshad rnams ni stong phrag ni// lnga bcu bcu drug dag go gcig ni rab mchogs yi gzhi la khor yug dag gi yang dag ste// steng gi rtse mo lnga
25b1: po rnams ni sa gzhi'i gnas rnams las phyogs kun du ni 'khor yug go/ / de yi phyi rol gling dang ri bo dag dang chu gter rnams te phyogs rnams kun du me dang drung // chug ter drug po thams cad kyang ni zla ba zla ba gcig gi
25b2: dman pa'i stong phrag re re ste/ / gling dang ri rgyung mchog rnams ngag kyang de lha'i stong phrag rnams te stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni// 'dzam bu'i gling gi yangs pa dag dang lan tshwa'i chu yi gter ni 'bum phrag phyed kyi tshad yin te//
25b3: srid pa gsum po 'dzin pa yi na mtha' ma dag gi me dang rlung gi tshad dag de bzhin no// tshangs pa'i gnas su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog bcas lha yi tshogs kyis yang dag bstod pa ste// lhun po la ni tshig mnga'i
25b4: tshogs dang sa gzhi'i 'og na gnas pa klu rnams ngag ni rigs lnga'o/ / dpal ldan lhun po'i phyogs rnams kun du sa yi dkyil 'khor la son gnas rnams kun dang nye ba'i gnas// zhing dang 'dun pa dag dang 'dus pa can
25b5: dang ro khang gnas na me dang rlung gi 'tshams kyi mthar/ / shar du brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu// rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng
25b6: gi cha dang 'og tu yang / / tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs ni srung zhing skyed pa ste// de rnams dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa rdo rje'i sku/
25b7: lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor// gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug pa de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed// kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom
25b8: ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu/ / rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur// dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab
26a1: tu zhugs pa der ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod te/ / rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan rtsod pa'i dus kyang bdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no// dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shurtsa
26a2: gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas pa ste/ / re re dag gi chad ni dus dang mda' yos bsgyur ba'i mi rnams ngag gi le brgya gang yin pa'o// phra dbugs d+ha dang chu che nyin zhag d+ha dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig
26a3: dang / / drug brgya rnams ni rim pas lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha mo ni rnams dang ni// rus dang gtso bo'i nyin gcig gi tshad te sa gzhi dag la dus bzhi nus pa'i chang du 'jug/ dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i
26a4: go 'phang 'khor lo can bgrod nyin zhag gcig la nyi ma bcu gnyis so/ / phyogs dang zla ba mtha' dag dang ni dus dang dus bzhi dang ni me dus bgrod pa rnam pa gnyis// rgyal po lo ni mtha' dag rjes su nyin zhag dus
26a5: sbyor chu tshed dag dang chu yi srang rnams te/ / 'di rnams de ltar bgrod pa lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni// nus dang gtso bo'i zhag re la ste srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang lus kyi dbus su
26a6: de bzhin no/ / lo 'odra nas ni drug brgya'i lo yis gsal bar mi bdag grags pa sham b+ha la zhes bya bar 'byung // de nas klu yi lo brgya rnams kyis nges par mkha'i yul du kra klo'i chos dag rab tu 'jug/ de
26a7: dus su 'dzin ma la ni nyung ngu'i byed pa gsal bar mi rnams dag gis rig par bya/ / mtha' dag sa gzhi la ni grub pa'i mtha' rnams rnam par nyam pa dus kyi sbyor ba la 'byung 'gyur// me mkha' lha mtsho rnams la
26a8: rab zung la sogs 'das pa rnams bsres kla klo'i lo ni rab tu grub/ / kwa gro'i dbang po'i yon lag pa gdengs can thabs dman pa'i lhag ma dag kyang nyi mas bskur// dag pa la sogs zla ba bsres te 'og tu dus
26b1: bskur ba mkha' me zla bas rnam par dbye/ / rnyed pa steng du bsres pa dag ni mi yi bdag po zla ba'i tshogs pa rnam par dag par 'gyur// zla ba gnas gsum gyur pa'i dbus ma'i phung po dag la gang gnas lag pa rtse
