95a6: yon tan dbang gis de rnams rang rang phyag rgya ste/ / rig ma phyag rgya la sogs nyi ma lha yi mchog gi bdag rnams dkar po nag po rdzogs pa'o// de dag rnams kyi pad 'dab la ni nor lag tshes te mchu yi zla ba la
95a7: sogs gang de rnams/ / zla ba drug ni snga ma drug tu 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi phyi ma yang // klu brgyad gang de bum pa rnams te khyab bdag pad ma'i 'dab la nus ma de rnams rab gtum ma// dpal
95a8: ldan du ba bya rog gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis bya rgod gdong ma smig rgyu ma/ / mkha' snar ma ni 'ug gdod ma ste dpal ldan mar me mkha' 'gro'i bdag po'i gdong mar rab tu grags// nag mo 'bar ma
95b1: khyi gdong ma ste dmar mo 'bar ma shin du rnam 'gyur gding ldan pag gdong ma/ / dkar mo 'bar ma stag gi gdong mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis ser mo 'bar ma skye snang ma// de bzhin rnam pa bcu yis sgeg mo la
95b2: sogs kun rab gsal te sna tshogs yum gyis lhag ma'o/ / lha mo sangs rgyas rig ma shing dang bcas shing bum pa dang bcas rgyal ba yi ni dag pa'i sku// khro bo'i dbang po byang chub sems dpa' nges par ro yi/
95b3: rdo rje ma ni chos kyi sku de nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams longs spyod sku ste rab mchog shing rtal gnas lha ni nyi mar rab grags pa// klu ni brgyad po rnams dang rab tu ma marnams 'khor dang bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi
95b4: ni rgol pa'i sku/ / de bzhin slar yang rgyal ba'i sku ni dbye ba gnyis su 'gyur te phyi rol dag dang nad la yang // mngal nas skyes pa ji lta ba nyid de bzhin kho na dkyil 'khor la ni nges par rab tu 'gyur// ston pa
95b5: lha mo sogs dang bum pa lhan skyes rgyal ba'i sku ste dkyil 'khor snying po'i dbus su'o/ / sangs rgyas la sogs chos kyi sku ste nges par ro yi rdo rje ma sogs longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// khro ba sprul pa'i
95b6: sku ru 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor gyi ni snying por yang dag gnas/ / phyi rol du ni tsA muN DI la sogs pa lha mo brgyad po 'khor dang bcas pa dag pa'i sku// lha la sogs pa chos kyi sku ste mtha' dag
95b7: gdengs can rigs kyang 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/ / gtum mo rnams ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi slad du'o// skra yi rdo rje lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni zung du 'gyur te/
95b8: gzugs ni rdzogs pa'i slad du'o// gsung gi rdo rje dang ni chos kyi sku yang zung du 'gyur te chos nyid bstan pa'i don du'o// thugs dang longs spyod rdzogs po'i sku yang zung du 'gyur te sems can kun gyi don ni byed
96a1: pa'o/ / ye shes dang ni sprul pa'i su dag nga du 'gyur te zag nags rnams la thar pa ster ba nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa mnyam dang ma mnyam rigs ni'i klagasags ma
96a2: sogs dang / / rnam gsum srid pa la gnas ye gos rnam shes dbye bdag gis rnal 'byor pa yis rig par bya// rdo rje swA hA'i mtha' ldan dag gis mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte ba gsang ba spyi bar te/
96a3: 'di rnams kyis ni byin brlabs yan lag rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po lha mo rnams kyis bkrubar bya// song pa chos kyi dbyings dang rdo rje gsum gyi dus dang ye shes mdzod pa rjes su chags pa'i gsum
96a4: la skyabs su 'gro bas sgrub pa po yis ta ta swa b+hA ba A ma ko haM brjod par bya/ / bum pa rnams dang du ba la sogs brgyad po rnams kyis snying khar chos kyi 'khor lor rab tu 'gyur// rig ma rnams dang sangs/
96a5: d+ha baM nyid kyis mag par rtsibs bcu drug pa ldan tse sbas par rab tu grags// byang chub sems dpa' la sogs nyis 'gyur mi bdag rnams kyis mgrin par langs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lar 'gyur/
96a6: 'jigs ma la sogs nar la gdangs can gyis ni bsgyur ba rnams kyis lte bar sprul pa'i 'khor lor 'gyur// lag bkang pa'i tshigs la wa rnams kyis na las kyi 'khar lo dgra bcu dus kyis bcwa
96a7: pas/ / klu dang gtum mo mo yi bdag po rnams kyis sar ma tshogs kyi 'tshams la bya ba zhes byar 'gyur// dus kyi dag pas dpal ldan rdo rje can 'gyur mi bdag la dang zla ba la sogs dbye ba pa sa/
96a8: sems kyi rnam pa nyi ma pa yin zhag so so'ongadabang gis sna tshogs yum ni rnam par dag/ rlung gi dag pas dra ba la sogs rang gi snying kha'i pad mar rtsa la 'khor lo la gnas rnams// nyan mong sa rnams
96b1: kyis drag po chung mar bcas pa khyab bdag zhabs kyi 'og tu bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud/ / dung dang ga Na DI nor bu ljon pa zhes pa dag kyang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis// bum pa brgyad ni bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis te rgyal dang rnam
96b2: rgyal bus pa byang chub sems sogs kyis/ / 'du byed don yod grub pa tshar ba dri meng ner bu'i phyag dang 'du shes sdang ba ma tha yas te/ gzugs ni 'khod lo ca ni bong ba dang thag gagag ci brnam pa dag pa'o// mo drug ni ba pa rnams kyis te yul ba sra
96b3: can rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag rgyar bcas/ / khro bo ldan skabs rnams kyis tings par slar yang gzhan pa ldan dbang po gzhan rnams kyis// nA muHN+Da sags thur brgyad kyis te pa ma
96b4: 'dab mar gnas rnams nyi ma'i dus skyeng chu tshod kyis/ / lha min la sogs nyi ma'i thabs pa ma'a'adab mar gnas rnams chu tshod da bugs kyi grangs kyis so// gsang bar mi bdag nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams kyis
96b5: rnams dang riganam ma rnams kyang rnam par dag/ de bzhin dang ma las gas de dag dang bzhin yod tan dbang gis lngas kyi khyab sa dam par nga // su rnams kyis na grub pa mtha' dag pasgyurnam tha dza /
96b6: gsal gnas 'byung ba chags/ nga dpas tha na pa 'ams sa sa~M m+b+ha / cig na gas da
96b7: gnas pa'o/ / dpal ldan rdo rje can dang sna tshogs yum ni rnam gsum sringad gnas 'gyung med ye shes sbyong ba las// dpal ldan dag pa las ni chos skur 'gyur te chos las nges par longs spyod rdzogs sgrub ca
96b8: po'o/ / longs spyod las ni sprul pa'i sku ru 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sems can kun don byed pa po// bzhi pa'i gnas skabs shin du gnyid log nges par slar yang gzhan dang lus kyi dbye bas sang ba so// des
97a1: sku yi rab tu dbye bas srog chags rnams kyi lus la yid ni rnam pa bzhi ru gnas/ / sprul par yid ni longs spyod byed pa pa ru rab tu 'gyur te lus dang ngag dang dbang pos so// longs spyod rdzogs
97a2: lam mthong sems par 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis chos kyi sku la gnyid kyang ngo / / dag pa la ni bde bar rab 'gyur 'dir ni nyin mtshan dus su thig le grol ba gsum gyi mthar// de phyir de ni nyin mtshan dus su rnal
97a3: 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya ste 'gyur med don du'o/ / g.yon du srog ni rab tu rgyu bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du ni g.yas pa bskum pa gang yin pa// de ni g.yon brkyang stabs te mnyam pa'i stabs dang gzhan pa g.yas brkyang me/
97a4: dang nyi ma'i rgyu ba las// sa ga dang ni zlum po mchog gi rol pa'i stabs dang pad ma dang ni rdo rje'i 'dug stangs rnams// nam mkha' sogs la rab tu rgya ba mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod pa dag la srog rlung rnam pa lnga/
97a5: gtum mo lte ba'i 'khor lo dgu yis bsnun pa'i lag 'gro tsar tsi kA sogs lhag pa'i lha dang ldan// ho yig ye shes snying po la ni dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes me ni rab rgyas pa// lte bar rnam par snang mdzad/
97a6: la sogs sreg cing mi yi bdag po spyan ma mig la sogs pa rnams// thams cad bsregs nas mgo bar zla ba bzang las thig le'i gzugs ni 'dzag pa gang de rdo rje can// shes rab chos 'byung dag la gnas pa mahA
97a7: dge slar yang spro ba byas te nges par thig le yis/ / sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan zhing me long dag la gnas pa lta bu'i ye shes 'khor lo rang byung ba// 'dod pa dang ni gzugs dang gzugs med srid pa rnam pa gsum po rnams
97a8: kyang rim pas sbyangs byas te/ / phyi nas ye shes me lce dag gis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag dus gcig tu ni dgug par bya// zla ba nyi ma a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis rnam gsum bgrod gnas sku yi rdo rje sogra
97b1: bak+Sha sa pa/ / so sor sdung pa la sogs drug gis gser bzang pad ma la ni sku gsung thugs kyi rnal 'byor te// dga' ba sogs kyis rdo rje chu skyes dag la ro mnyam gyur pas bsgom pa 'di ni rdo rje gsum// shes rab
97b2: pad mar sems kyi thig le dag la lhan skyes bde ba'i dbang gi bsgom pa gzhom med 'gyur/ / bdud rtsi lnga la sogs dang chu gter rdo rje rnams dang sngags kyi bzlas pa sogs kyis bsnyen pa ste// so sor sdud pa
97b3: sogs dang rdo rje pad ma las skyes bdud rtsi yis ni nye ba'i sgrub par 'gyur/ / dga' ba la sogs rnams kyis rdo rje gsum dang chu skyes ro mnyam gyur pa bsgom pa sgrub par 'gyur// shes rab sbyar la gang tshe 'pho med gra
97b4: mo'i rnal 'byor dag las nges par sgrub pa chen por 'gyur/ / dang por stong nyid byang chub nges par slar yang de nas zla ba thig le dag ni yang dag 'dzin// de nas gzugs ni bskyed cing rab mchog ro yi rigs rnams
97b5: ngag gis yi ge dgod pa nyid yin te/ / chu yi gter gyi rdo rje 'di ni spyi yi bsnyen par 'gyur te sgrub pa dag ni dbu ma yang // 'di la thabs ni rnam bzhir 'gyur te dman dang brtan pa sgrub pa'i yan lag dag la de bzhin
97b6: nyid/ / so sor srung ba rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur zhing rnam pa ban skyo bsam gtan mi bskyed pa nyid do// srogacol dag kyang ral gri can no slar yang nas pa bcu ste 'dzin pa phrug na rin chen no// g.yung so la ni rjes su
97b7: dran pa pad ma 'dzin par 'gyur te dpal ldan ting 'dzin 'khor lo can/ / re re dbye ba lnga rnams kyis te slar yang gang las a sogs ka sogs rnams kyis phye ba'o// so sor sdur pa lus la yul dang yul can
97b8: bcu po rnams ni rab tu 'jug pa med pa'o/ / bsam gtan dag kyang shes rab rtog dang spyod pa dga' dang g.yo med bde brtse gcig sems pa'o// srog rtsol dag kyang lam ni gnyis po dag ni bskyal zhing dbu mar
98a1: srog ni zhugs pa dag tu 'gyur/ / thig ler srog ni rab tu zhugs shing gnyi ga'i bgrod pa bcom ste rtse gcig sems pa 'dzin pa'o// gtum mo'i sdang bar gang zhig gyur pa nges par lus
98a2: dang nam mkha' la yang rjes su dran par 'gyur/ / shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis ni 'gyur med bde ba'i dbang gis ye shes gzugs la ting nge 'dzin// 'di rnams dman pa la sogs dbye ba rnams kyis/
98a3: sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// phyag rgya gsum dang gnas skabs gsum ni rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis las dang kun rtog mchog rnams so// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa ni yul
98a4: dang rnam par bral ba sdigs rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ / mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor bas dag pa'o// srog rtsol gyis ni dag po ri bong can dang nyi ma dang bral
98a5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod/ / bdud dang nyon mongs la sogs nyams shing stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur te 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis so// rjes su dran pa legs par dag pa dri med 'od kyi
98a6: dkyil 'khor dag kyang ye shes gzugs las so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin gyis dag pa nyin zhag 'ga' zhig rnams kyis ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud pa la sogs rnams kyis gal te sngags
98a7: pa rnams kyi 'dod pa grub par ma gyur na/ / nA da goms pas btsan thabs chu skyes su gnas rdo rje nor bur thig le bkag nas bsgrub par bya// bsnyen pa la ni dang po'i rnal 'byor rnam bcu mkha' la 'khor lo can
98a8: kyi khro bo'i lte bas so/ / bgegs mthar byed pa'i lta ba bdud rtsi'i lam du son pa yis kyang nye ba'i sgrub la yan lag drug/ shes rab la spros zla ba thig le rdo rje nor bur gnas pa'i 'gyur med gsum ni
98b1: sgrub pa la/ / bde ba ma nyams gcig pu zhi ba lhan skyes ye shes rnal 'byor 'dir ni sgrub pa chen po la// srog rtsol dag ni kun nas bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba ji srid mgo yis bar du 'dod pa ste// de las steng tu
98b2: 'dod pa min pa 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed te phung po nges par 'jig pa'i rgyu/ / gtsug tor sgo na phug nas 'gro na mchog gi bde ba'i go 'phang dag la nges par sbyang bar bya// phung po med kyang rnal 'byor pa ni bde
98b3: mnyam 'jug ste 'on kyang 'jig rten du ni grags pa min/ / dbus su sreg ni rab tu zhugs pa yul dang rnam par bral ba'i sna tshogs yum la 'khrud pa ste// pad mar zhugs pa'i rang gi rdo rje spro ba dag kyang
98b4: bzhin zla nyi'i dbus su rab zhugs pa'o/ / bde ba'i sa bon ma lhung ba la rab dga'i dga' bar gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor 'di// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan gsang ba las kyang mchog
98b5: tu gsang ba'o/ / gtsug tor du ni rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te phyi rol rtse mo dag ni nyis 'gyur gyi// rdo rje chos kyi 'khor lor 'gyur zhing nyes 'gyur gzhan ma dang ni de yi nyis 'gyur dag kyang gzhan// de yi
98b6: yang ni nyis 'gyur gzhan du 'gyur te lhan skyes longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa'i 'khor lor ro/ / de yi snying por rtse mo gcig pa bde mnyam 'bras ster gsang ba'i pad ma'i khongs su gnas pa'o//
98b7: rnal 'byor pa yis nyin dang mtshan mor srog gcod bya ba de ni srog nyams pa la gsungs pa ste// sgra ni gang zhig zhal gyis dman pa dag kyang snying la gyur pa de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// gang zhig thams
98b8: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sa ni 'dzin pa dag kyang rnal 'byor pa yi rku bar gsungs/ / thig le ma lhung ba las bde bar 'gyur ba chags bral min las gzhan gyi bud med bstan pa'o// srog rtsol ma
99a1: yis ri bong can ni zhu ba dag kyang btung ba nyid ni chang gi btung ba'o/ / mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor dag tu nya yi mthar ni rang sems 'gro ste chos kyi dbang gis so// gtsug tor nas ni so
99a2: mo rnams su slar yang 'di ni 'gro ste nag po'i phyogs kyi mtha' ru'o/ / rnal 'byor pa rnams spyod pa gang de nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab ster ba'o// bsam dang 'dod dang lus la rims dang khamachog
99a3: pad ma skam dang zas la rab tu mi 'jug dang / / 'dar dang bsnyo dang rab tu rmongs par 'gyur dang ying ni rnam par 'khrul dang drag tu brgyal ba dag/ rdo rje can gyi du ba la sogs rab gsal rnam pa bcu ste srog chags lus
99a4: la 'jig rten du/ / rab tu gsal zhing nges pa de rnams yid srub gnas skabs su zhig rgyal ba 'dod pa de ni su// nyin dang mtshan mor thig le dag las dkar po'i rgyun 'bab gang zhig mA ma kI de chang ma yin// go ku la
99a5: sogs mig la sogs pa nyin zhag so sor spro ste sha gzhan ras 'ga' dag kyang min/ / rang rigs sa la gnas pa'i lha rnams dag gis dag pa'i lus la bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsnyen pa ste// stong par sems ni rab tu
99a6: zhugs pas ro mnyam byed pa 'khrig pa de ni skye gnas la ma yin/ / nor rnams spangs pa sbyin pa yid dang bud med 'grogs pa las kyang 'pho ba med pa tshul khrims te// bzod pa sgra la sogs la mi 'jug pa ste rlung
99a7: gi gnyi ga'i bgrod pa 'jig pa brtson 'grus nyid/ / bsam gtan shes rab dag kyang lhan skyes bde la gnas pa'i sems dang kun du 'gro ba kun gyi skad// de las sems can don dang rdzu 'phrul srid pa mthar byed ma
99a8: skye 'thob ste gzhan pa bzhi rnams so/ / gcig pu'i sku 'am nus ma dang ldan gnas dgu dang bcas nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid la sogs pa// bsgoms na phyag rgya la sogs grub pa rnams su nges par nyin zhaga' gal zhig dag
99b1: gis yang dag 'gyur/ / rengs pa dang ni zhi dang dbang dang srid pa 'jig pa dag ni zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis byed// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas lha min lag 'gro'i rigs 'di bsgoms pa yis ni
99b2: bsgrub par bya/ / dkar po yis ni zhi dang rgyas pa byed te rang gi yid la dmar po yis ni dgug dang dbang // ser pos rengs dang rmongs pa dag ste nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas bsad pa dang ni bskrad pa'o// sgom dang
99b3: bzlas pa de bzhin nyid du rang gi yid la byed te sku gsung thugs dang rdo rje ni/ / 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag las kyi dbye bas bsgrub par bya// phyogs ni lhag pa las
99b4: thung bung ba dang ni gser dang mtshungs pa g.yas dang gcig shos dag gis ni/ / phung po'i bdud nyid glang chen lpags pa dag kyang ma lus bshus te rkang pa zung zhig dag nas 'dzin// lha min dbang po'i khrag gi thod pa
99b5: rab mchog phyag 'thil na ste 'chi bdag bdud kyi gdong gi phyag/ nyon mongs bdud ni zhabs kyis bsgyel ba gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag can gzhan gyi don du bsgom par bya// de la yum ni zhal gcig zung gi
99b6: phyag gi pad ma dag la gri gug dpal ldan thod pa ste/ / nyi ma las ni zla bas rang gis rgyu ba bcu gnyis lhag pa'i gcig tu bgrod pa'i dbangags so// de phyir lus kyi rab tu dbye bas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'gyur te/
99b7: sna tshogs yum ni de bzhin nyid// shes rab thabs kyi lus dang bsam pa bde mnyam 'bras ster zla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu bas so// gcig la sogs pa mtha' yas zhal te phyag dang zhabs mang du ma'i kha dog mun pa
99b8: ngag gi mthar/ / shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid nges par bde mnyam ster te rtsa ni zla ba nyi ma 'gog pa las// sa la sogs pa rnams ni kun nas 'bigs byed dri med nor bu dang mtshungs stong pa gcig pu ste// thog
100a1: ma med cing mtha' med dbus kyang med la yul med yul ni bsgrubs pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ / // khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs ni gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag dang rig byed zhal dang zhabs gnyis
100a2: pa/ / dmar ser spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa ste// sbrul gyi rgyan dang rab mchog stag gi lpags pa'i sham thabs dang ni gtso bo'i bzhin du mtshon tsha'i phyag
100a3: spyi bor mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyi thod pa kha dog lnga rnams dag gis phreng ba nges par bcings/ / dri med 'od zer 'phro ba sna tshogs chu skyes nyi ma'i steng du dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdog la ni// zhabs gnyis
100a4: ngag gis 'byung po'i mgon po lhag pa'i stobs kyis mnan zhing g.yas brkyang stabs kyis yang dag gnas/ / 'byung po rnams dang lha min gdengs can lha rnams skrag par byed cing ye shes sems dpa' gcig
100a5: gyur pa/ / bsgoms na zla ba gcig nyid kho nas dur khrod sa la gnas pa 'byung po'i tshogs ni bsgrub par bya// klu rnams chu skyes 'dab brgyad la ste rgyal dang rnam rgyal dag ni nyi ma'i steng du bsgyel byas nas/
100a6: zhabs ngag gis ni gdengs can bdag po zung dang pad ma'i 'dab mar gnas pa rnams kyi 'jug ma yi// rtse mo thams cad mnan nas sprin gyi rigs ni lto ba dag nas nges par kun du spro byed pa// de ltar khro bo'i
100a7: dbang po bsgoms pas nyin zhag nyung zad rnams kyis sprin gyi tshogs ni bsgrub par bya/ / zhes pa la sogs mi yi bdag po lha rnams dang ni lha mo rnams kyi sgrub thabs so so ru// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rang gi
100a8: rgyal ba'i rigs kyi dbang gis las kyi dbye ba mtha' dag rnams kyis 'gyur/ / rengs dang zhi ba dag dang dbang dang gzhan nor 'phrog dang bsad pa dang ni bskyed pa sogs la yang // sum bcu rtsa drug rnal
100b1: 'byor ma rnams 'gyur te slar yang bzlas dang sbyin sreg rang gis sa bon gyis/ / zhi ba la ni bsam gtan dag kyang zhi ba ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar lha ni zhi ba'i gzugs// drag po la yang bsam gtan drag po
100b2: dang ni sprin nag dang mtshungs lha rnams drag po nyid kyi gzugs/ / dbang du byal bsam gtan chags pa dang bcas nyin mor byed pa'i sku ste lha ni chags pa'i gzugs// rengs pa la ni bsam gtan rmongs pa
100b3: dang bcas mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i lha rnams rengs pa'i gzugs/ / zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang sras bcas rgyal ba'i rigs dang rgyal po lha mo rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbye bar bskrad pa dag
100b4: kyang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis khro bo las skyes rnams kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ / dbang sogs 'byung skyes rnams kyis rab gsal lha min rigs la phur bus gdab pa'ang lha min mo rnams kyis/
100b5: yum dag gis ni las rnams thams cad gnyi ga'i rdo rje'i rigs la bsad pa dang ni gso ba yang // dang por dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo dang ni srid gsum skyed ma 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nas
100b6: sa gzhi'i gnas dag tu ni gang zhig zhi ba la sogs las rnams dag kyang bsgrub par bya/ / pha dang ma yis rnam par dman pa'i bu ni yod pa min par dus kun du ni 'jig rten grags// de phyir bde mnyam
100b7: 'bras ster gnyis po bsgrub par bya ste rnam pa gzhan du las ni 'grub pa min/ / gtso bo'i thugs khar pad ma'i dbus su ri bong can dang nyi ma me yi steng du rdo rje ni// hUM yig ye shes las skyes 'jig dus
100b8: sprin dang mtshungs pa rtse lnga 'od zer dang bcas dgod par bya/ / de yi dbus su dzaHyi lcags kyu'i 'od zer rnams kyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag bkang byas nas// rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'i
101a1: ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas rdo rje'i lam du rab tu gzhug bya ste/ / thams cad zla ba zhu ba dang mtshungs rang gi rdo rje'i kha nas yum gyi pad mar spro bar bya// der ni nyi mar rab tu zhugs pa
101a2: mnyam dag tu 'gyur te a sogs ka sogs rab ldan pa/ / de yi dbus su zhi ba la sogs las kyi ye shes sa ban du 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis so// de yis rdzogs pa'i lha mo 'am ni lba yang rnal 'byor
101a3: la la 'bras bu srong ba nyid du 'gyur/ / ma tsA ba / rim pas lpags kunas dang rdo rje ngan rdo rje zhugs pa dral bu ste// oM AHhU~MHde bzhin du gsungs zla ba nyi ma rdo rje de bzhin nyid du 'gyur med de// ts+tsho
101a4: U lI de bzhin nyid du rab gsal ya ra wa la rlung me chu dang sa rnams so/ / haHhu haM pro nyi ma dang ni rdo rje zla ba dag dang gri gug tu yang de bzhin gsum// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su A li kA li dang bcas chu yi sa
101a5: bor bdag nyid du skyes te/ / de las rdzogs pa'i lha mo zla ba'i mdog can zhal gcig ma ste zung gi phyag gi pad ma can// glang chen dkar po la zhon phyag na chu skyes dkar dang mi 'jigs pa dang gos ni dkar
101a6: pa dang / / dkar ba'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal ni bsgoms nas bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// de nas bsgrub bya bzung nas slar yang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag rab tu gzhug
101a7: par bya/ / gtso bo'i bka' ni rab tu thob nas spyan ma la sogs rab dgyes rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i bum pa yis// slar yang bsgrub bya de ni 'khru bar byed cing rab mchog rnam bcu'i nus ma rnams kyis mtsha
101a8: par byed/ / gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis gso bar byed cing rab gsal sgeg mo la sogs bcu yis tshim par byed// 'byung por grags pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa med byed rab mchog rnam bcu khro
101b1: skyes rnams kyis skyong bar byed/ / klu mo rnams kyis 'o dag byed cing 'chi med na chung bcu gnyis rnams kyis 'khyud pa dag tu byed// gtum mo rnams kyis bsrung bar byed de mtha' dag sa gzhi dag la zhi rgyas
101b2: don gyi slad du'o/ / de ltar bsgrub bya yi ni mchog gi bde ba byed pa thams cad rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma'i dbus su hrIHste ud pa la kha ma bye ba'i mda' nyid dang ni bur shing gzhu// de
101b3: las rdzogs pa nyi ma ltar gsal phyag ni gnyi gas gzhu dang mda' ni rna ba'i bar du bkang / / pad ma dang ni ri bong 'dzin par g.yon brkyang rta la zhon pa bsgrub byi'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya yi na
101b4: snying kha lte ba gsang ba dag dang mgo dang kha la mda' yis bsnun byas shing / / mgrin par gzhu yis bcings nas de yis bskyod pa dag kyang dkyil 'khor du ni 'khrid par byed bzhin pa// gtum mo rnams
101b5: kyis gos dang bral bar byas shing klu mo rnams kyis kyang ni nges par bkri ba byas/ / lha mo rnams kyis spro bar byed cing khro skyes rnams kyis gtun shing dbyug par bcas pas bsnun par byed// 'byung po
101b6: rnams kyis 'jigs par byed cing sgeg ma la sogs rnams kyis kyang ni sen mo rnon po 'debs/ / rdo rje ma rnams kyis ni blo gros nyams byas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung rnams dag gis bcings// ga
101b7: 'bas kyi drung du nus ma rnams kyis gos med bsgyel bar byas pas rgyags pa mtha' dag bcom/ / de ltar dbang du byas nas slar yang khyab bdag dag gi tshim par byas te der ni bsgrub par bya// de bzhin
101b8: zhags pa lcags kyu dag gis khams gsum po nas dgug pa'i las ni rnam pa mang por 'gyur/ / nyi ma zla ba'i dbus su sprin nag dang mtshungs hU~M yig ring po las skyes ral gri bsgoms byas nas// de
102a1: las byung ba bung ba'i mdog can phyag gi pad ma ral gri dang ni sdigs 'dzub zhags pa'i phyag/ rnga mo'i steng du g.yon pa brkyang zhing rab tu khros pa'i zhal ni bslab bya'i khyim du bsal bar
102a2: bsgrub bya zhags pas bcing ba byas nas khros pa'i zhal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi ni sgo ru khrid byas te/ / yaHyig las skyes rnga mo mgyogs pa rlung ltar bgrod pa de la gtso bo'i gsung gis bslab bye ni/
102a3: smon nas rtse mo can dang g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor ji srid nyid du rang bzhin gyis ni bskul bar bya// de ltar lha yi bdag po dag kyang nges par bskrad par 'gyur na mi rnams dag ni smos ci dgos// dbye ba la yang rje
102a4: mos dman zhing rtsod med byas pa dag ni g.yas dang g.yon du bkri bar bya/ / nyi zla'i dbus su laHzhes bya ba yongs grur 'khor lo bzang po kha dog ser po bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba zhal gcig pa ste
102a5: mchog gi gser dang batshungs pa phyag na lcags sgrog 'khor lo can/ / dus sbal la ni lha min 'dug stangs kyis gnas shin du dal 'gro bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya 'khor los 'jigs par
102a6: byas nas sA la rab tu bsgyel te lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcings/ / dkyil 'khor du ni kun du khrid cing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis 'dzin ma la ni bsgyel byas nas// bsgrub bya de yi lus kyi steng du ldan
102a7: po mchog gi gser gyi rang bzhin dgod byi rengs la ste/ / phur bus gdab pa'i don du tshigs drug la ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin phur pa rnams kyis gdab par bya// rmongs pa la yang sbal rnams kyis ni kun du the bar
102a8: byed cings la 'gyel bar bsgom par bya/ / nyis zla ba'i dbus su dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i gri gug phrog ring bzhin bsgoms byas nas// de las byung ba'i rab tu gtum mo 'jig dus sprin mtshangs
102b1: phyag nagri gugacod ldan/ / tA yi dgra yi steng du g.yon brkyang stabs can gos dang bral ba bsgrub bya'i khyim du bskul bar bya// bsgrub bya'i sgra rnams dag las myung du bzung zhing de yi dkyil 'khor du ni gos kyi
102b2: dman pa yang / / kun du khrid te dpal ldan dur khrod dag tu rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis bya rgong bya rog dang // lce spyang rnams kyis bsgrub bya'i yan lag kun las khrag 'thungs sha dang de bzhin du ni khams
102b3: kun zos/ / de ltar ma lus pa ni rab mchogs yi gzhi la bsgom par bya ste bsad pa dag la'o// bsam gtan 'di yis brgya byin dag kyang gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gron mngal nas skyes pa smos ci dgos// zhi dang /
102b4: rgyas pa la yang rigs kyi dbang gis chu yi sa bon las ni bsam gtan dkar por 'gyur// dbang dang dgug pa la yang dmar po lus ni bsreg par byed pa me yi sa bon bdag nyid do// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa la
102b5: yang 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid do/ / rengs pa dang ni phur bus gdab pa sogs la gser zhun dang mtshungs sa yi sa bon rang bzhin no// stong pa'i sa bon las ni sngon po'i mdog
102b6: dang ljang khur 'gyur te bsad dang gso ba dag la'o/ / sa yi zad par kun nas chu yi gter du 'gro ba la ste rlung gi zad par char pa ni// nyams pa'i don to me yi zad par dag kyang sa yi dkyil 'khor bzhu ba'i don
102b7: e dge kyang / / nyams pa'i don du chu yi zad par du 'gyur stong pa'i zad par mkha' la 'gro dang snang min la// glang po'i bdag po gzhom pa la ni me yi sa bon nyid las kha lnga pa yi bsam gtan 'gyur// klu yi dbang
102b8: gzhom pa la ni mkha' lding dkar po chu yi sa bon bdag nyid can du 'gyur/ / bse dang seng ge dag la rkang brgyad 'jig dus sprin dang mtshungs pa rlung gi sa bon bdag nyid can// rta yi dgral ba so zhes grab
103a1: pa sa yi rigs kyi dbang gis lha min gzhom la khro bo skyes/ / khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por bsgrub par bya// phyi nas nyi ma'i
103a2: dbye ba rnams kyis gnas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub par 'gyur/ / sngags dang gzugs brnyan ma grub pa ni sringad gsum gnas su ci yang 'grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// de phyir rgyal
103a3: po rang sems dri ma rnam par bral ba dag las sngags dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya/ / dpa' bo g.yul gyi dus su lhung bar gyur pa zhes pa'am ni de bzhin chom rkun dbyangs pa dag/ brgyad dang 'byung po'i mtshan
103a4: mo mi yi bdag po ro sreg sar ni bum pa brgyad kyis bkru bar bya/ / dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis rab mchod nas// mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi bo lte ba la sogs
103a5: su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas te/ / thab khung zur gsum du ni rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i pad ma gang zhig mtshan mar bcas pa dang // 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma phyogs su'o phyogs bral du ni de
103a6: bzhin lha mo rnams kyi rang mtshan ma/ / phyi rol re khA gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams byas nas// ro na de yi g.yas min du ste lag pa ral gri dkyil 'khor las ni
103a7: g.yas su rkang pa'o/ / sngar brjod ma mo'i skyon las rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis bdag nyid bsrung ba rab byas nas// sngags pas thab kyi g.yas su khrag dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis
103a8: sbyin sreg nyid ni rab byed pa/ / de yi sngags ni oM hraM pr-i hu~M phaT kyi mtha' ste bcu yis bsgyur ba'i brgyar ni sbyir sreg bya// rdo rje dkyil dkrung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo bzhin du g.yo ba med pa nyid kyis mtshan ma
103b1: byed/ / sbyin sreg rdzogs na ro 'dzin ral gri lta bur 'khrug cing 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa// gang zhig rnam par 'gems pa'i sgra sgrogs sa la rkang pa rdengs shing sgrub pa po ni 'jigs byed pa// zab
103b2: kyi mtha' ru gnas nas ka ha ka ha rgod par byed cing 'jigs pa'i lus kyis gar byed te/ / de mthong nas ri 'jigs pa'i sngags pa sems nyams ska cig gis ni gshin rje'i grong khyer 'gro bar 'gyur/
103b3: ro sreg gnas su sngags pas dngos grub rgyur ni lha min dbang po las kyang 'jigs par mi bya ste// g.yo ba med pa'i sems mthong nas ni slar yang bsgrubs pa'i 'byung po'i mgon po 'di skad smra bar 'gyur//
103b4: dpa' bo bzang po khyod kyis bdag ni grub po mtha' dag smros shig da ni bdag gis ci zhig bgyi// de skad brjod na bsgrub pa po yis gzhan gyi don du rang yid la 'dod don du gnyer bar bya// ral gri reg pa bcud
103b5: kyi dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ri lu ro tsa na dang mig sman dang / / rkang pa byug dang shing lham dag dang 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub brgyad po khyod kyis bdag la stsol// dbye dang bskrad pa dang ni srid pa gzhom pa nyid
103b6: dang rangs pa dang ni dgug pa dag dang dbang / / bdag gi dngos grub thams cad mdzod cig de yis slar yang 'di dag thams cad bdag gis bgyi'o smra// 'byung po'i dbang po bslabs nas mi yi bdag po sgrub
103b7: pa po ni si 'og dag dang bar snang dang / / lha yi mchog gi khang pa dang ni lhun po'i rtse dang rgya mtsho'i pha rol gang yin der 'gro ste// de la zhon pa phyag na ral gri thogs pas sa yi steng gi gnas su 'jig rten bya ba/
103b8: byed// de phyir sems can don gyi slad du mchog gi snying rje yis ni lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya// ming gi dang po thugs kyi rdo rjer 'gyur te mi yi bdag po lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o// gsung gi rdo rje thams cad ming
104a1: ga yi ge de las lhag pa dag kyang sra ma du rjeste/ / de las yang lag so sa'i sngags ni rnam pa yang bar 'gyur te bklags pas grub pa btul ba na// bsgob bya ma ched bya bzlas bya rang gi rgyal ba'i
104a2: rigs kyi dbang gis thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so/ / so sor sngags kyi rigs ni nges par bya ba bzlas par rab tu 'gyur te rab tu grags pa'o// spyir sreg de las bcu yi cha shas rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis
104a3: grub par 'gyur ba ji srid nyid/ / phyi na sa zhi ba la sogs rnams la 'bras bu ster bar rab 'gyur rnam pa gzhan du 'grub mi 'gyur// bsapa gtan dang bcas bzlas dang sbyin sreg brtul zhugs nges ldan rnams
104a4: kyis sngags kyi skye gnas bsgrub par bya/ / grub pa sogs gsum gyis bcings mkha' la 'gro ba'i sha yi ri lus mkha' la spyod pa nyid dag ster// khyi dang rta la sogs pa'i sgron ma rnams kyis lus la bkras
104a5: ske ba sogs dang nang rnams 'phrog par byed/ / de dag rnams kyi mig dang 'khris pa rnams kyis mi mchog rnams kyi mig smar sa ni rab 'byed dang // mi snang ba dang dbang du bya lan chung yid 'phrog dpal ldan dur
104a6: khrod drar bslabs pa'o/ / dag po'i brgyad kyi mtshan mo dgag pa yang nam nu'i nyin 'gal ni dkyil 'khor ba 'angs byas nas// bsrung ba dag kyang kun nas byas te de yi dbus su sha yi ri lun masas pa
104a7: smad ro/ / byas des shan da dri bzang po cag rnams kyis yang dag mchod te sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya// ji srid mkha' la nyim bzhin du 'od zer 'phro ba'i bar byede nas blangs la gzung bar bya// 'a bar /
104a8: nyid ni 'tshal rab mkha'i phyogs su gnas na sos zir 'chi ba thob par 'gyur// be nyi'i dri ba mi mnyam pa gang nges par bde ba'i 'bras ster mnyam pa 'chi ba ster bar brjod// po nya sbrul la sogs pa'i
104b1: ming ni dang por brjod na de las sos zin 'chi ba thob par 'gyur/ / gal te srog na rab tu 'jug la dris na dge bar 'gyur te 'byung ba la ni dge min 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa g.yod pa mdun ni ni chung mar brjod
104b2: g.yas pa mdun du yin na skyes pa'o/ / lag pas rang gi yan lag dag la gang du rig pa'i phyogs darang mi sa yos zin pas te// mig dang kha ni rab tu gdangs pa dag dang rna ba'i rtsa bar nag po yang ni
104b3: bar brjod/ / gal te snying kha'i pad ma dkar por sgra ni cung zad gyur na de ni rab tu bsdu bar bya// dang por bsrung ba'i tshogs yis zin pa dang ni bdag nyid la yang bde ba byed par 'gyur// sa chu me rlung de bzhi
104b4: nam mkha' dag kyang mthe bo la sogs la ni nges par sbyar bar bya/ / la la sogs pa ha yi mtha' rnams rim pas brla dang lto ba snying kha kha nang dpral ba la// huM k+ShuM h+yaM d+hA la sogs klu bcu mi mnyam mnyam pa
104b5: zung du ring po'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ / g.yon gyi lus las ben thung dran pa mgrin pa la gnas mtshan khung dgu dang bar phyogs la// g.yas kyi lus la gdengs ca ni rnams kyi ring po nyid du rab 'gyur spro dang bcu
104b6: ba'i sbyor ba yis/ / bsrung ba byas nas rgyal ba zhes grags sor na shin tu mnyam pa'i 'dam bu klu yi sa bon ldan// duk+Sha ldan pas snying khar shin du bsnun na so yis zin pa myur du bskyod par byed par 'gyur//
104b7: sa yi sa bon dpral ba la ste mkha' skyes rkang par gnas pas myur du rengs par byed par 'gyur// spyi bor chu dang rtse mo can no lto bar rab tu bcug na dug ni med pa nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlung gi sa bon dang ni
104b8: snying khar rtse mo can gyis nges par dug ni 'pho ba ste/ / spyi bor stong pa rab tu zhugs shing sa ni rkang par gnas pas nges par dug ni gcod par byed// dpral bar thig le dkar po yis ni rnam pa gsum gyi dug
105a1: kyang nges par dug ni med par byed/ / dmar pos bskyod cing nag po'i sprin dang mtshungs pas 'jug pa dang ni kha dog ser pos rengs par byed// tsha ba gsum pa sbyar ba'i sdong bu sreg ni rab
105a2: tu 'bab par bcug na dug ni med par byed/ / yang na kha ni rnam par phye ba'i lce'u chung la sor mo yis ni tshal sbyar bar bya// dzA tI badz+rI gzhon nu tsha ba gsum dang lan tshwa lang ga lI dang de ba dA li dang // brahrIk+Sha
105a3: ro a shwa gan d+ha nyin mor byed pa dang bcas ban d+ha ka ra ko Ta ki dang / / bshad pa sha dang khu ba khrag ni mnyam pa dag kyang mi bskyod pas btags ri lu byas pa ni// sA ru bkod pas 'byung po 'am ni 'thung po'i
105a4: rims dang brtan dang ltos 'gro'i dug ni nges par 'joms/ / nyi ma la sogs gza' bdun dag ni nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus te bdun gyi cha yi mtha' ru ni// spen pa nyi ma'i dbus su stong pa rigs ldan ma dag 'chi
105a5: gzugs chu tshod byed na rab tu rgyu/ / de la sbrul dang rtse bar mi bya rnam pa gsum po dag gi dug kyang bza' bar mi bya ste// de nyid la ni sbrul gyi sos zin 'byung pos btab dang mtshon gyis phug pa gshin rjel
105a6: grong khyer 'gro/ / de bzhin du yang nyin mtshan dus su rtag tu rgyu ba'i 'chi ba'i dus kyi rab tu dbye ba ni// nyi ma gung dang mtshan mo phyed dang tho rings dag dang nyi ma nub pa la yang chu tshed te// thun 'tshams chu gter dbus
105a7: su steng pa dag la rigs ldan dus kyi sos zin chu tshod gcig rab rgyu/ / 'di dag sgra gcan gdong pa rnams su nyin zhag so so'i dus su yang dag par ni rig par bya// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su nyin mo'i dang po'i
105a8: tshal nyi ma dang ni mtha' yas longs spyod cing / / phyi nas lhag ma can te 'dir ni lto 'phye rnams dag gza' bdun rab tu dbye bas 'char bar 'gyur// mkha' dus mkha' dang bug pa mkha' mda' mkha' dus
105b1: mkha' nor mkha' ri mkha' med dag gi chu tshong rnams/ / nyi ma la sogs gza' yi longs spyod las kyang gdengs can nor gyi longs spyod dbye bas dug tu 'gyur// mtha' yas rigs ldan zhes pa bram ze
105b2: ba'i mdog ste nor rgyas bu dang drang skyong rgyal rigs dmar / / pad ma chen po dang ni de bzhin nyid du 'jog po rje rigs mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang pad ma dmangs rigs sprin nag
105b3: dang mtshungs mthar skyes dag ni kha dog sna tshogs so/ / de dag rnams kyi skye gnas dag kyang chu dang rtse mo can dang 'dzin ma rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// mkha' lding zhes pa rkang pa nas ni dbyi mthar ser po de
105b4: bzhin lte ba'i 'tshams su kha ba'i mdog/ mgrin pa'i bar du kha dog dmar po sprin nag dang mtshungs smin ma'i 'khri shing ji sring nyid du ste// de las gong du kha dog sna tshogs gdengs can rogs dang bcas
105b5: pa de nyid lnga yis rgyas btab pa/ / bsgoms na de yi phyag rgyas gdengs can dug dang 'byung po'i rang la sogs pa dag kyang nges par 'phrog/ rang gi snying kha'i pad ma dag la nyi ma'i steng du TI gi yi ge
105b6: 'dab chags mgon po na/ / klu yi rgyan dang ldan zhing mtha' dag rigs kyi dbang gis kha dog lnga rnams 'phro ba bsgom par bya// de nas 'dab chags mgon po'i sngags ni dang por ma yig dag dang pa
105b7: sAhA'i mtha' can te/ / de ni bye ba phrag gcig bzlas nas gdengs can rigs dang bcas pa'i 'dab chags mgon po bsgrub par bya// mkha' lding grub na gdengs can dbang po rnams dang gdengs can bdag po
105b8: bu rnams mdag gzhug nyid du 'gyur/ / rab ma rtog sa yi steng du 'thung po gnod spyir gdon rnams dag dang mkha' 'gro ma dang ma mo rnams// sngags kyis dgug par rab tu 'gyur te gdon gyi tshogs
106a1: mtha' dag dus kyi sos zin rjod par byed/ / de phyir sems can don gyi slad du dang por mi rnams kyis ni mkha' lding dbang po bsgrub par bya// rig byed dang ni 'dab brgyad nyid dang mi yi bdag
106a2: po so dang chu gter drug dang gnyis skyes la/ / snying por bsgrub bya rang gi phyogs su dang por a a zung ste i la sogs pa 'dab brgyad la// oM ya la sogs bcu drug la ste ka sogs gsum gyis
106a3: bsgyur ba'i bcu dang ha kA gnyis skyes la/ / thun 'tshams 'dab ma rnams la bsgrub bya tshes kyis bsgyur ba'i dus la la mtha' dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams// a sogs dbyangs ni re re dag gis chu srin bum
106a4: pa'i dbang las ring po thung ngu dag kyang lnga/ / phyi rol 'dab ma sum bcu gnyis la bdag gi snying po badz+ra tIk+Sha la sogs yi ge rnams/ de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang zhi sogs las la wa ya ra la dkyil 'khor rnam
106a5: nyid do/ / snying por yi ge'i yan lag mchog dang rtse mo ldan par rkang pa dag ni dbang dang dgug pa la// zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang pa dang ni rtse mo ldan par mgo bo sngags pas bri bar bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa sring
106a6: pa gzhom pa dag dang bskrad dang dgug dang dbang du bya ba dang / / rengs pa dang bcas rmongs pa dag kyang srid pa gsum gyi gnas su 'khor lo 'di ni byed te 'dir// sngar brjod bzlas pa sbyin sreg rnams kyis
106a7: dang por badz+ra tIk+Sha la sogs sngags chen bsgrub par bya/ / rtsibs brgyad la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas bcu gnyis rtsibs dang bcu drug rtsibasu la bar du yang // bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste dbus
106a8: su rab 'gyur ya ma rA dzA sa do me ru Na la sa ye/ / de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni ra yak+She ts+tsha de nas mthar ni ni ru 'gyur// de yi phyi rol oM hwASh+Ti dang bi kri tA na na las rnam gnyis hU~M dang phaT tu
106b1: 'gyur/ / re mig nas ni ri mig par la 'gyur te mi yi bdag po bsgrub pa'i ming dang sngags 'di'o// dbye dang bsad dang dbang la ya ma rA ni rab tu 'gyur te kI ra me ngos ts+tsha sogs// rengs dang dgug dang rmongs
106b2: pa dang ni stobs ni byed pa dag dang zhi ba dang ni bskrad pa la/ / der ni snying po dag nas ya yig 'gro ste yon tan dbang gis phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin// yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog las mdun du
106b3: dbyangs kyis 'khyud pa dag ni ma ru rab tu 'gyur/ / yi ge rnams kyi sde mtha'i yi ge rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis lnga pa ha~M dang saM du gsungs// thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog sbyar ba la ni 'di yang bdag
106b4: gi shes rab yi ge u ru 'gyur/ / maM muHhaM hraHsaM suHma~M dzuHnyid ni pad ma nor 'dab la ste nyi ma'i 'dab ma la// phyi rol du ni shrI badz+ra g+ho ShaHsa dang ldan pa'i man ta b+ha dra hUM dang phaT tu 'gyur// bsgrub bya 'dir ni /
106b5: ba la ste che ge mo yang mdzod cig dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul// de bzhin sngar brjod 'khor lo rnams dag la yang rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar 'gyur// 'di dag thams cad bdag gi drin lnga
106b6: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka' yis mi rnams kyis ni 'grub par 'gyur/ / sgra ni gang zhig snying kha'i phyogs na yod pa'i mi mchog rnams kyi rna ba'i bugs thos gyur pa// de la mi yi sems ni gcig tu
106b7: gyur par sbyar bdag kyang ron mnyam par 'gyur ba ste/ / 'jig rten kun du sma ni gang zhig srid par skyes pas brjod pa de dang de ni de bzhin thos// khyab bdag gi ni rnam shes nyid dang ring du thos pa dag kyang
106b8: rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ / dkyil dkrung bcing ba byas nas phan tshun so dag reg pa min par kha ni rnam par phye ba yis// phyi rol rlung dag bkug ste de dang bdud rtsir bcas pa lte ba'i dbus su
107a1: rab tu bcug pa yis/ / kun du gdung ba dang ni bkres dang skom pa 'phrog cing mchog gi lus la drug kyang yang dag 'gog/ dpral bar thig le dkar po dbyangs kyis yongs su bskor ba bdud rtsi
107a2: spro bar byed pa yis kyang ngo / / kha yang btsums te sna yi bug pa gnyi ga dag nas phyi rol dag gi rlung ni ma lus pa// srog gi shugs kyis bkug te dri ma med pa'i glog dang mtshungs pa thur sel rlung dang sbyar
107a3: byas pa/ / dus kyis goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las zla ba nyi ma me yi dbus su ron mnyam par 'gyur// lus la zas la sogs pas bkres pa dang ni skom pa 'phrog ste 'chi ba med pa nyid kyang ster// nyi ma las
107a4: ni gzhan du phyogs te nyi 'od la gnas rang gi grib ma brtan pa'i mig gis blta/ / phyi nas nam mkha' dag la mngon par brtags na ro mnyam skyes bu du ba'i mdog can mthong bar 'gyur// zla ba drug tu
107a5: goms pa'i sbyor ba dag las sa la gnas pa'i gter ni sa yi bu gar mthong / / yang na shing gi grib mar rab tu zhugs te nam mkha'i 'thil du thig le'i phreng bar gyur pas so// nus ma gang zhig lte ba'i
107a6: dbus nas gzhan gyi gnas su bcu gnyis mtha' dang cha yi mthar 'gro ba/ / de ni lte bar 'gog pa dang bcas dri meng glog dang mtshungs pa dbyug pa'i gzugs can langs pa yang // 'khor lo nas ni 'khor lo'i bar
107a7: du nges par dman zhing rol pa'i bgrod pas dbu ma'i rtsa la bskyod/ / ji srid gtsug tor bug pa btsan thabs nyid kyis phyi rol gyi ni lpags pa dag la khab bzhin reg/ de yi dus su thur du ser ba mchog gi btsan
107a8: thabs nyid kyis steng gi lam du bskul bar bya/ / zung gi rlung dag 'gags pa na ni gtsug tor phug nas mchog gi grong khyer dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// de ltar yid la rdo rje rab tu sad pas yul dang bcas pa mkha'
107b1: la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur/ / slar yang 'dis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams mngon shes lnga yi rang bzhin sna tshogs yul du 'gyur ba yin// phyag rgya sgyu ma'i rjes su mthun pa yid dang nam mkha' la ni me long dag
107b2: la gzugs bzhin te/ / 'jig rten gsum po snang bar byed cing dri med glog dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer du ma 'phro bar byed// phyi dang lus la dbyer med yul dang rnam par bral ba snang ba tsam ni mkha' la gnas/
107b3: pa yi// sems la sems dag gis ni bdag gis 'khyud te 'gro ba du ma'i gzugs can de ni gcig pu'o// sems ni rnyog pa dang bcas las kyi phyag rgya 'di dang rtags pa'i ye shes phyag rgya spang bya ste// yang
107b4: dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ched du rgyal ba mchog gi skyed ma mchog gi phyag rgya gos pa med/ / rnam par 'gyur ba med cing mkha' mnyam mun bcom khyab byed rnal 'byor dag gis bgrod bya ther zug gnas// ye shes
107b5: gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'phrog cing dus kyi 'khor los rjes su rig pa bsgom par bya/ / srid gsum phra rab gzugs min 'dir ni rnam par shes pa'o de bzhin rnam par shes pa nyid med te// sangs rgyas
107b6: shes rab gang du'ang gnas pa ma yin zhes pa'i tshig ni sangs rgyas pa rnams ston par 'gyur/ / gang gis 'gyur med dang bral mi rnams kyis ni stong pa nyid de bzung nas stod par lta byed pa// des na gtso bos
107b7: gang zhig 'pho med lhan skyes lus kyi bde ba dag ni sngags kyi theg par bstan/ / mchod sbyin dus su ba glang bas rta glang po'i mgon song lus kyi yul la khyod kyi dbang po ni// bde bar bzang bgyi gang de yul
107b8: dang yul can rnams ni ye shes sbyor ba dag las 'gog pa ste/ / bslab ldan rnams kyi ba glang lpags par so ma bal+li li btung ba khrag dang bcas par gyur pa gang // de ni spyi bo'i zla ba'i bdud rtsi b+ha gA'i rdul lag na
108a1: shing kun du 'gro bdaga' ba'i gzugs/ / tshangs pa srog chags rnams kyi lus dang 'phrog byed dag ste khyab 'jug kyang yid de rnams rig byed gsum// de rnams oM yig yi ga gnam dang
108a2: bsreg za'i rtsa gsum dang ni yon tan de rnams so/ / rigs ni lus la yul dang yon tan la gnas gzhan gyi rigs te srid srung nA da'i rang bzhin can// de yi dbus su gzhom med gang de yul dang
108a3: rnam par bral zhing yon tan med pa'i 'gyur med do/ / rig byed mtha' las gsang ba 'di dag tshangs pa yis ni rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la sngon brjod kyang // dus kyis shes pa rab nyams thub pa
108a4: rnams kyis 'dir ni srog chags rnams la gsod pa dag kyang bstan/ / mi rnams mtho ris don du de la rab tu 'jug ste dmyal ba ngan pa'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// sol ba 'o ma'i rgyun gyis mngon par
108a5: bkrus pa 'dir ni zla ba'i mdog tu 'gar yang 'gyur ma yin/ / rnal 'byor med cing dam tshig rnam par bral bar rig byed tshig gis bslus pa'i mi rnams gang yin pa// de rnams gzhan gyi bu ni mi skyed don
108a6: du nyin mtshan dus su rang gi bud med bsrung byas nas/ / bu yis byin pa dag kyang yi dgas kyi ni 'jig rten du song ba yi sbyin par 'gyur ro lo// des na bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba 'dod pa'i sbyin po 'di na
108a7: gdug pa'i bram ze rnams kyis sbas/ / gal te skyes bu gzhan gyi rigs kyi rta yis rgod ma bzang mo la ni rta mchog skyes pa na// 'di yi mthu las slar yang dpal du 'gyur ba bdag po yi ni rnyed pa dag
108a8: kyang cis ma yin/ / gang gis chags pa can rnams nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang rang bud med dag ni srung bar byed// shi bar gyur na khyod su khyod kyi rang gi bud med su ste kye ma mi dge'i las kyis bcings// ba
108b1: glang sbyin dang sa gzhi sbyin pa de bzhin gzhan yang mi yi 'jig rten du ni longs spyod ster/ / sman dang kha zas sbyin pa dag ni mtha' dag nad 'phrog bkres pa dang ni skom pa dag kyang 'phrog/ 'dod pa'i sbyin pa
108b2: thams cad du ni bde mnyam 'bras ster 'khor lo'i dus su smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ / yid 'ong chung ma sring mo skal bzang bu mo rnams kyang gsang ba sbyin pa la ni rab sbyin bya// smad 'tshong dam pa las kyi
108b3: phyag rgyar 'gyur zhing gsang ba'i mi mo gzhan gyi bud med dam tshig ste/ / rang dbang tshes kyi phyag rgya yul ni mar po la dga' rang gi chung ma ye shes phyag rgya'o// smad 'tshong dam pa bcu gnyis lo lon
108b4: mchog gi bde ba la dga' gzhan gyi bud med bcu drug lo/ / rang dbang mdzes pa'i bu mo nyi shu'i lo lon dad ni rang gi chung ma sum bcu'i lo ru 'gyur// sngon tshes sangs rgyas rnams kyis 'dzin ma glang chen
108b5: rta dang shing rta gser gyi khur bu du ma rnams/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyi ched du byin zhing slar yang dbu dang khrag dang sha rnams dag kyang rab tu byin// 'di rnams kyis ni bzhes pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du ma gyur de nas
108b6: 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rab tu byin/ / gsang ba'i sbyin pa de yis skyes bu rnams ni rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la sangs rgyas nyid du 'khrungs// zangs ma yis ni gser dang mtshungs shing 'ching bu dum bus lha yi
108b7: cod pan ner bu dang mtshungs par/ / smad 'tshong dam pa'i 'dod pa'i sbyin pas 'chi med rigs kyi bu mo lpags pa dum bus gla rtsi ste// bong bu yis ni rigs kyi rta dang ra yis rab mchog glang chen bdag
108b8: po gang zhig rnyed pa dang / / chung ma'i sbyin pas rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs de nyid la lha mo 'di ni rnyed pa cis ma yin// byams pa'i gnas la sbyin pa dag ni bde mnyam 'bras ster ma yin sems can mtshung
109a1: pa'i mthu las te/ / de bzhin btang snyoms legs gnas sems can bdud kyi rang bzhin las ni rab mchog rgyal ba'i rigs su 'gyur// dman pa nyid dang mchog nyid phyir na snying rje dgra
109a2: dang bcas pa'i gnas ni gnyis la gzhan don du/ / bde bar gshegs pa de rnams kyis ni rab tu byin na tshogs gnyis rab rdzogs mi zad bde 'bras ster// gang la rigs ni tshad mar gyur pa de la mi yi
109a3: bdag po rig byed dag ni tshad mar 'gyur/ / gang la rig byed tshang mar gyur pa de la nges par sa gzhi'i gnas su mchod sbyin tshad ma ste// gang la mchod sbyin tshad ma de la rnam mang phyugs dang mi rnams dag
109a4: la 'tsho ba tshad mar 'gyur/ / gang la 'tsho ba tshad mar gyur pa de la dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i sdig pa tshad ma'o// gnas ni 'dzin pa'i don du bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal ldan gtsug lag khang gi
109a5: rab gnas bzhed par gsungs/ / de la sman dang kha zas sbyin pa nang ni zhi bar byed pa sbyin pa po yis sbyin par brjod// sbyin pa med na gtsug lag khang 'di sa yi steng gi gnas su dud 'gro rnams kyi
109a6: gnas sa ste/ / gang du dge 'dun gcig ni 'dzin par gyur pa der ni mi yi bdag po chos dang sangs rgyas kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la ni mi rnams thar pa'i ched du skyabs su nye bar 'gro ba
109a7: ste/ / 'dir ni sangs rgyas gtsug lag khang na gnas pa 'di dang yi ge bris pa'i glegs bam chos nyid dang // dge 'dun ngur smrig 'dzin pa mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba skye ba 'bum phrag rnams kyis
109a8: ster ba min/ / slob dpon dag ni sangs rgyas nyid de rab mchogs yi gzhi la chos ni de yis bstan pa'o// dge 'dun gang zhig der gnas rab tu dga' ba'i thugs ldan sems ca ku la rjes su brtse ba
109b1: ste/ / de 'dir rnam bzhi rnam pa gnyis gsungs 'dir ni slar yang nyan thos pa dang bla na med pa'o// dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma dang slar yang 'dir ni dge bsnyen chen po dag dang dge bsnyen ma// rnal
109b2: 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor pa rnams lhan skyes bde ba la dga' dge bsnyen ma dang dge bsnyen yang / / bsod nams ye shes don gyi ched du rtag par mchog tu 'dod pa'i sbyin pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // nyan
109b3: thos rnams la mchod ston la sogs rnal 'byor pa la mchog tu bde byed 'dod pa'i sbyin pa yang / / sbyin pa po gang rab tu dga' ba'i snying dang dus kun du ni chags pa'i sems kyis sbyin byed pa// de rnams
109b4: bsod nams ye shes rdzogs te mchog gi bde ba'i gnas su skye ba 'di la 'gro bar 'gyur/ / rgyal bar rab tu gsal ba'i slob dpon la yang mkhas pa min pa'i nyan thos gang zhig smod byed pa// de rnam
109b5: bgegs kyi dgon pos bsad de mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i mnar med du ni myur du 'gro/ / gang la rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag pos sngags kyi mthu rnams kyis ni rang nyid byin gyis brlab pa mdzad//
109b6: mi rnams dag las brtul zhugs nges pa'i gnas la de dang tshangs par spyod pa mtshungs pa'i dge slong su// mchog gi bde ba la dga' dge slong dag gam kun du rgyu dang gcer bu mgo zlum ral pa can/
109b7: thos dang klog pa la dga' mkhas pa la ma nyams thams cad byed po dang ni bdag tu zhen pa dang // 'dir ni rtag tu rang bzhin bu dang chung mar zhen dang bza' dang bza' ba min par zhen pa dang // rigs dang rigs
109b8: ni min pa la dga' snod dang snod min dag tu zhen pas dga' ba byed pa'o/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni sangs rgyas dang bcas bde mnyam 'bras ster lus dang ngag dang yid dang chags pa ste// 'di rnams
110a1: kun du bor nas sdig pa'i blo yis khyab bdag gzhan pa dag kyang yang dag tshol byed te/ / zhing dang 'jug ngogs yul gzhan dag tu brtul zhugs nges pa brgya dang skang gnas ri las mchod
110a2: pa dang / / yul gyi bde 'dod g.yul dang nyi ma gza' yis zin la du ma'i mtshon dang me la mchod pas so// 'di dag mtha' dag sngon gyi tshe yang bdud rnams dag gis khrag ni btung ba'i ched du bkod pa ste//
110a3: 'jug ngogs srung gnas dag gis shi bar gyur dang g.yul du bsnun pa nyid dang ba glang nyi ma ni// grol ba'i don dang khyim dang nor gyi yul dang bram ze'i bya ba dag la sha ba mtho ris so// de yi phyir na rang dang gzhan
110a4: gyi lus ni bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas 'di bsrung bar bya ba yin/ / gang zhig rgyud kyi rgyal po las na// rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa thos shing dbang ni blangs nas kyang // slar yang phrag dog byed na de ni
110a5: dmyal ba brgyad pa ji srid nyid du rab du 'jug 'gyur te/ / gang na khab rtse'i sa la mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis dmyal ba rnams ni kun du rgyu bar byed// de phyir mi rnams sems la phrag dog yod kyi bar du dbang ni
110a6: blang bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal bskyed mdzad rigs la sbyin pa tshul khrims rab tu rdzogs dang bzod pa brtson 'grus rdzogs pa dang // bsam gtan shes rab dang ni thabs dang smon lam dag dang stobs dang
110a7: ye shes rdzogs pa chung ma yi/ / sbyin pa 'di yis myur du rab tu dga' ba'i yid can rnal 'byor pa yi skye ba 'di la ste// gang zhig rmongs pa'i mi de rnams kyis de la rjes su 'tshang ba byas nas dmyal bar nye bar/
110a8: 'gro// sa dang dpal 'byor slad du shin tu g.yo ba'i snying ldan sngar ma yis ni ral gri rnon po dag/ gzung ste kun nas 'thab mo pa yis bkrigs pa'i yan lag bzhi ldan g.yul du rab tu zhugs pa na// glang
110b1: chen tshogs pa mthong nas 'jigs pa de yi lag pa'i 'thil nas ral gri dag ni lhung gyur pa/ / de la ral gri'i skyon du 'gyur ba ma yin ji lta de bzhin nyid du sngags kyi rigs kyi'o// sngags dang dpa' bo'i
110b2: pa yis kyang lha min gdengs can lha rnams drag po'i sa la bsgrub par bya/ / rang byin brlab pas lha mo dam chog rigs la gnas rnams bsam gtan bzlas pa sbyin sreg bcas rnams kyis// dag pa
110b3: rim pas dbang ste sngags pa yis ni rgyun chad med par dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis so/ / de las kyang ni gang zhig rab du gyur pa ye shes yid bzhin nor bu rgyal po'i lam 'di'o// me ni dngul chu'i dgra nyid/
110b4: yin te me dang rnam par bral na nam yang dngul chu 'ching ba med// ma bcings na ni gser byed med te gser dang bral na smra bo rnams la longs spyod med pa nyid// de bzhin bud med sbyor ba bral na rtag tu rnal 'byor
110b5: pa rnams dag gi sems ni 'ching mi 'gyur/ / bcings pa med na lus 'bigs med te ma phug lus kyis 'dir ni lhan skyes bde ba ster ba mo ni// skyed mos tshal lam ri bo de dag ni skye bo ri rigs bral bar zhi
110b6: ba'i sngags rnams bsgrub par bya/ / drag po rnams ni drag po'i dur khrod du ste lha mchog gnas su rengs pa dang ni rmongs pa yang // dbang dang dgug pa sngags pas mchog gi sa la bde ba phyag rgya kun dang rab tu
110b7: sbyor ba la/ gnas gzhan dang ni skye gnas gzhan du mi rnams kyi ni skye ba 'bum phrag gis kyang 'grub mi 'gyur// khyim dang grong du bgrang phreng dag gis nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su sngags kyi bzlas pa byas
110b8: nas ni/ / ngal zhing rmongs te chags pa dang bral slar yang 'di ni sngags kyi dngos grub med pa brjod par byed// gnas dang dus kyis stong pa mchog du rmongs pa rnams kyis yang dag par na shes pa min pa nyid//
111a1: rkang pa'i sor mo rnams kyi nad la spyi bor sman rnams kyis ni rab tu thug pa byed pa bzhin// bsam gtan dang ni sngags kyi bzlas pa byed pa dag dang dkyil 'khor chen po rnams dang 'dug
111a2: stangs dang / / sbyin sreg sngags bzlas rab gnas rdul tshen la ni rgyal ba'i rigs rnams spyan drang ba dang gshegs gsol dang // bud med sbyor ba rnam par spangs nas rab mchog khyab bdag bde ba phyag
111a3: rgya'i dngos grub ster bar byed/ / de phyir de ni nyin zhags sa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis thar pa'i slad du bsgom par bya// rang gi sems ni rgyal dang gnyid la rab tu zhugs pa mi yi bdag po rang bzhin med par
111a4: 'gyur/ / sad la rang bzhin dang bcas gsal bar byed de de dag srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i lam ma yin// dngos dang dngos med kyis phye sems kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor pa rnams dag la bde mnyam ster ba
111a5: min/ / gang zhig mkha' ye shes rab la 'khyud lhan skyes bde bar gnas pa'i rang sems de ni thar pa ster// oM AHhU~M ho rim par gnas pas dang por 'dir ni rtag tu chang ni spangs nas rgyas par bya//
111a6: rab tu 'bar bar byas te ri bong can ni zhu ba bzhin du rim pas bsgom par byas nas ni// snod de nas ni thig le dag gis lag par ri bong can gyi ming med rtse mos sa gzhi la// phyi rol du ni zung gsum
111a7: byas nas de yi dbus su nyin mor byed pa dang mtshungs zlum po'o/ / de yi dbus su ye shes 'khor lo srid gsum gnas pa dag kyang 'dir ni sngags pas bsgoms byas nas// mthe bong dang ni ming med
111a8: ngag gis nyin zhag so so'i dus su tshim par byed pa la sogs bya/ / yul dang grong gi bdag po rnams la thog mar 'dir ni gtor ma dang po dbus mtha'i ming gis te// 'phrog ma la ni chang bu gnyis dang
111b1: slar yang sngags pas khro ba dargyal po la ni gtor ma'o/ / pho nya mo rnams ngag la nas su bdag por rdo rje rnams kyis sbyin// 'byung po rnams la zos pa'i lhag ma slar yang dge ba'i
111b2: don du sbyin pa'i tshigs bcad 'dir bklag go/ mgo dang mgrin pa snying kha lte gsang gtsug ter du ni pa rdo rje rnams kyis yan lag dgod// gnyi ga'i rigs la gnas pa'i yan lag sgo rnams kyis ni
111b3: gnyid kyi dus dang mchod dang 'khrig pa la/ / lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur ba ste// mngon sum dag ni de nyid sbyor bas mkha' la skar ma bzhin du
111b4: du ma longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sa/ / mngon sum min na rjes su dpag pa shi ba'i lus bzhin de nyid min pa yis ni brtags pa gang // de ni ri mo sogs la blta bya yongs su ma smin klo can rnal 'byor rnams
111b5: kyi bsgom pa'i don/ / gzugs sam yang na dkyil 'khor dag kyang dang por bris sku la ni de nyid min pas bsgom par bya// nam mkha' la ni de nyid sbyor ba rnams kyis rang sems ma tshang med pa mtha' dag
111b6: mthong gyur pa/ / lo yi phyed dang lo gcig bla ma'i nges pa'i dbang gis ji srid nyi du brtan pa gyur gyi bar// de nas phyag rgya'i sbyor bas nyin zhag 'ga' zhig rnams kyis 'gyur ba med pa nyid du rab tu
111b7: 'gyur/ / rmad kyi rgyal po thams cad du ni nges par rdo rje'i tshig 'di rnal 'byor pa rnams bdag la gsungs// byis pa rnams ni smon par byed pa'i don du mchog gi thugs rje dag gis sna tshogs gtso bos
111b8: sbas/ / de phyir de ni dbye ba byas nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// phyag rgya'i dngos grub don slad rgyal ba mchog gi skyed mdzad gzhom du med pa dus kyi 'khor lo'o// dpal dang
112a1: po'i sangs rgyas chen po las byung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las sgrub thabs kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // gtso bo'i sgrib thabs rgyal ba mchog dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod
112a2: gsungs pa rnams ni cung zad shes/ / slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal lo lha mi'i bla maM khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dkyil 'khor dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang rnal 'byor ma rnams dag gi rigs
112a3: drug A li kA li dag la gnas pa nyid/ / zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs gsungs// ka ba rnams dang rdo rje phreng ba sa yi 'khor yu
112a4: cig pa nyid ni rus pa rnams kyis mdzod/ / sha khrag chu dang bshad pa rnams kyis lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin gzhan du rdul tshon gdab pa ste// 'khris pa bad kan gyis ni nyi ma ri bong can yang de bzhin chu
112a5: chus rnams kyis chu skyes rnams/ / ra ba lnga yi re khA sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes rnams kyis so// dus kyi rtsa yis gtso bo'i chu skyes g.yo ba me yi khor yug la sogs lpags
112a6: pa la sogs kyis/ / nyi ma'i sgo rnams khug pa rnams kyis nor bu'i rang bzhin bkod pa so yi phreng bas de bzhin nyid// g.yo ba'i khor yug la gnas dur khrod brgyad du 'khor lo rnams ni sor ma
112a7: rnams kyi sen mo yis/ / ba spu rnams kyis rdo rje me lce dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtha' rwa phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu gnas// de ltar nges par sku yi rdo rje mchog gi yon tan rnam mang dkyil 'khor gyin
112a8: rnam par gsungs/ / gsung gi rdo rje sa sogs ka sogs lha yi rnam pa nyid ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis// stong pa drug gis thugs kyi rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pas gtso
112b1: rnam pa gcig pa'o/ / de bzhin du ni ye shes rdo rje nges par srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms sna tshogs yum gyi rang bzhin no// sde ba ka la sogs pa drug po rim par yongs su bkod pa rnams kyi rigs ni
112b2: rim pa yis/ / rdo rje ral gri rin chen 'khor lo chu skyes de bzhin gri gug nyid ni rgyal ba rnams kyi ste// slar yang sde pa re re la yang mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog gi dbye ba lnga rnams dag gis dbye// so sor
112b3: yi ge dbye ba sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang nam mkha'i dngos po dag las so/ / dang por stong pa'i rab tu dbye ba 'ang nga nya Na ma na dang de bzhin na dang dang po'i dbyangs// rlung gi dbye ba i yig g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha sha rnam
112b4: te me yi dbye ba ri la sogs/ / chu yi dbye ba u yig wa kha tsha Tha pha tha wa ste sa yi dbye ba li la sogs// de ltar mchog gi rgyal ba'i rigs ni rnam pa lnga yis ka la sogs pa'i sde rnams rnam par phye/
112b5: gtsug tor stong pa lnga ste rigs gsum dag kyang de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'o// a sogs phyag rgya'i rigs te ha ya ra wa la dang ldan pa'i ka sogs sde pa mtha' dgra rnams// 'jig rten
112b6: snang byed dbyangs dang bcas pa'i ha ya ra wa lar ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'o/ / rig sngags 'chang gi dbang por 'gyur te ka sogs mtha' dgra brtsegs par gnas pa'i sde pa brgyad rnams so//
112b7: ka sogs yi ge gsum bcu ha ya ra wa lar ldan kA dang bcas pa sum bcu rtsa drug nyid// dbyangs kyi rnam par 'gyur bas phye ba ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro ni 'khor lo'i mgon po rnams su 'gyur// sku
112b8: ni gcig pa nges par gcig gis 'khor dang bcas pa gnyis ni shes rab ma yis 'khyud par 'gyur/ / lnga yi bdag nyid lnga yis 'gyur te 'khor dang bcas pa dgu ni 'khor lo'i mgon po dgu bdag nyid
113a1: dbyangs kyi grangs kyi bdag nyid bcu gsum dgu dang phyogs rnams kyis kyang sum bcu rtsa drug bdag nyid te/ / ya la sogs pa rnams kyis sgo skyong mtha' dag tshogs kyi rigs ni lha
113a2: ma'i dbyangs rnams nyid kyis so/ / khro bo drug tu ha sogs kyis 'gyur rang rigs phyogs su gnas rnams rlung gi dbyangs sogs dbye ba yis// so sor yi ge'i dbye ba rnams kyis ro yis bskur ba'i ron
113a3: rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rlung / / de bzhin yi ges sa ra yis bsgyur ba'i ro yi dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor dbang po ste// phung po 'byung ba dbang po la sogs dbyangs kyi dbye bas mtha' dag tshogs kyi
113a4: ni snang bar byas stong pa gzhom med la sogs mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs rnams kyis ni lha rnams rgya yis gdab pa ste/ / gtsug tor nas ni chu skyes mtha' ru mi mnyam mnyam pa'i rigs la 'khor lo'i dbus
113a5: kyi gdan la'o/ / rdo rje rnams kyis zhal gyi dbye bar 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rnams dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis// de nyid rnams kyis phyag rgya'i rab tu dbye ba gzha na yang de bzhin sku yi rdo rje la sogs kyis//
113a6: sum bcu rtsa drug sbyor ba'i rgyud ni dpag med yon tan yi ge du ma'i rab tu dbye ba can// yi ge so so'i ming can mnyam dang mi mnyam rigs la lha mo dang ni lha rnams ngag gi'o// sa bon gcig pu dpa' bo gcig
113a7: brdul la ro mnyam pa ni shes rab ma yis 'khyud par 'gyur/ / phung po rnams kyis lnga yi bdag nyid sa yi khams sogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dgu pa yang // bshang lam la sogs dang ni
113a8: mig la sogs pas yongs bskor 'di ni nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid dang / / de bzhin so ni rab tu skyes pa slar yang so rnams dag gis dbang phyug mtha' yas 'khor lo can// dag par yang dag dag pa'i chu
113b1: las ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar pad ma'i mtshan pa 'od dpag med/ / nga rgyal 'jig rten dbang phyug rta yi shing rtas 'gro ma mA ma kI dang gzugs kyi rdo rje ma// drag mo chu gter tshogs kyi dbang po gnyis smras
113b2: gdengs can dang ni stag gdod ma dang 'ug par bcas/ / 'di rnams dpal ldan g.yon gyi zhal nas mchog gi snying rje yis ni rdo rje can gyis spros pa'o// chos la yang dag dag pa'i rlung las phyag gi pad
113b3: ral gri don yod grub pa sgrol ma dang / / nam mkha'i snying po reg bya rdo rje ma dang shin du stobs bcas tsar tsi kA dang lcags sgrog ma// bden bral dang ni rlung zhes bya dang dmangs rigs klu dang de bzhin khyi ga
113b4: ma dang bya rog bcas/ / 'di rnams nges par byams pa'i thugs kyis srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos shar gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par dag pa'i me las nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs rin
113b5: chen 'dzin dang gos dkar mo/ / sa yi snying po thugs byed dang ni ro mchog rdo rje ma dang phag mo gdong drug me yi lha// gdengs can dbang po rgyal rigs gnyis dang rab gsal khro gnyer ma dang pagan
113b6: dang bya rgod bcas/ / 'di rnams dpal ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog gi dga' ba yis ni sna tshogs gtso bos spros pa'o// lte bar yang dag dag pa'i sa las mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'i thub pa
113b7: phyag na 'khor lo dang / / spyan ma dang ni rnam par sel ba rab mchog mi yi bdag po rengs byed dri yi rdo rje ma// 'od zer can dang dbang po brgya byin dus kyi gdong pa dang bcas rje rigs klu la sogs pa kun// gtso
113b8: bo yis ni btang snyoms dag gis nub kyi zhal nas skye bo kun la phan rnams spros pa'o/ / gtsug tor dag pa'i stong pa las ni phyag na mchog gi rdo rje mi bskyod dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// gtsug tor dang ni
114a1: nas kyi khams tenam mtha' man tan nga gas bya ba da rgyal sogs gakun/ / gas pa dag pa las rnaMm pa dug pa pa ma sa rnams pa yid mamamags pa u/
114a2: 'og tu yod tur med po'i ga sa rnams srog chags rnams kyi thar po gyur ni smras pa'o// grags kyi'adab ma thun ma la sogs phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khrag gis gang ba'i bang pa sa/
114a3: gang du g.yon pa sam dang ngas dpang dag pa ba 'dag pa sa kyi smo rgyam/ ming pa rnams kyi srid ng+yas shing tshul gte gyi ya nga tsam phyag ga/ khyab tu
114a4: mag gi lpags pa mi bzang dathang po'i bdag po lpags pa pa shus brjod pa 'angan/ / phyi la dran nag dang dmar dang dri med ri bong can lus 'khor lo gsub la lA ma rnams// dza drug dang 'i skyes
114a5: rnams ni phyag gnyis zla ba'i zhal te 'byung skyes rnams kyang de bzhin no/ / sgor ni gtum mo rol gnas shing phyogs bral du yang nges par phyag na gri gug thod pa can// dpa' bo rnams kyi rig byed phyogar
114a6: rje Da ma ru dang dril bu rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dpal ldan ldan po'i phyogs brgyad dang ni sa chu'i dkyil 'khor dag la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tshan do ha dang 'dus pa can dang dur khrod ste/ me
114a7: rlung gi dbus su yang / / de bzhin yul dang grong khyer la ni phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas lha rnams rig par bya ba ste// shes rab rgyud kyi mngon par brjod pa srid pa gsum gyi bla mas shar gyi zhal nas
114a8: smras pa'o/ / dkyil 'khor byed kyi chu yis snying por 'khor lo tsha dgu pa ste ka ba rdo rje'i phreng bas spras// zla ba nyi ma dag dang pad ma la yang phung po dang ni khams kyi lhag pa'i lha chen po// phyi rol tu ni ra ba'i
114b1: rtsig pa dag la yul dang yul can zla ba nyi ma'i gdun la gnas/ / sgo skyong rnams ni nyi ma la gnas gzhan pa tshogs kyi rigs ni stegs bu dag la kun nas so// 'di la sogs pa de bzhin du ni rnal
114b2: 'byor rgyud kyang 'dus pa rnam pa drug tu gsungs pa ste/ / zur du khro bo rnams dang logs su yul dang yul can dza ma b+ha la ni phyag na so ba bsnabs// ngag dang rkang lag bshad lam b+ha ga'o nya ma ri bong
114b3: can dang dus kyi rtsa yi rang bzhin gyis/ / shes rab dang ni thabs rnams mtha' dag zhal gsum ro yi phyag ldan g.yas kyi zhal nas spros pa'o// snying por 'khor lo chu gter zung du 'gyur te mi yi bdag
114b4: po dkyil 'khor las ni gsum gyi cha/ / phung po khams rnams lhag pa'i lha nyid slar yang 'phar ma gzhan la sgra yi rdo rje la sogs brgyad// dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol tu gnas phyogs bcur bkod pa
114b5: nyi ma la gnas khro bo'i tshogs rnams te/ / der ni ra ba'i rtsig pa dag la dus la chu gter gyis bsnun byang chub sems dpa' mtha' dag rnams// sgyu 'phral dra ba'i dbye ba gsum ste zhal gsum ro yi phyag ni lha yi
114b6: sku yi dpe ba las/ / rtog pa la sogs gang yin mtha' dag blun po'i sems kyis dbang gis g.yon gyi zhal nas spros pa'o// rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa'i rgyud dang 'dir ni nyis 'gyur sdom pa chen po mkha' 'grem
114b7: rnams kyi/ 'khor lo drug ni rigs drug rams te mi bdag dur khrod sa rnams nub kyi rgal nas spros pa'o// thig ni dug dang bug pa'i cha shas g.yo ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas rnams kyis dkyil 'khor thig btab na
114b8: snying po las ni drug drug cha rnams kyis te pad ma'i 'dab ma lte bar ldan pa'i phyed la yang / / gri gug 'khor lo chu skyes rin chen ral gri mchog gi rdo rje'i phreng ba gnyis gnyis cha rnams kyis// nyi ma rnams kyis sgo dang
115a1: sgo lung dus dang ro rnams kyis kyang sregs bu dang ni do sha las/ / gsum gyis kyang ni rab lnga yi re khA rtse mo can gyis do shal rtsa bar sngam bu'o// nyi ma rnams kyis logs dang 'gam sde su pa 'gyung na
115a2: byed rnams kyis ka ba'i steng du rta babs so/ / phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu sgo ni brgyad rnams bya ste dkyil 'khor chen po 'di ni zlum po'o// dbus su chu skyes sna chags mdog ste lte ba la ni nya ma ri bong can dag
115a3: sbyang ba'i gang na/ / 'khor lo dang ni phreng ba sngon po sa ni ljang khu dag dang sa gzhi nag po 'khor lo ser// sa gzhi dmar la 'khor lo dkar dngas ni dkar po phreng bar bcas pa'i 'khar lo dmar po dang // sa ni ser po sngan
115a4: po dag dang 'khor lo dkar po min pa dag dang ljang khu'i mdog tu 'gyur/ / cha drug gis ni tshon gyi sa ste skyed byed zhal gyi dbang gis sgo yi 'khor lo de bzhin no// phyi rol du ni brgyad gnyis dur khrod rnams te rigs kyi
115a5: dbang gis de bzhin snying po'i lha mo brgyad/ / 'dab ma la ni thod pa bdud rtsi'i ro dang ldan pa brgyad te 'dab ma rnams la lha mo rnams// phyir ni sgeg mo la sogs lha mo phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas de bzhin klu
115a6: rgyal chen po brgyad/ / de yi phyi rol du ni sa chu me dang g.yo ba'i 'khor yug nyid dang rdo rje'i phreng ba'o// ring po thung ngu dbyangs rnams kyis kyang sa ta ba Ta tsa ka sa sogs stong sogs yi ge rnams// rlung sogs
115a7: rtsibs rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring pos sogs khams kyi rang bzhin rnams/ / steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis thung ngu rang rang 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi steng du'o// sgo dang sgo yi bar du ha kA
115a8: dang ldaran rnam pa 'di 'thil na gnas pa'i sde par bcas pa rnams/ / mkha' 'gro ma rnams thung ba'i dngos po ri bong 'dzin pa'i zhal dang phyag na gr-i gug thod pa can// g.yas pa brkyang zhing rang rang snod rnams kyis ni
115b1: lha min khrag 'thung skra grol gos dang bral ba ste/ / rkang pa rked pa dpral ba dang ni rnab mgrin pa lag par g.yer ka sogs dang rus pa'i rgyud// mgo dang rkeng pa'i ngos la thod pa'i dum bu rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog la
115b2: mi zeng ba'o/ / mkha' 'gro zhal gnyis phyag ni rdo rje mchog dang Da ma ru dang rdo rje la dz+wa dril bcan// mgrin par dpal ldan mgo phreng mgo bong cod pan la yang rdo rje dang dbyangs dang ni nang bu'o// dpal lda mgul
115b3: rgyar rkang la rkang gdub phyag la phyag gdub dang ni ske rags dag dang rnga rgyan te/ / rdzogs pa'i thod pa rnams kyi phreng ba mche ba can dang mtha' dag lus la gnas pa'i thal ba'i rgya// gtso bo dbu la thod pa rnams kyi
115b4: phreng ba mgrin par gdong brgya rnams kyi mgo yi phreng ba'o/ / zla phyed rdo rje'i cod pan can te rang gi rked dang phyag gnas stag lpags glang po'i lpags pa'o// zla nyi bsreg za'i dkyil 'khor la ni zhabs kyi 'og na bdud
115b5: dang dbang ldan sku la thal ba ste/ / phyag rgya klu yi dbang po dang ldan 'jig dus rtse mo can mtshungs mkha' 'gro ma la 'o dag byed// phyogs kyi 'dab mar lhag pa'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams Da ma ru dang rdo rje kha T+wAM ga nyid
115b6: te/ / bshad gci khrag dang mi sha rnams kyis phyogs bral 'dab ma la gnas khu ba'i snod kyang phyag da'o// de bzhin du ni lha mo brgyad kyang kun nas gnyi ga bde la snyoms par zhugs pa'i 'khor lo'o// ser dang dkar po
115b7: dpar po'i mdog dang nag po ljang khu'i lus dang sngon po'i mdog rnams rang phyogs su/ / rgyal ba skyed mdzad rigs la gtso bo'i kha dog mtshan pa rnams ni sngar bzhin spyan gsum dag gi tshogs// phan tshun du ni
115b8: 'khyud pa dag kyang rang bzhin rigs kyi dbang gis rig par bya ste kun nas so/ / sbyin pa sogs dang phung po 'byung ba yul dang yul can gzhan yang dbang po lnga la sogs pa dang // phyogs sa phyogs kyi stob
116a1: dang dpal ldan rgyal sras dbang rnams kyis kyang lha mo rnam par spyad par bya/ / lhun po'i phyogs su dbye ba brgyad kyis phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas kun dang // zhing dang tshan
116a2: dog dang 'dus pa dur khrod sa dang khyim ni rlung gi byed kyi 'tshams su ste/ / 'di dag sangs rgyas sa ni nyim phra mo lus skyes mi dang 'byung po lha dang lnga min dang // dus dang gisu ba'i nyon gcig rigs lngar ma ni rnam par rgyu ste
116a3: klu'i rab tu rngu ba las/ / rgyab tu lha mo dbang byed thim pa zhes 'dir mdun dung nyid lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis te// drung dang dbang ldan lha min me dang 'og dang mkha' dang lha dang gshin rje gdod sbyin rab tu yang// gdus
116a4: tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgrin pa mgo bo la gnas lte ba dang ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo la/ / 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'og dang steng du nyin zhag so so'i chu srin nas ni dus sbyor gnyis gnyis par// gtso bo'i chu skyes
116a5: rdo rje kun dang thig le 'gyur med rnams kyis rdo rje nor bur gnas pa ni/ / kun nas dga' ba thams cad rdo rje can gyi bde ba mnyam pa'i gnas te rdo rje can ni thams cad dag gi dus// zla bzhub bla ma'i zhal de la
116a6: gang 'i gzugs pa rus kyi 'khor long nyid te/ / bdud rnams kyi ni dus su gsungs shing 'chi ba'i 'jigs byed mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo 'di dag go// shes rab thabs kyi yi ge dag gis gnyi ga'i rigs kyi
116a7: las mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro'i ming / / rdo rje gsum po rkang pa gzhan dang bcas pas thog ma dbus dang mtha' mar phye ba bzlas bya ste// srog gis byin gyis brlabs pa gang zhig gnyi ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis rang
116a8: las kyi rjes mthun pa'o/ / de'i 'gro rnams la gnas mkha' 'gro ma dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams ni mung du 'grub par 'gyur// dbugs rnams gang dag skye ba'i dus su dbum la ni rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mdar gyur pa//
116b1: brgyad rnams kyis 'khor lor 'gyur te 'og dang mkha' yi dbang gis sgo yi dbus gnas lha mo rnams// rkang pa gcig gis bskyed pa srid pa gsum gyi yum ste phyag na gri gug dang ni thod pa can// bdud rtsi bde ba'i cha yis 'khrud
116b2: pa nyi ma zla ba'i steng du g.yas brkyang dus kyi 'khor lo'o/ / lnga gsum chu gter yul dang yon tan dbang gis zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams chu gter rkang pa las// gza' bdun dang ni rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bo
116b3: can gyi gdan ni gzhan pa rnams/ / nag po dkar po'i rdzogs pa nyi ma nyin mor byed dang ri bong can gyi gdan ni gzhan rnams te// 'di nyid la ni ri bo'i gza' rnams mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la nyi ma zla ba'i gdan rnam
116b4: so/ / zla ba nyi ma'i rkang pa rtsibs rnams dang ni pad ma'i 'dab ma sgo bzhi zur gyi ro rnams te// slar yang rkang pa nyis 'gyur de dag rnams ni nyin mor byed dang ri bod can gyi gdan rnams nyid// rdzogs pa gza' dang nyi ma'i rkang
116b5: ba mnyam dang mi mnyam gnas la chu gter rkang pa gdan rnams te/ / nyi ma 'am ni gang ba'i zla ba la 'gyur rigs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yang na kha sbyor la// rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig deng ni yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis
116b6: rgyas gad ba zhal ni gnyis pa'o/ / rtse mo can la ro dang reg bya'i zhal ni gnyis su 'gyur te rgyas gang ba zhal ni gsum pa'o// tshul zhal yang gzugs dang ro dang reg bya yi ni zhal te rgyas gad ba zhal ni bzhi pa'o// sa la
116b7: dri la sogs pa reg bya'i mtha' yi yon tan zhal te rgyas gang ba zhal ni lnga pa'o/ / nam mkha' la ni zhal yang stong pa rnam pa lnga ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa'o// de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te/
116b8: yon tan dbang las stong pa drug gis zhal rnams so// gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni bsres pa lnga// shes rab thabs ni zhal bcu yon tan rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis
117a1: bzhi la zhal ni bcu gnyis pa/ / thun 'tshams dbye bas rnam pa bzhi ste/ rnam pa gsum gyi zhal yang dus sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum// dus sbyor byed kyis phyag gi dbye ba mi mnyam
117a2: mnyam pa 'khrud pa dag kyang lus dang sems la ni/ / thun 'tshams cha shas snga phyi la ste zhal gsupa ro yi phyag ni 'khyud ba dbu ma'i cha shas la// shes rab sbyor dang snyoms par zhugs pa dag kyang rgod pa la
117a3: sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon 'tshams la'o/ / shes rab yan lag dmar dang ser po la ni nges par dus kyi 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug/ rdo rje can gyi g.yon mdun yan lag dkar dang sprin dag
117a4: mtshungs pa dag la shes rab bsam pa'o/ / mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba g.yon dang mdun gyi yan lag dag ni zhi bar 'gyur// drag po g.yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po
117a5: bsam pas phye ba de bzhin nyid/ / shes rab kyis phye rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gtso bos phye ba nges par phyogs bral du yang rnal 'byor pa yi
117a6: tshags nyid te/ / g.yas dang g.yas min nyi ma dang ni ri bong can gyi sku de gzung ste shar dang nub nyid kyang // nag po ser po dag ste sngon po ljang khu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa 'og yang dag gnas// dkar po rnams kyi the
117a7: rab dmar mo dmar po rnams kyi ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar de bzhin nyid/ / ser po rnams kyi kha dog nag mo dkar min rigs rnams kyi yang mchog gi gser dang mtshungs pa'o// sngon po rnams kyi kha dog sde rogs slar
117a8: ljang khu rnams kyi sngon mo rnams su de bzhin gsungs/ / de bzhin nges par lha mo rnams kyi rang rigs phyogs su gnas pa'i lha rnams dag tu rig par bya// shes rab rgyud ni shar nas slar yang rnal 'byor rjes su rig pa nyid
117b1: ni rub kyi zhal nas so/ / g.yas kyi zhal nas rgyal ba'i bdag pos rnal 'byor rgyud gsungs g.yon gyi zhal nas bya ba la sogs so// shar nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid te slar yang nub kyi zhal nas nges par dgu pa mtha' dag go/
117b2: mdo sde ba ni g.yas kyi zhal nas gsungs te dkar po'i zhal nas dag pa'i bye brag smra ba'o// nub kyi zhal ras nges brjod rig byed dang ni rgyal ba'i dbang pos g.yon gyi zhal nas mchod sten gsungs// g.yas kyi zhal nas
117b3: skan tshig rig byed mchog gi bsreg bya'i rigs la srid srang shar gyi zhal ras so/ / shar gyi zhal nas rigs can rgud te slar yang nub kyi zhal nas mkha' lding dang ni 'byung po'i rgyung// g.yon gyi zhal nas grub pa'i mtha
117b4: ste nyi ma 'char ka dang mtshungs g.yas pa nas ni khyab 'drug gos/ / rgya ba nas 'bral la ldog pa mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas g.yon gyi lha dang rab tu gnas pa ste// g.yas ras rig pa drag po mir dang slar yang rlung
117b5: gi'al nas drang sras rangs pa'i bdag/ stong pa'i zhal nas stong pa dbang phyug dag ni srid gsum bdag pos 'jig rten pa yi don du spros// rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dang ni gzhan brtsod dus rgyab kyi 'al
117b6: la sogs pa'i dbye ba las/ / de bzhin dpa' bo'o rim pa sogs dang nyi ma'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis thun 'tshams pa'i po nyid rnams kyi // kha zas dag ni g.yas kyi zhal nas mchog tu 'jigs pa dag kyang rgyab kyis
117b7: nas smos pa ste/ / mdun gyi zhal nas 'khrig pa nyid ngo mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas rgyal po rmi lam dag dang gnyid// rgyab nas rje rigs gnyis skyes mi yi bdag po dang ni de bzhin dmangs rigs dag kyang rim pas
117b8: 'grub/ rgyal ba'i bdag pos mdun nas thams cad yod par smra ba gsungs te g.yas nas mang pos bkur ba'o// rgyab kyi zhal nas gnas brtan pa ste slar yang dge 'dun phal chen pa ni g.yon gyi zhal nas so// mdun gyi 'al
118a1: nas mi rnams dang ni slar yang rgyab kyi zhal nas dud 'gro rnams ni nges par spros/ / g.yas kyi zhal nas 'thung po lha rnams mchog tu dkar ba'i zhal nas dmyal ba rnams dang lha min rnams// mdun gyi zhal
118a2: nas spros pa dag kyang snying kha'i 'khor lo nas 'gyur rgya ba zhal lte ba'i 'khor lo nas/ / g.yas kyi zhal nas longs spyod rdzogs pa nas 'gyur kun du g.yon gyi zhal nas lhan cig skyes pa nas// 'khor lo rnams
118a3: kyi zhal gyi dbus nas lus la dngos po spro ba dang ni sdud pa nyid du 'gyur/ / 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag rnams kyang rgyal ba skyed mdzad zhal gyi dbye ba rnams kyis yang dag go// dpal ldan zla ba dang ni zla ba rku shel
118a4: rnam rtog med pa'i rang bzhin las ni chu 'byung ba/ / de bzhin 'jig rten du ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phung po la brten thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos 'dzag ste// chu ni sa bon khams la kun du brten nas ro mnyam 'gyur ba ji
118a5: bzhin nyid du chos dag ni/ / sems can rnams kyi dag pa'i sems kyis rnam pa mang por 'gyur te sngon gyi las kyi mthu las so// srid gsum gnas na sems can don gyi byed po dang ni yid bzhin nor bu la yang bsam pa
118a6: med/ / sems la gnas pa de ni mi dge 'bras bu'i dbang gis sdig pa'i las can sems can gyis mi mthong // yid bzhin nor bu'i skyon min mi dge ba dang dge ba'i 'bras bu sems can thams cad rab tu spyod// sems
118a7: ni dag na mi de yang ni rgyal ba'i dbang por 'gyur te rgyal ba gzhan gyi ci zhig bya/ / gang gis myu gu 'di skyed skyed par byed pa de ni dngos po skyes nas rnam par nyams par 'gyur// nyams pa de yi skyes par rab tu 'gyur te slar
118a8: yang sa bon rgyal po dag gi skyed byed do/ / snga ma gang de gzhan gyi dngos las shi ba zhes pa'i tshig ste rang gi ngo bos skyes pa min// gang gis stong pa nas ni sa la 'ongs pa bde ba'i sku cig de yis stobs bcur 'gro bar
118b1: 'gyur/ / bde nas bde la rjes chags skra cig 'dir ni lhan skyes dngos po gzhan la rjes su chags pa min// phung po gang dag de yis skyed rnams slar yang bde ba'i skad cig de yis skyed par byed pa ste// dag pa las tre/
118b2: de las gzhan te slar yang de las gzhan dang de las rnam par dag pa'o// dag pa'i sa la sa bon btab pa las ni rtse ba rnams dang lo ma me tog 'bras bu bzhin// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang ro dang mchog gi ro ste phra rab
118b3: rnams ni rnam pa drug/ dri la sogs pa re res dman zhing mtha' ma yul dang rnam par bral ba ye shes blta bya rnams// 'dod pa gzugs dang gzugs med rnams ni zung dang zung dang bong can te mtha' mchos kyi
118b4: dbyangs/ / rnam pa kun ldan de rnams kun nas rtag tu 'pho med bde ba ltar skyes rten du gyur pa'o// sa sogs khams la phan tshun du ni gtso bo'i dngos po dag la slar yang pal ba'i dngos rnams gnas// pad tshur bung
118b5: po 'byung ba dang ni yul dang yul can rnams ni phan tshun bdud dang ma rig pa/ / lnga po phan tshur rjes su chags ra ro yi 'gro rnams la gnas sdug bsngal bde ba'i sa cig go// rnam pa thams cad pa rnams kur
118b6: nas gzhan gyi yon tan mi rga mi phyed rdo rje yang dag gnas/ / de dag rnams kyis dus kyi 'khor lo rdzu 'phrul rab tu gsal byed chen po du ma sprul pa'i sku// rdo rje 'bar ba 'phro ba rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams
