118b7: gnas pa lha min dang ni mi rnams dang / / longs spyod rdzogs pa gzugs can rnams dang mkha' la rgyal po'i sras sogs dgra bcom rnams la chos sku yis// stong pa'i cha yis srid gsum mtha' dag stong
118b8: ba'i zad par rung rnams kyis ni rlung gi zad par te/ / me yi tsha shas rnams kyis me yis zad par chu yang 'gro la spros pa'i chu yi charnams kyis// 'dzin ma'i cha shas rnams kyis sa yi zad par tshogs pa'i yul rnams kyis ri ngos
119a1: po'i rang bzhin kun/ / kun nas nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs pa gcig gi bdag nyid 'di ni dag pa'i sa la ston par mdzad// de ltar sangs rgyas skur gyur bde ba gcig pu'i rang bzhin phyir na 'chi bar yang ni mi
119a2: 'gyur ro/ / de gcig pu las mtha' dag rgyal ba mchog 'di rnams kyi rnam pa lnga yis mngon rdzogs byang chub dang // rnam pa nyi shu'i rang bzhin dang ni slar yang de nas sgyu 'phrul du ma'i rang gi ngo bo'o// de yi skad cig/
119a3: gcig ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur te las gzhan gyi ni rang bzhin min// 'dir ni 'pho med thabs gang yin pa'i skad cig ma 'di lhan skyes chos kyi dbyings su rab zhugs pa'o// mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing
119a4: rnams dang ni dpag med yon tan rnams dang nam mkha' la sogs khams rnams dang / / gnas dang skye dang nyams pa rnam gsum zhes pa'i srid pa dang ni 'gro ba drug gi sems can kun// sangs rgyas khro bo lha sogs
119a5: rnams dang snying rje'i thugs ldan byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas rnams te/ / 'di dag rnams ni srid pa gsum gyis phyag byas rgyal ba'i bde 'byung gcig yin no// sgra dang lpags pa sha khrag ro dang bcas pa
119a6: ngag dang de bzhin rus pa dang ni nang dang rtsa/ / de dag rnams la srog sogs rlung ste kun nas rlung gi dbus su nyi ma zla ba'i bgrod pa'o// zla ba'i dbus su dri med nor bu bzhin du dngos po kun gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes
119a7: pa ste/ / de ni dngos dang dngos med gnyis med nyid dang mchog gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom med do// spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha' ni mtha' dag lus la gnas rnams gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa rnams// sde
119a8: pa drug dang la sogs gzhan rnams 'di dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster/ / de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar bya// lus las ma
119b1: gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa min/ / sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas yin te sangs rgyas chen po gzhan 'dir 'jig rten khams na yod ma yin// de rnams mnyes
119b2: par byas pas dpag med srid pa gcod par byed te rnam par mi rtog pa las so/ / rnal 'byor pa ni 'khu bar byed na du 'bod la sogs dmyal ba chen po'i mtha' ru 'gro bar 'gyur// de phyir sems ni rnam par dag pas mkhas
119b3: dang mi mkhas skye bo rnams la 'gal ba mi bya'o/ / sems can dag dang 'grogs pa thob nas mi yi bdag po dag pa'i byams pa la sogs semasasu 'gyur// mi dge'i yon tan dang ldan 'khor ba pa ni drug po rnams kyi zhe
119b4: sdang chags sogs sems su 'gyur/ / dus kun du ni byang chub sems kyang 'gro ba dang ni 'gro bar 'dod pa rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur// thar par 'jug pas dman zhing smon pa rnam par spangs pa dag ni thams cad dus su
119b5: bdud kyi sems/ / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams zhi ba min pa dang ni byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba byed// bdud kyi dbang po rdzu 'phrul gyis dman mchog tu 'jigs byed yin te ston pa gcig pu rdzu 'phrul ldan//
119b6: bdud rnams kyi ni bdud kyi blo dang skyob pa rnams kyi bde ba'i blo gros gzhan gyi snying la 'jug/ de phyir sangs rgyas mthu rnams kyis ni srong pa gsum po mtha' dag mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// rgyal ba rnams
119b7: kyis 'jig rten khams la tshad gsungs gang yin de yang mi rnams kyi ni ye shes min/ / sangs rgyas rnams la lhan skyes lus kyi dbang gis khru ni gcig dang du ma dag gi tshad med te// las kyi sar ni srog chags rnams
119b8: la sems can rjes mthun tshad dag rtag tu rab tu gsal bar mdzad/ / gal te tshad 'di bdag gi 'dod pa brjod na lha rnams kyis 'di med pa ba zhes brjod par 'gyur// gang gis rgyal ba'i dbang po skyed cing nyin zhag sa so
120a1: dbang las gang gis mngal nas nges par 'byung / / rka cig gang gis 'gyur ba dag dang rnam par bral ba grub cing g.yo ba g.yo ba med gyur pa// sangs rgyas bya ba de spangs nas ni bde mnyam dang bral stong pa
120a2: gzhan dag gang zhig sgom byed pa/ / de yi skal pa bye ba du ma rnams kyis sangs rgyas nyid dang lhan skyes bde ba dag kyang ring // nim pa'i shing las rgun 'brum min te dug las bdud rtsi dang ni tshangs pa'i shib las
120a3: 'dam skyes dang / / stong pa las ni myar 'das bde ba mi dge'i dbang las bde ba srog chags gsod las grub pa rnams// mchod sbyin dag las phyugs rnams mtho ris dang ni dbang po 'gog las mchog tu zhi ba'i go 'phang
120a4: min/ / rig byed las ni kun mkhyen gsung dang 'gyur med bde ba g.yo med 'gyur ba ma dag sems las min// sems can rnams kyi sdig pa'i sems ni bdud kyi tshogs kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro mi yi bdag
120a5: bsod nams ye shes rjes chags bde ster dag kyang rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byin brlabs pa'o/ / gang phyir bde ba'i dam tshig dbang gis bdud dang nyon mongs bcom nas mya ngan 'das par 'gro byed
120a6: pa/ / de phyir bdud rnams nyi ma so so'i dus su de dag rnams la du ma yi ni bgegs rnams byed// rgyal ba'i lhan skyes bde ba 'di ni 'phel ba'i don slang dang por las kyi phyag rgya bsten par bya// de nag nyi ma'i gzugs
120a7: ni lus dang gdong dang rkang pa gtsug tor yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa ste/ / glog gi dbyug pa'i rjes mthun 'pho med bde bskyed par byed pa mtshan nyid yan lag rab tu rdzogs// rdo rje rnams kyi rab tu snang bar byed ma
120a8: srid gsum gnas lus chos kyi dbyings ni de nas 'gyur/ / 'byung ba med pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster phyag rgya bzhi po 'di rnams grong dang 'brog dgon dur khrod dang // mi gtsang ba dang gtsang ba'i gnas dang khyim dang lha yil
120b1: pa thams cad du ni dus kun du/ / shin du dga' ba'i dga' ba la gnas 'jig rten lam las rab grol rigs dang rigs min mngon spyod cing // lus stobs bde ster bza' ba btung ba la sogs longs spyod dang
120b2: ldan rnal 'byor rnams kyis bsgom par bya/ / rlung ni yang dag phrad pa rnams kyis glog me yi rtse mos spyi bo'i zla ba zhu bar byed// thig le gang gang zhu ba 'di nas mgrin pa snying kha la son lte ba gsang ba rnams la
120b3: 'gogs thig le las ni g.yo ba'i khu ba rdo rje nor bu la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la 'gog pa gang / / de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pas bde ster na'o// de phyir g.yo med bde ba'i skad
120b4: cig lhan cig skyes pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings kyis ster byed te/ / ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa'i srog rnams thams cad bkug cing nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas// rdzu 'phrul kun mkhyen pa dang
120b5: srid gsum bla ma nyid ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi skye ba 'di la ste/ / gal te lam du rab zhugs shi bar gyur na de tshe de yi 'dzin pas skye ba gzhan la'o// gang zhig yon tan med cing dngos chud yul dang rnam bral de ni sku
120b6: yi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis/ / de nas chags pa rjes chags dang ni yon tan gter gzhan dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin rnam pa gnyis// nag dang dkar la rjes chags yul dang yon tan la dka' thugs kyi phyag rgya
120b7: rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur/ / brgyad dang gnyis dang lnga dang lnga dang gsal bar mkha' dus dang ni stong pa rig byed dag gi'o// rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du rgyal ba mchog skyed ma ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsrung bar bya/
120b8: rin chen dbang po rab tu 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs byas nas// sangs rgyas byin brlabs sngags rnams kyis ni gsang ba'i pad mar bde mnyam sngags dang bcas pa smra
121a1: bya ste/ / gsang bar bsrung ba rab tu byas nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni myang bar bya// de la gang zhig bu ru gyur pa rgyal bskyed byed sras po de ni 'jam pa'i rdo rje nyid// shes rab lhag
121a2: pa las ni 'ga' zhig tshen bu mor 'gyur te nges par sangs rgyas yum du 'gyur/ / de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis pad ma dkar 'dzin dzam b+ha la dang phyag na rdo rje ste// me tog brgyad kyis gzhan brgyad phyogs
121a3: dang phyogs bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan khro bo'i rgyal po rnams/ / zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu byung ba de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab tu skyed pa ste// lo na nyi shu dag gi bar du so so'i rdul la byang chub sems
121a4: dpa' snying stobs chen po ste/ / de nas stong pa dang ni rig byed par du cung zad snying stobs rga shas dman par rab tu 'gyur// slar yang lon nyi shu'i bar du de bas kyang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o// /
121a5: de nas sre gnas la ni rdul med yul ni rab bcom de nyams pa las dbang bskur ma yin no// 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa las ni shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gis sbyin par bya// de dag rnams kyi
121a6: sa rku mo rlung nam mkha'i yon tan rgyal ba'i yan lag don du btsal bar bya/ / byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por 'gyur// gang zhig khrag ni 'thung byed rab mchog
121a7: lha li rnams kyi sbrang bu de ni bdud rtsi gcig pu ste/ / skyugs pa snying kha gsang ba'i kha nas rdo rje nor bu la gnas chu skyes nang du rab zhugs min// bshang ba gci ba khrag dang sha ni mchog tu ro mnyam skyugs pa'i dbus
121a8: su rab tu zhugs pa ste/ / 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsi srid pa gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun du bsten// shes rab chos 'byung la ni gang zhig lhung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu 'bad pas bsrung bar bya// de yis sem
121b1: can gang dag su ga zung ba de ni rgyal ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid/ / phyir de nyin 'ag so so 'dus su bdud kyi po nya srin po rnams kyis rbararu 'jug/ shes rab me tog dang ldan thos pazhi ba bde ba'i 'bras breb
121b2: bar stor du 'jug par byed/ / mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje ma 'khums nyid kyi bar du chu skyes las ni dbyung mi bya// gang che 'dod pa grub pa de yi tshen 'di ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur// rdo rje du skyes dag
121b3: gzhug bya rang gi rdo rje'i snying khar ye shes 'khor lo ba bcug ste/ / 'di'i 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang bar byas nas rnam pa thams cad pa nyid byed// gal te 'di ni grub par ma gyur rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas
121b4: pa bza' bar bya/ / shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung gnas la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung ba'i don du dgod par bya// shes rab ldan pa la'o de nas gcig pu la ste slar yang gsum ni rab gsungs sangs rgyas sku// gang
121b5: su 'di ni nyams la mngon par dga' byed g.yon can de ni rdo rje can gyis gsod par byed/ / srid pa gsum gyi bdag pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang // de rnams thams cad bdud/
121b6: kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa skyed byed yin gyi srog chags rnams la nam yang mi// gang zhig dran pa rnams dang byed po g.yul gyi yul la dga' zhing gsong byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa// de rnams la ni mchog gi rgyal sras ras
121b7: kyis srog chags bsrung ba'i doran du de rnams sbyar bar bya/ / sngon du rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams la phyugs kyi skye bo gsang gyir mkhas pas gsol ba gdab mi bya// sems can rapas ri bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas
121b8: 'jig rter khams su smras pa ste/ / de phyir de rnams nyin 'gas so'i dus su bsrung bar byed cing sgrub pa po la sdang bar byed// bsgrub bya dag ni las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na 'dir grub pa po yi bdud yin no// skyes bu rams
122a1: kyi sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis phran tshegs rig pa la rjes chag/ / rig pa 'di yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gis ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o// zhes pa'i bsam pa brkam
122a2: chags sems kyis sbyin dang ye shes rnam par spangs nas dmyal bar rab tu 'jug/ phyis ni rdzas dbang gi chung ma gzhan gyi dbang gyur kye ma ngan pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug// shes rab ma yin pa
122a3: kyang mid pa 'di ni lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste chos kyi skur gyur pa/ / shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin nges par mun pa dang bral ye shes dang ni rnam shes dbye ba las// 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste sgra brnyan lta bu sems
122a4: can du me'i don ni byed pa po/ / sems can rnams ni smin pa'i slad du slar yang 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprul pa'i ska ru 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' gcig pu 'di ni dus mtha'i sprin dang mtshungs pa he ru kar ni byung bar
122a5: gyur/ / gdug pa rnams ni smin pa'i don te de yang dam tshig rgyal ba rmongs pa rnams ni bde ba'i don// rin chen dbang po sdug bsngal ldan pa rnams kyi de yang bde 'dzin chags can rnams kyi chags pa'i slad// bgegs rnam
122a6: dag ni gzhim pa'i don du phyag gi pad ma ral gri don yod grub par byung bar gyur/ / zhe sdang las ni sna tshogs yum gang dus mtha'i rtse mo can mtshungs de ni mkha' 'gro mar byung gyur// gti mug dag la spyan ma zhes bya mchog
122a7: gi snying rje mA ma kI ni nga rgyal rgyu las so/ / chags las de ni gos dkar zhes bya mtha' dag yon tan gter te sgrol ma yang ni phrag dog las// sna tshogs gzugs can gnyis po 'di dag yul dang yul can gzhan rnams
122a8: thams cad du yang byung bar dkur/ / phung po lnga yi rang bzhin rnams kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs pa brtse ba yis// nges pa rnam par ma bsgrubs bsod nams bsags pa min pa'i sems can rnams na
122b1: sman pa'i don du ste/ / gtsang ma'i gnas la sogs par bcom ldan gang zhig rnam par bzhugs pa nyan thos rnams kyi slad du'o// gang zhig e waM yi ge la gnas gachog gi nges pa can rnams mchog la dgod pa'i do /
122b2: rnams ni smin pa'i slad du sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dbye ba rnams kyis dus kun du// nges par rdo rje can gyi bzhugs pa rnam gsum phyi dang rang dang ga'ang du yang ni rab tu 'gyur// phyi rol sna phyogs
122b3: 'og gi lus la srog gi rlung ni rab tu rgyu ba la'o/ / khyab bdag gi ni sa sogs dkyil 'khor dag la rab gyur gang de rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// gang zhig sgra la sogs la rang sems 'gro ste yul med la yang gzhan ni
122b4: bzhin kho na'o/ / gang zhig e waM yi ger gnas pa mchog tu bde ba'i gnas la sku gsung thugs ni bzhugs pa'o// gcig pu rdo rje can ni dbye ba gsum ste yul dang yul can khams rnams kyis kyang bskor ba
122b5: dus gsum gnas gsum du bzhugs srid pa gsum du'ang gnas pa sems can du ma'i don gyi slad du'o/ / rgud rnams ngag las 'di skad bdag gis thos zhes gsungs pa gang de 'di ltar bdag gis shes pa de// rdo
122b6: car gyi zla ba 'u las gang zhig spyi bo 'grin pa snying kha'i chu skyes lte gas te/ / rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi b+ha gar de ni thig le grol ba gsum gyis mchog gi pad mar gnas/ me da sa tus zhing du rab tu bzhugs pa
122b7: bcom ldan 'das su rnal 'bar rnams kyis rig par bya/ / skye ba snga mar rang gi snying gis bskyed pa'i zhidi chags pa la sogs dngos po rnams kyi ni// bag chags stobs kyis 'khor lor gnas pa gcig ni du ma
122b8: mthong ste smon lam yon tan dbang gis so/ / don gcig tu ma'i skad ni rang dang dngos po rnams kyis srog chags rnams kyi snying la rab tu 'jug/ gnas can rnams kyi bsod nams slad du 'khor lor gnas pa bson to//
123a1: la ni rnam par rgyu ru gshegs// dud 'gro yi dgas lha min rnams dang lto 'phye lha dang mi ni 'phags pa bod la sogs rnams la// byung dang 'byung 'gyur da ltar byung ba rnam pa gsum dang rtag tu bden pa'i
123a2: chos ni gsung byed cing / / rang rang skad gzhan dag gis srid pa gsum po ma tshang med pa lam la yang dag 'god byed pa// 'di ni bde mnyam 'bras bu ster ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung ste lha yi skad kyang ma yin no// sangs
123a3: rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma ni/ / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdag nyid ston par byed te brgya byin gdu ni ji bzhin nyid du'o// sna tshogs dngos rnams
123a4: kyis phye rgyal ba dang bcas lha mi rnams kyi rang rang sems la rab zhugs pa/ / 'di ni mi skyes chos te tshul nam mkha' bzhin du 'dir ni skye bar 'khrul pa ster ba'o// rgyal ba'i sgra yi rdo rje yul dang yul can rnams kyi bgro/
123a5: bya min pa rnam pa thams cad pa// gsung gi rdo rje sems can thams cad rang snying skad rnams dag gis chos ni go bar byed pa'o// rdo rje can gyi thugs kyi rdo rje sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rang bzhin mtha' dag sa la
123a6: gnas/ / dri med nor bu lta bu dngos po rnams kyi 'dzin byed gang yin de nyid ye shes rdo rje'o// sbyin pa la sogs bde mnyam 'bras ster drug dang bzhi rnams nus ma bcu po de dag rnams su gsungs// de dag rnams kyi bkra/
123a7: ni dag pa mchog gi sems kyi sa dang ba'i bum pa rnam bcu de rnams so// bdud dang nyon mongs nyams pa 'dod pa zhes dang 'phrog byed rdo rje'i tshogs ni ljon pa la sogs rnams// phyag tu drug rnams stong pa drag ste/
123a8: srid gsum skyed par mdzad pa ye shes rnam shes gcig pa'o// 'khor lo srid gsum kun nas dang bzhes pa'i bde ba rin chen 'di yi chags pa nyid dag ni// pad ma'o nyon mongs zad pa ral gri rdo rje dag kyang ye shes
123b1: sku cher rnam par mi phyed pa'o/ / mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di dag rnams kyis bskyed pa gang yin pa// phung po khams dang dbang po la sogs mkha' bzhin ro mnyam de dag rnams kyang
123b2: bzhin rig par bya/ / gang du nges par rigs kyi gzugs ni nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni chen po'i gzugs su gsungs// gang du 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni tshor ba chen por gsungs pa ste// gang du
123b3: 'khor ba'i 'du shes nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o/ / gang du 'khor ba 'phel ba nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni rdo rje'i 'du byed kho na'o// gang du gnyid la sogs pa'i gnas skabs nyams pa
123b4: nyid du gyur pa de yang rnam par shes par gsungs/ / gang du shes pa min pa'i dngos po nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni thub pa'i ye shes nyid// 'di rnams rnam par snang mdzad la sogs dam pa'i rgyal ba mchog ni rnam
123b5: pa drug ste rigs drug rnams/ / gzhan ni khams drug dbye ba rnams te sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' zhi ba rnams// gang du gti mug mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa spyan ma yin te de ni 'dzin ma'o// gang dung
123b6: rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa mA ma kI ste de ni chu nyid do/ / gang du chags pa mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa gos dkar mo ste de ni me yin no// gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sgrol ma yin te de ni
123b7: dung yang ngo / / gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid du gyur pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha'// gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid du gyur pa sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med do// mthong dang ma mthong ba
123b8: ni yid dang nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang yin de ni mig/ ring nas rab tu gsal ba bzhin du sgra ni thos pa 'di ni rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o// mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri rnams thams cad 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yas pa
124a1: rang gi zla ba'i bdud rtsi bde ster dag kyang nAg tu myed par byed pa gang yin de ni lce/ / rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'phrog pa gang yin de ni rtag tu rdo rje'i lus kyi dbang po // thabs dang shes rab rab tu
124a2: 'dus pa 'di yi chos te bde mnyam la 'jug gang yin de ni yid/ / dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas pa rnams// sna tshogs gzugs la sogs
124a3: pa 'di rnams rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam pa drug sde kun nas ni/ / rang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed gos pa med cing ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste// khams gsum dag tu
124a4: gzhan gyis gzung bya dang ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min/ / ye shes dgug pa byed pa 'dir ni slar yang shin du stobs te de ni gzhug pa tshugs byed kyis// de ni bcing ba rengs byed kyis
124a5: nges par mchog bde'i dbang gis khengs byed kyis ni mnyes pa yang / / ye shes 'khor lo dag la 'khor le ro ni mnyam par byed pa rdo rje shugs kyis byed pa ste// de bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni rab gsal
124a6: nges par rnal 'byor ma yi chud kyi sku la'o/ / srid pa gsum gyi gnas su bdud rnams ngag la bstan pa nges par dbyug pa sngon pos byed pa ste// bcing ba khro bo mi g.yo dus mtha'i nyi ma dang mtshungs mtha'
124a7: yas brtson 'grus kyis ni phur bus gdab/ / 'dod pas de yi brtson 'grus nyams par sa gzhi la gnas rengs par byed pa gnod pa dzes nyid kyis so// gtsug tor gyis ni rdzu 'phrul nyams pa rab tu gas
124a8: shing nges par sngar bzhin khro bo'i lha mo rnams/ / yi dgas rnams ni smin pa'i don du de nas tsar tsi kAk+Sha la sogs pa smos par gyur pa ste// skye bo rnams ni gsung ba'i don du dbang po la sogs lha rnams de
124b1: bzhin phyogs dang phyogs bral du/ / klu rnams smin par bya ba'i don du gdengs can rigs ni mtha' dag rdo rje can gyis nges par spros// lha min rnams ni smin par bya ba'i don du khyi yi gdong ma chen
124b2: mo la sogs rnams kyang spros/ / gzhan gang cung zad spros pa yod pa dag kyang khyab bdag dkyil 'khor la ni 'byung po las skyes mthar// sems can kun gyi don du mchog gi yon tan rnam mang 'di rnams rang gi
124b3: lus la rig par bya/ / de bzhin rgud dang sngags ni rnam mang rigs la gnas rnams rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor dbye bas to// 'dir ni dbang bskur rnam pa gnyis kyang bu yi yon tan dbang gis 'jig rten 'jig
124b4: rten 'das pa'o/ / gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu ma la reg gzhan pa bdud rtsi myang dang 'khyud pa gang yin pa// shes rab dang 'grogs byang chub sems ni zhu ba dag la bzhi pa'i sacig bdud rtsi rtogs pa gang // 'di dag
124b5: thams cad nges par 'jig rten pa ste mchog gi snying rje yis ni lam gyi rgyu ru bstan/ / 'jig rten 'das pa'i dbang dang mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya mchog la rjes su sbyor ba'o// sems kyi snang ba tsam
124b6: ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyan lta bu nyid/ / gang zhig mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang pos bsten bya ste// ye shes me lce de ni rab tu rgyas
124b7: pas bdud tshegs yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag sreg byed cing / / lus la chags pa la sogs kyang ste rnal 'byor rnams la lo yi sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes dag ni sems dang de
124b8: yi snang ba dag kyang rnam pa bcu po nyid du 'gyur/ / dbang bskur dri med ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bu 'di la zhugs pa gang yin pa// de las mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba 'pho med lhan cig/
125a1: skyes pa 'gyur me na ga pa/ sangs rnas pa 'dag gas pa la laganas pa byang bdad pa padag 'a gas sa/
125a2: lam drub tu zhugs pa yis// stong pa las ni dra ba sreg rngu ba gsal drim med pa'i mkha' byed dang mar me dang// 9ba ba dang ni na rjernams dang ma chog sa tang shig la mtha ba
125a3: ga/ de seM bus su sangs rgyas gzugs 'i yul dang rnam par bral ba du ma longs sung rdzogs pa'is// nam mkha' chu 'dzid bral ba dag zhal gyur pa yis bzad pa'i migags bal bar bya ba ste//
125a4: re khA nag po dri med 'od zer 'gro ba drus kyi rtsal mthong bar gyur gyi bar du'o// de la kun mgyon gzugs mi rdul nyi mA la bugs pa med pa kha dog sna tshogs te// rnam pa kun ldan dang sems yul dang rnam pa
125a5: bral ba dag gi gzhan gyi sems ni min pa nyid/ / gzugs ni mthong bar gyur na nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa rab bya ste// 'od zer 'khor lo rang gi lus la yongs su bskor zhing 'khor bar
125a6: byed pa mthong gi bar du'o/ / zla badrug gis sdom bcan rnams la reg byas dman pa'i bde ba mnyam pa lam gyi sems su 'gyur// chags dang chags bral mtha' thog la gnas skacig ma yang khyab bdag gi
125a7: dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ / oMHdab ba'i bang dang khyad par dka' ba ldan skyes dag dang ye shes rnam shes dag gi dbus// gnyid dang gnyid yur 'tshams su rdo rje pad ma dag gi gnyis gnyis sbyor ba la
125a8: nideb gang / / de ye 'phel ba 'i nges pa'i dbang gis 'phel 'gyur 'di la ngo mtshar med// nyod sangs bdud rnams bcom nas rgyal ba'i bdag por 'jug se lo yi sbyor bso rnal
125b1: 'byor dbang po'o/ / sa yi rnam pa sra ba min zhing zhu bachu lus khu ba min te gsher ba nyid min phyir// me yi rnam pa me min g.yo ba rlung gi lus ni gang zhig g.yo ba min pas rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin
125b2: yang blta bya dkar dang ljang dang kha dog sna tshogs chen po kha dog min/ / rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mthong ba min te rang snying dri ma nyon mongs bdud kyi mthu las so// nA da thig le cha dang ye shes bdud rtsi'i gnas su
125b3: son pa lu gu rgud du bcings pa'i rtsa/ / srog dang bung sel lam gsum rnams te rdo rje dang bcas pad ma rdo rje chu skyes ldan pa nyid// rlung gnyis yang dag phrad pa'i dbus su yul ni yul can rnams nyid 'byung dang
125b4: rab tu 'jug pa ste/ / du ba la sogs rnams kyi mtshan ma 'dzin pa dag kyang gang zhig 'di rnams thams cad gsang bar bya// dbu mar srog ni rab gzhug nyi ma dang bcas ri bong can gyi bzod pa g.yas dang g.yon
125b5: la bcing / / phyag rgya rab tu 'grogs la sems dang mchog gi bde ba la gnas rdo rje yang dag bslang ba yang // pad mar rdo rje'i sgra'am rang gi lag pa'i chu skyes dag gis gsor ba bde ba'i slad du ste// sa bon gto//
125b6: ba min pa'i bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs 'phrog 'di ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal// sa ni chu la rab tu 'jug cing chu yang 'bar byed la ste gtsang bar byed pa rlung la'o// rlung ni spong pa la ste stong pa nges par mtshan ma/
125b7: rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur zhing mtshan ma ni// rnam pa thams cad pa ru 'gyur te mi zad mchog gi bde ba gzhom du med pa ye shes sku// ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dengs grub tu 'gyur mi bdag skyes bu rnams
125b8: kyi skye ba 'di nyid la'o/ / 'dod pa sprul pa'i skur ni nges par rab tu 'gyur te rdzogs pa dag ni de yi gsung nyid do// 'bar ba sprul pa'i thugs te 'di yi mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i ye shes dag ni oM T+Ta nyid dga' ba/
126a1: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ste mchog dga' dang bcas khyad par dga' ba rim pas 'di yi ni// gsung dang thugs so lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid kyang bde 'thung 'di yi ye shes rdo rjer 'gyur// 'dar
126a2: ba nyid ni srid pa gsum gyis btud pa chos kyi sku ste 'byung ba de yi gsung du 'gyur/ / gnyid yur nyid ni chos kyi thugs te gnyid ni 'di yi srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms ye shes kho na'o// yi ge nyid ni dag pa'i sku rtse
126a3: dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le nA da rim pa yis/ / bde 'byung dag pa'i sku yi gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'o// sad pa dang ni rmi lam rang bzhin slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni
126a4: gnyid dang bzhi pa'i rang bzhin rnams/ / lus la gnas dang dbugs la zhen pa yul rnams rnam par dpyod cing g.yo med sems la zhen pa ste// ye shes la gnas bud med rab tu 'grogs las byang chub sems ni
126a5: zhu ba la yang ska cig 'gyur/ / sprul pa la sogs dag gi sems kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhir ni rim pas nges par rab tu 'gyur// de ltar sems ni rnam bzhi srid pa gsum la gnas pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i dbus
126a6: su ste/ rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bde mnyam 'bras ster khyab byed dag ni thar pa'i slad du bsrung bar bya// thig le btang na rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog gi bde ba skye ba'i sa bor song la thar pa gang // de phyir 'khor ba'i
126a7: bde ba'i skad cig 'di ni sdom brtson rnams kyis thams cad dus su spang bar bya/ / gang phyir gcig nyid a sogs ka sogs ri bong can dang nyin byed rdo rje can gyi gdan min zhing // hUM yig nyid kyis mtshan ma dang ni yongs
126a8: su gyur pa gzhan pa kha dog gzugs dag mi 'dod te/ / 'gyur med dag gis bskyed cing 'gyur ba nyams par gyur pa mchog gi dbang po dag dang ldan pa ni// rnam pa kun ldan thig le mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po sA
126b1: tshogs sku ma 'dzin pa 'di la'o/ / li sogs dbyangs brgyad gang dag yul dang yon tan du kur dbyangs phyed kyis ni rnam par dman pa rnams// phan tshun dbye bas phye ba rkang pa dang bcas ro dang mda' rnams dbu pa'i dbugs
126b2: ni 'bab pa ste/ / dus sbyor gnyis pa la ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis ring po phan tshun dbye bas skye ba rnams// slar yang thun 'tshams gsum pa la ni shin du ring po yul dang yon tan dbu ma'i dbugs rnams 'bab//
126b3: ltar thun 'tshams bzhi la mda' dang bcas pa'i ri bo ro rnams dbu pa yi ni dbugs kyi dbyangs// ka la sogs pa'i yi ge sum bcu sum bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu gsal bar dgu brgya nyid// dbyangs drug gi ni dbye
126b4: bas phye ba mkha' mkha' dus dang mda' rnams dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ / de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i nyin mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// slar yang dbyangs drug dag gis
126b5: bye ba rnams ni mtshan mo'i dus su dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la/ / de bzhin ring pos rab tu phye rnams phyi ma'i mtshan mo'i bgrod par dus sbyor gsum gyi rtsa gsum la// nyin zhag so so'i dus su dbugs ni 'byung
126b6: dang 'jug pa mkha' mkha' drug dang zla ba mig rnams 'bab/ / snga ma stong pa rnams bsdus nas ni mnyam dang mi mnyam bgrod par dbu ma dag la sbyar bar bya// phyi rol tu ni gang zhig chu tshod brgyad pa'i phyed gur sgra gcan
126b7: longs spyod dag las gzhan du gnas/ / de ni rang gi lus la dbugs phyed nges par mun pa dang bral 'jig rten thams cad snang ba ste// snga ma phyed ni mun pa dang bcas srid pa gsum po mtha' dag stong pa gang du thim pa'o// /
126b8: de phyir ro ni phye nas rus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor ldan pa gcig pu mun pa bral bar 'jug/ zla ba dman zhing nyi mar lhag gang khyab bdag mchog gi cha de 'dir ni thun 'tshams bzhi la ste// thun dang thun la nyid dang mtshan
127a1: mo'i dbang gis bgrod cing dus sbyor phyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba yis/ / sum bcu rtsa drug dus kyi po nya nyis 'byung mi bdag gzhananapas rjes ni 'argyad gnyis dbye ba la// gzang rnams kyi yang brgyad kyi dbye ba la
127a2: ste slar yang gzhan rnams du ma'i tshigs kyi phyogs la'o/ / rigs byed dus kyi dbugs kyi lhag ma srid gsu maskyed par mdzad ma mkha' 'gro ma ni sna tshogs gzugs// ba'i dbus bu dman pa gang de mchog gi rgyal
127a3: ba'i bdag po'i rang gi phyag rgya rnam gnyis 'gyur/ / gang zhig nyi ma la gnas de ni brgyang dbye phyogs dang phyogs bral 'dab mar thun tshod longs spyod mtha'// lhag ma 'khor lo'i su mo mchog tu 'jigs par byed pa
127a4: gzhan rnams mtha' dag phyi dang lus la'o/ / spen par bug pa mun can nyin zhag ces bya lha yi bla ma'i byed bcas mig dang mig gi grangs// phyod bcas drug dang rig byed du 'gyu de rnams mchog gi rgyal bdag thugs
127a5: kyi rdo rje las ni skyes/ / sa skyes stong pa klu bla nyi ma gza' lag pa sangs 'jug rings la yang stong pa klu mkha' gcig/ mkha' mig mig dang gcig tu gyur pa de rnams mchog gi khyab bdag gi ni dag pa'i gsung las
127a6: bud/ gang zhig zla ba'i dus kyi longs spyod mkha' mkha' ro mo de rnams sku yi rdo rje dag las zung // mtha' dag gcig tu gyur pa ro drug klu dang dus rnams dag ste phyed kyi chu tshed de bzhin nyid// mkha' 'gro dus kyi
127a7: zugs can mtha' dag lus la gnas shing srog chags rnams kyi srog ni 'phrog byed pa/ / de phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su rang gi lam ni dgag pa byas nas de rnams bsgrub par bya// ji srid gza'
127a8: rnams ngag gi longs spyod dang gzhan bgrod pa la gnas dbugs rngub dbugs 'byung rgyu ba las/ / de srid dus kyi pho nya khyab byed ma gang khams gsum du ni mchog dag ster bar 'gyur ram ci// pho nya phra mo rab tu rgyab tu
127b1: ma'i gsung la gnas pa byang chub sems ni 'gyur med pa/ / sdig bral rnal 'byor ldan pa rnams kyis shes par bya ste gzhan du 'dod chags sems kyis ma yin no// nyi ma dang ni zla ba'i rkang pa rnams la gnyi
127b2: ga'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis sred pas bsnan pa rnams/ / yan lag rnams kyis bgos pa'o lhag ma'i rkang pa de ni sgra gcan 'jug pa la yang 'jug rings za// thun 'tshams kun dang kun brgyad nyin zhag so so'i dus
127b3: su srog chags rnams kyi yan lag bcu gnyis rnams/ / dus sbyor re re la ni dbugs rnams dag kyang nyis 'gyur dgu brgya'i srog rnams 'bab pa yan lag gsungs// yan lag gnyis gnyis rnams la tho kA ma'i
127b4: nyid zhag dbang gis dang po ma rig yan lag bcu gnyis par/ / de phyir dus la sogs pas yan lag rnams te gzhan ni dgu pa sngar bzhin gang yin de rnams so// de ltar rnam pa lnga po rnams kyis dus su yang ni
127b5: zhanas zla ba gnyis gnyis dag la 'gyur/ / gang du zla ba'i cha gcig nyams pa nyid du gyur pa de ni dang po'i zla ba kho na la'o// zla ba drug dang dus gsum gyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur te rten cing 'brel pa yan lag bcu gnyis
127b6: kyis/ / drug pa nyi ma'i dus kyi dbye ba rkang pa'i bgrod pa'i dbang gis zla ba'i dbus su rab tu zhugs// reg pa'i yan lag dbus der sgra gcan rgyu ba de yis zla ba nyi ma dag ni 'dzin par 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su
127b7: sgra gcan dag gis bltas pa'i sman rnams gang yin de rnams grub pa ster/ / sa skyes pa sangs gza' lag zla nyi gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi shes spen pa dang // sngags pa luka la sog pa'i khyim
127b8: la nyin zhag so so'i dus su zhing cin rnams ni dus kun du/ / ni la zla nyi'i khyim ste gza' lag pa sangs sa skyes sngags pa nyi skyes khyim ni rgyas pa dang // dbang dang dgug pa 'bral dang bsang ba dag la rab 'gyur
128a1: gal te 'dir ni zhing can gyur na'o/ / zhi la dkar po'i zhal te dang por rgyas pa la ni dkar dang gser mtshungs thun tshod lag pa la// rengs la ser po me yi kun la 'i rmongs la gser dang nyi mtshungs
128a2: chu gter la ste dgug pa la/ / dmar po lnga pa dag la 'gyur te dbang la nyi ma chu gter dang mtshungs drug pa'i thun la'o// bsad la nag po'i zhal te ri bo la'o bskad la nag dang dkar 'dir bral mtshan ma'i mthar/ sa
128a3: chu me rlung ri bong can dang nyi ma lha ste 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod byed po min/ / 'di rnams srog ni longs spyod po yang mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis bdag ni longs spyod sems par byed// sred pa sdug bsngal rjes chags
128a4: 'aglang po'i tshogs ni gza' dang lag 'gro lha rnams ngag la don gnyer byed/ / gang gi drin gyis thar par rab tu 'gyur ba yid kyis zhi ba de ni byed pa ma yin no// dang po'i dbugs ni yon tan med po'i bdag nyid rnam gsum
128a5: yon tan dbang gis de yang gsum grangs 'gyur/ / de yang yul gyi yon tan dbang gis tshes zhes bya bar 'gyur te de rnams slar yang sum 'gyur ni// 'byung ba chu gter grangs 'gyur slar yang de nas rku ba'i dbye ba
128a6: las kyis bstan pa de dag rnams/ / chu tshod phyed kyi dbugs kyi grangs rnams dag ste slar yang nyis 'gur chu tshod dbugs kyi grangs rnams so// gnyis gsum chu gter mda' dus ri brgyad gza' dang bcu rnams
128a7: kyis ni dus kyi rtsa 'di 'phel ba ste/ / de nas sde yi rab dbye rnams kyis rnam gnyis lam la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa ni 'jig rten gsum// kun nas gang bar byed do bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bzla ba nyi ma'i rab tu rgyu ba
128a8: las/ / ji srid rig byed klu dang me ste nges par phyag na gri gug zod pa can du rab tu 'gyur// 'khor lo mda' dang chu gter grangs ni yul dang yon tan dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi rab dbye yis// gtso bo srung bar
128b1: gyis te bde mnyam 'bras bu ster bdu ba la sogs lha mo brgyad rnams so/ / de ltar nyi ma la gnas gtso bo mchog gi ri bong can gyi cha yis 'khrud pa sna tshogs gzugs// lha mo sangs rgyas 'chi med rnams dang
128b2: yul dang yul can sgra gcan zla ba nyi mas phyag 'os pa'o/ / gtso bo yi ni phra mo'i ngo bo mchog gi yon tan yul te nang dang phyi rol phyag rgya gang // de rnams khams gsum du ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro ba'i sems
128b3: las rab skyes mkha' 'gro ma rnams so/ / gtso bo'i dbang po gang dag rnams dang rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ste// de rnams rang gi yul bcas yon tan gyis 'khyud bkra shis la sogs
128b4: rdo rje mkha' 'gro 'di rnams so/ / gzugs dang sgra dang ro dang dri dang gzhan pa dag kyang de nas reg bya mun pa rdul dang ni// snying stobs sems la rim pas rab tu gsal bar yang ni de bzhin sgra gcan gyis kyang 'khrung
128b5: pa ste/ / de dag rnams kyi ral rkang drug dang myur 'khyog la sogs chub las ni rnam mang bgrod pa 'di// brgyad po rnams kyi rkang po drug la yul dang yon tan brgyad rnams yang dag gnas pas 'khor lo'i tshul/
128b6: dang po'i dbugs ni dbye ba brgyad ti yul dang yon tan la gnas kun nas du ba la sogs pa// mkha' 'gro ma rnams ngag gis bskor zhing rnam gsum bgrod pa'i dbang gis 'khyams te 'gro ba drug tu gnas// de yi
128b7: dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo bdud rtsi 'phro ba'i cha yis 'khyud par gyur pa dag pa'i sku/ / gang zhig dbugs ni bcad nas rgyal ba'i sku la 'jug pa de nyid kho na dus kyi 'khor lo'o// dbugs ni bcad pa'i mtha' run ma
128b8: gsum bgrod pa 'di dang rnam pa drug kyang yod pa ma yin te/ thig le bkag par gyur na kun nas mchog gi khyab bdag bde ba mtha' yas dus su 'jug par 'gyur// 'khor ba dag gi bde ba spangs nas mchog gi bla
129a1: ma'i zhal ni rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ / spyod pa sgeg pa'i gzugs dang mchog tu 'jigs pa byed la rnal 'byor ma rnams dgyes pa ma yin no// gtso bo'i dbugs la gza' yi tshogs kyi rkang pa
129a2: mtha' dag dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis thim 'gyur te/ / dbugs ni mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chug ter song na thams cad stong par skul bar byed// lo 'di rnams kyis phyi rol du ni mchog gi khyab bdag rkang pa
129a3: spro dang bsdu ba'i ngo bo la/ / rang rang tshad kyis rgyal ba'i bdag po'i chub dbugs kyi dbus su 'gro dang gnas pa shos par bya// stong pa la ni spen pa 'jug pa rang gi nyin zhag bgrod pa'i dbang gis dus kyi mthar 'gyur te/
129a4: stong pa nam mkha' mkha' mtsho chu gter zla ba'i nyin zhag longs spyod lhag ma rnams kyis nam gu la'o// rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyin zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtshe mig gis der ni sgra gcan 'jug
129a5: rang gi bgrod pa 'gro ba'i nyid zhag mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' dus dus kyis lha yi blon po 'jug/ nam mkha' mkha' dang stong pa mkha' brgyad klung dmig gi nyin zhag rnams kyis bkra shis 'jug pa ste/
129a6: mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mig me dang chu gter grangs kyi nyin zhag rnams kyis nyi ma la sogs 'jug/ mkha' mkha' nam mkha' mkha' mtshe brgyad dang zla ba mda' yi nyin 'ag rnams kyis zla ba der
129a7: 'jug ste/ / de yi dus su rgyal po 'gro ba dag ni rang rang tshad kyis rnam par nyams par rab tu 'gyur// de nas zla ba nyi ma shar ba la yang rtsa yi kun du spyod pa 'di ni rab tu 'gyur// gcig gnyis gsum dang chu gter mnga'
129a8: rang ri dang bo nar rnams 'phel bar 'gyur ba gsang ba'i rtsa/ / 'ug pa zhes bya gza' yi car 'gyur bcub phra mo'i ci ni slar yang steng gi lam du'o// de ni sde yis bye ba yon tan dang bcas yul dang bcas pa 'khor lo
129b1: rtsa rnams dag du 'gyur/ / gtsug tor snying kha'i phyogs dang mgo bo ri bong can gnas mgrin pa'i phyogs te nyi ma'i rgyu ba dang // lte bar 'khor lo'i rtse ni dus dang lag 'gro mi bdag zla ba'i rkang pa rnams kyis tha dad min// sum
129b2: bcu rtsa gnyis de yi nyis 'gyur rnams te mtha' dag nyi rkang bsres pa yis kyang tha mi dad / / brgya dang brgyad bcu rtsa gcig gang zhig lag rkang la gnas tshigs kyi rtsa ni gnyis kyi dbye ba rnams// gtsug ter snying kha'i phyogs
129b3: dang ri kong can dang nyi ma'i rkang pa mgrin pa'i 'khor lor lhag ma rnams/ / brgyad bcu rtsa gcig mthar thug rab gsal rnam bcu gang yin de dag zhi dang drag po'i gza' rnams te// de dag rnams kyi thogs mtha'i cha ni khyab bdag
129b4: 'bas la gnas pa dus kyi rtsa yis longs spyod cing / / gza' yi mtha' yang srid pa gsum gyi skyed ma mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje'i sku yis longs spong ngo // dang por gang zhig stong pa'i ngo bo yul dang yon tan la gnas de yi rang
129b5: bzhin dag tu 'gyur/ / khams dang phung po rnams la rab zhugs slar yang mig la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams la mnyam pa ste// sad dang rmi lam la sogs la zhugs mchog gi bde mnyam gzhom du med par yang dag rab
129b6: 'gas pa/ / rig ma sangs rgyas yus rdo rje yi ni tshig la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis btsal bar bya// gtso bo'i sku yi mthu las rnal 'byor pa rnams ngag gi mchog gi lus la lha yi spar du 'gyur// de yi gsung gi
129b7: mthu las rna ba de yi thugs las gzhan gyi snying la gnas pa shes par 'gyur/ / shes rab sku yi mthu las rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sngon gyi skye ba rjes su dran par 'gyur// shes rab kyi ni gsung gi mthu las
129b8: mkha' mnyam thams cad dus su kun 'gro'i rdzu 'phrul du rab 'gyur/ / shes rab thugs kyi rang bzhin las ni gang zhig bde mnyam thams cad dus su gzhom du med par 'gyur// lha yi spyan gyi mthu las mig gis
130a1: ma mthong ba dang srid pa rnam pa gsum yang mthong bar 'gyur/ / lha yi rna ba'i mthu las srogs chags rnams kyi kha yis brjod dang snying gi sgra ni thos par 'gyur// de bzhin sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba dag las mi
130a2: yi bdag po reg bya la sogs thabs cad 'gyur/ / rtsa ni gang zhig thur sel dbus su rnam gsum lam gnas gci ba bshad pa khu ba 'bab pa rnams// srog ni de dag rnams kyi rab tu tu ba rnam pa dgu ru 'gyur te mtha' ma sangs
130a3: rgyas zhal/ / rna ba sna dang mig la rnam gnyis zhes par 'gyur te lce'u chung ni lce dang bcas pa dang // thig le gtsug tor bug par 'gyur te bcu pa shes pa yis ni rgya yis btab pa gang yin pa'o// sro ka dang thur sel 'gags par
130a4: gur na ri bong 'dzin pa bskyod pa nyi ma'i gzugs su rab tu 'gyur/ / rdo rje pad mas rab tu sad na slar yang 'di ni nyi ma'i gzugs kyi me lces zhu bar byed// rlung dang zla ba nyi ma 'gags par gyur na rnam par shes pa dang ni ye shes
130a5: gcig tu 'gyur/ / de ltar de ltar dang ni de bzhin de ltar rngam gsum du 'gyur gzhan ni cung zad yod ma yin// zla ba nyi ma'i gzugs ni zos na mkha' la nyin mo dang ni mtshan mo nam yang min pa nyid// thun 'tshams de ni
130a6: rnal 'byor rnams kyi lus kyi dbus su dus kun bdud rtsi'i go 'phang la gnas pa'o/ / phyogs zad zla ba mkha' la gnas pa nyi ma'i gzugs la ro ni mnyam par 'gyur ba ji lta bar// srog dang thur sel zad par gyur na
130a7: gsal bar yang ni lus la dngos grub dus su de 'gag go/ zla ba nyi ma'i rku ba nyams shing lam ni gnyi ga yi yang srog gi rlung ni chen po 'gags// chu skyes rdo rje rab tu sad cing ri bong can zhu nyi ma'i gzugs chen la ni
130a8: rab tu zhugs/ / dngos dang dngos med gcig gyur rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'i gzhom med legs par rab tu rtogs gyur pa// de yi dus su rnal 'byor pa de gang la gnyis ni cung zad yod pa mchog gi go/
130b1: 'phang 'gro// khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa yi snying po sogs// rab tu dga' ba'i thugs rnams rnal 'byor pa la grub pa'i dus su nam mkha' la ni mngon sum 'gyur/
130b2: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan mo phyed la 'gyur// rin po che 'am me tog char ni mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du 'bab par 'gyur// lus ni dang zhing rdul phran
130b3: nyams pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs mtshan la sogs pa rnams kyis rab rdzogs 'gyur/ / sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum po nyid ni dang zhing sgrib pa rnam par bral ba rmi lam bzhin du sdang // skad ni kun nas
130b4: da pa med cing du ma'i skad gzhan dag gis gzhan gyi snying la 'jug pa ste/ / sems ni dam pa'i bde bas gang zhing mi g.yo thams cad dus su lhan cig skyes pas 'khyud pa'o// sa las chu dang rtse mo can dang klung gi rdul
130b5: bran phye nas chu yi khams la 'jug par byed/ / chu las sa me rlung phye rtse mo can la rtse mo can las sa dang chu dang rlung phye ste// rlung la'o rlung las sa dang chu dang rtse mo can dag phye nas las kyi rlung yang stong pa la// rnam gsum srid
130b6: pa'i dbang gis gang zhig las kyi rlung gis bsnun pa gzhan rnams zhing gzhan dag tu 'gro/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus las can min par srid gsum skyed par mdzad pas rnam par gzigs nas ni// gnyi ga ro mnyam
130b7: dag pa'i rdul la sangs rgyas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor ba ste/ / so se re re'i ro yi rdul la gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis rdo rje'i sras po rnams kyis bskor// sa la sogs pa'i rdul la ma
130b8: lus rigs la gnas pa mtha' yas mi g.yo sogs la rab zhugs rnams/ / de dag rnams dang thabs gcig rdo rje sems dpa' 'chags pa'i dus kyi bar du mkha' la rnam par bzhugs// yang dag 'dzin par byed/
131a1: pas sa dang chu dang bsreg za rlung dang spong ba'i rang bzhin rdul phran 'dzin// srub par byed pa sa tha dad rdul phran mtha' dag gcig tu gyur gyi bar du srub par byed pa ste// slar yang de dag rnams ni phan tshun
131a2: sbyor bar 'gyur te gtso bo'i dngos la phal pa'i dngos rnams so/ / dbyibs kyi rlung ni chen po thams cad dag gis sangs rgyas zhing rnams mtha' dag rnam par 'god par byed// 'jig rten khams nis so dag la
131a3: slar yang khor yug ri bo chen po dag ni kun nas so/ / de yi dbus su las kyi sa ni chen po dag gi rang bzhin 'jig rten khams su rab tu 'gyur// lhag ma longs spyod rang bzhin yul gyi bde ba byed pa rin chen kun
131a4: gyis rab tu gang ba rnams/ / mtha' dag ri yi bdag po'i shar ni dag pa'i in dra nI la lho ni pad ma rA ga ste// nub ni kar ke ta ni ser po byang ni ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar zla ba chu shel lo// dbus ni ljang khu de yi
131a5: nang du chud pa 'dir ni dkyil 'khor chen po de yi snying po ste/ / dang por thugs kyi rade bzhin de nas dbus ma las ni nyis 'gyur dag kyang gsung gi rang bzhin no// de nas gzhan ni nyis 'gyur dag ste mda' la bcu
131a6: yis bsgyur bar gyur pa'i dpag tshad stong phrag go/ / de yi phyi rol dus rnams dag gis 'khor lo'i ngo bo de nas 'jig rten khams kyi rang bzhin no// 'khor lo drug dang rigs drug gis te reg byed 'bum gyis rlung gi
131a7: dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor ro/ / brgyad gnyis ka ba mi bdag ri bong can gyi cha yis khang pa brtsegs pa zlum po skye gnas gzugs// rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gtsug tor nas ni mdzod spu'i dbus su phyed dang
131a8: bcas pa nyi ma'i sor du 'gyur/ / de nas mgrin pa'i chu skyes de bzhin snying kha dang ni de nas lte gsang chu skyes de bzhin no// zhabs kyi 'thil dang rje ngar brla dang dpyi yang ma nu de nyid de nyid rig byed rnams kyis te/ brang
131b1: phyed phyed bcas nyi mas rang dpung dpung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po nyi ma'i tshad kyis so/ / nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag gang zhig dus dang dgu yis mi rnams kyi ni 'jig rten tshad// rig byed phyed dang bcas
131b2: pa'i bzhi dang chu gter chu gter phyed dang bcas pa'i rig byed rig byed kyis/ / gtsug tor mgo bo 'og tu 'gyur te rgyal ba'i bdag po'i dpal ldan dpral ba dag dang shangs dang ni// shangs kyi 'og tu ko so'i mtha' dang de
131b3: nas mgrin pa dag ste mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'i chu skyes dbus/ / de nas snying kha lte ba gsang bar mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis rim pas 'gyur// gsang ba'i chu skyes lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa yi ni steng
131b4: gi gtsug tor nyid/ / mdzod spu gsang ba'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i thig le mi 'gyur bde ba skyed byed gnas pa gang // dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs kyi dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo dag la'o//
131b5: phyed bcas nyi ma nyi shu rtsa lnga de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang thugs gsung sku yi 'khor lo ste// thugs kyi phyed ni sor drug rkang pa dang bcas snying kha la gnas ldan skyes ye shes 'khor lo'o// gsum po dag las sgo
131b6: rnams bya ste nor bu'i rang bzhin gyis spras dkyil 'khor rnams las brgyad cha'o/ / 'gro dang 'ong bas steng dang 'og tu su dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur// lhun por gnas pa la yang rgyal
131b7: ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed ni dpag tshad stong phrag dag tu 'gyur/ / de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi tshad du 'gyur te rgyor ni phyed kyi tshad yin no// de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa cha gsum pa ste de yi yang
131b8: ni byed du 'gyur/ / de bzhin 'og tu 'dzin ma chu dang me dang rlung dang me lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// phyed bcas nyi mas rgyal ba'i bdag po'i thugs kyi 'khor lor 'gyur te lte ba mgrin pa'i chu skyes dbus// gsung gi
132a1: 'khor lo skra yi 'khor lo rdo rje nor bu'i gnas nas steng du mdzod spu phyed kyi 'tshams/ / sgo khyud mthar ni dpal ldan 'gram par 'gyur te mi bdag dpral ba'i steng du gtsug tor dag gi
132a2: 'tshams/ / phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor mi lce dang bcas rdo rje phreng ba'o// steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku 'di mnyam par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi 'khor lo'o// kun nas
132a3: rlung gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis thang ka'i tshad kyis gsum rnams kyis sam de bzhin drug rnams kyis/ / rtsibs brgyad mtshan ma dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas sor mo drug gis 'khor lor 'gyur// sgo
132a4: brgyad rnams kyis bskor zhing rang gi lag 'thil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan dur khrod brtag par bya/ / steng 'og zhal dang gsang ba'i gnyis dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor dag tu 'gyur//
132a5: snying po'i dbus nas pad ma phyed dang de nas phreng ba dang bcas 'khor lo drug ni gsum gyis so// sgo la sogs pa dag dang 'gram pa 'khor lo kun las lnga cha dag gis nges par rab tu 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa'i
132a6: sku ni mchod rten gzugs 'di kun nas shes rab ma yin thabs kyang ma yin no/ / lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gi sa gzhi'i gnas la grub pa brgyad po yang dag gnas pa ste// shar du ral grir 'gyur te ro yi
132a7: dbang po bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ri lu mig sma na ro tsa na/ / lho ru dpal ldan rkang mgyogs mi zad mtha' dag gter ni dkyil 'khor dag gi me yi zur du'o// dbus su mchod phyir thogs pa dag ste lha dang mi yi bla
132a8: ma'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni de nyid do/ / nor bu gtsug tor dpral ba mgrin pa snying kha'i gnas dang lte ba gsang ba la yang rdo rje ni gcig gnyis chu gter mda' dang glu yi dbang po dgu bcas nyin byed sor rnams dag
132b1: gis rim pas so/ / dbus dang steng 'og gsum gyi cha ste zum pa dang ni rnam pa dgyes pa zhi dang drag po la'o// dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum steng ni rdo rje dang mtshungs pa glang gdong dang pad ma'i gzugs// khyon ni de yi sum
132b2: cha zhal dang bcas pa'i lte ba 'dab ma dag kyang de yi sum cha las/ / ra ni khyon dang mtshungs pa phyogs sam phyogs bral du ste rwa yi zlum po dag ni bzhi cha'o// phyi rol rwa yi sum cha 'og ste steng du chu shug tsher ma yi
132b3: ni rnam pa sbyor ba'o/ / dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin 'dab ma rdo rje yang ngo ba lang gdong la sogs pa de bzhin nyid// gsang ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis mchog gi rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mchod rten
132b4: dpangs kyi tshad/ / de yi phyed kyis gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin shin du mnyam pa de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams// phyed dang gnyis mthar phyir 'bur chu skyes thugs khar gnas pa'i khor yug gdan gyi tshad kyis zlum po'o//
132b5: gzhi dang mnyam pa'i pad ma'i mtha' yi chas dman khog pa de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o// gdan byed cha yis gdong ste sa gzhin shin du mnye ba de yi sum chas phyogs cha 'o gsang ba yi// chu skyes dag las
132b6: phyed bcas nyi mas gdan gyi dpangs kyi tshad te shin tu mnyam par yang ni 'gyur/ / gdan nas pad ma'i sngon 'tshams thugs khar gnas pa'i khor yug mtha' dang de na mgrin pa'i rtsa ba'o// de nas gdong gi mthar
132b7: ni de bzhin chu gter phyed bcas dus dang rig byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum/ / gdan las rig byed dag gis pad mthugs khar gnas pa'i khor yug mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te// phyed bcas brgyad
132b8: kyis gdong ba'i tshad dang de yi steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi dbang / / mdzod spu'i 'tshams nas dpral ba dag dang spyi bo de nas 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di// da ltar nges par 'jig rten
133a1: khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste 'khor lo mchod rten rang bzhin no/ / gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur te dngul ni chu dang zangs ma dag kyang me yi khams yin no// lcags ni rlung ste zha nye dkar nag 'di ni
133a2: stong pa dag dang 'dres pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin no/ / rin chen ser po sa ru 'gyur zhing dkar po chu dang rin chen dmar po yang ni me yin te// nag po rlung ngo sngon po dang ni ljang khu de yang de bzhin 'dres pa'i khams las
133a3: zung ba'o/ / lan tshwa sa dang dang ra ba chu ru rab tu 'gyur zhing tsha ba me dang kha ba rlung yin te// skur dang ska ba'i ro ni 'dres pa dag go slar yang zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas dang // sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro dang mchog gi ro/
133a4: ste khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po rnams// sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams dang mtha' dag nad ni 'brog pa nyid kyi chu rnams yang dag go/ sa yi zug gzer 'phrog par byed cing dug kyang chu yi khams kyis 'phrog
133a5: bar byed te me yis ni/ / 'byung po rlung gis rengs pa nam mkha' yis kyang gdug pa'i lta ba rab tu ltung ba 'phrog par byed// ye shes kyis ni thams cad 'phrog ste de bzhin mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor bus kyang // chu dang
133a6: ro dang nor bu reg pa sngags dang sman rnams dag gi mthu rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab/ / bcom ldan ye shes 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can ni kun nas sangs rgyas zhing du rab tu 'jug 'gyur zhing // slar yang thams cad tshegs pa'i
133a7: sbyor ba dag las 'bras bu'i dbang gis sems can rab tu 'jug par 'gyur/ / rang gi nyin bgrod dbang gis yan lag bcu gnyis de dag rnams kyis zla ba lhun po rdzogs pa 'dir// mchod rten rnam pa steng du brtsegs pa rdo
133a8: rje'i rang bzhin mi bdag de yi snying por dkyil 'khor ro/ / phyi rol du ni chu skar 'khor lo rnams te las kyi sa las gzhi la gnas mi rnams so// longs spyod sa la gling drug bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro yi kha zas can gzhan lnga
133b1: la sogs pa rnams/ / rwa la rjes su gnas pa brgyad rnams lha yi bdag po me dang dus dang lha min chu gtor rlung // gnod sbyin dang ni drag po 'og dang steng du 'khor dang bcas pa khyab 'jug nyid dang chu gter gdong // 'dir ni chu
133b2: srin rnam shes dang ni stong pa'i khams te bum pa dag ni 'du byed nyid dang rlung / / nya dang lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa tshor ba me ru rab tu 'gyur te 'du shes chu dang ni// gzugs dang sa dang 'gyur med dag dang lhan cig skyes pa kar ka Ta la
133b3: sogs pa'i khyim rnams so/ / 'di rnams mtshan ma rdo rje la sogs ka tsa Ta pa ta sa thung ngu ring po lhag pa'i lha// lug dang 'khrig pa kar ka Ta ra ni zla ba dkar po nyi ma seng ge bu mo srang rnams su// sa skyes sngags pa
133b4: sgra gcan rnams te gza' lag spen pa gdengs can sdig pa gzhu yi thog mthar ro/ / de ltar sa la sogs pa'i khams ni kun nas phan tshun sbyor bar 'gyur ro mi yi bdag po kye// 'gro ba 'di ni sems can rnams kyi las
133b5: kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang / / gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang mchog gi ro dang sman dang ro yi dbang po gzhan// mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran rnams kyis rab tu bskyed pa de rnams sems
133b6: can rnams kyis mi mthong ste/ / gang zhig phal pa'i nA dang shing dang rdul dang rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur// yi dgas rnams kyis chu ni me chen dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams ngag gis kun nas gcod 'bigs so//
133b7: 'di rnams dgrol ba'i slad du sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po las kyi sar ni rab zhugs te// mngal ni rab tu bzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni// nyon mongs dang ni bdud
133b8: rnams bcom nas sa yi steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor te/ / sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid kho na'o// de phyir rgyal ba'i dag pa'i sku ni skye dang nyams med srid pa
134a1: gsum po la yang gnas pa ste/ / bcom ldan de yis thams cad dus su sems can don ni mi 'dor las kyis bcings pa ma yin no// de ltar 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag ni srid pa gsum gyi gnas su las
134a2: kye sar gnas nyi ma kye/ / sems can rnams la lam ni sbyin byed dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'phrog lha gzhan dgra ni nam yang ma yin no// gang dag chos la mngon 'jobs rang lus gzhan gyi lus dang rang gi bud med dag la rjes
134a3: su chags/ / shi bar gyur na bu yi me yi sbyin sreg dang ni gnyen gyi bsod nams dag las mtho ris te// mchod sbyin la ni phyugs rnams 'tshe dang g.yul du shi bar gyur na mtho ris 'jig rten dag tu 'jug/ 'jug dogs lus
134a4: po lhung las mchog gi go 'phang 'gro ba de rnams thar pa ster ba'i chos ma yin/ / de nyid lam ni rnam par spangs nas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod kyi ma gang pha ni gang // mchog gi bu dang bu mo spun zla chung ma sring mo rnams
134a5: dang rje bo gnyen gyi sde ni gang / / bdag gis byin gyis brlabs pa'i drang srong 'di rnams 'khor lo'i dbus 'dir gang gis thar bar 'gro 'gyur ba// de yis nyi ma khyod kyis thub pa rnams ni bdag gi tshig las rigs gcig dag
134a6: la 'jug par mdzod/ / gal te lus la dbyug pa bsnan pas sdug bsngal gyur na de la dbyug pa dag ni nyes pa can// dbyug pa 'di ni ma yin lag pas rab tu bskul te 'dir ni nyes pa mtha' dag lag pa yi 'di ni ma yin
134a7: sems kyis bskul te sems kyang 'dir ni gdug pa chen po khro ba'i me yis so/ / de phyir khro ba'i me 'di 'gro ba'i dgra bo bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsad par gyur// chags las sdang sogs skyon te/
134a8: rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi rang 'dod chung ma gzhan dang 'grogs las so// de ni rtsed nas dbyung slad mtha' dag rgyal sras rnams kyis de ni 'dod pa'i spyan la rab tu byin// de phyir sbyin la rjes su chags pa bde mnyam 'bras bu
134b1: ster ba bsod nams dag gi tshogs 'di ni/ / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnyen du gyur cing thams cad dus su skye bo rnams kyi dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog/ chags pa grang gis sems can rnams ni nyams par gyur pa de yis
134b2: skyob pa rnams ni grol ba ste/ / sems can rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su gang zhig srung byed de ni skyob rnams ster bar byed// sems can rnams kyis rang snying la gnas bde ba gang zhig gtong byed de ni rgyal rnams srung
134b3: bar mdzad/ / des na rgyal ba mchog gi spyod pa 'di ni lha klu lha min rnams kyis bya ba dka' bar 'gyur// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' yon tan yid dang blo dang dar 'dzin srog dang ni// gzugs la sogs dang mig
134b4: la sogs pa yul dang yul can rnams dang las kyi dbang po lnga rnams te/ / byugs dang bcas pa mi yi lus la khyab byed 'di rnams dag las rigs ni thu bo gzhon nu gang // mi bdag dang bcas mi yi bla ma rigs dregs//
134b5: nga rgyal can khyod gang gis rigs ni thu bo yin// bsreg byas dang dri ma med pa chu ru rab tu 'gyur te tu ta tha ka ni me nyid do// rlung dang nam mkha' ba dres pa'i khams ni g.yo ba dang bcas ri bong can dang mtshal ni bdun pa yang //
134b6: kA k+She kA shi sa dang mu zi mnyam dang mkha' rlung me dang chu ni ldeng ros pa bla ste// btsag ni sa'o lan tshwa gang zhig ze tsha rgya mtsho skyes dang rgya mtsho nag po thab kyi tsha// 'di rnams sa sogs khams te slar yang 'dir ni nA ba sA ra
134b7: ya bak+Sha ra sad dzi dang / / tsha la kA tsa las skyes de rnams mkha' dang rlung me chu dang sa rnams dag gi rang bzhin no// rdo yi chu ni sa ru 'gyur te ri bong can gyi chu niri chu nang me yi hu ri me// rlung dang stong pa'i rang bzhin dag gi dug gi
134b8: chu dang gzhan pa gri gug gsum gyi rang bzhin no/ / gla sgang ser po sa yi khams te shag tu ka dang rwa can nag po chu dang me dang rlung // nag po brtsegs pa stong pa zhes bya gzhan pa nye ba'i dug ni rnam pa lnga po rig par bya/
135a1: rdo dang srog gi ngo bo rnam pa sna tshogs 'bras bu dang mtshungs mgo dang dung la sogs pa'i gzugs// de rnams lcags ni rnam drug lhang tsher skyes dang de bzhin lha yi lcags dang khab len rnam pa bzhi// ro
135a2: ni grub dang grub pa ma yin rnam pa gnyis su 'dir 'gyur 'bugs byed dang ni 'bugs byed min/ / grub pa lcags ni 'bugs par byed te slar yang de ni zos pas lus kyang 'bugs par byed pa'o// gang zhig 'bugs byed
135a3: min pa'i dngul chu ro de bskol ba dang ni bsgyur bar gyur pa dag gis kyang / / lcags ni 'bugs shing rjes su 'bugs te mtha' dag nad 'brog rul pa'i lcags ni rnam par spangs nas so// dang por du ba'i rang bzhin dag gis
135a4: 'gro ste me la gnas shing bskol ba de ni rim pa yis/ / sgra dang rab tu 'phar ba yis te de yang 'dar ba dang ni 'dar med nyid du rab tu 'gyur// sgra ldan 'phar ldan 'bugs par byed pa ma yin de yang 'dab ma 'bugs byed 'ad/
135a5: dang bcas pa ste// 'dar ba med pa mdung gis 'bugs byed rnams gsum 'di yang sbyar byed rnams kyis bsgyur bar gyur pa'o// mchog gi sman gyi stobs kyis stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur te lcags rnams thams
135a6: cad bzhu ba'o/ / su zhig de rnams med na sa yi steng gi gnas su 'di yi bcing ba dag ni gang zhig byed// bcings na mkha' la spyod pa nyid du 'gyur zhing de bzhin zos na 'chi ba dag kyang nyams par 'gyur// ye shes
135a7: med nas bdag rnams kyis ro yi dbang po 'di ni rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ / de dag rnams kyi rdzas ni du ma glu dang rol mo'i mngon par sbyor ba la yang 'god par 'gyur// gang zhig chud zos de ni mi bdag ro yi/
135a8: yul la me bsregs chos kyi bya ba la ma byin// gang zhig rdzas ni sdig pa'i slad du zad par byed pa de yis de ni sdig pa dag gis bcings// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems can dag gi don gyi slad du ma lus
135b1: pa ni zad par mdzad/ / gang zhig thugs pas 'phral la zangs kyi 'dab mi 'dri ma 'phrog par byed pa dag ni sman yin te// mtha' dag nad 'phrog lpags rigs 'ju bar byed pa de ni skal ldan rnams kyis sa la mthong bar
135b2: 'gyur/ gzhan dag rnams kyis 'di yi bcing bar rab tu 'gyur ba gang de nges par lo dus par dang ni// bdug dang dgod pa'i sbyor ba rnams kyis de ni stong phrag gcig 'bugs dag las lhag par mi 'gyur ro//
135b3: sman rnams thams cad shin du tsha ba'i ro rnams ngag dang 'gyur byed sde dang sbyar ba'i sde rnams dang // bskrad par gyur pa'i rtsub mo dag gis rtag tu mnye dang bdug par yang ni rab tu 'gyur ba ste// dngul chu rnams ni
135b4: dngul du bya ba la yang me tog btab pa rnams kyis sa bon dag pa'o/ / gnyis sbyor cha la 'ching bu byi brta sen dug rnams kyis so snyam gyis bran pas 'jam pa nyid// glang po mi yi chu ni lan bdun blugs pa dag
135b5: gis chu shing tsi tra la sogs thal ba dang / / 'gyur byed kun dang tsha ba rnams dang slar yang nye ba'i ron sbyangs pa de rnams smra bar bya// yang nis yang du me yi che bdag gis slar yang lan brgyar ska bar bya zhing skam par bya/
135b6: de bzhin drung gi phye ma brgya phrag sbyar bar gyur pa 'di ni mu zi ngag gis bsres pa yang zhwag rnams zhu bar byed pa'i don du bi ra 'di ni dngul chu dag gi brgyad kyi cha shas 'gyur/ phyogs kyi bdug pa mtshan mo brgyad te ro la
135b7: snying khar gnas pa zhu bar gyur pa ji srid nyid/ / drag por bskol bas dri ma med pa 'di ni mnyes shing bzhus pas stobs dang ldan par rab tu 'gyur// lcags gcig zhu bar gyur na nyi ma ri bong can gyi lus kyi ljags
135b8: rnams thams cad kha sbyar byed/ / khyab byed bsgyur ba de yang chen po dang bcas zha nye gsha' tshe spra tshe la bcas pas 'jug pa ste/ de ltar gang zhig dngul chu'i las ni 'chad par 'gyur ba dag gis nyin zhag so sor byed pa
136a1: na/ / dus gzhan dag gis 'ching ste gsal bar lci zhing sra ba nyid dang skyon rnams kun las rab tu grol// de yis mchog gi lus la nad dang 'chi ba dang ni dbul ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed// 'pheng
136a2: gsed kyi pad ma nor gyi 'dab ldan dag la lte bar snying po'i dbus su rdo rje/ / lha dang gshin rje nor sbyin dag tu dag pa'i in dra nI la pad ma rlag chu shel lo// ruT tu rin chen kar ke ta sre me dang lha min 'phrog byed da
136a3: zangs dang dngul/ / rlung gi 'dab ma dag la gser dang gser gyi lhang tsher dag las skyes pa'i gdan ni lte ba la// snying por de sted gser las skyes pa'i dza b+ha la ni phyag gnyis ni le dang bcas mchog sbyin pa// 'dab ma rnams la gas
136a4: las skyes pa 'am dngul las skyes pa'i lha mo brkyang te chu skyes mchog sbyin phyag/ cod pan sangs rgyas rin chen dbang po nor bu mchog sbyin phyag ste gnod sbyin mo rnams de bzhin nyid// ha hA thung ngu ring po phyogs dang phyogs bral
136a5: 'dab ma rnams la yi ge brgyad rnams rim pas so/ / dri dang me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag so so'i dus su bun gsum zla ba'i snod du mchod byas nas// oM dang swA hA thog mab 'o dbus su dzaM b+ha lar bcas dza len pA ya zhes pa'i sngags
136a6: 'di yis/ / rgyal po rab dga'i yid kyis gser 'akrur mnyan nams dag gis bsrung ba'i don du chu ni rab sbyin bya// de ltar bsrung ba'i mthu yis 'byung po'o mgon dang klu yi mgon pos ro ni 'phrog par mi 'gyur ro// so phag 'phru
136a7: byed sbyar ba'i snga rnams dag gis nyi ma bcu ru na mi nya zhing bdug par bya/ / de nas slar yang snyigs ma dag la gnas pa phyin pa 'gro bar bya ste thams cad dus su'o// slar yang gal te snyigs las de ni ma byed don/
136a8: stede yid de la bzhu bar bya// dngul du rang gi skye gnas zan de ni slar yang gzhan gyi skye gnas thams cad rab tu za// zha nyi rnon por gan zangs dang lhang tsher skyes sa ma gzhan pa zhing las skyes pa rnam dag pa// mnyam pa gcig
136b1: bsregs pa 'o dngul gyi bya ba la ni lhang tsher dkar po las skyes gsha' tshe mnyam/ / dang por drug bcu'i cha shas zas ni 'ju bar 'thung zhing de nas cha re bskyed pas 'phel bar bya// rkang pa'i cha shas ji sri'i nyi
136b2: las lhag pa rab tu sbyin ma bya/ / phyogs gcig gis ni nyis 'gur 'ju bar 'gyur te slar yang 'di ri de bzhin mabon rnam par dag/ de ltar gnyis gsum brgyad 'gyur 'ju bar 'gyur te slang yang khu ba 'di ma
136b3: kyis/ / ma zhun ni ro la ji srid mtshan mo brgyad kyi bar du 'khor lo'i dugs su rab tu 'gyur// reg pa mchog gi sman rnams dag gis me la gnas pa lhang tsher lcags ni kha med 'ju bar 'gyur// lhang cher dag las yugs
136b4: ni brgyad 'gyur stobs su 'gyur te de ni zhu ba na yang bcadar 'gyur ro/ / de yi sa bon la yang brgyad 'gyur yin te slar yang de las rdo rje rin chen brgyad 'gyur ro// de ltar lcags dang rin chen rnams dang nye ba'i ro dang ro rnams ji srid khol
136b5: bar gur gyi bar/ / me yi nang du bkal bar bya sted nas de ni 'bum phrag du ma 'bugs par rab tu 'gyur// reg rdo sman dag med na mchog gi bi Ta mnye ba dag dang dugs rnams kyis kyang 'ju bar 'gyur// 'dar ba med pa ji srid
136b6: nyid te de nas sngar byed/ ni mnyam pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur// slar yang gzhan ni gnyis dang sum 'akur gser zhu'i khu ba 'bru mar dngul chu dag la blugs pas so// rdzas kyi don du zha nye brgyad cha gser zhun khu ba dag la rab tu
136b7: 'bad nas blugs par bya/ / gser dngul bya ba dag la gsar rten sbal zangs zha nya mtshal dang ldeng ros mu zi dag gis dang // gsha' tshe zla ba de bzhin lhang tsher skyes dang ba bla dang ni bsreg bya dag gis bsad byas nas/
136b8: mnyam pa'i 'bur byed dug dang 'ide rnams dag dang lcags dang mnyam pa'i dngul chu ni// 'khris pa skyur po dag gis nyin zhag bcu ru mnyes nas de ni rdo ba'i dbus su thugs byas te// sa yi nang du zla ba drug tu steng du me dang
137a1: bcas pas thams cad dus su bdugs gyur na/ / dngul chu de ni bcu drug cha yis g+ho Shas drangs pa 'dugs par byed par rab tu 'gyur te slar// zangs dang zla ba gser mnyam dge ba'i gse 'di gser gyur
137a2: rnams dag gi sdug bsngal 'joms pa ste/ / dngul ni brgyad kyi cha shas byin na dag pa'i zangs ni phug pa dngul du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// 'dzin ma la ni rdo ba gang dag 'bras bu'i lus dang mtshungs shing dung dang mgo la sogs pa'i
137a3: gzugs/ / de yi skye gnas de rnams la byin mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas drag po'i rlung gis bzhu bar bya// de nas slar yang btag pa dang ni tshal 'gyur byed sde tshan rnams kyis dag par byas nas ni// lcags kyi skye gnas de ni shes nas
137a4: nyis 'gyur dag kyang ro la gser 'gyur mkhan gyis bzhu bar bya/ / nyin zhag bdun du sdod ni dag par 'gyur te 'bras bu gsum po ro mnyam bskol ba'i chu dang ni// sman gyis bsad pa'i lcags kyi phye ma mar dang sbang rtsi dag dang
137a5: bcas pa dngul tu dang bcas dang / / ba yi 'o ma sar pa rnying pa sA li zan ni lo ma skyur pos dman zhing lan tshwa dang // rnam bral nya dang 'bru mar sogs las grol ba zos pa dag gis phyogs kyi nang du mi rnams kyi'o// stong phrag 'bug
137a6: pa brgya yis bskur ba'i brgya dang bye ba 'bugs pa ji srid par yang shes byas nas/ / nyin zhag so so'i dus su bza' bar bya ste yungs dkar cha las mtha' ma skye tshe'i cha shas so// khang bzang dang ni sa yi khang pa grang ba rlung dang
137a7: tshad pa dag dang bral bar rab tu 'gyur/ / 'bring po 'di ni zla ba drug gis lha yi lus po skra dkar gnyer ma dag dang bral bar byed// ka ra ko TI dang de ba dA lI tsha gsum bri ha tI dang ni ma pa ki rA ta ti ga ta// bskol ba 'thungs te slar yang
137a8: ma zhu ba la nyid zhag gsum du bsnyung bar gnas pa rab tu bya/ / de bzhin zla ba'i chu la sogs pa me dang dug gi chu dang rdo dang b+hal+lA ta yi chu// ngan pa'i dri dang sa dang rdo ba dug gi sha dang brtag pa gzhan rnams la yang sngags
137b1: pas so/ / gang zhig zos na drag tu brgyal ba ster byed dug dang mtshungs pa de rnams mtha' dag sman yin te// phye mar byas nas de nyid cung zad mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas bza' bar bya ste de bzhin nyid// gsal bar mi phyugs
137b2: sems can rnams kyis gang zhig za bar byed pa de ni grub ster sman ma yin/ / de dag rnams la 'chi ster mchog tu 'jigs byed gang yin de ni rnal 'byor rnams la bdud rtsir 'gyur// daN Dod pa la sA li ba ra NI chu skyes sA tI/
137b3: ngag gi rang lus 'dam ma'i khu ba yis// ro dang mu zi mnyam pa khab len sdod du lugs kyis nyin zhag gsum dag tu yang mnye byas nas// gang zhig zla ba drug tu nyin zhag so so'i dus su Ti ka'i rkang pa'i tshad ni za byed pa/
137b4: de ni mdzel sogs pa'i nad las grol zhing skra dkar gnyer ma dang bral brgyad gnyis lo lon dbyibs// bok+kA Na dang bar snang shag tu kI ra'i mchu yis rab g.yo dngul chu dag kyang bsad par bya// sman gzhan dag gis bsang
137b5: pa la ni dmar reng lhang tsher skyes dang gser dang khab len mnyam pa dag/ gcig tu byas nas srog bcas dri ma rnam bral dngul chu dag la srang drug gis ni gong bu ste// sngar brjod khab len snod du chur khu dag gis bskol
137b6: bar gyur pa gnyer ma dang ni skra dkar 'phrog/ zla ba drug dang gnyis gcig zla ba mi bdag dang bcas nyin zhag bcu dang zhag bdun zhag gsum dang // zhag dang skad cig gcig gis 'di yi mthu dag las ni lus la dngos grub tu
137b7: yang rab tu 'gyur/ / thun mong ba dang 'bring po 'jig pa dag dang rnam par bral ba mchog gi ye shes grub pa ste// mchog dman skyes bu'i rang gis byas pa'i dge dbang las te skye ba gcig gi rjes su 'bugs las min// gang na/
137b8: 'khri shing ljon pa gzhan gyi dngos dang nyin zhag so so'i dus su dud 'gro rnam par rtsod// ral gri dag la pad ma'i skud pa'i sdong bu mi yi snum gyi mar mes gter ni gsal bar byed// der ni nyin zhag so so'i dus su 'byung po'i bdag
138a1: bo dag gis rdzas kyi bzlas pa rab tu bya/ / ji srid brko ba'i mtshan par gyur gyi bar te de nas sngags pa rnams la rdzas kyi dngos grub po// dang por rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa ste gnas drug gi sngag
138a2: rnams bslab par bya/ / gdong sbyin mo rnams bslabs nas slar yang sa gzhi la ni zhing du smra ba rnams kyang bslab par bya// klu mo rnams ni bsgrub pa byas nas bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro dang sman de rnams ni bslab par bya// le'
138a3: 'gro ma rnams bslab pa byas nas mchog tu 'jigs pa byed pa'i lha min rnams kyang bsgrub par bya/ / klu la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas rab mchog lha dang mi rnams rnal 'byor pa yis bsgrub par bya// du ba la sogs
138a4: bsgrub pa byas nas de'i ba 'jigs par byed pa'i dbu ma dag ni bsgrub par bya/ / srog la sogs rnams bsgrub pa byas nas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu ba'i thig le rnams ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i bde ba bsgrubs nas lhan cig
138a5: skyes pa rgyal ba'i sku ni kun du 'gro ba bsgrub par bya/ / sems can rnams la 'chi ster gang de grub pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtha' dag bdud rtsi ste/ 'dod pa'i dngos grub gang zhig bgrod bya min pa de yang srid
138a6: gsum gnas su bsam gtan bgrod bya'o/ / ye shes gang zhig rnyed dka' dag kyang rdo rje pad mar bde bas byin brlabs rnyed pa sla ba nyid// de lta de ltar rdo rje can te srog chags rnams la thams cad dus su bde mnyam
138a7: ster kur cig/ sgra gcan me dang zla ba nyi ma bzhi por brjod te sa chu sreg za rlung dang stong pa gang // lnga po dag go gza' yi tshogs pa gcig shos dag ni drug po 'di yi phyogs rnams su// gling rnams dag ni bzhi por
138a8: rab tu 'gyur te yul rnams dag ni lnga por phyi rol dag tu gsungs/ / snying stobs la sogs yon tan rnams ni gsum po gzhan pa 'di'o lus kyi dbus su de bzhin nyid// pad mar rnam shes dga' ba khrag dang bdud rtsi
138b1: zhes pa dang por bzhi po dag gi de las ni/ / gang shig rus pa la sogs mtha' dag rnams kyang lnga po de nas mig la sogs pa drug po ste// lag pa rkang pa dag ni bzhi po lag pa rkang pa la gnas sor mo rnams ni lnga po'o// de rnams
138b2: tshigs ni gsum po gang zhig 'dir ni rim pa mtha' dag rigs 'di la ni rig par bya/ / sa 'dzin de nyid rab dbye rnams dang ro yis bsgyur ba'i ro dang nyi ma nyi shu zhes pa dang // dbye ba drug bcu mi rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus
138b3: la gnas pa bug pa drug dang zla ba'i grangs/ / de dag thams cad bsdus pa sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur te lnga bcu rtsa bzhi srog gi rgyu ba dang // gza' rnams dag gi rgya ba gang de slar yang gcig shos rnams kyis rnal 'byor ma yi chu
138b4: par brjod/ / ye shes nam mkha' gnyis dang slar yang gzhan pa 'di ni theg pa dag dang dkon mchog gsum po yang // nyon mongs bdud dang gnas rnams dngon slar yang nges par rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zag pa rnams dang ni//
138b5: mi 'jigs pa dang bden pa rnams dang slar yang de bzhin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yang dag par// bsdu ba bzhi yi mtha' rnams rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo rje rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya// mngon shes lnga
138b6: dang stobs dang lta ba rnams dang rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po dag gi spyan lnga dang / / de bzhin phung po dbang po dran pa zhes pa drug dang byang chub yan lag bdun dang mchod pa ni// bdun te lam gyi yan lag brgyad rnam
138b7: so sor legs 'jug gzugs can rnam par thar pa brgyad rnams dang / / bug pa zhes bya yan lag dgu ni gsung rab mchog ste sa rnams dag ni phyogs kyi tshad yin no// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyogs kyi stobs dang gsal
138b8: bar dbang bcu dang ni yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel dag/ skye ba dang ni 'gog pa dag go de bzhin nyis 'gyur dgu ni ma 'dres pa yi sangs rgyas chos// rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mtshan ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis
139a1: dag dang dpe byad rnams kyang brgyad bcu ste/ / khyab bdag mchog gi go 'phang 'di dag mtha' dag sngags pa yis ni lus la bsgom par bya ba yin// zla ba rang gzugs gcig ste zung dang lag pa yig dang 'phri
139a2: pa phyogs dang bgrod pa dag ni gnyis/ / 'jig rten dus dang yon tan me ni gsum mo chu gter dus dang rig byed dag ni bzhi ru brjod// mda' dang 'byung ba dbang po rnams ni nges par lnga ru rab tu 'gyur te ro dang dus ni ruH/ ga
139a3: dang ri bo thub pa zhes pa bdun gyi grangs te de bzhin klu dang nor ni brgyad yin no/ / rtsa dang bug pa gza' dang gter yang dgu ste phyog ni bcu dang dbang phyug dag ni bcu gcig go// nyi ma lus med ma nu srid pa gang dang tshes rang mi ba
139a4: bcu gnyis nas ni re re 'phel/ / nyes pa 'di dag bcwa brgyad yin te rgyal ba mchog ni ma lus de rnams nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o// de nyid ces grags nyi shu rtsa lnga yin te gnyis skyes zhes pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis nyid du 'gyur// zud kyi
139a5: rgyal po thams cad dag tu nges par rdo rje'i tshig ni rdo rje can gyis sbas pa ste/ / dang po'i sangs rgyas su ni srog chags rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du ma lus pa yang mngon sum gsungs// de phyir 'jig rten 'das pa dag las
139a6: mtha' dag ma tshang med pa'i rgyud ni bla ma ste/ / dpal ldan rgud ni dang po'i sangs rgyas mtha' dag rgyal ba'i bdag po'i mngon par brjod pa'o zla ba bzang // gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sku dang dra
139a7: dad ro dag dang / / reg bya gzugs dang sems med rang bzhin dang ni skyes bu med cing 'ching dang grol dang byed po med// sa bon dang ni gsal bar dus med mtha' dang / srid pa'i sdug bsngal bde ba nyid kyi rang bzhin med//
139a8: mya ngan 'das pa mtshan ma med nyid byed pa rnam bral yon tan med pa de la phyag 'tshal lo// dus dang sna tshogs la sogs rdo rje dang ni skyes bu dpe med kun 'gro spros pa med pa ste// zer zug tu gnas snyan dang shangs
139b1: dang 'am pan dang dbang phyug dang zhag pa ni thams cad pa/ / 'thung po'i mtha' ste 'byung po'i mgon po mchog gi srid pa gsum 'dzid spyan sas dag gi skur gyur pa// rig pa la sog par la 'byor dag gi rtogs byas
139b2: bde'i go 'phang dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal/ / spro byed nus pa'i gzugs can klog gi me dang mtshungs shing nyi ma bcu gnyis dag gi gzi brjid can// ye shes rdo rje'i snang ba mchog gi go 'phang bgrod byed rnam pa
139b3: bcad pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dkar po 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzag 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag gnas// bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'dzems par byed pa thig
139b4: gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ / sems tsam sngags kyi ngo bo lha yis yongs su bskor ba sdug bsngal dang ni bde ba'i rang bzhin te// dam pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs ni rang gis byas pa'i nyams myong mi bzad dam pa
139b5: la mi bzad pa/ / gang gis las gang rab byas rang gi sems la cho ga bzhin du de yi 'bras bu de snyed pa// 'jig rten dbang po sna tshogs gzugs can srid gsum snyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshala'o/
139b6: gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing mnyam dang mi mnyam pa yang mnyam pa g.yas g.yon mdun rgyab dang // steng 'og kun nas dkar ldang sna tshogs kha dog chen po gzugs te thung ngu ring po shin tu ring po
139b7: dang / / shin du ring po yon tan med ces yon tan dang bcas bud med skyes pa'ang skyes pa bud med min// gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud te khyod la 'dud// gang zhig mi yi/
139b8: 'jig rten dag na dam pa ldan bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa sdig bral de bdag so// de la gnod pa byas pas srog chags rnams ni nges par dmyal bar 'gyur te 'di la ngo mtshar med// de mnyes pa yis bdag ni maku ste de
140a1: la khro ba'i pe ri thos pa zhes bya chen po'o/ / de nyid sems can rnams la thar pa bde mnyam 'bras ster bu rnams dag gi phyag 'os mchod 'os so// sdig can gang yi gang zhig dpal ldan tha pa'i zhabs par bzang la ru
140a2: gsum phyag mi byed pa'o/ / mi shes gang zhig rnam mang me tog rnams kyis dus gsum du ni maN Da la mi byed pa'o// mung dmanar med 'gro ba gang zhig bde mnyam ster byed bla pa skyob bskyed pa'o// shes rab ye shes theb pa
140a3: yi pa nyams gang zhig mchog gi zla pa'i zhabs ni pi spong ba'o/ / nyams pa gang yin gang shig rtsa gsum dag la gnas pa'i rlung ri mtha' yas dus su bsad pa'o// dpa' bo gang yin gang zhig sanya pa dang mi mnyam la rjo
140a4: dang bur sel rlung ni gsod byed pa'o/ / sbyin bdag gang yid gang zhig dpal ldar bla mar rang lus bu dang chung ma la sogs kun 'bul ba'o// ma rabs gang yin gang zhig slu byed rang snying sdig pas drangs pa'i sems dang g.yo
140a5: dang ldan pa'o/ / dpal ldan dpal gyi chos kyi 'khor lor gdan ni kha dog sna tshogs de lha lha mi'i bla ma ni// sangs rgyas nye bar bzhugs la lha yi mchog rnams kyis ni btud cing zla ba'i 'ub rtogs pa na// rgyud kyi rgyal po
140a6: dang po'i sangs rgyas sems cad ngod kyi chang du mi bdag la gsungs pa gang / / de yang ngalha bdag gis A li kA li nyung ngu'i rgyung ngu de rnams bkod do nyim kye// sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa dag las dus kyi 'khor
140a7: lo bdag gis phreng 'dzi rjes sbyor bcing bas brjod/ / 'di ni pad ma dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa khyad kyis sngags pa rnams la bstan pa nyid du mdzad// nyi ma dang bcas thub pa'i rigs rnams kyis ni shes rab ye shes thob par
140a8: bur 'di ji lta bar/ / sa da rnams ni rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'i dus kyi 'khar lo'i drin las e baM nyid gyur cig/ dus kyi 'khor lo rnal 'byor gcig pu las ni nyi ma khyed kyang mi dbang ma thog krur
140b1: srid par ste/ / tshangs pa'i rigs 'di la na mi bdag grags pa bdag ni 'jam dbyangs yin te bdag gi dga' ba ni// dpal ldan sgrol ma'o pad dkar cad ni yon tan kun gter 'jig rten mgon po chu sres patshan pa can/
140b2: ud pa la sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin du ltos// ud pa la sdong bu yis ni rang gzhan la gnas srid pa thams cad don ni ji lta bzhin mthong nas// num pa'i dbang po rnams da
140b3: lhan cig nyi mas cod pan bcas pa'i mgo dang lag pa dag gis ni/ / rigs ldan zhabs kyi pad mar phyag 'tshal nas ni smras pa ston pa gcig pu mchog/ gi thugs rje yis// thub pa'i rigs ni 'jigs rung 'khor
140b4: sdug bsngal dag las phyung nas ye shes la pa la gzhag par mdzad/ / khyed ni rgan yang gzhon nu mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sras po yin yang thog mar dang po'i sangs rgyas khyod// bud med sbyor zhing tshangs par spod ldan
140b5: metog gi thugs rje dag gis 'jig rten gnyen te gshin rje'i dgra/ / khyod ni zhi yang rdo rje bzang po 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'phrog pa khyod ni rtag tu bdud kyi bdud// khyod ni grol yang srid pa 'dir ni 'gro ba smin pa'i don du grags pa
140b6: ni rab tu 'jug/ rangs pa'i rigs las thub pa'i rigs kyis btud pa'i nyi ma bdag ni zhabs kyi rtsa bar lhung ba na// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du dus kyi 'khor lo mtha' dag sa la rab tu gsal bar mdzad/
140b7: rigs ldan rigs la khyod ni nyims bdag gis btud dpal ldan grags pa dpal ldan ka lA par// khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad ma dag la 'jigs rung 'khor bas 'jigs pa rnams ni skabs su lhag par mare// sa ga'i zla ba'i nyal
140b8: mtshan mo'i dus ni 'das shing nyin par rab tu ma zhugs pa dag la/ / thub pa'i skye bo dang bcas nyi ma sna tshogs gtso bos byin gyis brlabs pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob// sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i ched nga mtha' dag srid
141a1: par gnas pa'i thugs kyi rdo rje bdag la ni/ / ji lta bzhin du dus kyi 'khor lo'i mthu las sems can rnams kyis rnam gsum srid pa rtogs gyur cig/ sems can kun don mdzad pa po yis mchog gi thugs rje ga
141a2: gis rgyud kyi don ni bstan mdzad nas/ / sras po pad ma dkar po rab mchog yon tan dag gi gter la gnang bskul pa nges par ni// dang por khyod kyis rgyad kyi rgyal po mtha' dag ma tshad med pa glegs baM dag la gnas pa dang /
141a3: de nas rang gi 'dod pas rgyas 'gro la byas nas gzhan gyi gnas su bgrod par bya'o 'jig rten gnyen// steng na byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi phyogs gnas lha ma yin rnams mchog tu 'jigs byed dang // mi yi
141a4: 'jig rten dag na phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i rgyal po btsun mor bcas rnams dang / / sa 'og dag na gdengs can dbang po gang dag gdon tshogs mi dag dus kun du ni 'ching byed pa// de rnams thams cad nyid
141a5: zhag so so'i dus su mi shes 'jig rten kun nas skyong bar byed gyur cig/ rgyud ni dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo shin tu bsdus pa ma lus rdo rje sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha// thabs dang shes rab gcig sbyor rgyal ba'i bdag po'i
141a6: rdo rje dag gis de nyid rnam pa bcu drug pa/ / sems can rnams kyi thar pa'i slad du rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs shing bdag gis kyang ni bstan pa gang // bsod nams de yis sems can thams cad 'gyur med mchog gi
141a7: bde bar gyur cing de la 'dud gyur cig/ dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las phyung ba dpal dus kyi 'khor lo las ye shes kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal
