141a8: po dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / // kha che'i paN Di ta so ma nA thA dang bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba 'bro dge slong / shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las// dus phyis yon tan phul du byung ba
141b1: dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang / / dpon chen shAkya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du/ mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang / dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i
141b2: dge slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi cha la legs par dpyad cing bskul te/ legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i dge slong shong skon gyis// dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul
141b3: dbus kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos te gtan la phab pa'o/ / gang gi thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis// 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen bsgrubs pa dang // bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams
141b4: gang beb nges/ / kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog/ slar yang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po d+harma kI ti shI b+ha dras/ 'di'i don rnams legs
141b5: par dgongs shing bka' yis bskal nas de dag gi gsung bzhin du/ pan Di ta chen po s+thir ma ti'i bka' drin las/ legs par sbyar ba'i tshul rig pa lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan dang / blo gros dpal
141b6: bzang pos/ rlung dang 'grel pa'i hUM dpe mang po la gtugs nas dag pa rnams dang mthun par bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// de ltar gsung rab rgya mtsho'i des don stong nyid snying rje'i snying po ni// rnam kun
141b7: mchog ldan stong pa nyid dang 'gyur med mchog gi bde chen du/ / legs ston dus kyi 'khor lor 'bad pa'i dge ba gang des 'gro ba kun// gzhung 'di rtogs shing lam der zhugs nas 'bras bu de nyid myur thob shog
141b8: ye d+ha nA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun te ShA data thA ga to d+ya ba data/ teShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e bam+b+ha dI ma hA shra ma NaH/
142a1: 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ltar chos dbyings dkyil 'khor dri med 'jam dpal gyis ni ngag dang mi dge bas// sangs rgyas pa dang mu stegs pa dag lha dang dmyal ba nyid ces
142a2: gang thos pa/ / rgyal mchog pho brang sa ma b+ha lar grags ka lA ba ru ngag gi dbang phyug seng ge yi// gdan bzhugs rgyal pos rgyud kyi rgyal po slar yang thub pa rnams la gsal bar bstan// byung 'gyur zhes sogs
142a3: bden te lha mchog bla ma khyab 'jug lha yi dbang po dang / / zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me lhas stengs lha yul nam mkhar bsod nams sdig las byung // mi rnams pha rol srid par yi dgas dmyal ba gang zhig bkag
142a4: pa sha yi dam tshig can/ / rig byed pa dang thod pa can gyi rgyud kyi sdig pa'i bya ba de ni brdzun pa ste// gang du gcan chen bdun sogs dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis bram ze rnams kyang der skyes la// sngar gyi lus po spangs nas
142a5: lus gzhan sar pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ / thub pa shed bu'i tshig las srog chags rnams kyi gsod byed za ba'i mthar thug brgyad du 'gyur// sha zos pa las bram ze rnams kyang lha las so stengs 'dir lhung de ni bden pa ste/
142a6: bzang po tshangs pa dbang phyug khyab 'jug rnams kyi rig byed zhi ches khyab 'jug ches bla ma// shA yi kha zas bkag la sha yi dam tshig can la rnal 'byor ma dang rnal 'byor rgyung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis
142a7: bcwa lnga sogs par bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas byang chub ni/ / sangs rgyas pa yis kun nas sha mi bza' zhing bdag gi pa yi bsrung mi bya// srog chags rnams la srog chags 'du shes gsod pang
142a8: yid kyis nye bar brtsams pas 'di nyams pa/ / yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur gyi nam mkha' tsam ni srog chags rnams kyi byed po min// srog gcod lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyu rnams gsum gyis 'grub la long
142b1: srong cing / / steng byed bdag nyid sems kyi rgyal po sog chags rnams ni las longs spyod pas 'jig par 'gyur// seng ge sbrul dang ne le stag dang bya rog/ skye gnas yan lag lnga yis srog gcod 'gyur// rgyal po
142b2: dang ni sgra dgrar ngam byed du 'jug dang yid rang gsum gyis 'gyur/ / dge slong snying rje med pas lce la sha yir myong rol rjes su chal byed cing // bdag nyid gsod pa las sogs skyon gyis dge slong rnams dang dag
142b3: tshul yang ni dmyal bar 'gro/ / dge slong nad pa sman pas sha bsnun na yang bya khwa rnams kyis bsang ba dang // ba yi tshod du bsad dang mchod sbyin thog dang me dang chu dang mazhu'i skyon gyis shi ba rnams// sbyor ba 'di rnams ma
142b4: par gur dgang dung tshe bza' bar bya bar gsungs pa rnams/ / dge slong rnams la sha gang de ni stobs bcu ldan pas nang 'joms phyir yin 'otsho bsgra min// sha las sogs ba zos na nges par sa yi 'og tu lus chen rnams
142b5: su 'gyur/ / srog chags yi dgas las sogs skye gnas dka' thub khyim pa rgyal po nges par rang khyim du// gzhan gyi khyim dang chung ma longs spyod dang ni bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs dang rang khyim rnams// shi ba
142b6: rnams kyi lus ni gang yin chung ma bu dang bu mo gnyen 'dun tshogs ni gang / / 'dir ni rdol gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya nyid ni rnam par blta// tho yor ka lnga pa dang rang gzhan bral ba rdo yi tho yor phung
142b7: por 'gyur/ / sa steng gnas su srog chags rnams kyi rig pa nyams pa'i lus la'ang yod pa nyid// srog chags rnams kyi srog rgyu ba ni rang gzhan rnam 'brel legs par sang las shes// shi zla la yi nyi ma'i
142b8: shing rta las sogs phung po khams dang dbang po 'gro ba rnams/ / 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi khams las sogs pa phung po thams cad rdul phran rnams kyi rnam 'gyur te// longs spyod byed pa rnam par rig pa tsam te/
143a1: rang gzhan bral zhing rtog med de rnams kyis// longs spyod byed min srog chags rnams kyi snang byed gang gis mun pa bral nas sang 'gyur ba// zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan me dang phun pa gcig tu snang
143a2: bar byed pa yang / / sa sogs dri sogs mig lta sgo dang gzhu dang char pa glo go dang rlung sgo drug pa gnyis// de ni lus la phung po drug dang yul dang yul can de yi bya ba drug pa gnyis// de rnams longs spyod byed pa sra
143a3: chags phung po gnyid log gyur 'dir snang byed kyis bslang ba/ / phyi yi bdag dang nang gi bdag dang gsum pa mchog gi bdag rnams bzhi pa las rab byung // sprul sku longs sku dang ni de bzhin chos kyi sku rnams pa'i
143a4: las ni rab tu byung / / khong stong min zhing gcig pu mchog gyur 'brang ba las gyur tsam gyi gsum sngo thim par 'gyur// de bzhi gsum sgo gcig pu mchog gyur chos kyi dbyings su nges par thim par 'gyur// phung po khams
143a5: dang dbang po'i yan lag skye mched mun pa stug po sdang ba 'od kyi mdog/ rnam par shes pa srog gi de nyid srid gsum 'gro bar rtogs pa'i mtha' yas byang chub chos// dri rnams nam mkha'i me tog bzhin du yod
143a6: min mkha' tsam rdul phran chos kyi dbying pa la gnas/ / gang phyir 'gro ba 'di rnams bdag dang gsum la sogs pa sangs rgyas sku gsum las sogs pa// yan lag nang nas nyon mongs ma rig par 'gyur slar
143a7: yang len pa dang ni sred pa yang / / las ni 'du byed srid par 'gyur la 'dir ni gsum po zung bcas rgyu chos sdug bsngal ni// rnam shes las sogs rnam pa lngar 'gyur de bzhin bcu gcig pa dang bcu gnyis
143a8: pa yang yin/ / gsum las zung la zung las dpag tu med pa'i srid par chos bdun 'bras bu'i yan lag rnams// shing las me tog me tog las kyang 'bras bzhin gang zhig 'gro ba'i nyon mongs pa las las// /
143b1: de las sdug bsngal sdug bsngal de las nyon mongs mtha' yas 'khor lo ma lus tu las byung // chos rnams 'gag pa med pa na ma mkha' tsam las 'byung ba'ang med pa nyid las de yi phyir// srog chags srog gi
143b2: rdul phra ni phung por btsos shing 'gro ba gzhan du rtag min mi rtag min/ / sbyin pa las sogs gang zhig dge bcur ldan pa stong zhing byang chub phyogs kyi stong pa nyid// gang zhig dri dag byed pa por 'gyur rgyal mchog rmas
143b3: bcas srog chags rnams kyi bdud kyi ris/ / de las phung po rnams las de las slar yang sring gzhan 'pho min phung po'i mtshams sbyor ni// mar mi kha zon rgyu dang dri med chu dang sgra dang nyi ma chu shel sa bon sngar// gang du
143b4: ba rnams kyi chos sa dkar po'i chos kyi tshogs las byung ngo zhes pa bden/ / chos las longs spyod rdzogs su mtshan dang dpe byed ldan pa ma lus sgra yi tshogs rnams te// phung po sprul pa'i skul mchog tu 'gyur me
143b5: bde ba chos sku yin zhing de yi phyir/ / gang zhig sku yi mtshan nyid 'dir ni sangs rgyas pa yi slob dpor klu yis gang gsungs pa// gang zhig gcig min du ma min la bdag gzhan la pa ni phun tshogs chen po'i rter gyur pa/
143b6: dngos min dngos po dang min nam mkha' bzhin du ri mnyam rnam par dpyad ka'i rang bzhin nyid// gos med rnam par 'gyur med zhi ba mtshungs pa med pa mnyam zhing khyab pa spros pa med// dpe med so so rang gis rig bya rgyal
143b7: banas kyi tshul bdag phyag 'tshal/ / gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das bsam mi khyab pa legs dpyang 'bras bu bdag nyid phun sum tshogs// blo ldan chen por gyur pa mnyes pa'i rgyur gyur 'khor gyi dbus su sA chog
143b8: gsung mdzad cing / / 'jig rten kun la khyab pa rgyun mi 'chang pa rgya che'i dam chos sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// longs spyod rdzogs sku chos kyi rgyal po chen por gnas pa de la 'dir ni bdag phyag 'tshal// gang zhig
144a1: sems can rnams kyi smin pa'i rgyur gyur la mar me bzhin gsal bar snang ba dang / / slar yang la lar mngon par byang chub chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu zhi ba gang mthong ba// rnam pa du ma 'gro ba'i gzugs kyi thabs
144a2: kyis 'jug cing srid pa gsum gyi 'jigs pa 'joms/ / phyogs bcu'i rjes su 'jug pa don chen thub pa rnams kyi sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// khams gsum spyod pa las grol mkha' dang mnyam par
144a3: gyur pa dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin nyid/ / dag cing zhi la rnam dben mchog tu zhi la rang bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis rtogs bya ba// rtogs dka' brtag par dka' la zhi ba mi mnyam mnyam par khyab cing
144a4: mtshan ma med pa nyid/ / mi mnyam pa yi bde ba rnam par mi rtog sku gcig rgyal ba rnams kyi sku la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas rdul phran yon tan las byung ma lus 'jig rten khams rnams
144a5: su/ zla ba nyi ma la sogs skye gnas lha yul sa stengs nam mkhar rdo rje btsun mo'i mthar// bud med skye gnas chos kyi dbyings su bde 'gro ngar 'gro dus kun du ni rnam par bzhugs// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas srog
144a6: chags phung po yul gyi yon tan ldan pa bsod nams sdig pa'i mthus/ / khu ba khrag dag rig ma'i pad mar chud cing srog gi rlung dang rtsol ba'i rlung // de ni ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can du 'gyur ba'i skyes bu rig ma yang dag
144a7: ldan/ / yul gyi yon tan las krung de longs spyod pa'i gzugs sku ma yi khams la rab brten pa// skyes pa bud med ma ning lha klu khyab 'jug rgyal ba thub pa rang las mthu las byung // gang gi de nyid de nyid lnga dang rigs gsum
144a8: go 'phang yang ni gcig tu gsang ba yi/ / zhal brgya rig 'dzin dbang pos las sogs dang yul dang yul can bdag po chos kyi dbyings// zhal brgya pa de rgya las gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i yan lag sor
144b1: mo'i tshigs rnams la/ / de las tshor ba gsum las sogs pa nub par 'gyur ba sgra bzhin myur du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang zhig lnga dang gsum las yul dang yul can dri dang lus las sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sa
144b2: las sogs pa lnga dang zla ba nyi ma mun pa rnams kyis khams rnams rgyas btab de yis de/ / gcig gi du ma'i khams la gnyis skyes lag pa rkang pa'i sor mo'i tshogs rnams gang zhig tu// thams cad tha ba'i
144b3: las mchog gi rigs brgya rgyas btab skyes pa dang ni bud med dag/ rten gyi 'byung ba'i tshogs ni rang bzhin yon tan yang ni 'jig med rdul gyi phung po ste// srog gi rgyu ni dbyangs yig las sogs rang bzhir yang ni 'dzag
144b4: pa med pa'i srog gi khams/ / khu ba'i rten ni zla ba nyi ma yang ni rdul yin las ni srog chags phung po yi// de yi thabs kyis sad par byas pas bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu las 'bras bus gzhan du// rang gi las kyi bur
144b5: po lngar longs spyod cing slar yang gzhan du'ang slar yang sog par byed/ / de yi dkar po'i bsam gtan bstod pa nges pa brgya yi las kyi phung po zad pa min// gcer bu pa ni las kyi phung po rnam par 'jig 'gyur sreg byed che
144b6: ni 'ba' zhig gis/ / dkar po'i bsam gtan dgra bcom sngags dang bstod pa nges pa brgya phrag sems dang lus ngag lnga// pad ma khyab byed snying po ze 'bru'i dbang phyug dgra bcom thig le bzang po sgom par byed// de dbus
144b7: lus po sbas pa rtse mo brgya phrag 'bar ba kun nas gsal bar byed pa can/ / lha rnams gsang ba'i mdzod gyur mchog gi go 'phang 'di ni brgya byin rgyal po mchod 'os pa// yon tan 'di ni sreg zugs za bas ma lus las kyi
144b8: phung po sreg par 'gyur bar mthong / / gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig 'phel 'gyur// gang zhig gnod pa'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig
145a1: nyams 'gyur/ / gang zhig drag po'i bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig drag po bsam gtan las ni ldog par gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig
145a2: pa nyams/ / gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams// gang zhig chos kyi bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig dkar po'i
145a3: bsam gtan la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa nyams/ / gang zhig dkar po'i bsam gtan las ldog gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel// gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba la zhugs
145a4: gyur pa de rnams sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ / gang zhig nyin dang mtshan du 'tshe ba ldog par gyur pa de rnams kyi ni bsod nams 'phel// de bzhin sha dang chang dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa dang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /
145a5: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams nga nges par khro ba nga rgyal 'dod pa rnams kyis 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa la zhugs gyur pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur// gang zhig sbyin pa las ldog gyur
145a6: pas nyin dang mtshan du de yi sdig pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin tshul khrims bzod pa nyin dang mtshan du 'gyur la rdo rje'i brtson 'grus de bzhin du// shes rab thabs dang smon lam stobs kyi sbyor bar ldan zhing stong nyid ye
145a7: rdo rje rnams/ / dngos dang dngos med byer po bsgribs dang nam mkha' 'phrog par byed pa dang ni mchog gi bdag/ nam mkha' byed na byed po gnas min 'dir ni gang zhig stong nyid smra ba rnams kyi tshig sems can rnams kyi byed por
145a8: ma byas bsod nams sdig pa dus rnams kun du rnam par 'phel/ / rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan pa ye shes can dang lha rnams longs ma spyad par 'jig pa min// so sor sdud la sogs pa drug po stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan
145b1: pas stong nyid bsgom par gsungs/ / mtshan mo dra ba la sogs sbyor bas slar yang nyin mo nam mkha' mar me la sogs pas// so sor sdud pas rnal 'byor pa yis dus gsum dngos po nam mkha'i dkyil du son par bze/
145b2: bsam gtan gyis kyang de la shin du sems brtan byas pas phyi rol dngos po rnam par spong // srog rtsol gyis ni srog gi rlung dag nyi zla'i rgyu ba bral nas mun par rgyu bar byed// dbugs kyi 'byung 'jug bral zhing slar yang 'dzin pa'i
145b3: yan lag gis ni thig le 'dzin par byed/ / rjes su dran pas rang gi gzugs las zla ba bzhin du nam mkhar 'od mar 'phro bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje nas brtsams mgo bo dri med bde bas rab gang 'gyur// nam mkhar
145b4: bltas pas gti mug rnam par 'jig par 'gyur te stong pa nyid mthong bas/ / nang gi bdag nyid bltas pas 'dod chags 'jig par 'gyur te srog gi rlung dag bkag pas so// yan lag med pa bltas pas zhe sdang 'jig par
145b5: 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba yis/ / sna rtser bltas pas nga rgyal 'jig par 'gyur te gzhom du med pa tshangs pa'i gsungs las so// srog dang rtsol ba bkag pas sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma bral ba'i dkyil 'khor yang
145b6: dag pa/ / gsang ba lte ba snying kha mgrin pa mgo bo rdo rje rnams su rim bzhin ma zung re// khu ba gyen du song zhing khrag kyang 'og tu 'gro la tshangs dbyangs gzhom du med pa las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsum dang dri ma bral ba
145b7: gang gis ston pa sangs rgyas nyid/ / khyi la sogs pa'i sha yi mig dang rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lha la sogs pa'i lha yi spyan// rang rgyal nyan thos dag gis gzhan gyi sems rtogs shes pa sangs rgyas spyan te gsum
145b8: pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dri ma bral ba rnam dag bzhi pa shes rab spyan du 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thams cad gzigs pa dri ma gsum dang bral ba lnga pa ye shes spyan// rgyu 'thun dga' ba khu bo rdo rje yang
146a1: ste de 'dzin pas na nges par rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ / lus kyi sa bon khu ba pa ste 'khor lo 'dzin pa lte ba'i 'khor lo'i bde ba gang // mtshon bya de nyid mtshon bzhin pa yi snying kha sgra bcas bde ba mgon po 'khor
146a2: ba 'jig/ gang gis mgrin par de rig g.yo med bde ba 'dzin pa de ni tshor byed rin chen 'dzin/ gang gis mgo bor zla ba 'dzin pa 'di ni khu ba dri bral bde ba shes rab 'dzin// gtsug tor tshangs pa'i bu gar 'gyur med mchog
146a3: gi bde ba dga' bo bcu drug rab gdab/ / gang gis shes rab rang bzhin med pa mchog gi zla ba cha shas bcu drug rdzogs pa'i mtha'// de ni dpag med gang gi rig pa mgo bor rdo rje dang bcas drug pa rdo rje sems/
146a4: snang ba ye shes khams su 'gyur te gang zhig spyi bor 'gyur med rdo rje skyes bu la// dri bral sa yi thig le mgo bo'i skyes bu de ni chu dang nyi ma 'grib pa yang // sgra gcan me dang rnam smin snying kha sgra bcas bde ba rlung dang lte ba mjug
146a5: rengs te/ / gsang ba'i 'khor lor mun can bcom pa'i bde ba stod pa can ni stong pa mun pa'i khams// gang zhig mig las sogs pa yul can drag po lha mo rnams las sa snying las sogs gang // gzugs kyi phung po las sogs
146a6: gang zhig yul drug rnams kyang lha ru brtags pa de rnams kyis/ / dag pa'i dbang po las sogs yul can drug po gang zhig gnod mdzes rgyal po sogs// de rnams khu ba mi 'pho las sogs yul drug rnams kyang sngon
146a7: po las sogs de rnams so/ / gang zhig khro bo gshin rje gshed ni zla ba dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom gyur pa// nyi ma dang bcas srog rlung rab tu bcom 'gyur gang zhig khro bo pad ma mthar byed do// sgra gcan dang bcas
146a8: srog rlung rab tu bcom pas gang zhig khro bo bgegs mthar byed pa ste/ / mjug rings dang bcas srog rlung nges par bcom pa gang zhig khro bo shes rab mthar byed do// srog rlung 'gags pas phyag gnyis dgyes rdor zhi ba
146b1: 'dir ni nga rgyal 'joms dpa' ste/ / srog rlung bkag pas phyag bzhi pa yi dgyes rdor byin za zhe sdang 'joms pa byang chub sems// dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'dod chags 'joms pa zhal gsum phyag drug dbang phyug
146b2: sems dpa' chen por 'gyur/ / zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi gti mug 'joms pa tshangs pa bden pa dang bcas dam tshig sems// lte bar srog rlung bkag pas dri ma gsum bral rdo rje sems dpa' de ni sangs
146b3: rgyas nyid/ / snying khar bkag pa dri ma gsum bral byang chub sems dpa' rang rgyal de ni sangs rgyas nyid// mgrin par nyi ma de ni dri ma gsum bral sems dpa' chen po nyan thos nyid du 'gyur// dpral bar rlung gi dbang
146b4: po 'gags pas bde ba dang bcas dam tshig sems dpa' ston pa'i sras/ / lte ba'i 'khor lor mi 'gyur mchog gi bde ba gang zhig khro bo'i dbang po'i rtsa bzhi dang // sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan rol ro yis bsgyur ba gang
146b5: zhig bde mchog 'khor lo gsum/ / lag pa rkang pa'i rus pa'i dum bu brgyad dang lag mthil sor tshogs dum bu rnams// 'khor lo drug gi rtsa rnams 'dir ni nyis 'gyur ba de mchog chen po'i rnal 'byor ma rnams
146b6: la/ / gtsug tor rtsa ba'i rnams su 'pho ba rnam par bral dang de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo brgyad// mgrin pa sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams su 'gyur te drug cu rtsa bzhi lte ba'i 'khor lo ru// gang zhig zla ba'i cha yis ga
146b7: ba mgo bo dkar po de 'dir gsang bar dkar po'i cha/ / 'khor lo'i rtsa rnams yang ni mchog tu mi 'gyur bde ba dus kyi 'khor lo lhag pa'i lnga// dus ni drug cus lhag dang bcas pa'i brgya phrag gsum ste tshigs mtsham
146b8: rnams kyang rdo rje'i sku/ / rgyu skar rnams kyi dbyu gu nam mkha' lag brgyal po de yang dang po'i sangs rgyas gsungs// zla ba'i cha shas sum tsun pa mkha' nam mkha' gdengs can zla ba'i ca ni zla bzang po/
147a1: dang ba spu gang zhig ma lus lus la gnas pa rdo rje myu gu'i ming can te// rdo rje chu dang bshad pa khrag rnams lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lce yis ldag par 'gyur// byams pa'i tshems kyis gdong dang lag pa rkang
147a2: pa'i sha rnams zos pas des na drag po la/ / mngon shes lnga yi zhal chen yul gyi phyugs kyi tshogs rnams zos pas des na seng ge ste// bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims dam pa dri ma gsum bral dus kyi 'khor lo spyan gsum
147a3: pa/ dpal ldan 'dus par sku rnams gang zhig yul dang yul can srog chags las kyi mthu las byung // der ni 'ga' zhig khams rnams de dag lta ru rtag tu bdud kyi rigs la gsal bar mdzad// rtsa dang sha dang rus pa khu ba khrag
147a4: rnams rdul phran 'dus pas lha rnams kyi ni gnas/ / srog chags so so sangs rgyas lha yul bar sngangs steng rang rang gnas su gtso bor gnas// mdor byas brdzun gyi rim pas 'gyur la yul dang yul can sgrub byed rdo rje bzlas
147a5: pa yin/ / rang byin brlabs pas srog rlung ri bong can du bzhi pa 'dir ni mngon par byang chub 'dod// 'dir ni lnga pazung 'jug rim pa mchog tu gyur pa dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus par yang // bdud rnams yang dag gzung
147a6: phyir srid pa gsum gyi thams lha yi bskyed pa'i rim pa gsungs/ / gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' dge ba bcu yi lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs las skyes// skyes pa skye bar 'dod par 'gyur gyi yid tsam
147a7: min la brtags pa dang ni bdag kyang ngo / / bdud kyi tshig 'di dag ni rang gi yid la byed cing de 'dra'i khyab pa'i rang bzhin gyi// bsam gtan rje bo 'ga' yang yod min lha yul so stengs bsod nams tshul khrims
147a8: rnam par dmar/ / stobs bcu mchog dang ldan pas rdzogs pa'i lha dag chos kyi dbyings la yang dag gnas pa ste// bsten par bya yi lcags kyu rdo rje mda' gzhu dril bu ral gri zhag pas bsgrub pa min//
147b1: bkug cing 'dir ni gzhug dang mchog tu 'jigs par gyur pa brdung zhing lag pa bcing ba yi// bsam gtan 'dis ni dge ba bral nas bdud rnams shi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas pa yi lha rnams dri ma
147b2: gsum dang bral zhing sems can kun gyi son mdzad pa/ / de ni shin tu dri zhim me tog dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni lha bshos dang // gsang sngags bzlas dang bstod pa nges pa brgya yis bsten bya ba sgrub pa po la rab dgyes nas// sa
147b3: 'og 'jig rten lha yul sa steng bar snang rnams su grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa ster/ / zla ba nyi ma'i rtsa dag bkag cing nyin mtshan dus su srog gi gsang sngags gang zhig ni// zla ba gcig la nam mkha' mkha' dang stong
147b4: pa brad 'gro dus ro mun pa dbyer med bzlas/ / steng dang 'og gnyis 'dzin pas lam gsum bral bas srog rlung gang bas rlung dag khyer bzhin pas// grub par 'gyur te ri bong 'dzin pa lta bu nam mkha' 'gro bas rig pa 'dzin pa/
147b5: ste// bsod nams don du byang chub sems dpa' thugs rjes rgyal srid chung ma bdag gi sha yang gtong // ye shes don du dus gsum dngos po stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mi g.yo dri bral klog byed cing // tshul khrims don du khu ba rdo rje
147b6: mgo bor khyer la mgo nas tshangs pa'i bu ga ru/ / bsod nams ye shes tshul khrims yang dag dri ma rnam par bral nas rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// shin du skyon can skye bo gang zhig rgyal srid sems kyis ster ba len pas longs
147b7: mi spyod/ / yon tan ma lus ldan pa'i chung ma sems kyis byin yang gang zhig len pas longs spyod min// sha dag sems kyis byin dang gang zhig sha yi dam tshig can gyis len pas longs spyod min// sbyin pa de yis byang chub sem
147b8: dpa' gal te stobs bcu ldan pa de tshe dman rigs cis mi 'gyur/ / byams pas dka' thub mchog ni tho rangs dus su chang gi don du chad 'tshong khyim du 'gro// nyin mtshan dus su mchog gi thugs rje nya yi don du nye ba rnams
148a1: gyi tshong 'dus su/ / dgongs kyi dus su bud med la 'jug phyir du dga' bas bran mo rnams kyi khyim du 'gro// chang nyo bud med rnams kyis dri ma gsum bral a ba d+hA tI dam dra rigs cis ma yin// gang dag
148a2: dngos po du mar gyur pa ser skya ba ni gcig pa nyid du dam 'cha' la/ / gang gi bsgrub bya med pa nyid la brtan g.yo'i 'gro ba yod pa nyid du dam 'cha' ba// gang tshe gtan tshigs bsgrub bya dang mtshungs gyur pa de tshe sgrub pa po yis
148a3: bsgrub bya min/ / gal te bsgrub bya gzhan la gtan tshigs kyang gzhan gyur pa de tshe de yi dam bcas nyams// sgra rnams rtag par dam bcas nam mkha' lta bur byas pa'i lus med par grub de bzhin du// sgra rnams mi rtag
148a4: dam bcas bum pa lta bur byas te shin du rtsol bas byung ba'i phyir/ / nam mkha'i las ni rtag par grub kyang khyod kyi kha las sgra rnams mi rtag nges par grub// gzugs dang reg bya dri dang ro bzhin lnga pa sgra yang cis ma yin// de ni/
148a5: gang gis thog mar rtogs pas sa steng bar snang khams su sgra des slar yang ni// rna bas sgra rnams rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba de ni sgra rnam ma rtag pa nyid yin no// gang gis thog mar don rtogs gyur pas sa steng bar snang
148a6: khams su slar yang de tshul gyis/ / rna bas don rnams nges par rtogs par gyur pas de ni gzugs rnams rtag pa nyid yin nam// rtag pa gsal bya gcig tu yon tan ma lus rang bzhin sgra zhig rna ba'i bug par gnas//
148a7: mgrin pa nas brjod gsal byed sgra yi tshogs rnams slar yang rtag par gyur pa ma yin la// gang zhig brjod pa gcig gis nyan byed rna ba'i bug par sgra yi ku cor 'gyur min nam// rtag par mngon par gsal bya de ltar
148a8: 'gyur gyi gzhan la ltos pas nus pa'ang min/ / dngos po'i byed po'i rgyu ni slar yang mun pa bsal bar byed pa gzhan na gnas pas ni// rtag pa mngon par gsal bar byas pa gang zhig rgyu yis bskyed pa 'dir ni byas pa
148b1: ste/ / byas pa dang ni gzhan pa gang dag chos mi mthun pas grub par 'gyur ba nyid ma yin// chos mi mthun pa de phyir byas pa rnams ni yod par 'gyur la gcig shos re med do// gang zhig mngon par gsal bya'i rgyur
148b2: gyur mngon par gsal byed de ni ci yis rgyu ma yin/ / mun par thim par gyur pa gang dag de yis mngon par gsal byas de yi 'bras bu cis ma yin// sgra dang don dag gal te gcig par gyur na re tshe don nyams pa na sgra nyams
148b3: 'gyur/ / spyi dang gsal ba de bzhin 'gyur te nam mkha' tsam dang gzhan pa nyid dang gcig pa nyid// stong pa sgra dang ldan par gyur na de tshe 'jig rten gsum po sgra med 'gyur// gang gis nam mkha' yod pa nyid na brtan dang
148b4: g.yo ba des na med pa nyid/ / gal te nam mkha' dang ni 'byung ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu dag chos mi mthun las grub 'gyur na// de yi rgyu las sgra dang sgra min dman par nges pa sgyur ba po la dri bar 'gyur// nam mkha' sa stengs dag tu gza' dang /
148b5: rgyu skar dag dang byol song dang ni mi rnams dang // lha dang srin po rnams dang rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig can gyi yid dgas lha min klu// sngags kyi yi ge rnams kyi rang bzhin yon tan dbang las dbyings dang kha dog rang bzhin gyi/
148b6: don gcig du ma'i sgra yis kha cig tu yang don rnams mang po de ni sgra gcig gis// dngos med stong pa'i rgyu las brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po rgyu las grub pas na// dpe ni nam mkha'i me tog dang ni sa dang shing dang me tog
148b7: de der rang rang grub/ / mo bsham bu mo nam mkha' tsam las skyes pa nam mkhar 'gyur la bu ldan las skyes pa// bu ni 'gro ba ma lus par 'gyur shin du phra ba'i rdul phran phung po'i sa bon las// sa dang chu dang me
148b8: rnams lha yi de nyid khyad par rnams ni phyi dang tha dad min/ / gal te lha gcig rab tu 'jig par gyur na de tshe tha dad gzugs dang lhan cig tu// sa dang chu dang me rnams lha yi de nyid gcig pa nyid du rab tu 'jig pa min/
149a1: srog chags so so'i lus ni 'jig pa rnam par bral ba'i 'byung po'i tshogs kyi lha rnams te// sa dang chu dang byin za rlung dang nam mkha' sbyor bas gang zhig rnam lnga'i ba gi lus// lus can rnams la yon tan bral
149a2: ba'i lha rnams rnam lnga der ni mthong min yod ces grag/ srog chags rnams ni sngon gyi lus po spangs nas slar yang lus gzhan bsam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// gang zhig sa las sogs pa'i lha rnams de yi sngon gyi lus
149a3: po zhig pas rab 'jig 'gyur/ / srog chags gzugs gzhan glog gi phreng ba chen po bzhin du rab tu rgya chen gzugs can te// sprin bor nas ni bar snang dag la phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su mgyogs pa'i shugs
149a4: kyis 'gro/ / srog chags srog dang lhan cig bems po'i lus dang bral ba tshor ba las sogs rab ldan pa// srid pa sum bcu rtsa gsum rnams su dge dang mi dge'i dbang gis gcig pu kho na 'gro// gcig min rnam pa lnga po
149a5: yul dang bral ba nang gi bdag dang mchog gi bdag nyid ni/ / nam mkha' las 'das mi gsal min zhing mi gsal 'bras bu med min nus pa dman pa min// sems las 'dod pas rang bzhin skyes bu 'byung ba min zhing srog
149a6: rlung med na sems med la/ / srog chags sems dang lhan cig bde 'gro ngan 'gro dag tu las kyi 'brel bas 'jug/ phan tshun ltos phyir bems po dag dang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid dag dang // phan tshun ltos phyir gang tshe 'byung
149a7: ba'i tshigs rnams yongs su gyur par rab tu 'byung ba nas/ / ther zug pa yang 'gyur ba nyid pas de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams 'gyur bar nges par yin// thams cad 'gyur med rtag pa'i rang bzhin 'gyur yang gang zhig rtag pa
149a8: nyid ni 'gyur ba med/ / ther zug pa dang ther zug dman pa'i skyes bu khyab bdag gis ni srid sgrub la bshad de// phan tshun ltos phyir rig pa dang ni rigs dag kyang ni rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa min dang /
149b1: byas pa dag kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid du 'gyur// phan tshun ltos phyir byas pa dag dang byas pa yang ni rgyu dang 'bras pa nyid// thams cad rnam par rig pa tsam stes dang me dang chu dang nam mkha'i khams// gzugs dang reg pa dri nga
149b2: sgra dang bcas pa'i bde ba rdul phran phung por gyur pa min/ / rnam par shes las 'bras bu'i dngos po rang 'byung ba las min zhing med dang 'dren mas min// sa bon las ni ma gu la sogs bzhin du 'gyur gyi rang las minan
149b3: rgyu med min/ / rkang dang rus pa chub sha dang khu khrag tshil bu lpags pa rdul phran phung po min// rnam par rig pa tsam zhig spangs nas slar yang srid pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam zhig 'gro// der ni lus min slar yang srid
149b4: pa gzhan du rnam rig tsam po de nyid de/ / 'dod chags gnyid log kur na rang gzhan bral ba rnam rig tsam po rnam par nyams// gal te 'gro ba rnam rig tsam du gyur na 'dir ni don gzhan rnam par rig tsam du// de 'gyur gal
149b5: 'gro ba rnam rig tsam na de tshe gnyis med min te de gnyis phyir/ / / gang zhig 'di yi ma rig glo bur rab ste lhan skyes gyur pa de ni nam rig min// sngon du rnam rig rnam par dag par lhan sras bems po yang ni
149b6: rig par rnam dag 'gyur/ / bems po la lus rnam par rig pa tsam du 'gro bas sad pa'i tshe na rab tu rtogs pas grub// de yi rnam rig mi sdang bar 'gyur yang na rang gnas tshangs pa dbang phyug las sogs 'gyur// bye brag grab
149b7: na ser skya'i 'dod par 'gyur nyes bon nang na mug sogs/ / gcig phyir 'bras bu yod par smra bar 'gyur te rgyal rtag pa zung zang yod ma yin/ thog mar prar ba rdul gyi phung po 'gro ba'i tshe meng gang gi rdul phran nam mkha' la// pra ga
149b8: rdul rnams 'dus pa'i 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba srid pa rdul phran phung po min/ / rdul phran bril te nam mkhar gnas pa las gzhan 'gro ba rnams kyi rnam par 'jig pa min// gal te lus po rdul phran phung por gyur pa de tshe su li
150a1: lus po 'jig par 'gyur/ / 'byung brtags pa med las gzhan du rdul phran bral min gang gi rdul phran de rdul kyang // sdud dang skyed pa bral bas nam mkha'i dkyil la gnas te rlung dang ldan dang mi ldan pas/
150a2: phra rab rdul rnams cha shas drug la slar yang cha shas drug ste slar yang gang gi cha shas drug/ de yi cha shas cha yis nam mkha' khams 'di gang bar cis mi 'grub// dngul chu nor bu'i rdul phran cha bcas cha med tshad med dag gri
150a3: bsgrub byar gyur pa min/ / cha dang bcas na zangs ma 'bigs min rdo yang min la rdul phran phung po che med min// dngul chus zangs ma reg cing gnyis skyes nor bus rdo ba lha yi nor bu rin po cher 'gyur la// rnam par
150a4: shes pa rnam rtog drug gis nye bar nyams pa rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur min/ / phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs ni gang zhig rdul phran phung por de yi tshad mos grub pa min// rnam par shes pa'i bag chags dag las/
150a5: nam mkha'i dkyil du rmi lam dang mtshungs mthong zhes grag/ gang phyir dmun long mig med yid kyis de ni mig dang ldan zhing ma yin de phyir min// mig gi rnam shes khams las mig dang bcas pas phyi rol gzug
150a6: las yin gyi bag chags min/ / gang zhig sgra rnams ma lus rna bar thos pa de yang 'on pa rnams kyis thos ma yin// sna nang bcas pas gang zhig dri yi rdul phran 'dus pa min zhing nad med pas de 'dzin// lce yi nad can
150a7: ro mi myong la de nyid la yang nad med lce yis myong bar byed/ / rnam par shes pa skye mched bcu gnyis rnam par bral ba tshad mas bsgrub par bya ba min// rdul phran 'dus pa'i 'gro bas kyang ni 'gro ba mthong nas mi shes pa yis tshad ma
150a8: yi/ / drag po dang ni tshangs pa'ang seng ges kyang ni shes pa rnam par rig pa tsam du byas// rdul phran rnams kyi bral ba mthong nas thim par 'gyur ram bsdus sam yang na 'gags par 'gyur// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med la mang po 'dus
150b1: sam 'dus pa min par rab tu byung / / 'di ni thub pas nam mkha'i tshad ma byas la rgyal ba rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyi yang // rang rgyal rnams dang nyan thos lha dang lha min klu dang bdag lta bu yi rgyal sras rnams// gza' dang rku skar rnams
150b2: dang nam mkha' sa steng dag tu skyes pa bud med drang srong rnams/ / khro bo rnams dang srin po sha yi dmi tshig can gyi stag gzig byol song dmyal ba rnams// gang zhig rnam par mi rtog dang ldan dang gzhan bral ba stong nyid dus gsum ngo bo
150b3: nyid/ / rnam pa thams cad rdul phran gyis stong nam mkha' dkyil ltar son pa'i rmi lam snga ma bzhin// gang zhig thams cad mkhyen pa gzigs pa dri ma gsum bral rnam par mi rtog de ma yin// gang gis de rtogs sems la
150b4: dri med dri mar ldan pa mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas te/ / gang zhig sbyin pa las sogs lam dang dge bcu lam dang byang chub phyogs sogs chos rnams dang // byams pa las sogs gnas dang rang bzhin bral ba stong pa la sogs rnam
150b5: par thar pa dang / / tshul khrims la sogs gang zhig yul dang bral ba'i rnam pa kun du mi rtog pa// de rnams byed po gang zhig stobs bcu'i stobs ldan nyan thos rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' min// gang zhig gzugs sogs
150b6: khams drug de ni yul drug kyang ste rdul phran phung po'i rnam 'gyur ro/ / phyi rol sngon po'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul can rang lus sa dang dri la sogs pa drug/ stong pa snang dang mun pas gsum gnas su rnam pa kun nas
150b7: rnam par mi rtog pa/ / snang bas rab tu sad pa rab rib rnam par bral ba 'gro drug gnas pa'i srog chags yin// 'phags pa'i yul gyi rgyal po bde gshegs dam tshig can la sangs rgyas lam ston mdzad pa po// klu sgrub
150b8: rdo rje can kyang srid pa gsum gyi bla mas chos kyi dbyings su lung bstan cing / / nyams pa rnams kyi gos sngon can la sha yi dam tshig can gyi ston pa byang chub rdo rje ste// ye shes mtha' can nag po'i ming can gzhan yang mi
151a1: dA ma ti srin po'i dbang po 'thung / / ye shes ming can rdo rje dril bu lag gdub dag kyang de bzhin thod par chang 'thung zhing // kha T+wAM ga dang dras pa'i rgyan ma dang snod cang te'u ster ba nag po'i ming can no// slob ma rnams la
151a2: gos sngo dang ni kun du chug pa ster ba na bza' sngon po can/ / sha yid pa tshig can gyi thod pa can la rdo rje'i phyag rgya ster rab byang chub rdo rje'o// gos sngon can ni rta mchog bdag po dpal ldan ha las sogs pa'i med can gyis
151a3: bkan 'gyur/ / ye shes rdo rje'i skyon gyis slob dpon rab tu 'khrugs pas mig gnyis sa la ltung bar 'gyur// rab tu khros pa'i khe can thod pa can gyi pho nya gzhon nu ma nag po'i khrag 'bung byed// sha yi dam tshig can gyi
151a4: spyod pa 'gal ba de dag sangs rgyas pa rnams spong mi 'gyur/ / mchog gi thugs rje can gyi 'jigs byed kyis bstan thod pa can gyis rgyal po las 'doms pa// gang gi ming gis rnam tog yid kyis thugs rje min zhing sa
151a5: can phung po byams pa min/ / de rnams bzang po'i thabs ni sna tshogs sha yi kha zas gzhan gyi nor 'phrog 'dod pa ni// log par g.yem pa dge ba rnam par bral bas skye ba 'di nyid la ni grub par 'gyur// skyes bum mtho
151a6: ris gnyis skyes 'jigs byed las sogs phyugs kyi sha yis mchod pa'i mchod sbyin gyi/ / de thos sangs rgyas lam ni seng ge 'phrog byed kyis bshad tshangs pa'i chos ni rnam par spangs// khro bo'i dbang po srin pa'i dbang po
151a7: gnyis sras thugs kyi sha yis mchod par 'gyur/ / gang yang rung ba blo gros dman pa dge ba rnam bral de ni bdud kyis bslus par 'gyur// khro bo dbang po srin po'i dbang po'i sha yi dam tshig can gyi rgyal pos
151a8: mchod par 'gyur/ / mthe ris dbang phyug 'dod phyir gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha dang khrag gis bsgos pa'i mgo bo yis// nges par mnar med dmyal ba rtag tu'ang sdug bsngal dbyal ba pa la ster bar 'gro bar 'gyur // gang
151b1: las bskal pa'i rgyal po stong phrag sum bcu rtsa drug rnams kyis nges par 'thon par 'gyur/ / bdud kyis sha yi dam tshig can gyi yi dgas mkha' 'gro rnams la ska byer 'gyur zhing // sems can sku phyir kha cig tu
151b2: 'jigs pa min par bdag nyid gzugs ni ston par byed/ / lha rnams sha yi dpa tshig can gyi lha ma yin rnams zad par bya phyir sgyu ma byed// sems can rnams ni bkang phyir kha cig tu yang bdag gzugs 'jig
151b3: par mi byed stod par byed/ / long brlag phyir 'jig pa'i dus kyi me lha'i dus kyi ma lha'i 'jigs byed dus ni me lha rab tu zung // ba byed kyis bsad lha ma yin te khrag kyang srin po rnams kyis 'thungs par 'gapa1
151b4: dang rus sbal pa ga rbed mi yi seng ge lha ma yin rnams rlag phyir khyab 'jug skyes/ / nya dang ngo bzhin ri dgas las sogs 'o ma nags tshal dgon pa khyab 'jug gis mi bza'// sa gsum bla mas yi dgas mkha'
151b5: 'gro rnams ni sprin phyir he ru ka yi gzugs su byas/ / mtshan mo rgyu ba'i bdag pos rA ma'i chung ma dbrog phyir gnas 'jog gzugs su byas// 'jigs sde med pas sgrub seng bu rnams sha yi dam tshig can kyis bram ze'i
151b6: gzugs kyis bcings/ / kir mi ri yis sha yi ched du sum bcu'i stobs bcu'i stobs can srin po'i rigs kyi chos byed cing // lha dang klu yi dbang po dam tshig 'di rin rgyal po chen po rig par byos// lha bshos 'bras chad
151b7: khur ba zho dang 'o ma mar dang bcas pa'o thug sha kar rnams/ / khro bo rnams dang srin po rnams la phyugs kyi sha yi gtor ma 'bras chan khrag dang chad// sangs rgyas rnams la snying po lnga dang buras zhor bcas 'bras cha
151b8: lhung bzed dka' thub la/ / khrum bcas sbrang rtsi mar sar za zhing tsan dan me tog dag gis mgon por bcas pa mchod// gang gis chad sogs mchod pa de dang de yis lha dang 'jig byed dpa ni he ru ka la pin// srin
152a1: po'i dbang po mtshan mo chu ba'i dam tshig dpal ldan zla ba seng ges spyad/ / mdung can pa dang dri ba ti dang 'di dgra rigs skyes bud med min te khyo mo lnga lnga yang // gzhan yang thod pa can gyi chang sdong nang gi chu yid
152a2: gtsang sbra an tra las sogs yul/ / sin d+ha'i yul na baglang sha za kha ba can ri gnyis skyes rgyal po'i mi rnams chang 'thung zhing // gA ri tshogs nam he d+ha sham kha bar bar mi se ren ta grang sha/ de rjing stag dang mi sha za la
152a3: skar yul du bong bu rnga mo khyi yi sha/ / bram ze las sogs rnams kyis shA mi bza' ba yul 'khor chen po ka Na ra yi yul// nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su dam ngas rigs las sogs chang 'thung bkag sa rigs skyes 'bus bud med
152a4: rnams kyi dbang po skyes pas mo rtags 'jig par byed cing gnyis skyes kyis bshad kyi/ / khrus dang gtsang sbra mi byed 'dir ni chags pa spyod pa pi ra'i yul las sogs pa rnams// pha dag shin ma dag bu yi chung mar bag mar le/
152a5: pa nges par kho kha'i yul// rug mer spun zla'i tshe mor len la mkhar yang ni sman zla'i bu mo rang gi bus// sor me dang tsam pa ka las sogs par tsha mo'i bu mo dang ni tsha mo 'ang yin// spun zla'i bu mo chung mar len pa yul 'khor
152a6: chen po ka ra na ta las sogs par ro/ / ma yi tsha mo chung mar len pa la la yang ste khol mo len pa ra ra'i yul// bon na khrus dang gtsang sbra med la ba ru ku lan ta re go stan rigs ngan yul// skyes pa'i bka' yis gdengs
152a7: na dbang po nyin dang mtshan gyi dus su chu yi char 'bebs byed/ / gal te yul chos spyod pas grub par gyur na de tshe rig byed ngag dag bden pa min// sha yi dam tshig can gyi sha za'i lus can phru gu sha dag spong bar 'gyur
152a8: ba yin/ / gang zhig rig byed byed pa drang srong mchog gi dka' thub can gyi rig byed dag de gnyis// mtho ris don du mi dang pa glang gsod cing b+ha gar dkrugs pa zhi ba'i btung // zhi ba'i rig byed dag de dag gis sems
152b1: sun 'byin pa rab tu mkhas pa rnams/ / ba glang lpags pa'i zhi ba'i btung ba b+hag mchog tu dkrugs pa ta yi po rtags bcang bra la// khra ba khrag gis rnam par bsgos pa spang dang mar du bcas pa lce yis ldag par byed/
152b2: dwe lha'i sha ba'i spyod pas gal te mchod sbyin rig byed dag gis gnyis skyes rnams kyis grub// nges pa dang ldan zhi ba'i sems dang snying rje ldan pa'i ngaN Di mtho ris rnam par nyams// pa las sogs pa'i don du 'tshe ba byed
152b3: ze khyim pa mchod sbyin dus su phrugs dag gsod/ / dka' thub rnams ni 'tshe ba spong zhing dka' thub nges par brdung zhing gong ma goms gtso yod// daN Di dka' thub rnams kyis mtho ris mchod sbyin 'gegs par 'gyur
152b4: te de yang gang gi phyir/ / shes par grol bas de phyir sna tshogs thugs dag gsod pa gnyis skyes rnams ni ngu 'bod 'gro// lha las sogs pa mchod pa nyid pas gal te shazos pa las nyes pa mi skyed na// bcu gnyis
152b5: pa dang nya dang bcu bzhi klu yi tshes dang nyi ma 'pho ba'i dus dag tu/ / khyab 'jug las sogs mchod phyir 'di rnams nyi mar bram ze rnams kyis ci phyir sha mi bza'// pa la gnas su sha dang rnam par bral ba'i chang bu ci phyir ster
152b6: byed mkhas pa rnams/ / 'tsho ba'i pha dang ma dag gang zhig shi bar gyur na sngon gyi rigs rgyud rnam par spangs// bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis mtho ris ngan song dag tu rab tu skye la lus bsregs nas// gnas dang gtu
152b7: su rus pa'i dam bu 'jog cing chang bu dag kyang ster byed su zhig ni/ / su zhig ma yin su zhig pa yin de ni lus dang rnam par bral nas skye gnas gzhan zhugs pa// bram ze las sogs mchod pas gal te de yis pa
152b8: la mchod par rig byed las grub na/ / bram ze las sogs ma zhu ba yis de tshe shi ba la yang ma zhus gnod par 'gyur// gang gi pa dag yi dgas skye dge'i dbang gis yi dgas skyes nas dad pa'i kha zas slong // nges
153a1: ba'i bu yis byin pa'i chang bu len par gyur la chu yang len par byed/ / tshangs pa las sogs gtso bo nyi ma lha mchog bdag gi nyi ma de ni ci yis bza'// sems can rnams la sdug bsngal ster ba 'chi
153a2: ba'i 'jigs bskyed lnga rnams ci yis zhi bar 'gyur/ / zla ba lha min dbang po'i gtso bo phebs bcas gtso bo ci zhig zla ba gza' de ni// sems can rnams la bde ba ster zhing mchog tu 'jigs pa 'joms pa ci yis lham
153a3: yin rnams grag/ gang zhig mtho ris lha rnams mi dang phyugs kyi sha yis bram ze rnams kyis mchod bya ba// gang zhig yi dgas sa yi khor yug rtogs par yod pa de rnams gnyis skyes spyod yul min// sa las so//
153a4: pa lha yi de nyid nye bar zhig par gyur pa dbang po'i spyod yul min// tshangs pa gzugs mA tshogs pa nam mkha' tsam yang seng ge dbang phyug gtso bo tshangs pa de nyid de// yi dgas las sogs rlung gi lus po dang /
153a5: bzhin yon tan dbang las rigs pa'i kha dog dman// sa dang chu dang me yi lus can sa dang bar snang dag tu kha dog rigs sogs ldan// rlung gi reg bya'i lus can sa dang chu dang me rnams mig gis gzung bya'i kha dog
153a6: gzugs/ / dri ni sa yis gzung bya 'dir ni lce yis ro myang dag pa'i rna bas sgra rnams so// rig byed tshig las gal te rlung gi gzugs ma grub cing rig byed rtog ge'i tshad ma yis// gzugs med de yis sa dang bar snang
153a7: ngag tu de tshe 'byung ba'i tshogs rnams bskod pa min/ / mo bsham bu dang mtshungs pa nam mkha' tsam la nam mkha'i rgyu tsam yon tan med pa gang // gzhan dag gzugs can bzhi ste sa dang chu dang byin za rung rnams ro//
153a8: yi dbang po gnyis// bram ze sogs kyis mthong gyur khyim ni mun pa can du mtshan mo mar me med na yang // bye ba las sogs phyogs dang mtshams su son pa'i gzugs kyi dngos po ma lus snang bar 'gyur// srin
153b1: po dang ni yi dgas las sogs tshogs pa mtshan mo'i dus su lha rnams ma lus kyang / / bram ze las sogs rnams kyis de ni mthong zhing nyi ma shar na skar ma mya lus kyang // bya rog srin bya lce spyad khyi rnams 'byung dang
153b2: 'bung 'gyur zung ba ma lus ston/ / bram ze shi nas yi dgas gyur pas rmongs pa'i lus la zhugs nas rig byed 'don par byed// sprin bdag srin por gyur na khyim du bong ba so phag rus pa'i dum bu 'phen
153b3: par byed/ / blo dang ldan pa'i dpyod pa can rnams nye bar nyams par 'gyur ba'i yi dgas spyod la ltos// mun pa bsal ba min par gyur la mun las khA ta de yi bshad pa las byung ba// mya ngan med skyes khyab 'jug
153b4: 'phrog byed skyed byed des names po khwa da mchod par 'os/ / ba glang rgyab dang ra yi kha dang gnyis skyes bong bu'i rkang pa bud med b+ha gar phyag byed cing // khams rnams stong la gnyis pa mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa ldan pa gang
153b5: zhig bram ze rnams/ / sgra med yi ge med las nam mkhar 'gyur te nam mkha' rlung gi rten du gyur pa las// rlung las ma la me las chu yin chu las sa las 'bras bu'i kha zas rnams// zas dang chu dag zos dang
153b6: 'thungs las rdul phran yon tan rang bzhin g.yo ba'i lus 'di dag/ bsod nams sdig pa'i mthu yis bde 'gro rnams dang ngan 'gro'i srog chags phung po rab tu 'byung // mo bsham bu yi thu bo mchog las mchog
153b7: mchog gang rdul phran 'bum gyi cha ltar phra/ / nam mkha' las ni mchog gi bdag nyid yul dang bral zhing yon tan med pa nam mkha'i rtags// rtags kyi gnas ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha'i da
153b8: de rnams so/ / gang yang 'di dag kun nas thim zhing nam mkha' sa stengs zhi ba'i grub mthar ldan// gang zhig de yi nus pa b+ha ga zhes bya rnam gsum lam ldan sgur mo 'jigs byed ma// de ni nam mkha' las
154a1: las na ma la'i dbang phyug mchog gi mchog kur rtsa bcings 'khyil pa can/ / nam mkha'i mtha' can thig le'i phreng ba mgo nas bshang lam bar du ba thag dang mtshungs pa myangs skam pa'i rig
154a2: can gnas dang 'jigs pa med byed za byed rnams kyi za byed ma/ / gsal dang mi gsal gcig ma rigs las rigs min gzhan yang gcig tu mkha' spyod 'khor lo pa// rig pa'i 'khar la'i dbang smrigarims dang rig
154a3: min gyur pa'i thar pa ster ba'i dbang gis 'bigs/ / sa gsal bya reg rA yis gzhu la 'dir ni rang gi yon tan ru sbal spu yis byas// nam mkha'i me tog lcags pada'i mda' ga'u gang dag 'bigs pa dman rgyal po
154a4: dbang bskar 'gyur/ / gal te ske dang 'jig rgyas ma chen mo byed dam he ru kar 'gyur na// sangs rgyas pa dang mu sngags pa dag khyab 'jug gam ni rtag pa'i sgra ma ji ltar min// 'di ni thub pa'i tshig las sreg chags
154a5: srog ni rdul phran keng dag byed du 'jug pa med/ / sems can rnams kyi bsod nams sdig las bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin 'bras bu 'byin par 'gyur// gang zhig srin po yi dgas mkha' 'gro bdud kyi rigs kyi sha
154a6: yi dam tshig can gyis bskabs/ / grub pa'i tshig gis skye bo gzhan gyis de rnams nges par 'bebs par byed// stag las sogs pa 'gasal tshul ma 'bar glang chen rengs byed ma 'or cha sags kyis yin// sngags kyi the zang la
154a7: sogs pa yi khor yug rtogs par rje bo'i bya ba byed/ / byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten dbang phyug lha min lha klu rnams ni sangs rgyas pas sgrub na// gang gis grub pa'i ngag gis denams sa yi steng du 'dod pa'i dngos
154a8: skye bo rnams la ster/ / skal pa ngan dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'joms par byed// seng ge las sogs 'jigs pa rab tu dad pa'i yid kyis zhi ba las sog byed par 'gyur// byang chub don du gcig
154b1: tu sbyin pa las sogs lam ni dge bcu ldan las gzhan ma gsungs/ / dbu ma'i dag pa gcig pu b+ha ga dkrugs pa grub 'gyur lam gzhan gyis ma yin// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi rdzogs pa'i byang chub
154b2: rdo rje'i sa gzhi byang chub shing las gzhan du min/ / sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa 'byung ba yi dgas sa gzhir shing gcig las ni gzhan du min// bde gshegs dam tshig can gyi byang chub lha las gshegs nas
154b3: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor la 'jug/ sha yi dam tshig can gyi grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pas phran tshegs las la rab tu 'jug/ sangs rgyas lhas 'jug bde gshegs dam tshig can la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
154b4: ston/ / grub pa'i yi dgas 'jug pa sha yi dam tshig can gyi ma mo'i 'khor lo la ston byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi stobs bcu bskyed pa bya rgod phung po las gzhan ri la min// grub pa rnams kyi yi dgas rigs bskyed
154b5: ston pa 'jigs byed ri las ri gzhan la ma yin/ / grub pa rnams kyi dpal ldan 'bras phud chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu'i stobs mnga' sangs rgyas pa yi rgyud rnams bstan// zhing gi drag po'i dur khrod dag tu byugs/
154b6: kyi skye bo stobs can thod pa can rgyud ston// rgyal po'i rgyal srid lha khang sa stengs las 'byung ba de rjes lha yi rgyal srid do// gsal bar mgon po'i 'khor lo gzhag par gyur las thar pa rab tu 'byung bar gyur// rgyal
154b7: po srog gcod pa las dmyal bar rab tu 'jug par 'gyur gyi gzhan du sangs rgyas bka' ma yin/ / rgyal po bram ze las sogs gsod pas mtho ris 'jug gi gzhan du grub pa'i tshig ma yin// sha yi kha
154b8: zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang srid pa gzhan du lha min rigs su skye/ / sha yi kha zas longs spyod byed pas slar yang sdig gzhan lha yi rigs su 'di skye'o// mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas
155a1: slar yang bong bu nyid du rab tu 'gro/ / mgo zlum dang ni yugs sa mngon spyod byed pas slar yang srid gzhan 'jigs byed nyid du 'gro// sems can phan pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la gnod pas sdig par
155a2: bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ / sems can gnod pa byas pas bsod nams nyid la phan pas sdig par nam mkha' tsam pos ston// sangs rgyas rnams dang 'jigs byed skyes pa bud med gdengs can rnams
155a3: kyi bstan pa lha rten gang / / g.yul du zhugs pa'i stag gcig rnams kyi rta yi tshogs kyis de rnams ma lus 'jig par byed// de rnams rigs gcig gzhan gyi nor mi len cing bden dang gtsang sgra rab tu 'jug/ gzhor
155a4: gzhan gyi chung ma spong zhing dka' thub nges pa dang ldan rang gi chung ma bsten/ / khrus byas gang zhig 'dod pa'i sgra gcan mtshan mo so so'i dus su nyin gung phyed yol dang // srod dang thun gsum dag dang nyi ma re la shar bar
155a5: gyur nas lan lnga phyag byed cing / / sa stengs lha yul dag tu stag gzig mu stegs dag la mun can dbang pos gcig tu skyob// drag po'i g.yul ngor pa ltar skyob par byed cing bu dang bran bzhin 'gyur la rgyal po ni// rtsal
155a6: 'gas 'thab mo min pas gnyis skyes phyugs kyi sha yis 'jigs byed las sogs mchod nas su/ / sna tshogs sems can gnod pa byed cing gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa yis gdung rgyud 'chang ba 'byung // grub pa bya
155a7: be sman pa mi phugs zhabs dang dum bu zhes byazod pa can/ / dge slong klu srub zhes bya yon tan ma lus 'byung khungs sems can kun la phan 'dogs pa// slob dpor blo brtan zhes bya gcod byed chu yis grub
155a8: phrag bcu dang bcas pa rnams/ / gzhan yang de ltar rab tu grags kyang kyi ma de ltan yang dam par gyur pa rmongs pa yod// dge 'dun lam gyis grub par gyur pa 'phags pa lha dngal ba'i na bza' rta dbyangs pa
155b1: phyogs kyi glang po gzhan la phan pa'i bsam pa btsun pa zla ba pad ma'i myu gu zhes/ / pang go sa la rtog pa'i rgyal po ma lus nag po rgyal po in dra b+hU ti dang // de bzhin gzhan dang de rnams mthong yang mi bdag 'jig
155b2: byed sogs kyis byin gyis brlabs/ / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' mkha' tsam gdong lnga pa la yan lag drug// de yi dbyangs yig ring dang thung ba'is 'gyur gyis gzhan la dbyangs yig yon tan las sogs med//
155b3: nyi ma gang du tshangs pa'i sa bon nye bar 'jigs par 'gyur ba des na dus phyi mar// sa gzhi skyong ba mchod na 'dir ni g.yul ngor kla klo dang ni mu stegs 'jig par 'gyur// thung dang ring dang lnga rnams rang bzhin yon tan
155b4: mtshungs pa dbyangs yig yon tan las sogs min/ / a sogs ma ning stobs bcu'i gsung ste nyi ma 'thab mo zad phyir ro// ri dang thung ba mtshungs pa gang du a ko ring po phyugs bdeg tshig las 'gyur// de phyir
155b5: ma ning i ko ya Na tsa mi byed po'i phyogs nas nges par bskyod/ / thog mar lo nas nam mkha' mkha' dang gzhan yang zla ba tsin tsi yi ni dbang phyug 'byung // de yi bka' yis yi dgas dbang bsgyur dus la ka sogs grogs
155b6: ldan sgur mor byin brlabs pa/ / phyi nas sa steng son pa'i gnas dang zhing gi lha khang drug bcu rtsa brgyad kla klo yi// mgon po ma d+hu ma ti bu dang bu mo spun zla skyes pa rnams kyis 'jig par byed// der ni bcwa brgyad lo la brgya
155b7: yis brgya la bskur bsam kha las sogs 'phags pa'i yul/ / kla klo rnams dang lha gang mun can nyi mar rtogs pa gang de nga yis brlag par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs gsum tshegs skye dgu
155b8: rnams ni der bzhag nas/ / bde ba bkod de ka lA pa nas lha gnas dga' ldan mchog tu nyi ma 'gro bar bya// nam mkha' ma/ kha' dang dus dang dbang po mig gis dus kyi dus son pa yi lo yi tshad// slar yang skye bo rnams ni
156a1: kla klo 'dzag ste ji srid bcwa brkyang lo la bsgyur dang bcas pa'i bar/ / yang nas yang du nga yis rtsod pa'i dus der byung nas de rnams gzhig par bya ba nyid// ji sri sa dang chu dang me rlung nam mkha'i yon tan nam mkha' nyi zla skar
156a2: ma rnams/ / phyogs stong phyogs kyi gdon dang phyogs lho nam mkha' sa gzhir yi dgas bram ze ba glang sogs// sa 'og klu dang lha min rnams ni sa yi bdag pos zhi ba'i don du 'di rnams mchod// don kun grub
156a3: phyir rtag tu rgyal po mi dang bcas pas sangs rgyas pa dang rgyal ba rnams/ / sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang stong pa nyi mar bcas pa mchod rdzas rnams kyis mchod // slob dpon mchog la gzhol bas bsrung ba lnga po rab
156a4: tu dri zhim me tog rnams kyis mchod/ / sngon du khrus byas gos sngon snga dro gso sbyong blangs pas nyin dang mtshan du gdon// klog mkhan bzhi dang lnga pa gang zhig zhi bar byed pas nyin dang mtshan du bya bar 'gyur// slar yang de la bsrung
156a5: bar bya zhing nyi ma bcu ru zhi dang rgyas pa dag kyang bya/ / zho dang 'bras chan nyi mar rta dang glang po'i lto dang 'bras chan 'o ma zla ba la// 'bras chan la sogs mig dmar gza' lhag me tog bcud dang bcas pa 'bras chan la
156a6: 'bras chan ser po bu ram sogs kyi gtor ma lha yi bla ma'o thug sha kar gyis/ / pa wa sangs la zan dron mar nag bcas pas spen pa'i nyi ma bdun par de skyon la// nyi ma slar yang phyogs dang glang po rnams kyi gtor ma
156a7: khung ba 'bras chan gyis/ / glang po rta mchog rnams kyi zhi dang rgyas pa'i don tu sbyin bsreg la sogs gzar// 'bru dang mar sar so ma dUr pa mda' shing yam shing brgya dang 'o ma'i mchod yon btung // skyon bsreg
156a8: rjes la dud por gang ba'i zhi ba'i chu yis rta dang glang po/ khrus bya'o// yi dgas la sogs gtor na/ srin chan cha dang tshad rnams nyin mtshan swA sbyin par 'gyur// srin po la sogs yungs ka ra dang ni rdo rje phur bus phyogs
156b1: mtshams gtogs par phur bus gdab/ / slob dpon gyis ni bsrung ba lnga yi cho gas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa bsrung bar bya// gang dang gang gis yul mtha'i bar gyi skye dgu nyin dang mtshan du zhi dang rgyas
156b2: 'gyur ba/ / thog mar dbus su bsgrub bya'i ming dag rang bzhin yon tan dbang las pad ma lnga yis bskor// gang zhig rang bzhin yon tan dbang las sa dag kha sbyar zur brgyad de bzhin phyi rol du// gang zhig zung rnams
156b3: dar dbyings bcing ba phyogs dang phyogs mtshams de las rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ / rgyal chen phyogs kyi zur la ma lus yon tan rang bzhin ri yi rgyal po phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// de nang zlum pa'i snam bu
156b4: phyogs dang mtshams su de la snod dang rtse mo'i phyed du 'gyur/ / pad ma'i ge sar cha la 'dir ni dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa dang ni dung nyid do// chu skyes 'dab mar bsrung 'khor gang zhig snying po yang ni de bzhin gnyis pa
156b5: gsum par de/ / de ltar pad ma gnyis la gyur te nye ba'i snying po chu skyes 'dab ma chen por rnam gnyis der// klu rnams zung gi bar du phyogs dang mtshams kyi 'dab mar bar du de bzhin lha dang lha min dang // gnod srin
156b6: rnams dang gza' dang ma lus 'jigs pa'i ma mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnams/ / bsrung 'khor 'dis ni thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur te khrag dang 'gi wang las sogs rnams kyis bri// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang
156b7: ma lus rgyal sras rnams kyi bsrung ba lnga sogs bsrung 'khor gsung pa yin/ / bud med bu 'dod pa dang rgyal po dgra dang g.yul 'gyeng rgyal bar 'gyur// nad pa nad las grol bar 'gyur te sa yi steng du dbul po
156b8: rnams kyis nor rnyed 'gyur/ / skyes pa bud med rnams kyis 'bras bu ster 'gyur sngon gyi bsod nams mthus// bsod nams sems can rnams la phan btags dge bcu'i las kyis mchod las nam mkha
157a1: sogs las min/ / bram ze gang zhig chang 'thung 'gyur dang gcer bu pa'am ral pa can nam dbyu gu can// dge tshul dang ni tshogs dpon dge slong dge ba rnam par bral ba grub mtha'i spyod pa
157a2: mnyam/ / sum bcu'i dam tshig can gyi mi yi dbang pos de rnams yul du bskrad par bya// gang phyir de dag rnams kyis ngage dang mi dge'i las byas drug bcu'i cha shas rgyal po yin// yugs sa mo rnams gang
157a3: zhig 'khrig pa spyad nas ngan pa dmyal ba'i 'bras ster me la btso bar byed/ / gang du yul na bdud ris de med mi gdug dpung bcas der ni nam yang grub ma yin// rgyal po sa yi steng du rgyal srid dang ni dgra dag 'joms dang nor ded
157a4: bsod nams kyis/ / skal pa bzang dang tshe dang grags pa dpal ldan lha yul sa steng grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// sa stengs ma lus mi yi rgyal po sbyin las byung ba tshul khrims dang bcas lha rgyal po// bzod pas tshul khrims
157a5: skyong la nyin dang mtshan du rtsod pa las ni sbyin pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ / skyes bu bsam gtan la gnas mchog tu rang bzhin rnam par bral ba shes rab kyis thabs 'phel// shes rab thabs kyi mthu las smon lam dang yang
157a6: stobs dang stong nyid ye shes rdo rje'o/ / chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang gal te 'khor bar byon pa ma yin na// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yul dang yul can lhan cig nam mkha'i
157a7: khams rnams su/ / de ni brdzun gyi tshig la de bzhin bcom ldan rdo rje btsun mo b+ha gar bzhugs zhes pa// 'dod chags las sogs skyon spangs dri ma gsum dang rnam bral rdo rje sems dpa' las gzhan min// tshangs pa las
157a8: sogs lha rnams sa stengs dmyal ba'i dmyal ba sa 'dir zhi ba las sogs kyi/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma lus tshe yi tshad rnams rang rang grub mtha'i chos su gsal bar byas// tshangs pa las sogs bsod nams longs
157b1: spyod mthong ni lha yul sa stengs dag nas lhung bar 'gyur/ / srin pos byin brlabs rnams kyis de la thar pa 'dod pa de na nam mkha'i shing 'bras bzhin// byis pa rnams la rang rang ma yis brdzun tshig 'jam pa snyan pas bdag nyid
157b2: drung du khrid par byed/ / chang ba stong pa ston cing bdag gi lag la ril bu yod pa long zhig pu zhes brjod// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bdud kyi lag nas shin tu snyan pa'i tshig gis bdag drung khrid// nam mkha' tsam cig ston cing
157b3: bdag gi rigs kyi mya ngan 'das pa long zhig pu zhes gsung / / sems can bsam pa'i dbang las rgyal bas srin po rnams la gso sbyong gsal bar mdzad// de rnams de yis sangs rgyas nyid na thub pa'i bka' yi gsang
157b4: sngags theg pa bden ma yin/ / gang zhig bskal pa dpag med byams dang dge bcu'i lam dang sbyin dang tshul khrims rab rdzogs pas// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' stobs bcu ldan pas sangs rgyas byang chub
157b5: lung bstan to/ / mo bsham bu ni lus med ma lus yon tan rang bzhin gang zhig rdul phran 'dus pa rnams// srog ni nam mkha'i me tog min te gong du rags pa'i lus la zhugs nas klog cing dgod// srog chags bya rog
157b6: rwa min bsod nams sdig pa'i dbang gis gang zhig 'gro ba rnams su 'khor/ / srog chags gang zhig rdul phran phung po'i lus ni sa stengs 'chi ba'i tshe mi ltung // rgyud kyi rgyal por stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pas sangs
157b7: rgyas pa yi gang zhig lam bstan pa/ / rgyal ba stobs bcu ldan dang ston pa'i sras dang sangs rgyas pa yi lha klu lha min dang // khro bo srin po sha yi dam tshig can dang stag gzig rnams dang mu stegs spyod pa rnams// de kuH
157b8: b+ha la zhes bya ba rgyal mchog bzhugs gnas der ni nyi ma bdag gis bton/ / dpal ldan 'bras phung chos kyi dbyings su stobs bcu mnga' bas gang zhig bdud rnams btul mdzad pa// de kun sha b+ha la yi dpal ldan
158a1: ka lA pa yi bskyed mos tshal gyi dus 'khor gyi/ / don chen gser gyi khang pa'i sgo yi phyi rol thub pa nyi ma'i shing rtas dris// dpal ldan 'jam dbyangs rin chen seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa stobs bcu mnga'
158a2: ba'i mdzad spyod gsungs/ / / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i chung phyi ma chud kyi snying po rdzogs so// / shAkya'i dge slong d+har ma grags kyis bsgyur ba'o// / ye d+harma he tu pra b+ha bA he shu d+heSh+ThanA thA ga to h+ya daH/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni
158a3: d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/ / / rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra gar+b+ha nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi snying po// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad mkhyen pa
158a4: ye shes sku/ / nyin mor byed pa'i 'od lta bu// pad ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i spyan// sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs// lha yi mchog gis phyag byas pa// spyi bos gtugs de phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal po zla ba bzang pos zhusaH
158a5: yan lag pad ma sbyar ba ni/ / yan lag mchog la bzhag byas te// dus kyi 'khor lo'i sbyor ba ni// rtsod pa dag gi dus kyi ni// mi rnams grol ba'i rgyu ru'o// so sor sdud pa rnam pa bcu// rgyal ba yi ni dbang por 'gyur//
158a6: de bzhin bsam gtan mi bskyod pa// srog dang rtsol ba ral gri can// srang la yang ni rnam po bcu// gzung ba rin chen phyag rgya can// g.yung mo rjes su dran pa ni// pad ma 'dzin pa ru ni 'gyur// dpal gyi ting 'dzin 'khor lo can
158a7: re re yang ni lnga ru dbye/ / slar la yang ni gang dbye ba// a las sogs dang ka las sogs// so sor sdud pa yul dang ni// yul can rnam pa bcu po rnams// lus la 'jug pa med pa'o// shes rab rtog dang dpyod pa'o//
158a8: dga' ba mi g.yo bde ba dang // bsam gtan sems ni rtse gcig pa'o// srog dang rtsol ba gnyis kyi lam// mi 'khrug pa ru 'gyur ba ni// dbus mar srog ni 'jug pa'o// thig le ru ni srog 'jug cing // gnyis ka 'gro dang 'o/
158b1: ba dag/ gzung ba yid ni sems gcig pa// gtum mo yini sdang ba gang // lus la nges par gsal 'gyur ba// nam mkha' de ni rjes ngan 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyi// lhan cig gis pa'i bden dbang
158b2: gis/ ye shes su ni ting 'dzin te// 'di ni chu sogs dbye ba yis// gsum du yang ni 'gyur ba yin// sna tshogs bdag po'i sgrub thabs so// phyag rgya gsum dang tshad ni gsum// rnam pa gsum gyi sra dbang gis// las
158b3: ngang kun rtog bzang po yi/ / so sor sdud pa rnal 'byor pa// yul du rnam par bral ba dang // sngags kun gyis ni byin gyis brlabs// bsam gtan sbyor bdag pa yis// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// srog dang rdza
158b4: ba raka pas ni/ / zla ba nyi ma dag pas bral// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mchod// gzung ba yi ni stobs kyi ni// nyon mongs las sogs bdud 'joms shing // stobs bcu la ni 'jug par 'gyur// dri med 'od 'phro/
158b5: dkyil 'khor te// gzhan yang ye shes sku las so// de phyir dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// nyi ma cung zad tsam gyis ni// ye shes sku ni 'grub par 'gyur// so sor sdud las sogs pa yis// gal te gzir bar de 'gyur na// sngag/
158b6: pa rnams kyis 'dod mi 'grub// sgal goms pa yan lag ma'i// pang mor rdo rje nor bu yi// thig le bsgrub par song bar bya// bsnyen pa dang po sbyor ba ni// nam mkha' du ni rnam pa bcu// 'khor lo can ni khrol/ ba'o// 9
158b7: ni mtha dbyed kyi lta ba/ / bdud rtsi lam du song ba yang // nye ba'i bsnyen pa yan lag drug/ shes rab las 'phros gathig le// gzhan yang rdo rjenar bus// yi ge gsum ni bsgrub par 'gyur// bde ba ma nyams gcig gig//
158b8: lhan cig skyes pa ru ni 'gyur// sgrub chen ye shes sbyor ba'o// srog dang rtsol ba kun nas ni// mgo bo 'bar ni phan pa ste// mnyam pa'i bde ba 'bras ster ba// de las steng ni mi phan pa// 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'o// sem
159a1: can nges par klog pa'i rgyu/ / gtsug tor sgron bu gnas su// mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang du// 'di ni sbyar bar bya ba nyid// phung po mang po'i rnal 'byor pa// mnyam pa'i bde ba la bzhugs mong // 'on kyang
159a2: 'jig rten grags pa med/ / dbus su srog dang 'jug pa ni// yul dang rnam par bral ba nyid// sna tshogs yul gyis 'khyud pa'o// pad mar 'jug pa'i rang rdo rje// spro ba yang ni de bzhin te// rdo rje dbus su gzhag
159a3: par bya/ / sa bon ma lhung ba bde ba// shin du chags pa'i chags par song // rnal 'byor pa yi 'byor pa nyid// mchog tu yang ni khyab pa'i bdag/ dpal ni gsang bas gsang ba'o// gtsug tor du ni rtsa lnga pa'o// rdo rje yi
159a4: ni 'gyur ba yin/ / phyi yi rtse mo nyis 'gyur du// 'gyur ba chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de ni gnyis su 'dres pa dang // de ni gzhan yang nyis 'gyur ro// de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur// lhan cig skyes dang longs spyod rdzogs// /
159a5: sprul pa yi ni 'khor lor ro// de yi nang du rtse gcig go// mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba// gsang ba'i pad ma'i nang gsang ba'o// rnal 'byor pa dang srog gcod pa// nyin dang mtshan du phye ba ni// de ni srog 'jig pa ru gsungs//
159a6: sde gang ba dang bral ba ni// snying la yod par rab 'gyur ba// de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid// kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar// 'dzin par yang ni dbye ba gang // rnal 'byor pa la de gsungs so// bde ba'i thig le ma lhung ba// gzhan gyi
159a7: bud med du ni 'gyur/ / sten pa chags bral min pa'o// srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni// ri bong can la zhu ba yi// btung ba can gyi btung ba'o// mthe bo'i tshigs nas gtsug tor du// chos kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ri/
159a8: mthar thug par rang gi sems// gtsug tor gnas nas mthe bo ru// yang ni 'dir ni 'gro 'gyur te// nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug par// rnal 'byor ma spyod pa des ni// nyi ma re ra'i dus su ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu
159b1: ster/ spyong dang 'dod pas lus chan// mchog gi kha yi pad ma las// tshig mi 'byung dang gnyid log dang // 'gul dang nab lkug pa dang // yid ni 'khrug dang brgyal ba ni// du ba las sogs rdo rje can// de rnams gsal
159b2: rnam pa bcu/ / srog can lus kyi gnas skabs so// 'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skabs ni// nges pa kho nas gsal ba las// su zhig rgyal ba bu 'dzing ba// thig le dkar po'i thun ni gang // nyin dang mtshan mor lhung ba ni/
159b3: mA ma kI ni de chang ngo // go ku las sogs mig las sogs// nyi ma re re bzhin spo bas// sha gzhan res 'ga' yang ma yin// bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni// rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba// lha rnams dag pa'i lus
159b4: las so/ / stong pa'i sems de rtsod pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde bas// de ni skye gnas 'khrigs pa med// nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang // bud med sbyor la yid kyis ni// mi 'jig pa ni tshul khrims so// bzod pa sgra
159b5: sogs mi 'jug pa/ / gnyi gar 'gro ba'i le lo na// rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so// bsam gtan shes rab sems dang ni// bide ba lhan cig bar song ba// ku ni 'gro thams cad brjod pa'o// sems can don du de rdzu 'phrul/
159b6: sring bdon ni med byed pa// thob pa gzhan ni bzhi pa'o// lus gcig la ni dus ldan pa// cha dku dang ri lhan cig pa// nyi shurtsa lnga bdag nyid sogs// bsam gtan phyag rgya'i gnyis dngag nyid// cung zad tsam gyi nyi ma yis//
159b7: dngos grub yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// zhi ba dbang dang rengs pa dang // srid pa 'jig par byed pa ni// zhal gyi dbye bas bye ba nyid// 'byung ba rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gnas// lha min lag 'gro dag gi rigs// 'di bsgoms
159b8: nas ni bsgrub par bya/ / // dpal dam pa dang po'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu gnyis pa las gsungs pa dpal dus kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba las thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa// sbyor ba yan lag drug pa'i
160a1: thabs bkol ba'i dum bu'o/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI b+ha dra bo d+ha'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsAb kyi dze ban d+he zla ba'i zer gyis 'bro dge slong gi phyir bsgyur cing sa te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgyu
160a2: gar skad du/ she ka br-i kri ya/ bod skad du/ dbang gi rab tu byed pa/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa sprin ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo// phab pa btang ba'i phyi nas mgo bo dang ni snying kha spyi gtsug rnams dang lte ba mgrin
160a3: pa dang / / gsang ba rnams su bsrung ba rgyal ba rnams kyis rang gi rigs gyur rnams la rang gi rdor gsum gyis// slob ma rnams kyi lus la gos ser skon zhing mig rnams bkab nas dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya/
160a4: kun rdzob don du rab mchog lam nas gshegs nyid rnams la brtul zhugs rnams ni sbyin bya rtag pa ru// gsang dang mi bden pa dang gzhan gyi bud med rnam sbas de bzhin gzhan nor chang 'thung dag kyang ste// 'khor ba'i rdo rje zhags
160a5: pa rang gi dge ba 'joms par byed pa sdig pa lnga po 'di nyid rnams/ / gang zhig gang gi dus su byung ba'i lha dang mi yi bla ma de yi ming gis rab tu sbyin byas pa'i// sna tshogs gtso bo'i bka' stsal 'di yis srid pa'i 'jigs pa
160a6: 'joms pas khyed rnams kyis kyang sbyang bar gyis/ / rgyan 'gyed kha na ma tho bcas pa'i zas dang tshig ngan klog dang 'byung po lha min chos rnams dang // ba la dbyis pa bud med skyes pa rnams dang lha dang mi rnams bla ma lnga ni gas
160a7: mi bya/ / grogs dang rje bo dang ni lha mi bla ma dge 'dun dbugs 'byin rnams la 'khu ba dang // dbang po rnams kyis yongs su chags rnams min te srid pa'i bdag po'i brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// dpal ldan sngags kyis
160a8: mngon par bsngags pa lag pa'i pad ma kha sbyar du ni me tog gcig byin te/ / dang por lan gsum bskor te lag pa'i pad mkha sbyar gnas pa'i me tog dkyil 'khor du ni do// gnas grur gang du me tog bzang po lhung ba de nyid de yi
160b1: rigs su nges so mi bdag kye/ / phyi nas dbang bdun rnams dang rnam gsum 'dir ni ji lta ba bzhin bla med yang dag rab tu sbyin// klu rnams kyis sam bzhis te rgyal ba rnam rgyal bcas pa'i bum pa nor bu gser gyi bum pa 'am//
160b2: sa las byung ba rnams su rin chen sman ldan dang ni dri ldan rnams kyis lha mo rnams kyis khrus bya'o// sangs rgyas rab dupo rnams kyis dbu rgyan sbyin te mchog gi bla mas nus ma rnams kyis dar dbyangs nyid// rdo rje dril bus nyi ma
160b3: zla ba nyid te brtul zhugs kyis kyang yul dang dbang po sbyang bar bya/ / ming gis khro bo rnams dang byams sogs dang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rjes gnang phyi mor bcas pa sbyin// rdo rje dang ni dril bu rab tu byin nas mchog gi snying rjes dag
160b4: pa'i chos rnams bstan par bya/ / rdo rje'i rigs su nges pa srog gcod pa dang ral grir mi bden pa yi ngag brjod bya ba dang // rin chen du ni gzhan nor 'phrog dang mchog gi pad ma'i rigs nyid du yang gzhan gyi bud med 'phrog/ 'khor/
160b5: lor chad dang mar me sangs rgyas rnams dang yul rnams mtha' dag shin tu bsten par bya ba la// gri gug du ni gdol ba mo la sogs pa bud med mtha' dag mkha' yi pad ma smad mi bya// sems can rnams kyi don du nor dang lus
160b6: bcas sbyin bya 'di ni khyod kyis bsrung bar bya ba min/ / rigs kyi bu rnams gzhan du bskal pa grangs med pas kyang sangs rgyas min par rgyal bas gsungs par nges// chu yis sgrol ma la sogs lha mo rnams dang dbu rgyan rgyal
160b7: ba rnams te der dbyangs nus ma rnams/ / rdo rje dril bum nyi zla dag dang brtul zhugs yul sogs rnams dang ming gis byams pa sbyong // rjes gnang rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpal ldan srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dus
160b8: kyi 'khor lo rjes khyab pa/ / de ltar dbang bdun rnams kyis sdig pa'i dri mi 'joms pas dkyil 'khor nyid du yang dag rab tu sbyin// dbang bdun rnams kyis dbang rnams bskur na dge ba'i dbang gis sa bdun dbang phyug
161a1: nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ / phyis ni phyir mi ldog la sogs pa nges par rab tu 'jug pa bum pa dang ni gsang ba'i dbang // shes rab ye shes dbang rnams bskur bas srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa'i 'jam dbyangs
161a2: nyid du 'gyur ba'o/ / 'gro ba g.yo sgra'i dbang gis rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na 'di nyid la yang dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal 'gyur// rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dbang bdun la gnas yon tan can gyis bzlas pas rnam par dag par 'gyur//
161a3: gal te bum pa dang ni gsang bang brtul zhugs nges pa'i dbang ste gong mar dag pa yod ma yin// gang zhig la ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na dag par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug bya// rjes gnang thob nas phyi nas tsheg
161a4: kyi rigs su 'gro na rgan pa zhes pa las ni gzhon pa'o/ / rtsa ba'i ltung ba bu rnams kyis te dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung ba ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur// de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan te de bzhin du ni spun la khro ba
161a5: gsum par nges par 'gyur/ / byams pa spangs pa bzhi par 'gyur te gzhan yang byang chub sems nyid rab tu spangs pa las ni mda'// grub mtha' smod pa drug pa nyid de gzhan yang ma smin skye bo rnams la gsang ba byin
161a6: ba naM/ phung po nyon mongs pa las klu ru 'gyur te gzhan yang dag pa'i chos lam dang dgu pa'o// sku yi byams pa phyogs te ming sogs bral ba bde ba ster la rtog pa gang yin drag po'o// dag pa'i sems can rnams la ra /
161a7: kuklon brjod nyi mar 'gyur te dam tshig rnying pa spangs na gzhan// bud med thams cad la spong nges par mi nur 'gyur te rdo rje theg pa la gnas rnams kyi'o// phyogs kyi lo ni gcig nas rnam pa bdu yi bar du lta dang reg par bya ba yin
161a8: ste/ / de nas 'khrud bya rnams ni rgya mtsho rnams dang ro bcas bsten par bya ba g.yo ba la sogs pa// nyi shu'i lo yi 'og ma'i phyag rgya rnams ni mchog tu 'jigs byed khro bo 'apung po lha mi ni rigs// dbang gi don du drug dang
161b1: gsum gyis bde mnyam 'bras ster ba dang gzhan ni bsgom pa'i don du'o/ / gang zhig dang por yang ni dpal ldan shes rab nu mar reg pa de nyid bum pa'i dbang du brjod// ri bong 'dzin pa myangs dang gsang ba mthong bar bya/
161b2: pas gsang ba'i dbang du rab tu 'gyur ba'o// mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs kyis yan lag kha rnams spang bar bya ste shes rab ye shes dbang sbyin bya// rgyal ba dbang por byas te slob ma'i don du phyag rgya sbyin dang gzhan yad
161b3: bla ma la yang 'dir/ / rgyan rnams thams cad ldan pa'i gser zhun dang ni mtshungs pa'i lo nyid bcu gnyis ma ste bu mo mdzes// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid ldan pas rang gi rdo rje nor bus spyad pa nyid ni chags bcas la/
161b4: slob ma dag pa shes nas rdo rje sa bon bcas pa khar ni yang dag gzhug par bya ba nyid// phyis ni rang gi phyag rgya bu la byin nas de nas gzhan yang du ba'i lam la sogs ldan yang // skrag dang 'khrul ba'i sems dang g.yo dang
161b5: gzhan gyi dbang du 'gro ba dang ni nad ldan bu btsas dang / / khro ldan khengs shing 'dod la chags dang brdzun dang rtsod pa la dga' yan lag nyams dang ma dag pa// de lta bu rnams shes rab ye shes dbang du shin du 'bad de bla mas
161b6: spang bya mi dbang po/ / sngar gsungs sangs rgyas bla ma dag la gus lngadang ma tshig 'dzin la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par bya// 'gro ba rnams kyi rang gi yid nyid 'dod chags kyis ni 'khrugs par byed dang gang bar 'gyur ba nyid//
161b7: yan lag mchog la gang ba las ni 'bar bas ri bong 'dzin pa zhu nas yang dag 'dzag pa nyid// oT dgug par rab tu byas pas mchog gi bde ba ster ba thig le thar pa gsum gyi mthar// snang reg 'dus dang 'gyur
161b8: dang bde ba rnams te dga' ba'i dbye ba la sogs pa yis de ltar ro/ / dang por yang ni mi rnams kun gyis mig gis bltas pa 'di yis 'dod chags 'khrugs pa dga' ba ste/ phyi nas gang ba rang gi lus la rab tu
162a1: 'dus pa mchog tu dga' ba nyid du 'byungs klo rabatu 'dra ba yA dag rolal rdo rje las ni par mar thig le 'dzag par dga' ba'o/ / on+d+ra rdo rje las ni thig le gsum gyi mtha' ru bde ba 'gyur byed lhan cig skyes dga' 'o// 'dod dang dga'
162a2: dang / g.yo ba dang ni mi 'gyur ba ste bzhi rnams kyis ni de yi spor ba gcig/ gang banus pa dang ni skye ba nges par yin te mchog tu dga' ba nyid rnams gnyis pa'o// 'bar ba dang ni thig le dag dang yurab dang ste khyad par dka' ba nyid rnams gsu
162a3: pa'o/ / oN+Da dang ni sgra tsam nyid de gnyid dang lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba nyid rnams bzhi pa'o// sems kyis bsam par bya ba ma ste reg par bya zhing 'khrud pa yis ni srid mor 'gyur ba'o// rdo rje rab tu zhugs pa bu mor brjod te byed bcas
162a4: shin du bde ba de bzhin tsha mo'o/ / thig le lhung ba chung mar 'gyur te chags bral gzhan gyi rigs su gyur pa'i rnal 'byor ma nyid do// de ltar rnal 'byor phyag rgya drug ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' chad pa'i dngos// rku
162a5: skyes su ni rdo rje rab zhugs pa dang mer ni rlung dang thig le ma lhung rim pa ste/ / de ltar rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab tu gsal bar nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phyag rgya'o// chags dang chags bral mtha' dang sngon du bde ba dam pa'i
162a6: gter ni sbyor bas go cha bzhi pa'o/ / phyag rgya rnams la yum gyi mchog gur rnam pa bcu po de ni dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal 'di'o// rnam pa bdun dang rnam pa gsum ste bcu po 'di ni 'jig rten kun rdzob kyi dbang ste// de ltar de bzhin yang
162a7: bzhi pa zhes gsungs pas so/ / bzhi pa ni gsum pa shes rab ye shes ma yin te/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang bzhi pa zhes pa'i phyir dang de bzhin yang zhes gsungs pas so// 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
162a8: pa/ gang zhig shes rab kyi ni nu mar reg pa nyid dang gzhan yang bdud rtsi myong dang 'khyud pa'o// shes rab dang ni 'dus pas byang chub sems nyid zhu ba skad cig ma bzhir bdud rtsir gyur pa gang // de rnams thams cad 'jig rten pa yi
162b1: lam gyi rgyu ru snying rje mchog gis nges par bstan pa'o/ / gang zhig 'jig rten las 'das dbang ni rgyal ba'i bdag po dam pa'i phyag rgya bzang dang rjes 'dus pa// las kyi phyag rgya dri ma dang bcas sems g.yeng byed te ye shes phyag
162b2: rgya rnam par rtog yin pas/ / yang dag spangs te rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur ni rgyal mchog skyed byed phyag rgya bzang po bsgom pa ni// gos pa med cing mi 'gyur mun 'joms kun la khyab pa mkha' mtshungs rnal 'byor ma yi go bya ga
162b3: lus la gnas pa'i ye shes gzi brjid srid pa'i dri ma 'joms pa dus kyi 'khor los rjes khyab pas/ / sems kyi sdang ba tsam ste rang gi yid las skyes pa me long gi ni gzugs brnyad lta bur nges// ma lus rgyal sras rnams dang
162b4: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsten pa rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsten byis na/ / ye shes snang ba de nyid rab tu shar bas bdud dpung yul dang bcas pa mtha' dag bsregs pa dang //
162b5: chags pa la sogs rnams kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams lus la lo gcig sbyor bas bde mnyam ster bar byed// shes rab ye shes zhes pa sems kyi snang ba nyid de de yang rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur ba'o// dbang 'dir zhugs pa gang zhig/
162b6: dri ma med pa'i ri bong can mtshungs me long gzugs brnyan lta bur nges// de nas bde ba 'dzag pa med pa lhan cig skyes pa 'gyur med bzhi pa mya ngan 'das par reg/ des na sangs rgyas zhal ni gang gi thugs dang zhal la gnas pa de
162b7: nyid dpal ldan bla ma'o/ / nam mkhar chags pa'i sems kyis mig mi 'dzums pa dang ni rdo rje'i lam du rab tu zhugs rnams kyis// stong pa las ni du ba smig rku rab tu gsal ba dri med srin bu me khyer mar me dang // 'bar dang nyi ma
162b8: zla ba rdo rje rnams kyang gzhan yang mchog gi cha dang thig le nyid rnams so/ / de yi dbus su sangs rgyas sku ni yul dang rnam par bral ba longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o// chu 'dzin bral ba'i mkha' la snang ba rnal 'byor rtse gcig
163a1: gnas pa'i lta bas lta bar bya ba ni/ / ji srid nges par ri mo nag po dri med 'od zer 'phro ba mthong ba rus kyi rtsa yis sa// dar ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sku ni chu nang nyi ma bzhin du rnyog pa med pa sna tshogs mdog/ yul
163a2: rang rnam par bral ba'i rnam pa'i rnam pa ma lus rang gi sems te gzhan gyi sems nyid ma yin no/ / sru mthong gur nas nyin zhag so so'i dus su srog gi rung zhing rab tu dgag par byas pa dang // brgal zhags can rnams la
163a3: gyi sems ni zla ba drug gis reg bya bral nas bde mnyam 'gyur ba'o/ / ji srid nges par rang gi lus la 'od zer 'khor los yongs su 'khor bar byed pa mthong ba'i bar// chags dang chags bral mtha' dang dang por song ba'i skad
163a4: cig ma nas khyab bdag dbugs kyi grangs 'phel lo/ / mtha' dang 'bar ba'i dbus kyang khyad par dang ni lhan cig skyes dang ye shes dang ni rnam shes dang // gnyid dang rgyal ba'i dbus su gnas pa'i rdo rje pard ma dag gis gnyis spong bde
163a5: ba gang yin pa/ / de yis 'phel bar rab tu bya ba bla ma'i nges pa'i stobs kyis 'di nyid 'phel bar the tshom med// bdud dang nyon mongs 'joms shing rgyal ba'i bdag po la gnas rnal 'byor pa yis lo gcig stong ba yis//
163a6: yi rnam par snang yang sra ba min dang chu yi gzugs su snang yang cha min gsher ba med pa'i phyir// me yi rnam par snang yang me min rlung gi gzugs su snang yang g.yo ba med pas rlung ma yin// stong pa'i rnam pa yin yang
163a7: mthong ste dkar dang sngo ba la sogs mthong yang sna tshogs kha dog min/ / rnam pa kun ldan yin yang mi mthong rang sems dri ma nyon mongs dang ni bdud kyi mthu stobs kyis// skra tsam thig le cha dang ye shes rnams ni bad
163a8: gnas su 'gro dang lcags sgrog bcings pa'i rtsa/ / srog dang thur sel lam gsum rnams nas rdo rje pad mar bcas dang pad ma rdo rje ldan pa yis// dngos su rung dag 'gro dang 'jug pa yang dag 'dus pa yul can
163b1: par 'gyur ba dang / / du ba la sogs mtshan ma rnams ni gang zhig gzungs dang 'di rnams 'dzin pa thams cad gsang ba chen po'o// dbus su srog gzhug pa ni nyi ma dang bcas zla bar gyur ba g.yas dang g.yon pa
163b2: bcing ba dang / / phyag rgya dang ni sbyor ba'i sems kyis mchog tu bde gyur pa dang rdo rje yang dag sang ba dang // bde ba dam pa'i don du pad mar rdo rje bskyod dam rang gi lag pa'i pad mas gsor ba yis// sa bon ma bta
163b3: bde ba de ni 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nyid do/ / sa ni chu la 'jug 'gyur chu yang me la de bzhin me ni rlung la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o// rlung ni stong pa la ste stong pa mtshan ma rnam pa bcur 'gyur
163b4: mtshan ma rnam pa kun ldan du/ / rnam pa kun ldan mi 'gyur bde ba dam pa gzhom du med pa ye shes skuraru 'gyur ba'o// mi yi bdag po ye shes las ni rdzu 'phrul dngos grub 'gyur ro skyes bu rnams kyi skye ba 'dir// 'dod
163b5: pas sprul pa'i ska ru nges par 'gyur te gang ba rdzogs pa gsung du rab tu 'gyur ba'o/ / 'bar ba sprul po'i thags te oMH las ni mchog tu bde bar mdzad pa'i ye shes zhes su brjod// dga' ba longs spyor rdzogs pa'i sku
163b6: ste mchog dga' khyad par dga' dang bcas pa dag gi rim pa yis/ / gsung dang thugs te lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba sogs las ye shes rdo rje la sogs 'byung bar byed// g.yo ba nges par ches kyi sku ste srid gsum
