163b7: phyag byas pa dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba de yi gsung / / gnyid ni nges par chos kyi thugs te tu ra da yi ye shes nyid yin srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms// yi ge nges par dag pa'i sku ste dbyangs dang bral ba'i cha dang thig le
163b8: skra tsam rim pa yis/ / gzung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje srid pa rnams gsum la gnas dag pa'i skur sbed par byed// sa dang rmi lam dang bzhin dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gnyid log pa dang tra u0f7f'i rang
164a1: bzhin rnams/ / lus gnas pa dang dbugs nyid thim pa rnam par chu dang yal las bskyod pa med pa'i sems thim pa// ye shes gnas kyang bud med dang ni rab 'dus pa las byang chub sems su
164a2: gyur pa'i skad cig ni/ / sprul pa la sogs rim pas thugs kyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi ru nges par rab tu 'gyur ba yi// de ltar sems ni rnam pa bzhi rnams srid pa rnam gsum gyur pa'i srog chags rnams kyi thig le'i
164a3: dbus/ / khyab byed pade mnyam 'bras ster thar pa'i rgyu ru rnal 'byor dbang po rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba ni// rnal 'byor rnams la mchog gi bde ba bskyed par sa bon thig le btang na thar pa ga la 'gyur// de phyir
164a4: 'khor ba'i bde ba skad cig ma 'di brtul zhugs can rnams kyis ni rgyun du spang bar bya/ / dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshigs su bcad pa sum bcu lhag pa'i stong phrag gcig pa las mdor bsdus pa dbang rab tu byed pa
164a5: rdzog s+ho/ / // rgya gar gyi baN Di ta mkhas pa chen po sa man ta shrI dang / lo tsha ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI sarba bud d+ha sa maM yo ga DA ki nI dzA la sa
164a6: ba ra nA ma ud ta ra ta na tra/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog ces bya ba'i rgyud bla ma/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dpa'
164a7: sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rang thung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu rab tu che ba'i lha// sangs rgyas pas
164a8: cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ chags med chags dang bral ba min// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs so// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rtsa// 'di ni gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni tham
164b1: cad pas/ / bud med sgyu ma khyad par che// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag gis// rang bzhin gyis ni 'di 'grub pa'o// 'jig rten gsum 'dir bud med 'dis// gus par byed pa dag tu 'gyur// rnyed dang bde dang dga' kun gyis// ngan
164b2: par spyod pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur/ / rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur na// bud med kun gyi sgyu mas 'grub// ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// mkha' 'gro ma zhes brdar bstan to// DA ni nam mkhar 'gro ba zhes// khams las
164b3: mngon du brtags pa ste/ / nam mkha' kun du spyong 'grub po// mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// thams cad ma lus bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/
164b4: mkha' 'gro ma zhes rab tu grags/ de ni nam mkha' 'gro ba zhes// sangs rgyas khams las rnam par brtags// kun du 'gro bar grub pa ni// sangs rgyas kun dag mkha' 'gro ma'o// sham zhes bya ba bde bar bshad// sangs/
164b5: rgyas kun gyi bde chen yin// sgyu ma thams cad rab sbyor ba// mchog tu bde bas bde ba'i mchog/ kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi
164b6: dngos por bdag gyur to/ / sems dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// de bzhin bdud dang bdud las rgyal// de ni byang chub sangs rgyas yin// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang // de bzhin pa dam
164b7: pang mo'ichang / nor bu nor bu 'dzin nyid dang // / de dag gi yang rigs yin no// de nyid 'dod chags 'dod chags bral// 'dod pa dang ni grol ba'ang yin// dus gsum srid gsum mchog gsum dang // 'jig rten
164b8: gsum dang khams gsum dang / rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa'i// gnas pa thams cad de nyid do// 'gro ba dag ni ma lus kun/ thams cad du ni 'di 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mim
165a1: pa/ nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dngos po thams cad de yin te// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ mkha'
165a2: 'gro sgyum bde mchog go/ / bskal pa bye ba grangs med par// sangs rgyas thams cad ma thob pa// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang dag gis// tshe 'di nyid kyis thob 'gyur la// de nyid bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas kun bdag
165a3: be ba'i mchog/ bdag nyid shin du bsgrubs pa las// sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog go// rnal 'byor yang dag ma yi nas pas / sprul dmigs par byed pa dag/ rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te// lugs ma la
165a4: sogs rnal 'byor skye/ / yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor pa// lha la dmigs par byed pa dag/ rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor ba// mi 'gyur dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan lugs la sogs pa la// rnal 'byor skye
165a5: par mi 'gyur gyi/ / byang chub sems la rab brtson na// de las rnal 'byor lhar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// de bas thams cad bdag sbyor bas// sangs rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur//
165a6: bdag nyid sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo thams cad bdag yin no// de bas bdag nyid lngar sbyor bas// bdag nyid rab tu bsgrub par bya// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // dpa' bo rnams kyang thams cad dang // rdo rje
165a7: 'dzin pa thams cad du/ / tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog las de kho
165a8: de nyid sdang ba dam pa'i yul la 'jug pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya brtag pa ste dang po'o/ / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad ma nyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro/
165b1: ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag sbyor bas// dbab pa thams cad rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// bde bas bde ba nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas bde ba kur 'thob
165b2: po/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde chen po// 'di la khrus dang bsdam mi dgos// dka' thub dka' ba spyad mi dgos// dka' thub sdom pa med pa dang // bde ba dang ni dga' bas 'grub//
165b3: de bas ji ltar 'dod spyod cing // kun za de bzhin thams cad spyod// spyad pa ji ltar 'dod par byed// g.yo ba dag kyang ci dgar byed// langs pa dang ni 'dug pa'am// 'chag gam ji ltar gnas kyang rung // rgod dam rab tu
165b4: sgra yang rung / / gang na ji ltar spyod kyang rung // dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs pa 'am// sgrib pa kun dang ldan pa'ang rung // rang gi lhar ni bdag sbyor na// bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur/
165b5: de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad sgrub par byed pa na// ngan zos ngan spyod thams cad kyis// nyes pa dag tu yod mi 'gyur// bskal pa bye bar mi 'thob pa// sangs rgyas dam pa thams cad do// phyag rgya'i cho ga gang
165b6: ngag gis/ / bsgrubs na kun du 'thob 'gyur ba// bdag nyid grub par byed pa'i mchog/ 'di ni bdag gis brtag par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje sems
165b7: dpar bdag sbyar ba/ / cha lugs ji bzhin bsgyur ba yis// thams cad sna tshogs phyag rgya'i bdag/ bsod nams chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// rgya 'di bsgrub pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis rlob// shin
165b8: ru byin gyis brlabs na ni/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad
166a1: 'grub par 'gyur/ / gang gis ldan pa di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun du mchod byed na// de yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // mthong zhing mchod pa byas par 'gyur// 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// ma#
166a2: kha dang ni reg pa yis/ / dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs pa'ang // bden pa dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur// mthong ba dang ni reg pa dang // thos pa dang ni dran pa yis// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas dngos
166a3: grub thams cad 'grub/ / 'di dang sangs rgyas thams cad la// rnal 'byor thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// bud med dag kyang rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas byang chub reg par 'gyur// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag
166a4: nyid rnam pa thams cad du/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dngos grub par// de yis bdag nyid mthong bar 'gyur// 'di ni bdag nyid kun gnas pas// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs dag
166a5: gis/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor mchod dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// bde ba'i mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun la
166a6: nyer skor bas/ / dpal ni bzhir 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor kun ni bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// de yi nye bar sbyor ba ni// khams gsum ma lus thams cad do// rnal 'byor kun
166a7: kyi longs spyod kyis/ / ji ltar bde bar sten byed cing // rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// bdag nyid rab tu mchod par bya// rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed mi/ rnal 'byor kun gyi bde ba dag bdag nyid kun du lung byed na// shin
166a8: du sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// ra sa yan bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal tshe dang // lang tshond med pade mchog 'grub// kun du kun nas thams cad du// sangs rgyas tha
166b1: cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ rtag tu de ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje semra dpa' ma de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor bamatha'a'
166b2: skam bde ba'i'amachog las dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun du sbyor bas brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o/ / // 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thas cad mnya
166b3: sbyor ba'i/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor pa// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig bde// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa'
166b4: sbyor ba yi/ / mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// phyag rgya bde ba chen po kun// so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor bde ba myos pa kun// so so
166b5: rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' spor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// bde ba'i myos pa'i dngos grub kun// so so'i rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu
166b6: nyid kyis ni thams cad du/ / bde ba myos pa'i dbang phyug kun// so so rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yi// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' yas pa'i// bud med
166b7: mchog rnams skye bar 'gyur/ / de yi dam tshig de byung ba// sdug pa'i dam tshig bdag rjes 'brang // shin du stong dang sprod chen po// thams cad bdag nyid dam tshig mchog/ gcig bzhin du ni gcig spyod pa// lhan cig
166b8: spyod pa rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam spor ba// mkha' 'gro sgrul mchog tu 'bar// thams cad dga' ba ma lus pa'i// phyag rgya thams cad bde ba che// rtag pa dam pa lha mo yi// rgyal mos mchod pa tha
167a1: cad mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba dang // thams cad lha mo 'dus pas ni// ma lus skal pa bzang po kun// bde bas so so rjes su 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa las// rdo rje sems dpa' che ba'i
167a2: lha/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'o// lha mo bde ba chen po kun// thams cad rnal 'byor bde bas myos// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phan tshun du ni rab dga' bas// skyes bu'i tshul gyis dga' bar
167a3: byed/ / dbang po kun nas byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen thams cad kyi// bkod pa rab 'byam tshogs rnams kyis// thams cad bdag nyid mchod par byed// rnal 'byor bde bathams cad kyi// dbang bskur bde chen las byung ba//
167a4: rin chen tshogs rnams thams cad kyis// rab tu rmongs pas dbang bskur 'gyur// lha mo kun gyi longs spyod la// ci bde bar ni bsten bya ba// bdag ni che ba'i lhar sbyor bas// bdag la bdag gis rab tu mchod// rnal
167a5: 'byor thams cad bde ba yi/ / rjes su sbyor bas mchod byed cing // zag tu myang bar byed pa na// shin du sbyor bas rab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi// ras yan bde ba des// rdo rje sems dpa'i dpal
167a6: dang / / lang tshe rad med bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung snyan pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal chen po//
167a7: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug kun gyi gtso// rin chen dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ de dag dang ni dga' spyod na// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo thams cad grub chen po// 'khor los
167a8: sbyar ba rab tu 'grub/ / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// de las rgya chen mchog gzhan med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor
167b1: ba/ / rnal 'byor dbang phyug pa chen des// 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun du mi 'grub pa'i// dngos grub kun gyi bde myos pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas
167b2: pa'i/ / dbang phyug kun gyi bde myos pa// dam pa rgya chen gang yang med// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des/ 'di la tshe 'di nyid kyis ni// rnam pa kun du mi 'grub ces// bcom
167b3: ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so/ / sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog las// lha mo thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba skal pa mchog bzang po dpa
167b4: rdo rje sa chag gi rtog pa ste gsum pa'o/ / / 'di ni rnal 'byung bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam stong ba// mkha' 'gros pa bde ba'i mchog/
167b5: kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sel pa bzang mchog 'dod pa ste// yang dag sbyor ba'i bde myong ba// 'dod chags ther zug brtan pa'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs ched dang // dbyangs dang dri dang ro dag dang / sangs rgyas
167b6: kun gyi reg bde mchog/ rang gi spyod par de spyod do// sangs rgyas pha rol phyin grub pa// gzungs rangs rnams de bzhin du// dga' bar spyod na lha dang mi'i// skal bzang bud med ci zhig smos// lnga yi dngos grub dka'
167b7: ba dang / / sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// skal pa bzang po bde myong bas// so sor rjes su rang 'grub 'gyur// dngos grub thams cad las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// skal pa bzang po
167b8: spyod kun/ / rang gis spyad par de spyod do// rdo rje can gyi grub mchog dang // 'jig rten dang po mchog gi dpal// sangs rgyas dga' bas bde dam pa// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// khams gsum dgan
168a1: lus pa'i/ / sangs rgyas rgyal srid chen po kun// rtsal gyi stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// phrogs nas nye bar spyod par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas
168a2: phrogs nas de spyod na/ / longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// mthu chen las ni bkra shis brtan// phrogs las grub dang dran pas dga'// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// ma lus
168a3: 'jig rten gsum rgyal srid/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug kun dang bcas// ngo 'thon stobs kyis phrogs nas kyang // de ni dad la sbyin par byed// tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen gyi// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa dag/ kun nas phrog
168a4: te mur sbyin na/ / longs spyod gzhan lta ci zhig smos// de yis mi smin ci yang med// sangs rgyas don du bya ba kun// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// sbyin pa dang ni byed pa'ang yin// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // phrogs/
168a5: nas kyang ni sbyin byed na// las mchog dang ni rab 'byam dang // dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// dngos grub mchog ni gdon mi za// sde rnams thams cad rab 'joms pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi grub chen po// 'khor
168a6: los sbyar ba rab grub pa/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sbrum bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdzu 'phrul tshe// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'jug/ la lar byang chub sems chen po// la lar stso
168a7: ba 'thun par 'gro/ / la lar dga' ldan lha dag las// dam pa shin du 'pho ba'o// la lar skye ba rnam par dag/ la lar nges pa 'byung bar gsal// la lar byang chub chen por gshegs// la lar bdud las rab tu rgyal//
168a8: la lar byang chub mngon 'chang rgya// la lar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// la lar pha rol mu stegs rnams// chos dang 'thun par tshar gcod do// la lar 'jig rten gsum rgyal ba// grub pa kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// la lang
168b1: rtog pa thams cad mchog/ grub pa'i dbang phyug bla na med// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// 'dul ba'i thabs su nges pa'i gar// rnam par sprul pas dgyes shing ngol/
168b2: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ brtan pa dbang phyug chen po'i bdag/ gzugs dang tshe dang kha dog stobs// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin// 'gro ba dag gis bsnyen bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs pa kun
168b3: gyis mchod/ / lha mo kun gyi dpal ldan mchog/ rdo rje sems dpar rab tu 'grub// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni phyag rgyas 'debs// lha dang byang chub dka' ba rnams// brtan par sems can dag
168b4: la smin/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag bde mchog gis// sems can kun gyi don byed cing // ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun du srid par gnas zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs/
168b5: so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sna tshogs thams cad kyi skal pa bzang po mchog gi dngos grub ces bya ste/ dpal dam tshig gi brtag pa ste bzhi
168b6: pa'o/ / / 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// ji ltar/
168b7: 'dod pa bzhin du sbyar// rtog pa'i cho ga thams cad la// grub pa dam pa mchog gi mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod pa yi// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba dang // bde ba thams
168b8: cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ / bcom ldan rnal 'byor de nyid ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul bas// sems can kun don rnams sprul na// myur du shin du 'grub par 'gyur// nyin re'am yang na zla re'am// yang na de bzhin/
169a1: lo rin // ci bzhin byin gyis brlabs nas kyang // sangs rgyas bde mchog gar bya'o// khams kyi ngo bo thams cad dang // de bzhin srog dang rtsa las 'byung // rang gi lha yi cha lugs su// bsgrub pa'i
169a2: phyag rgyar rab tu bya/ / dkyil 'khor gang dang gang bsten pa// sna tshogs phyag rgya'i mchod pa yis// slob ma'i tshogs kun de dang der// mchod pa byas nas nges bsgrub po// de las gzhan yang rtog kun gyi// sangs rgyas
169a3: thams cad rnam sprul pa/ / ci rigs par ni sprul byas pa'i// gtam dag rab tu bshad par bya// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gis dgyes pas na//
169a4: thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'di ni rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// rtag pa dam pa brtan pa ste// rtag tu da ltar 'byung ba bzhin// ngo bo nyid ni 'da' bar dga'// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// las
169a5: kyi sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// 'dul ba'i phyir ni byas pa yin// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por 'di 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba//
169a6: mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ sems can kun gyi don mchog rnams// sangs rgyas la sogs 'dul bas 'grub// dpal rdo rje sems dpas dbugs
169a7: byung ba'o/ / 'dis pa'i dus na sngon krung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon zung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du stong pa nyid la brtson// 'gog/
169a8: pa'i chos nyid la sbyor bas// 'gags shing yongs su mya ngan 'das// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// grol ba thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// sangs rgyas sprul pa kun du bskyed//
169b1: stong pa ma yin mi stong mir// dbu mar yang ni mi dmigs te// shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba// thabs kyi snying rje bdag nyid rnams// de bas de ni snying rje'i thabs// shes rab pha rol phyin par gsal// rtog pa med pa'i chos
169b2: rnams la/ / sems can don du yongs brtags pa// rnam par me rtog la mos pas// thams cad rtog pas brtag par bya// brag ra yi ni sgra 'dra ba// chos kyi tshig tu de 'gyur te// de las theg pa cher po yi// yang dag
169b3: yon tan rgyas pa'i glus/ / dus gsum pa yi dam tshig gsum// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bstod// mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal
169b4: sel bar mdzang/ / yon tan mtha' yas dngos grab thams cad stan mang ba// da me mig yo mnyam meng dam pa'i mchog mas cad// yon tan shin du phra ba'i tshal yang chang med de// dpe ni ram mkha' dang yang bskrun du
169b5: yod pa'ang min/ / dngos grub mtha' yas mnyam med dpe dang bral ba'i rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams dam par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa'i thugs rje shugs las byung // smon lam chub
169b6: pA 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can/ / 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par sdang // tshad med tshang dang bral bas shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs
169b7: pa'i go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang / / khams gsum kur la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// thugs rje spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin du bzang po'i chos nyid mchog da
169b8: ldan/ / mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang dam pa mchog brnyes pas// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med par rab mkhyen pa// dam tshig mchog
170a1: gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgya chen te// lan gcig tsam ni brjod pas kyang // sangs rgyas thams cad grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas
170a2: kun bdag nyid sbyor bas/ / bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di nyid kyis// dus gsum pa yi rgyal ba kun// dam tshig gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// sku ni lta bas mi ngoms pa// thams cad bdag nyid bstar nas kyang // legs
170a3: so zhes nas dngos grub ni/ / mchog rnams kun ni rab smin mdzad// thams cad bdag nyid 'grub dga' dang // bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs// sangs rgyas 'grub pa mchog kun dang // rnal 'byor dam pa'ang sbyin
170a4: par mdzad/ / de nas de yis bsgrub pa dang // shin du rtag pa'i dngos grub dag/ gang gis srid pa 'di nyid la// dngos grub shin tu rtag thob bshad// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya//
170a5: thal mo legs par sbyar ba yi// thal mo lan gsum rnam par brdab// dbang po gad dang gang lam gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// shin du mnyam bzhag sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor zhing // ji ltar mos
170a6: pa'i chags pa dang / / Sha Da ba la sogs pa yis// ci nas yongs su mi skyo bar// rtag tu tshad med bzlas par bya// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas kun du dngos grub pa/ rab tu mthong
170a7: zhing mchog grub pa'o/ / 'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad dang // de bzhin dpa' bo thams cad dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad du// tshe 'di nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan bsngags pa rgya che ba
170a8: bstod pa'i rgyal po mchog ni lan gcig glur blangs pas/ / kun du 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor rtag pa'i mchog/ dngos grub mi zad bde ba'i mchog nyid thob par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// thams cad bdag nyid dbang
170b1: zug mchog/ sna tshogs kun gyis rnam 'dul ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun sgrub ste// de bas dam tshig gsum la sogs// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i//
170b2: sems can khams ni rnam par bkrol// dpal rnam par snang mdzad kyis dbugs byung ba'o// // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la//
170b3: 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin tu khro gtum gdug par gyur// shin du gdug par khro ba yis// 'o dod 'bod par lhung bar 'gyur// de nas 'phos nas sems can de// bag
170b4: chags kyis ni mtshams sbyor bas/ / shin du gdug pa chen por gyur// blo na bdud kyis byin brlabs nas// rims dang dug dang dbyig du ga nad// pra men ma dang gnod sbyin gdon// bdud dang rnam par log 'dren
170b5: nyid/ / shin du gdug pa chen por gyur// gnas gsum po ni 'jigs byed cing // sgrub pa po rnams la yang za// lha la sogs pa'ang 'pho bar byed// bstan pa dag kyang 'jig par byed// de nas dbang por bcas pa'i lha
170b6: tshangs pa'i drung ngu nye bar dong / / tshangs pa'ang lha dang dbang por bcas// 'jug sel la yang skyabs su dong // tshangs dang 'jug sel lha rnams kyang // lha chen drung du nye bar dong // tshangs pa 'jug sel dbang chen
170b7: yang / / rdo rje can la skyabs su dong // de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje se gol phyag rgyas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis/
170b8: dpung pa gnyis ni rdo rjer bcings// rdo rje se gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu mdzad na// de yi bka' tsam gyis skrag nas// 'khor dang 'khor lo'i tshogs bcings pa// sangs rgyas
171a1: thams cad gshegs 'gyur na/ / gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig/ dges// rdo rje se gol gtogs pa yis// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bcas pa// kun gyis til 'bru bzhin
171a2: du rgyas/ / shin du gdug mar gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yi// khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum dag sreg byed na// sad
171a3: rgyas thams cad khros pa yis/ / khams gsum ma lus smos mi dgos// de nas sna yi rtse mo la// yid ni brtan par yang dag gzung // sna yi dbugs ring dro ba las// rgyal bas phyag rgya'i sbyor ba byung // bcom ldan de nyid/
171a4: rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje khro bor gyur nas byung // dpal chen rdo rje he ru ka/ 'bar bar thal bas rab tu 'jig/ sems dpa' sngon por 'bar ba'i dang // 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dmar por 'bar// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar
171a5: drag/ dur khrod kyi ni me dang 'dra// thod pa mang po'i dbu rgyan can// 'jig pa chen po'i dus ltar drag/ dur khrod bzhin du rab tu 'jigs// khro ba sogs pa'i tshul ldan pa// zhal rnams sna tshogs 'gyur ba dang // smin ma
171a6: khro gnyer bcas par 'gyur/ / 'bar ba'i lta bas gar byas pas// gu lang dbang chen nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs par bcas// gnas gsum dag ni 'bar byas nas// thal ba bzhin du rab tu bshig/
171a7: rdo rje rdo rje kha T+wAM ga/ dril bu'i sgra ni gsil ba yis// thams cad phab nas slar yang ni// bal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// de yi 'bar ba nyi ma las// byung ba'i grib ma mi bzad pa// bskyed nas ma lus bdud la so/
171a8: gdug pa rnams kyi khrag za nus// rgyal po de ni de dag dang // lhan cig dur khrod rnam par rol// thams cad rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yis// shin du gdug cing khro drag pa'i// sems can
171b1: khams ni rnam sbyangs nas/ / dag pa'i sangs rgyas zhing rnams su// sangs rgyas byang chub dag la bkod// rdo rje 'dod khro la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems
171b2: can khams ni rnam par sbyangs/ / dpal he ru kas dbugs srung ba'o// 'das pa'i dus na sngon bung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon bung ba// de tshe sems can
171b3: thams cad ni/ / log par lta la gnas par gyur// shin du lta ba ngan pa yis// 'odod 'bod pa chen por lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// byang chub sems ni rnam sbyang phyir// pad mo chags par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
171b4: chos su gnas par gyur/ / ji ltar pad mo dmar po 'di// tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// de bzhin bag chags khams gsum gyi// nyes pa sna tshogs rnam par dag/ 'dis ni kun du gzigs pas na// rgyal ba dbang daphyuganyid
171b5: du 'gyur/ / dpal ldan spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang // rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags thams cad dag pas na// mchog sbyin dam pa bcom ldan 'das// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// sna tshogs
171b6: pa ni 'dul bar spro/ / kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang rgyal// pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// pad mo'i rgyal po mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog des// pad mo gar dbang la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad
171b7: kyis/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rnam par sbyangs// dpal pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gis dbugs phyung ba'o// // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de
171b8: bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la/ / 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// shin du gdug cing brkam par 'gyur// shin du 'dungs par gyur pa yis// yi dgas rnams dang dmyal bar ltang // de nas
172a1: 'phos nas slar yang ni/ / shin tu dbul por skyes par gyur// bkres dang skom pa'i skyon rnams kyis// de dag phan tshun gsod par byed// shin du gdug pa spyad pa'i phyir// rnal 'byor de ni bcom ldan 'das/
172a2: dam pa'i don gyi nor chen po// rdo rje nyi ma byung bar gyur// nam mkha'i snying pos thams cad phyogs// kun gyi re ba yongs rdzogs mdzad// bud med la sogs rin chen mchog/ mkha' las rin chen thams cad 'bebs//
172a3: shin du gdug cing khro ba la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi nyi ma ni// rab tu gdung ba kun bsgrubs pas// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // dbrog pas kyang ni khyad par du// rgyal bar byas nas gnas
172a4: gsum gyi/ / nor gyi tshogs kun sdud par byed// 'jig rten gsum rgyal la sogs kyi// rtog pa bla med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i// sems can khams ni rab tu bkrol// dpal rdo rje nyi
172a5: mas dbugs pang ba'o/ / // 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab la// 'gro ba'i tshul ni sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad ni// brtson 'grus shin du
172a6: chung bar gyur/ / shin du brtson 'grus chung ba yis// mnar med pa yi dmyal bar lhung // rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// drag shul sbyor ba'i tshul dag tu// rta mchog dpal
172a7: ni byung bar gyur/ thams cad dag par mos pa yis// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// pha rol gnon pa'i rtsal dag gis// shin du gdug cing khro gtum pa'i// sems can rnam pa mang po'i khams// 'jig rten thams cad
172a8: rab tu 'jig/ byi ba rkun po chom po yis// thams cad rnam par sbyod par byed// khrid pa dang ni sgra dag dang // ro 'thon stobs kyis de bzhin du// dgra cha lnga yis brgal nas ni// de tshe 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// skye 'gro
172b1: gnas pa 'gro ba rnams/ / mtha' dag btul nas 'grub par 'gyur// 'dul ba'i thabs rnams sna tshogs kyis// rang gi rgyal srid rtag tu skyong // g.yem pa rnams la g.yem par gyur// khro ba rnams la khro ba'i mchog
172b2: zhi ba rnams la zhi ba'i mchog/ drag shul can la drag pos gnon// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// dbang phyug dam pa rab mnan nas// lha mo b+hi mo phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs
172b3: kyis do 'thon du/ / mthu bo che yang rab mnan nas// rug mi ni yang phrogs nas ni// de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// skye dgu'i bdag po rab mnan nas// lha mo rab tu zhi ba phrogs/
172b4: de tshe longs spyod rang gir spyod// sdig med stobs kyis ngo 'thon du// 'dod pa'i lha ni rab mnan nas// dga' sdug mi yi dbang phyug ma// phrogs nas de tshe nye bar spyod// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings
172b5: mnyam dang mi mnyam pa/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// rdo rje las mchog rnam gnon pa// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// thabs dang rtsal gyi grub pa yis//
172b6: drag shul sbyor bas bsgrubs na ni// khams gsum rgyal srid ma lus par// rdo rje 'dzin pa des thob nas// byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas mchog/ drag shul sbyor bas grub par byed// thams cad dag par mos pa
172b7: yis/ / sdig med stobs kyis do 'thon du// rtsal gyis pha rol gnon pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu 'grel// lha yi dngos grub dka' ba dang // sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// go 'phang mchog gi rtag pa dag/
172b8: rang gi rnal 'byor gyis thob nas// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ ma lus par ni rgyas 'debs shing // 'chi med byang chub dka' ba dag/ sems can rnams la brten par zhid// rta mchog rnam par sprul pa yis//
173a1: ma lus lus pa med pa yi// bskal pa kun du srid par gnas// sems can kun gyi do kyang byed// de ltar rta mchog dpal la sogs// rtog pa d+ma med thams cad kyis// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
173a2: mtha' klas pa'i/ / sems can khams rnams rab tu bsgrubs// dpal rta mchog gis dbugs byung ba'o// // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha'i dbyings
173a3: kyi mthas klas pa'i/ / rang byung rnams kyi gtam gyi rtags// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'jug par byed// sa
173a4: rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las gtam gyi phyag rgya zhes pa rtog pa ste lnga pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang thams cad du// rnam pa sna tshogs mchog 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas
173a5: thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde mchog bshad// dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde 'byung ba// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs/
173a6: sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' snang ba bde// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha rdzas mchog/ rin chen rgyan la sogs pas spras// dril bu rgyal mtshan mchog ldan pa'i// bla re dam pa bres
173a7: bas na/ / rdo rje ku dang mchod la sogs// klu dang sil snyan rnam par 'phrul// me tog bdug pa'i sbyor ba dang // mar me dri dang sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sa ma bde mchog
173a8: bsgrub/ / yang na bdag gi gnas dag gam// bskyed mos tshal la sogs par bsgrub// der ni dang por gdan bshams te// 'jam zhing reg na bde 'gyur ba// sna tshogs pad mo ras kyis g.yogs// de ni thams cad dag
173b1: pa'i gdan/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phrag rnam 'phrul pas// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// de na rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// stan de dag ni thams cad la// ci ltar gnas pa bzhin
173b2: du dgod/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes par byas// rdo rje rin chen pad ma sogs// sgo srungs dang ni ldan par byas// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// bud med dag ni legs bsgrubs pa// skal
173b3: bzang rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ / tshegs kyi dkyil 'khor rtag par bya// mi yi mtshal ni grub pa la// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// ngo bo nyid kyi mthu dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de grub pa'i// rdo rje'i chu dang
173b4: rdo rjer bcas/ / mtshal chen po dag bsgrub pa ni// mthu yis rab tu grub pa ste// pad mo'i snod kyis nang du bzhag/ chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas
173b5: kun gyi rdo rje'i thugs/ / dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka'// de yi mtshal dang khu ba dang // mtshal chen po ni bsgrubs pa dag/ chags pa chen po las byung bas// dmar chen po zhes bya bar bshad// dmar chen dang ni
173b6: ga bur bcas/ / tsan dan dmar por sbyar ba dag/ tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa ni// ra sa yan kun slong ba// ring gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// srin lag dang ni mthe bo'i ces// zhi ba'i bzung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag
173b7: pa yi ni dngos grub thob/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid kyi/ ra sa yan bde ba 'dis// rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe dang gzhan// nad med pa dang bde mchog 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro/
173b8: sgyu ma bde mchog gis// 'dus pa der ni zhugs pa dag/ 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'od lding// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// bdag nyid rtag tu rnam pa kun// sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por
174a1: 'gyur ro/ / 'das ni bsrung ba byas pas dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhin du 'gyur// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ba de mchog gis// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid 'grub// de nas khrus byas dri zhim lus// ci 'khyong
174a2: pa yi gos dang rgyan/ / sna tshogs gos bzang bgos dang ni// me tog phreng ldan kha dri zhim// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang pos// slong bas dal gyis dal gyis su// gos dgab pa yi sbyor ba yis// bdag gi 'byung ba bskal
174a3: bar bya/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi zla rnams// shar ba dag ni mthong ba yis// sdig pa kun las grol 'gyur zhing // bsod nams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// nges pa'i lam dang kun ldan pa// rnam par 'das pas
174a4: rnam par brgyan/ / brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// kun nas slong ba'i bde ba ni// stong pa shin du rnal 'byor yod med mthus// nam mkha' nyid du dam tshig nye bar gnas// bde gshegs bde bar gshegs pas bzhes su
174a5: gsol/ / rdo rje sems dpa' skal bzang dpal khyod bdag/ 'di dag nyid kyi glung blangs na// shin du mya ngan yongs 'das pa'i// shi ba'ang slar ni slongs 'gyur na// yang srid pa lta ci zhig smos// lam bzhi dang ni mnyam
174a6: ldan pa/ / rnam par 'das pas mdzes par byas// sna tshogs 'brang bar rab tu 'grub// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'jig rten gsum gyi ston pa'o// 'jig rten gsum na sgyid sbyin pa/
174a7: 'jig rten gsum po bdag la sgrubs// rdo rje sems dpa' dba' sbyor// lha ma kun dang 'gregs pa yis// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// a ra li ni kun 'grub 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo kun
174a8: dang bde myos pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rdzogs// nyi ma zla ba gsal bar 'char// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag sbyor// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'byung // lan gcig dmigs pa tsam gyis kyang // bde ba'i dngos grub kun 'byung ba//
174b1: brtan zhing grub pa slong byed pa// sna tshogs 'bras pas de bzhin du// gan d+ha ba dang shad pa'i// glu dbyangs sna tshogs glus pasgrub po// de nas de nyid dam pa yis// thar pa thams cad rmongs pa yi// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid
174b2: la/ / glu 'di yis ni bskul bar bya// rjes su chags pa'i rnam mang dga' ba'i pad ma rnam dag pa'i// mchod pas gsal bar rjes su mchod byas nas// mchog tu rtag pa'i rnal 'byor bde bas bde ba grub par mdzod// kye ma'o mchog
174b3: tu bde ba'i dam tshig ngo bo nyid/ / mchog tu bde ba shin du rnal 'byor skal bzang mchog dgyes pa// rang gi dam tshig skyon med dag la rol cig rol cig to// kye ma mchog tu gsang ba'i bdag po rang gi dam tshig yin pa'i phyir/
174b4: rab tu gsang ba'i lha mo mchog rnams so// 'gro ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul ba gsal bar mkhyen// dam tshig thams cad dngos po brtan g.yo kun gyi ngo bor gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi bdag nyid rnal 'byor bde ba
174b5: mkha' 'gro sgyum ho/ / kye ma dam pa rtag pa'i dngos grub chen po rab tu sgrubs pa stan// dzaHhUM baM ho// e ma'o bde mchog bde bar drongs// rnam par sprul hUM snang bar mdzod// a la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi//
174b6: mkha' 'gro sgyum sna tshogs kyis// slob ma dag ni gzhug tu gsol// glu yi rgyal po 'di dag ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal la gnas// kun gyi sgyu me bde ba'i mchog/ ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// glu 'di dag ni len
174b7: pa na/ / dkyil 'khor sna tshogs thams cad du// sangs rgyas thams cad rnam 'phrul pa// ma lus lus pa med par snang // rnam pa mang po'i 'dod chags rgyud kyi sems cad ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa//
174b8: bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sgyu ma'i bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// na te te hUM/ rnam pa mang po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin ga shas
175a1: bkur gyi sgra ba bde mchog skams thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul rol cig sprul cig/ hUM hUM hU~M/ rnam pa mang po khro ba'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa// de bzhin gshes
175a2: bkan gyi sbrum bde mchog smra mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ / ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+r-i hU~M// rnam pa mang ba srog gi rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sku
175a3: ma bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ / hAM shi Sh+Ti b+hi Sha hUM/ de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// rang byung
175a4: rnams kyi glu yi rgya/ / nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la ni gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa dang // lha mo kun gyis
175a5: rab bskul nas/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'grub// dbang po kun las byung ba yi// mchod pa'i sprin chen rnam bkod pa// rab 'byam tshogs rnams thams cad kyis/ kun gyi
175a6: bdag nyid mchod par byed/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog gis// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid lus// ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// ston pa'i phyag rgya phab pa yis// bud med
175a7: dag kyang bsgrubs nas ni/ / rdo rjer bcas pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin// rnal 'byor mar ni rab tu 'gyur// de dag rang gi lha rnams dang // 'dra bar byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs nas// sngon med rol mo'i sel snyan gar// rnam par
175a8: 'phrul pas 'grub par 'gyur/ / lha yi gzugs dang sgra dang dri// ro dang reg pa'i bde myos pas// bdag nyid rang gi lhar mthong zhing // mchod pa dag kyang byed par 'gyur// lha yi mchod pa mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog
175b1: gi 'dod chags can/ / rnam pa kun du skal bzang po'i// bde ba yang dag sgrub par byed// sangs rgyas snrums kyir brlabs pas// pal rdo rje sems dpa' banyab sbyor ba'i// dadas grub kur gyi bde ba rnams// dkyil
175b2: 'khor mthong dka' myong bar 'gyur/ / rdo rje sems dpar mnyam sbyor ba'i// mthu nyid kyis ni thams cad du// sna tshogs kun gyi skal bzang po// rang gi bde ba nyid kyis 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzugs chen dang /
175b3: dbyangs dang dri dang ro bde bas// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid du// de yis rab mthong mchod par byed// mchod pa thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// skal bzang mchog gi 'dod chags can// sangs rgyas thams cad bdag nyid kyi//
175b4: dngos grub ma lus lus med 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyum bde mchog gis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gar// rnam par rol pa mchog tu snang // de nas yang dag rab gsang gra//
175b5: bud med dag ni bzhi rnams dang // gar gyi phyag rgya mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// rab tu dga' ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa grub par mdzod// oM hU~M/ dam tshig dam
175b6: pa grub par mdzad du gsol/ / oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad dag par mdzod// oM hUM/ mchod pa chen po thams cad grub par mdzod// glu'i phyag rgya 'do ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// mchod pa ma lus
175b7: lus med pa'i/ / rab 'bum las lo 'di skad du rung // gang dag grub par mgur dang // mchod pa dag ni mi 'byor pa// phyag rgya 'di yis mchod byas na// mchod pa thams cad myur du 'grub// mchod pa'i sbyor ba 'di dag dang /
175b8: lha po bzhi po dag gis ri// ma rtag la sogs par dbyas nas// slob ma thams cad gzung bar bya// dngos grub 'dod pas ci 'dod pa// snyim pa'i gar ni kun bskyod nas// de dag gding ni mdzes pa yi// ras kyis g.yogs
176a1: gzung bar bya/ / dngos grub ji ltar 'thob 'dod par// slob ma me tog 'thong drug zhug/ lha mo gang la lhung ba ni// lnga de de la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas gdong ni bkrol nas kyang // yon gyi mchog ni
176a2: blang ba ba/ / sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur bas// ci lta bar ni dbang bskur ro// dmar chen po dang ga pur bcas// tsan dan dmar po sbyar ba'i rnams// tshogs kyi dbus su bzhag pa la// g.yod pa mtshan 'dzin
176a3: rje bcas/ / rang gi lha yi rnal 'byor ldan// srin lag dang ni mthe bo rtses// zhi ba'i btung ba bzhin myangs na// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i tshogs
176a4: kyis kyang / / rgyas mi thebs shing mi rmongs te// de la gnod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mna' ni bsgrags byas nas// sangs rgyas thams cad 'thun pa yis// mchog tu rtag pa'i bka' stsal pa// dam tshig sdom pa sbyin par
176a5: bya/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// sdom pa nyams par khyed byed pa// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// lha dag dang ni mi rnams dang // de bzhin rnal 'byor grub pa'o//
176a6: de dag la ni snying rings nas// snying las khrag chen 'thungs pa bzhin// sems can khams ni ma lus don// srid pa shin du dag bya'i phyir// mi 'gog chos nyid sbyor ba yis// rtag pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// bdag gi
176a7: bo yongs spangs shing / / dka' thub kyis ni gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni phyi dus sangs rgyas yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// tsos kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyi
176a8: khyed ma 'jigs/ / dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// grub pa gcig pu gcig la sbyor// lhan cig spyod dang rjes spyod sdug/ sangs rgyas byang chub bla med yin// yang dag nyid kyis rtag tu bsten// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin
176b1: gshegs/ / de skad bka' stsal dpal ldan gyis// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor bcas dang gsang bcas pa'i// bdag gi ye shes rgya bsgrubs nas//
176b2: ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed pas// slob ma rnams la bde bar sbyin// slob ma dam pas de phyir chad// phyag rgya'i ye shes rjes bzung nas// rnam par snang mdzad mchog bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gug/
176b3: de nas ro dang zas dang gnas// glu dang sil snyan la sogs pa// de dag mgon po rnams la dbul// rdo rje bla ma chen po dang // bdag dang gzhan la 'dod dgus mchod// 'dod de ni 'bras bu phun tshogs 'grub// de nas
176b4: bdag nyid rab bsgrubs nas/ / kun gyi slob dpon rab gnas pa// ci lta'i tshul bzhin 'jug pa yis// bden pa'i chos ni brjod par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi tshul// rtog pa thams cad rab bsgrubs shing // rtog
176b5: pa kun la rab sbyor ba'i/ / ngo bo nyid phyir chen po'i mchog/ sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba dang // 'dul ba'i bdag nyid sna tshogs pas// sems can rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// de las gzhan pa'i tshul du bstan// rnal 'byor/
176b6: de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thams cad rnam sbyang phyir// 'gro ba'i mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur// rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yi// rang gi byin brlabs bsgrub pa'i rgyas// phyag rgya
176b7: bzhin rjes 'thun pa'i/ / sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgrub par bya// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// thams cad rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro byung bar gyur//
176b8: gzhan yang shin tu rnal 'byor pa// ma lus pad mo rnam sbyar phyir// sa la bzang dam pa mi 'gyur ba// pad mo sgyu ma 'byung bar gyur// gzhan yang rnal 'byor bcom ldan 'das// nor gyi mchog gis rnams/
177a1: phyir// nam mkha' kun gyi bdag po che// rdo rje nyi ma dpal 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// drag shul sbyor ba spang ba'i phyir// rta mgrin pha rol rab gnon pa// rta mchog rab tu
177a2: 'byung bar 'gyur/ / rang gi lha dang 'dra ba yis// rang gi byin brlabs bsgrub pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan ngo bor sbyor ba yi// phyag rgya'i sbyor bas gar bya'o// dam tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de ltar rnam pa snga
177a3: tshogs kyis/ / de ltar rnam par spyod na ni// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog 'grub// kun du kun nas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas 'phrul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rtag tu
177a4: rnam pa kun/ / sangs rgyas la sogs brtan g.yo kun// kun gyi dngos por de 'gyur ro// kun du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa thams cad kyis// bdag nyid rnam par 'phrul pa ston// lha mo kun dang /
177a5: 'dus pa yis// sangs rgyas zhing ni ma lus par// sangs rgyas sprul pa grub par byed// sangs rgyas sprul pa sgyu ma yis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa ston// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba'i// mkha'
177a6: 'gro snum gar byed pas/ / khams gsum dag ni ma lus par// dngos po kun du de 'gyur ro// pad mo sgyu ma rnama'i phrul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs// sna tshogs gzugs byed rim pa yis// 'gro ba thams
177a7: cad mgu bar byed/ / khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// mjal dum g.yul 'gyer grub pa dag/ rgyal srid sgyu ma rnam 'phrul pas// bya ba thams cad ston par byed// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// bdag rtul
177a8: bod pas mnan nas ni/ / 'gro ba thams cad rab 'dzem par// rta yi gar gyis ston par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mtha' klas bI/
177b1: sna tshogs kun gyi bde mchog gis// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal dgyes rol pa rnam 'phrul pa// sna tshogs kyis ni rnam par rol// rnam pa sna chog
177b2: skal bzang po/ / rnam pa sna tshogs bde mchog gis// 'dul ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// sems can khams ni rab tu bsgrub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam
177b3: mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i mchog/ nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab bsgrubs pas// thams cad bdag
177b4: nyid grub par byed/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas de skad gsungs so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyong
177b5: ba mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor brtag pa ste drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha// rnam pa sna tshogs kun gyi mchog/ 'khor lo thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// gsang
177b6: zla mchog gi dgyes pa ni/ / thams cad bdag nyid rjes su bsgrub// dben pa yi ni gnas dag gam// rang gi bskyed mos tshal sogs par// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun du sna tshogs bde mchog gis// kun du snga
177b7: tshogs dgos pa'i rnams/ / ci bde bar ni bsgrub par bya// rten dang dgon pa gtsug lag khang // ri yi rtse rnams thams cad du// rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dgos pa bsgrub par bya// dur khrod dang ni lha rten dang // pa
177b8: mo'i gnas la sogs 'dug na/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dgos pa dag/ rnam pa du mar 'grub par 'gyur// pad mo'i bskyed mos tshal dga' dang // chu bo dag gi mdo dag tu// pad mo 'dzin pa'i dgos pa rnams// yang dag par ni 'grub par
178a1: 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i pho brang dga' ba dang // rgyal po'i bskyed mos tshal dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs du ma yi// rgyal po'i dgos pa bsgrub par bya// 'khor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // de bzhin chu bo'i 'gram dag gam/
178a2: rgyal khams gzhan las grub pa ru// rdo rje ni bsgrub par bya// cha lugs rnam pa sna tshogs dang // bsgrub pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i dgos pa la// dkyil 'khor la sogs rab tu bsgrub// sangs rgyas
178a3: rnams kyi pad mo dmar/ / phyag na rdo rje sna tshogs la// 'jig rten dbang gi kha dog dkar // rdo rje nyi ma dpal gyi gser// kha rog kun dang ci 'byor pa// tha re rgyal mtshan rgyan gyi rnams// thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa dpal// rna mcho/
178a4: rdo rje can gyi'o// gnas dang 'khor rnams ci 'dra dang // bkod dang 'gro ba ci 'dra dang // 'khor rnams bkod pa ci 'dra bar// de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis mdzad// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' lha rnams kyi// 'khor lo mngon sum
178a5: mthong ba las/ / bsod nams brtag pa ci 'dra ba// phyis brim pa yang de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor thig btab shes rab can// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgrub cing // shar nub byang gi phyogs dag tu// thig bzhi btab pra
178a6: dkyil 'khor brgyad/ / dkyil 'khor yang dag ci 'dra bar// rab tu rtag par su zhig nus// rang gi lha yi rang bzhin gyis// dkyil 'khor brtag pa 'grub par 'gyur// bdag nyid rang gi lhar sbyor bas// dngos grub thams
178a7: cad bsgrub par bya/ / che ga lhag gam ma tshang na// nyes pa meng de 'grub par 'gyur// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can/ kun du sna tshogs 'grub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor kun du sna
178a8: tshogs pa'o/ / dkyil 'khor zlum po sangs rgyas kyi// rdo rje can gyi zla gam bzhin// pad mo'i dbang gis pad mo'i dbyibs// rin chen mchog gi rin chen dbyibs// ji ltar 'dod pa ci 'byor pa// ci lta'i dus dang ci bde bar//
178b1: dkyil 'khor kun du gnas par dpal// rta mchog phyag rgya rdo rje'i'o// dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs shing // dam tshig rnams ni spangs pa dag/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes pas// bsgrubs kyang ci yang mi 'grub bo//
178b2: srog chags gsang par mi bya zhing // dkon mchog gsum ni yod mi spang // byang chub sems ni mi gtang ste// slob dpon skal bzang yod mi gtang // kun du sna tshogs skal bzang por// bdag rang bsgrubs pas
178b3: skal pa bzang / / bdag med chos nyid dang ldan pa// dam tshig la sdang skal ba ngan// srid pa shin du bsgrubs pas na// skal bzang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das// skal ngan nyan thos 'jig rtenan// shin du yongs su su
178b4: ngan 'das/ / rtog pa thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir// skal bzang phyag na rdo rje dpal// stong pa nyid la rab sbyor bas// rang rgyal rnams ni skal ba ngan// 'dod chags thams cad rnam dag pas// skal bzang spyan ras gzigs
178b5: kyi dbang / / log par lta dang ldan pas na// skal ngar 'jig rten mu stegs ni// dam pa'i nor mchog sdang pa'i phyir// skal bzang rdo rje nyi ma dpal// bdag gi bu yang ma chags pas// skal ngan dka' thub spod pa kun/
178b6: rgyal sring mchog rnams kun bsdus pas// rta mchog dpal ni skal ba bzang // bdag med yongs su 'dzin mang // thub pa thams cad skal pa dan// bde ba thams cad bdag sgrub phyir// kun gyi slob dpon skal pa bzag/
178b7: lha ngan dam tshig la sdang ba'i// slob ma thams cad skal pa ngan// gsang ba'i don ni yang dag nyid// 'di ni gsal bar shes pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin du// sangs rgyas kun du 'grub par 'gyur// kun gyi
178b8: slob dpon la gnas pas/ / 'khor lor 'jug par byed pa na// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa'i slob ma la// gsang ba yang dag mtha' yas mchog/ thog ma nyid du gsang brjod pa// kye khyod ci la dga' zhes dris// skal pa
179a1: bzang la bdag dga' zhes/ / 'jug pa bas kyang smra bar bya// gsang ba'i yan lag 'dir shes na// ci ltar 'dong par rab tu gzhug/ gsang ba yang dag mi shes te// g.yas pa yis ni gzhug par bya/
179a2: de ltar dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas// de bzhin shin tu yon dbul te// gsang ba'i cho ga nyid shes pas// mi 'gyur ba yi mchog 'grub po// kun du sna tshogs bla ma la// yon mchog dag ni dbul bar nges// gang la yod
179a3: su btang dka' gang / / de ni mchog tu bshad pa yin// gang dang gang ni sdug pa'i mchog/ yang na shin du khyad par can// de dang de ni bla ma la// de nyid mi zad 'dod pas dbul// yang na de ni 'dod 'gyur ba 'am// 'on te sems
179a4: la dgos pa dag/ de sbyin yang na dgos pa bya// de ni chung yang mchog yin no// de la gal te mchog bdog la// de yang ngan pa'i yon 'bul na// kun gyi slob dpon bsnyas pas na// de ni rtag tu sdug bsngal 'thob// bu mo/
179a5: shin tu brgyan pa 'am// de bzhin chung ma sdug pa dag/ phul nas rin gyis blu ba ni// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog gi yon// mi chen dag ni phul nas su// slar yang rin gyis blu ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal sbyor ba yi//
179a6: yon te mchog gi yon yin no// mu tig bzang dang nor bu dang // shin du dkar ba'i ras zung dang // de bzhin rta ni dkar po dag/ pad mo can gyi yon mchog yin// rgyal srid longs spyod gter rnams dang // gos dang rgyan
179a7: gyi tshogs rnams dang / / de bzhin mchod pa thams cad ni// rdo rje nyi ma'i yon yin no// shin du brgyan pa'i rta dag dang // glang po shin du brgyan pa dang // shing rta rin chen gang ba dag/ rta yi rgyal po'i yon yin no// khama?
179a8: kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam/ / srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang bskur ba// mkhas pas rnam pa sna tshogs brtag/ spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // 'gram pa gnyis dang lhag pa ru// sangs
179b1: rgyas rin chen thams cad kyi/ / dbu rgyan mi 'gyur dam pa'o// khams kyi rang bzhin thams cad dam// srog dang rtsa ba'i de bzhin te// thod pa rin chen dbu rgyan nas// sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ kun du gru tshogs bla ma
179b2: ni/ / kun gyi slob dpon kun la bya// rgyal srid thams cad rnam dag la// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen ngo mtshar gcig las byas// de bzhin sna tshogs rgyan gyis spras// sangs rgyas pad mo'i dbang skur
179b3: bas/ / slob ma thams cad dbang bskur ro// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje phyed// rdo rje rigs la rdo rje yin// spyan ras gzigs kyi sangs rgyas sku// nor bu 'dzin gyi nor bu yin// sangs rgyas rin chen pad mo dang // rdo rje nor bu
179b4: de bzhin du/ / thams cad mchog ni rta mchog la// rang gi dbang bskur bsdus pa'o// blugs pa dang ni byas pa 'am// brdungs pa 'am yang na bris pa'ang rung // sna tshogs rab tu legs pa yi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rab tu
179b5: brtag/ kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// rang byung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// lha mo rnams kyi bde ba'i mchog/ gzhu dang mda' dang de bzhin du// skal ldan de bzhin skam
179b6: ba bzang / / thod pa dang niri kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin no// pad mo rgya gram dpag med che'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe bsgrub pa// lha mo tshogs rnams thams cad kyi// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs sgrub bzhin// mnga'
179b7: dang de bzhin tshangs pa'i mgo/ / de bzhin 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang // rdo rje tri shul phyag rgya'i mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang lcug ma dang // pad mo rta mgrin 'phang mtho ba// rta mgrin ljang khu de bzhin no// phag gi mche ba grub pa
179b8: rang zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/ / rin chen sna tshogs snod chen du// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi ra sa ya// thams cad bdag nyid myong skal bzang // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya tshogs gzhan to// sring du dang ni pi bang kun// ku mu rkaHdang mu ra dza// me tog
180a1: bdug pa par me dang / / sna tshogs dri rnams de bzhin no// de la sogs pa batha' yal/ chos dbyings pa nya pa dang pa pa// dpa' sa kyang la nus pa la// mtshar ma'i phyag rgya ma pa'i
180a2: rogs/ / dam mkha' kun gyi skabs ni dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid la gnas// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid grub par 'gyur // des gos dang 'i skang bzed dang // de bzhin du ni kha pa
180a3: dpadam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dag/ mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhar ro// de bzhin rtse yi phyag rgya dang // tsha lang dang ni rnga dag dang // rdo rje dang ni rin chen sdod// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhan no// de bzhin
180a4: sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dang / / me ling dang ni rlung yab dang // rdo rje ser ba sprin dang bcas// de ba'i namig gi phyag rgya dang // rdo rje 'bar ba kha d+h+r-i ga/ thod pa kham por de bzhin ni// dpar chen dang ni snying rje dang // sha chen
180a5: po yang de bzhin te/ / rnon po mda' dang de bzhin 'dren// chang dang chu dang de bzhin te// lhag ma rlung gis bstod pa dang // ras dang de bzhin me dang ni// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i dpal// gdug pa thams cad za ba yi// mtshan ma'i phyag
180a6: Takral pa'i tshogs/ / ral 'byor dngos grub rab sgrub pa'o// pad mo sna tshogs dmar po dang // lja khur ba'i dkar po dang // mthing ka ser po le brgar dag/ bang po batshan pa chog rnam pa bdun// pang ma srung po bud med/
180a7: de bzhin ngos kyi 'khor lo dang // gsal zhing dpal bskyed rdo rje dag/ pad mo mtshan ma'i tshogs gzhan no// ga'u dang mda' dang ral zi dang // de bzhin du ni 'bar ba'i me// dbang sngar gter dang rgyal mtshan dag mthor pa
180a8: mtshan pa bsdus pa'o/ / de bzhin sna tshogs pad mo dang // rdo rje rgya gram de bzhin te// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya grub pa yis// rgyal srid thams cad 'joms pa ste// sangs rgyas thams cad la sogs pa// dngos pa brtan g.yong
180b1: ma lus kur/ / rang thung rnams kyi mtshan ma'i rgya// ram mkha'i dbyings kyi ma 'aklas pa'o// de skad bcom lngaran de bzhir gshegs// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyis gsungs// sangs rgyas thams
180b2: cad mnyam sbyor ga/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bde ba'i mchog las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya shes pa'i rtog pa ste bdud pa'o// de nas gzhan dag bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha la/ rnam
180b3: pa kun du sna tshogs mchog/ mchod pa thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// lag pa g.yas g.yor gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo daze'u chung mdzes par bskur// dpal ldan g.yon pa 'gying ba'i thabs// g.yas dang
180b4: ba dan gsum du bya/ / sri 'ur bcas pa'i steg pa'i mchog/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' dpal// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i mig gis pa'o// bsam pa g.yos pa'i phyag rgya'o// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyim
180b5: khams gsum pas/ / skad cig gis kyang phyag byed na// khengs pa gzhan lta ci zhig smos// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// btud de rab tu phyag 'tshal nas// las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// rdo rje dpal gyi
180b6: thal mo bsgyur/ / bsam pa g.yos pas phyag byas pa'i// sangs rgyas mchod pa legs byas na// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// smin ma g.yon du 'deg tshul gyis// ru lu ru lur bcas brgad na// tshangs pa nye dbang drag por
180b7: bcas/ / khams gsum pa rnams phyag byed 'gyur// thal mos pad mo kha 'bus bzhin// rang gi sgor ldan snying khar bcing // mthe bo mthe'u chung mdab ma bzhin// rgyas pa btud pa'i phyag kyang bya// lus kyi yan lag thasra
180b8: cad ni/ / sa la bsnyal te phyag bya ba// snying kha kha dang spyi gtsug tu// thal mo sbyar te phyag bya'o// dpal ldan rdo rje 'gying ba'i thabs// 'dzum pa'i mig gis phyag byas na// khams gsum pa yang phyag byed na// mthu bsnyems
181a1: gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ / phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya shes pa'o// kar gyi rgyan rnams ci snyed dang // de bzhin bya ba'i tshul ston kun// de dag rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyu// rang gi don rnams grub byed pa'o// 'gying dang bcas pa'i
181a2: tshul byas nas/ / ci lta'i tshul bzhin gar byed cing // bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gi/ mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bskur te// g.yon
181a3: pa'i mdzub mo khu tshur bcang / / g.yas pa ba dan gsum par bya// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// sangs rgyas kun dang 'grogs pa dang // ngos grub chen po mchog kun gyi// dbang phyug chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'grogs pa/
181a4: dpal skal pa bzang po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems 'dzin chen por bcas pa yi// sbyo bas de nyid bteganas su// 'gras pa'i phyogs su yongs bsgyur nas// lci bo'i mtshams su bzhag par bya// thams cad 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// gar byas de nas/
181a5: bab nas su// bskal bzang hA zhes bya ba'i lus// mchod pa thams cad dpral bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam sbyor bskal pa bzang po bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung medzes
181a6: bsgyur ba'i/ / rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// de bzhin g.yon du bsgyur bar bya// de ni sbyor bas btag nas su// spyi bo'i mtshams su bzhag par bya// skal bzang mo zhes bya ba'i glus// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje thal mo sbar ba sangs
181a7: rgyas kyi mchod pa'o/ / lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe'u chung mdzes bsgyur te// rdo rje thal mo gyen du dgrol// mchod pa'i gtor ma kun gyi tshul// dur khrod cha lugs gar byed pas// phyag ma 'di yis gang byed ci/
181a8: skal bzang rdo rje drag por rgod// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal rdo rje he ru ka'i thod pa'i thal mo ste// mchod pa'i gtor ma thams cad kyi cho ga'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// mdzub mo mthe' rkang mdzes
181b1: sbyar to/ / g.yas g.yon thal mo brdabs pa yis// mchod pa thams cad dbul bar bya// dpal pad mo gar gyi dbang phyug gi thal mo'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis dag gis// / mdzub mo mthe' chung mdzes bskur te/ rdo
181b2: rin chen bral sbyar nas/ / mchod pa thams cad dngul bar bya// de ba thams cad yongs rdzogs byed// dpal rdo rje rin chen zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gyen du 'thor zhing thur du 'bebs// bskor zhing de bzhig zug pa dang // me tog bdug pa
181b3: mang me mchog/ dri yi mchod pa 'byung ba'o// gang ba 'am 'on te stong pa'ang rung // yang ni ci 'byor pa yis kyang // dam tshig mnyam par bsgrub pa yis// mchod pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya 'di rnams pa'i mnas ni// 5@
181b4: rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur/ / dngos grub dbang phyug grub pas kyang // kun gyi bdag nyid mchod par 'gyur// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'o// rang 'byung rnams kyi mchod pa kun/
181b5: gang dag de yis ma byas shing // spel bar yang ni ma gyur pa'o// rlabs chen dam pa gang yang med// / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// sbyor ba'i dbang phyug bde chen dang // dngos grub las
181b6: dang bde bdag/ 'di yis mi 'grub gang yang med// mchod pa rab 'byam grub pa rnams// ma lus lus med 'grub chen dpal// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam par sbyor ba'i
181b7: 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog las mchod pa thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba dpal skal pa bzang po dam tshig gi rtog pa ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi lha'i// kun du sA
181b8: mchog rnams kyi/ / phyag rgya thams cad rnam sprul pa'o// sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// bad ban
182a1: la zhar pa dang / / dngos grub thams cad rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ zla ba nya ltar rtsad dmar sku// 'dod chags kun la chags pa'i phyir// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// dpal rje
182a2: rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya 'di/ / dmar po sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od// khams gsum dag ni rin cher gzhan// sangs rgyas rin chen lta bu med// sangs rgyas kun gyi rin chen che// dbu rgyan can ni bde ba'i mchog/ gzhan gyi nor mir mi
182a3: 'phrogs pa/ / lha yi chu 'dis dag pa ste// mthu dang ngo bo nyid dag dang // rang bzhin gyis ni de 'grub bo// thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyar dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu can// kun nas nyon mongs 'jig rten dbang // mi mjed la sogs
182a4: de 'grub po/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dpal sbyor ba// lha mo kun dang 'dus pa yis// kun du sna tshogs skal bzang po// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad 'grub// sangs rgyas rdo rje pad mo 'dzin// rdo rje nyi ma khams gsum pa// rgyas btab
182a5: rmongs pas bslar nas ni/ / las rnams kun la sbyor bar byed// phyag rgya 'di yis btab pa ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // lha mo kun mchog dpal dang ldan// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la
182a6: tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba mchog gi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i tshe lugs gar byed cing // sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkang bcas na
182a7: dpung rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms/ / dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung ngo // zla ba'i kha dog 'dzum pa'i zhal// dngos grub thams cad dag pa dang // pad mo'i 'dod chags rnam dag phyir// par yi dbus ni dpar la
182a8: phyag mchog lo ma sngon po 'dra/ / de bzhin bde ba'i dbang phyug dang // bde bar reg pa'i dbang phyug pas// dkar zhing ser ba'i brla dang ldan// lha rdzas sna tshogs kha dog mchog/ 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad po
182b1: rdzogs la gnas pa/ / thams cad dag par rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas pad mo la sogs mchog/ rin chen sna tshogs rgyan dang gos// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// mi mjed la sogs brgyan pa bzhin// bya ba
182b2: dang niri bzlog pa dang / / 'phrog pa dag kyang lhag par mdzad// bdag la mthud pa'i phyag rgya yis// yan lag thams cad 'phrog par 'grub// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ang lding // dpal ldan
182b3: 'dod pa kun la dbang / / rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' ba la rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mnga' bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam pa sna tshogs dam tshig tshogs/
182b4: bde ba'i 'bebs pa'i gar byed pas// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya mchog/ dbus kyi lha mchog chen po yi// phyag rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa// 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'od lding // bde chen dbang phyug dpal dang ldan//
182b5: rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// mchog tu dga' la rab sbyor ba// skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga bzung ste//
182b6: bdag la mkhrud pa'i phyag rgya ni// pad bcas rdo rje rgya gra po mchod// phyag rgya 'di yis btab ri 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro 'ong lding // rnal 'byor kun kyi dbang phyug rgyal// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub// me rog tu
182b7: bal rab tu sbyor bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor bde ba'i mcho ga rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi kham por 'grub// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya yil// sems dpa' dpal
182b8: gdabs kyi lha mchog che po'o/ / phyag rgya 'di yi sa la 'byor // dod pa bzhin du 'gro' rdzing // dpal ldan mo dang gzhon 'grub pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'gror/ dga' bal
183a1: skal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje tshe bde ba'i mchog rol pa zhes bya ba'i phyag tu'o/ / de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchos/ chos dbyings pa'am dang mi mnyam pa// dag pa pa'i dbangs kyi babs thas pa'i/
183a2: rang byung phyag rgya sna tshogs rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' la gnas te// grub pa'i dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid 'ab 'grub 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam
183a3: ba'i/ / mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// gtsug lag ci lta'i rjes 'thun pa'i// dpal rdzogs rgya chen gang dag gis// mnga' bzhi yongs su 'phangs na ni// bdud bzhi dag las rgyal bar 'al/
183a4: tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dpal rdo rje mda' zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa 'deg cing phab pa dang // gshebs te 'tshongs pa'i stabs dag gis// 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bstod nas ni// khams gsum dag las pa 'ongs
183a5: par 'gyur/ / dpal rdo rje mthu bo che zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// bya ba dang ni bzlog pa dang // phrogs pa dag gi khyad par du// sa tshogs phyag rgyas gar byed cing // khams gsum dag ni bsdu bar bya// dpal rdo rje gar dbyi bang thug ces
183a6: bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lcug ma gang yang rung bzung nas// bdag la mkhyud pa'i phyag rgya yis// bud med thams cad rtsed na ni// dpag bsam shing ltar rtag tu 'grub// dpal rdo rje 'dod po'i lha 'o/ zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mya
183a7: btungs pa ltar byas pas/ / drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla ga shin rje'i tshangs bcas pa'i// 'jig rten gsum dag skabs par byed// dpal rdo rje rta gdong zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sna yi myang ba'i rngub pa yis/
183a8: po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'i// khams gsum yang ni sdud par byed// dpal rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// mig tshugs zhen par lta ba yis// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi k+Sha ka
183b1: rje'i tshangs bcas pa'i/ / 'jig rten gsum yang za bar byed// dpal rdo rje sun nyin zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// thams cad bdag nyid myangs pa yis// drag po dbang po nyi dbang bcas// nyi zag shin rje'i tshangs bcas pa la/
183b2: thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tshe bar byed// dpal rdo rje kun gyi bdag nyid khams gsum slar 'tshe bzhes bya pa'i phyag rgya'o// gling bu len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji ltar babs pa'i ga byed pas// tshangs dang nye bang drag por babs/
183b3: 'gro ba gsum dag dbang du byed// dpal rdo rje gling bu'i dbang byed zhes bya ba'i phag rgya'o// bi bang len pa'i tshul ston cing // ji lta babs pa'i gar byed pas// las rnams grub par rab 'byab dang // ngos grub ma lus myu
183b4: 'grub/ / dpal rdo rje 'ibi bang bde bas rmongs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// nga te'u tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pas// rims dang gdon dang du gzhan pa'i// sdug bsngal thams cad myur duso la/
183b5: dpal rdo rje cang te'u sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i tshul ston rnal 'byor pa// ji ltar babs pa'i gar byed pa// gnas gsum dag ni ma lus pa// skad cig tsam gyis 'bebs par
183b6: byed/ / dpal rdo rje rdzongs myos par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// mchod pa thams cad byas na ni// rang byung gar gyi mchod pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grug/ rims dang dug dang dbyig dug
183b7: bye ba phra men gdon gyi gnod pa rnams/ / bskor ba'i gar rnams sna tshogs kyis// skad cig tsam gyis zhi bar 'gyur// drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi zla gshin rje tshangs bcas pa'o// rgyas btab rmongs byas zos pa dag/
183b8: skad cig tsam gyis 'tsho bar byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// rang byung lha mo phyag rgya rnams// nam mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje se
184a1: #/ / dpa' la gnas te// dngos grub dbang phyug rab grub pas// thams cad bdag nyid babs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgru pa pad ma reg gi/ rab tu grub pa'i grwa rnams kyis/
184a2: bla med pa yi dngos grub 'thob// de nas phyag rgya ye shes 'di// gsal ldan rdo rje mchog gi klu// las rnams thams cad rab grub cing // srid pa shin du bsgrub pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde chen skal bzangs dpal khyod bdag la
184a3: bsgrubs la rtogs par mdzad du gsol/ / kye de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi bdag nyid bde ba mkha' 'gro snyam sna tshogs bde ba'i mchog/ 'gro ba'i rgyung rnams rnam pa sna tshogs 'dul mchog sgrub pa dag la grub pa mdzad du
184a4: gsol/ / a la la la ho// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs gar rnams bstan du gsol// dzaHhUM ba ponakye bde mchog bde bas zung la rnam par sprul// hUM snang bar mdzad du gsol// a la la la to// de bzhin gshes
184a5: kun sna tshogs mkha' 'gro skams slob ma gzung du gsol/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde ba'i mchog/ kun du kun ras thams cad du// 'di nyid kyis ni mur du 'grub// sangs rgyas thams cad dang
184a6: mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro pa'i rnal 'byer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya zhes pa'o/ / / rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// thar pa thakra
184a7: cad rnam dag phyir/ / sangs rgyas phyag rgya dpal du gnas// 'dod dam rnam par dag pa'i phyir// bcom gser gyi kha dog bzhin// chags med la sogs chags tshan phyir// dkar zhing sna tshogs gsal ba'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal
184a8: srid rab bslabs pas/ / rin chen chos las lhag pa med// de bas theg chen byang chub sems// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen can// g.yas pa'i mthe bo gung mo gnyis// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs pa yi// sor mo kun la reg pa ni//
184b1: rtsa ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal yin// byang chub sems chen skye ba dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// phyag rgya 'di yis btab na ni// shes rab pha rol
184b2: dran pa'i tshul/ / nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas par// rab tu bsgrags par 'gyur ba yin// byang chub sems chen bskyed pa dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ste// sangs kyis nyid du rig bdag// mchog tu rtag pa'i sa
184b3: rgyas so/ / gang gis ldan pa 'di mthong zhing // rnam pa kun du mchod byed pa// de yi sangs rgyas rtag pa'i mchog/ mthong zhing mchod pa byed par 'gyur// sems ni bskyed ma thag tu yang // chos kyi 'khor lo legs par skor// dpal dam
184b4: ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa'i yan lag gnon pa yis// g.yon pa'i yan lag kun las rkyal// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas na// bdud rnams thams cad rab tu 'joms// dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil to//
184b5: dpung ngo // rdo rje khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas dgab pa ni// sangs rgyas kun blo dngos grub rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// de bzhin dpal ldan he ru ka'i// rdo rje khu tshur chen po dag pa// dpa' bo blong ba'i dngos
184b6: grub rnams/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// pad mor bud med khu tshur ni// de bzhin g.yon pas bkab na yang // byang chub spyod rab 'grub pa rnams// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rin chen 'dzin pa'i khu tshur yang // lag pa
184b7: g.yon pas bkab na ni/ / sangs rgyas nor kun dngos grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// sangs rgyas khu tshur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshe 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med pa la
184b8: bud med phyag rgya bcings nas su/ / lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// dngos grub thams cad myur 'grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rta gdong dpal gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bka ba na ni// thams cad 'dugs
185a1: par rab grub pa/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// dpal grub can gyi khu tshur yang // lag pa g.yon pas bkab na ni// snang ba thams cad rab grub pa// ma lus lus pa med par 'gug// dang po sangs nas ca da pa/
185a2: gnyis pa de ba'i nadapa' bo yin// gsum pa kun tu bzang po'i'o// bzhi pa mi zad snong yin no// sangs rgyas yan lag kun ldan dpal// de bzhin zhal bzangs gzungs pa yin// spri cher po bdun pa ste// brgyad par
185a3: mkha'i sman yin no/ / gzungs ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya shes pa 'di dag gi/ sangs rgyas stsal ba'i klu mchog ni// 'grub par 'gyur ba byed pa'i mchog/ las rnams thams cad rabasgrub pa// slong bar byed pa
185a4: bstan sgrub pa/ / de bzhin sna tshogs rgyas pa dag/ sha rngan drug pa'i dbyangs kyi glu blangs nas// de ba ta yi klu blong ngo // 'jig rten khams mang rdul phran grang snyed khyab par 'phros pa'i// rgyal ba'i don rnams rab tu phra ba'i rdul
185a5: gyi grangs snyed pa/ / sprul pa'i sku rnams phra ba'i rdul gyi grangs snyed ni// srid pa bde chen de bzhin gshegs kun rnam 'phrul sna tshogs kyis// rdul phran grangs rnyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par stsal pa mdzad do//
185a6: dpal rnam par snang mang sbyor ba a la la la ho// de ring grub par mdzod// glu 'di dga'i blangs pa yis// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro snyam bde ba'i mchog/ grub par 'brar ba gdom mig
185a7: bud med bzhi rnams dang / / rang gi yang dag gsang ba yis// cho ga rgyas pa'i tshul bzhin du// me tog la sogs mchod pa bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag tu shes pa'o// rnal 'byor de nyid bcom ldan
185a8: dpa' de bzhin gshegs/ / dam tshig la sdang rnam spang phyir// dur khrod dpal gyi phyag tur gsal// shin tu gdug cing gtum po la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bar
185b1: dam par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas khros byung khro bo ni// thal bar 'jig pa mchog yin te// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba can// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar por snang // gzhan gyi ma yin mi 'phrogs pa// lha rdzas rba
185b2: yis dgang ba ste/ / 'di ni rang bzhin nyid dag dang // mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub// gos chen po dang glugs pa che// sha chen po dang sbrad rtsi ma// dur khrod kun gyi 'bring ba yi// phyag rgya dpal ldan dbang phyug mchog/ shA
185b3: tu gro gdug gdum po yi/ / sems can khams rnams rnam spyad lding// 'di ni dpal ldan bye ruka'o// rdo rje rgyal chen dbang phyug mchog/ thong ba'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan dang // sangs rgyas gtsug gi nor bu dag/ rgyal sri
185b4: thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ / ma lus lus pa med par 'grub// rdo rje khA rdo rje bcas// dril bu dkrol ba'i sgrar bcas pa// dpal ldan te ruka babs pa'o// phyag rgya sna tshogs rnam sprul pas// sangs rgyas rdo rje
185b5: mo 'dzin/ / rdo rje nyi mi khams gsum pa// rgyas btab rmongs byas de bos nas// thal bar gyur pa'ang 'tsho bar byed// dpal rdo rje ce ruka rdo rje 'bab pa rnam par 'phrul pa pade ma gar gyi dbang phyug ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
185b6: seral ka yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ka la rgyab rten byas// lag pa g.yon nathod pa thogs// g.yas pa bdan gsum par bya// nam mkha'i phyag rgyas rnal 'byor ba// nam mkha' kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bud med la sogs rin
185b7: chen mchog/ / dngos po thams cad mkha' las 'byin// phyag rgya 'di yis yongs btab nas// bde bar lhag pa'i tshul ston pas// nam mkha' las ni kun lhags te// bdag gi spyod par de spyod do drag po dbang po nye dbang bcas// nyi
185b8: mkha' 'gro mi bzad tshegs/ / mkha' las sgyum kun blags nas// lus pa med par de za'o// nam mkha' thams cad mnyam sbyor ba// bskal pa bzang po dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i mchog/ ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'o//
186a1: g.yas dang g.yod pa'i spor ba yis// bde bar 'bab pa'i gar byed pas// dkyil mo dkrung ni phyed bcas la// rkang parang gi 'dra ga dngas bdag po dbang po'i dbang bcas// nyan gshin rje nangs bcas pa
186a2: sa pa ba rmongs byas bslad nas so/ / gar byed cing ni nga ba'o// de nyid kyi ni spong ba yis// de nas bde bar badrag gas sa par bdag sanas// rab tu bsapa ste btung bar bya// skam dngag nyid kyis
186a3: de nas bla brag rgong pa yis/ / sbrul bzangs dang mi rnams kyi// bud med kun la de snor ro// bde bar reg pa thams nyam spa bsapa ba la rdo rje dgapa gnas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// ngadam gas
186a4: yang rab bshad pa/ / sa mas ma pa 'gro'i bkyil 'khor du// dpal ldan te ru ka babs pa'i// pags sna sogs gnas pa'o// zhi dang drag po rmongs pa'i mchog/ dga' ba'i gar byed 'gyung ba bcas// ba ldang ba'i ska
186a5: ba yis/ / bde ba'i phyag rgya yatug na pa drag pa rmongs byed dang // gyen du dbugs 'byin gar byed lus// lta ba'i phyag rgya 'bya ba'i mchog// gsang ba'i kau kha po ga gis// me tog bdug pa'i stong pa
186a6: dang chu dang lhag pa dang / / ngas dang ma cad gas pa yinag spyang bar du ni chas 'debs so// rtse gcig mnyam par sbyor ba yis// stor ba'i gnyer ba bde ba stan// mngon par gtor zhing se gol rdob// ral bus kyang da
186a7: 'byin pas/ / g.yon du lta pas 'a'o byed 'gad par 'astan te// gang byed rab tu rmongs pa dang // za dang gsang ba'i lus rnams dang // tshangs pa chen po'i mgo dang ni// de bzhin 'jig rten gsum las rga
186a8: bzhin sa las 'dren pa dang / / rang gi phyag rgya'i tshul ston da // dur khrod dag gi gar byed dang // de bzhin rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // rab tu 'jig par sreg pa'i me// las kyi phyag rgya rab tu gnas// dang po rgyas 'debs ma yi rtsa/
186b1: gling 'drer ma yi gnyis pa'o// gsum pa shin du rmongs byed pa'o// de bzhin bzhi pa 'degs byed pa'o// lnga pa gar byed pa yi rtsa// drag pa gsod pa'i yin par bshad// bdun pa zab mo yi bya// brkyang ba las kyi byag
186b2: ma/ de nas phyag rgya 'di kun gyi// phyag chu'i la dmas than par/ ga pa'i bdag nyid da 'joms pa// khyad par du bshad par bya// sa nan// rnas la
