235a2: par nges/ / 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// ngal ldan de bzhin cing gshegs shing // de bzhin slar ni shes rab rigs pa yis// debazhir gshegs
235a3: zhes brjod par bya/ / rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing // mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsu shugs kyi dbye ba yis// phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ yung ba ldarnams dang // phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyi/
235a4: rigs dang bgrang ba 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya// bsgom pa po nyid bsgom pa'ang med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang gzhan las// lha dang sngags ni yang dag gnas// rnam snang mi skong
235a5: don yod dang / / rin chen dpag med sems dpa' 'o// tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang // thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid rjong// tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid//
235a6: thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de// bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid// lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// bcom ldan
235a7: sa zhes brjod par bya/ / b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjed // dbang mag la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon yongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod// gang phyir ske 'gro med pa yis// shes rab ma zhes
235a8: da par bya/ / gang phyir skal pa ston pa yis// shes pa srid po shes bya nyid// bco bslag ma dang bu mo dang // gang sa khan par yang brjod par bya// sems can thams cad 'tshed pa'i phyi bco bslag ma zhes de bzhin brjod//
235b1: yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni// bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyi// shes rab gang mar brjod par bya// gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// A li kA li rab brta
235b2: pas/ / brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad// rkad pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyid phyir dkyil 'khor brjod par bya// lag pa sbyar ba phyag rgya yin// sor lo nyid pa'ang de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni//
235b3: gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji ltar pa las bde thob pa// de yi bde ba rang gis bza'// bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di// de yi bde ba bas pa gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
235b4: rab bshad bya/ / spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid// gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// kye'i rdo rje'i dngos grub kas// bsgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dag la rnan bzang // khor 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin// lag
235b5: pa dag la lag gdub nyid/ / rked pa la yang ske rags nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub po// lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung brgyan nyid// mgrin par rus pa'i phreng ba ste// bgo ba stag gi lpags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed
235b6: he rug sgor skyes pa ste/ / kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni gcig tu rnam par brtag/ kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
235b7: la mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa 'am pas mtha' ru// bsgos pa bzang por brjod par bya// cung zad dro 'i thob pa na// gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na// des ni spyod pa bya ba nyid//
235b8: shin tu bzhin bzangs mig yangs ma// rang gis dang 'dung snying rje na// / da pa bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos pa na// rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya// yang na gzhan gyi rigs bya
236a1: ba/ / byang chub sa bon gdab pa dang // spang ba yis ni gzung bar bya// gal te dga' bas gla blang ste// de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no// gal te dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar bya ste// de tshe rdo rje rkang pa sa gang /
236a2: yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi spyod pa// rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi phreng ba rin chen bdag/ lag gdub rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ske rags la ni don
236a3: yod gnas/ / kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa// glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni bsgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na glu dang gar/
236a4: yo gi rtag tu rtag tu byed// sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga shis zil gyis mi non cing // rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur ba yin// rkun ma'i skra las cod pan byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya/
236a5: sangs rgyas lnga'i thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin// thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad// byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yi ske rags nyis skor nyid
236a6: thal ba sra yi mchod phyir thogs/ / rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pas 'dzin// cang te'u sgra ni zlas pa ste// kha T+wAM ga bsgom shes rab nyid// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di dag bzlas dang bsgom pa yin// brkam dang rmongs dang 'jig
236a7: dang khro/ / ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyi ni gnyid spangs nas// the tshom med par spyod pa bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byin nam ni// phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyang // skal dang skal min rnam dbyung bas// de phyir sbyin pa sbyin
236a8: mi bya/ / bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'// yid 'ong mi 'ong na ma rtog kying // zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bza' dang bza' min spyod pa dang // de bzhin btung dang gtud min nyid// bgrod dang
236b1: bkrod min sngags pa yis/ / rnam chog nyid du mi bya'o// dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang // yang dag ye shes sdang ba bo// mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi byed// sgrub pos bla pa mngon phyag 'tshal// bslab da dbang las
236b2: rnam par grol/ / de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yogs rnam dpa snying rjon// sbyin sreg mchod sbyi dka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam chog sngo pa lam
236b3: rnam par grol/ / rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed// nges par mngon du lha mi gang // brgya sprid lta bu yid na yang // de la 'jigs par ma bya ste// seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/
236b4: rtag tu snying rje btung bar bya// rnal 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa// gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med// // spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas rje m+bu'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gang gis spun dang sring mor
236b5: yang / / the tshom med par shes par bya// gang zhig sor po gcig ston dang // gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon pa'i 'the 'ong bcangs pa las// snyan gyi phyag rgyar rnam par shes// gang zhig srin lag ster
236b6: ba la/ / de la mthe'u chung rnam par sbyid// gang zhig gung po stod pa la de la 'dzub po ram par smir// gang zhig srir lag ston pa la// de la mgrin pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ri ston pa la// de la rtse gsupa rang
236b7: tu bstan/ / gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de yi mtshams ri rab tu bstan// gang zhig yod ston pa/ de la di rab tu bstar// gang zhig khro gnyer stor pa la// gtsug pud dgrol bar brjod par bya// gang zhig
236b8: pral bston pa la/ / de la kyang ni rab tu bsta/ la stor pa la/ // phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// dam chag gis na rnam par da // de la ral 'byor pas sbas
237a1: ga/ / e ma pa ni snying rjen// gal te phreng ba lag spyod de/ 'dra bar bya zhes smra ba yis phreng ba mdon par btang byas na// dam tshig la mnos brtul 'gas bzang // de la phyir la zhes 'drab// bzang po
237a2: spyod yul la gnas pa/ / de la 'dre bar rnal 'byor pas// gang smras de ltar thams cad bye// kye bcom ldan 'das 'dra ba'i gnas du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas da
237a3: na/ / shing dang nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // dz+nyAn de nye ba'i rgyan do dang // de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba// 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid nga khod nye ba'i drang khrod nyid// 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis te// sa bcu dbang phyug mgon
237a4: pa nyid/ / 'dis ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ni dz+wal d+hA ra bshad// de bzhin du ni u d+hin nyid// gnas ni ka
237a5: lA gi rI nyid/ / de bzhin du ni kAm R+Sha nyid// nye gnas ma la wa shes brjod// sin d+ha na gar nyid do// zhing ni mum+ma nir bshad de// zhing ni byed pa'i brang nyid do// de wi ko Ti de bzhin zhing // zhing ni lcags pa'i brang nyid do// nye zhing
237a6: ku la ta zhes brjod/ / de bzhin ar+tha de nyid dang // ba yi mchog sbyin kha ba'i ri// nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o// tsAn do ha ri ka la dang // lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nad skyes dang // lam pa ka dang kA tsi nyid// de bzhin sau rASh+Ta
237a7: nyid de/ / nye ba'i tshan do ka ling ka/ gser dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni// gong ka NA yang nye ts+tshan dor// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// 'jung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang // 'thung gcod grong gi mthar gnas pa// tsa ri tra tra
237a8: ka sa la/ / bin d+ha gzhon nu'i grong khyer ro// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// nye ba'i 'brang gcod de nye ba'o// dur khrod rab seMn dge 'dun dang // dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'grab nyid do// med tsha la ra brdzing bu'i 'gram// nye ba'i
237b1: drang khrod brjod par bya/ / sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma hAd kye'i rdo rje// rnal 'byor ma'i legs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
237b2: kyis bka' stsal pa/ / yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin du yang brkyang pa nyid// rgyal mtshan dang ni mtshon bstan nyid// lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis// gsang par bya bar
237b3: brjod pa nyid/ / snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed pa nyid// thams cad gdug par gzhug pa ste// cho ga'i gtso bo sa dgag par bya// de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid// nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes
237b4: rab brtag par bya/ / mi bya chung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin// 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med// ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin bdag nir mchog nyid//
237b5: 'di ltar sems dpa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ bza' dang btung ba las sogs spyad// yan lag ji snyed bskur ba dang // tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas bzhugs pas// de snyed sngags dang phyag
237b6: yad/ / shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// dun tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi// sha ni mkhas pas
237b7: bza' bar bya/ / sems can de de dbang du 'gyur// brda' dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam// dbus su rnam
237b8: sgom pa ni/ / 'khor lo sngo rigs par// sma mas nyi skar 'jung ba nyid// 'khor los dang chu ni tror// ji ltar rigs par byin za dang // lha rnams kyi ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar bsgom pa 'byung ba yang // chos
238a1: zung las skyes 'khor la pa/ / 'ab mags ngag khrel bul ba ni ga shi sung // thugasum gyis ni kyi mar rjo// des pa shingasardzog sa ba'i rnas parab
238a2: steng du zla ba yin/ / zla ba'i srid dus pon cing// byis na pa da // ga 'dus pa las par chen po// A li u0f89u0fa4 gsu la gnyis gdas/ dA li'i gzu // klu nyim 'dus p
238a3: a las/ / dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// zla ba me langs ldan// bdun kyi bdun nga mnyam nyid ldan// rang lha'i sa ngon pag na ni// so sor rton par brjod par bye// thams cad gcig sung dang ngan nyi// lpags pa/
238a4: sa dbyings dag pa ste// mkhas pas chog gsus pa yis// dag pa lnga po brnam pa nyid// A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje bams pa 'anyid kyi gangan// yi ge las zung gong bu la// hUM laT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya/
238a5: ses pa'i gzugs brnyan las dang ba'i// kyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom// ga mtshan nal sogs gong ma pa / zhing chun pador dri'i 'ong // zhabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'di ma thams cad rjem
238a6: rnabazhi pa'i 'bas/ A li shes rab tu mi bas// 'dims pa// 'jod dathangs sas so/ gi mas// dala' ma lda sa gnas pa// phus lnga ye ba
238a7: la/ / sa da / sa dag yang bal// mtsham du
238a8: sa kha nga da da pa/ na po 'dag
238b1: mo thams cad la dog ga dag/ drag chen phrag rgya lnga yis brtan// zhal gcig sur ding bar ba dang // lag par gri gug zod pas khyab// 'khor lo rjer mgul rgyan dang / lag par lag gtub ste rags
238b2: nyi/ sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag pa'o// ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// lag pa gcig ni thed pas brel// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pa' rna
238b3: gnyid do/ / stag gi lpags pas rnam dkris shing // rol zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar// phyag gnyis gyed du dbu skyes ser// nga rgyal la sogs skyon druka rna mas// gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med rnam
238b4: rtog gi/ mgo bo'i pad ma'i snod du ni// bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga/ thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/ 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam sgoms na// dngos grub myur
238b5: du thob par 'gyur/ / dang por nig po rab tu bsgom// gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom// gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom// bzhi par ljang khu de bzhin no// lnga par kha dog sngon po dang // drug par dkar po'i lus
238b6: can te/ / yan lag drug bsdom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid dang ni// rdzogs pa'i yang ni rim pa nyid// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyis chos
238b7: do/ / bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do// ram mkha'i khams ni padamal// b+ha ga zhes bya ye shes brjod// bsgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid// de yi bde bar 'khor lor brjod// sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid// rim pa
238b8: ji bzhin rang rig nyid/ / lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems// ji ltar 'thung ba khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// re shig btsun mo shes rab yid// skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye
239a1: ba las/ / phyi nas de yi rnam pa gnyis// re shig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid// skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang // de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid// de nyid kyi na dga' ba nyid// bzhi yi rab tu
239a2: bye ba yis/ / skye med rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi// dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bde dga' thams cad nges// do de thabs las thams cad rig/
239a3: dga' ba bde ba cung zad de// mchog tu dga' ba de las lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas chags bral yin// lhag mas lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// dang por reg par 'dod pa dang // gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa nyid// gsum pa 'dod
239a4: chagra 'jig pa nyid/ / des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya// mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod// dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med cing chags
239a5: bral med/ / dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di la thabs dang shes rab med// yang dag de nyid snang ba'o// gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni mi rnyed de// bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa yis// bdag
239a6: gi bsod nams las shes bya/ / dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang // ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta// dman pa gnas ni phra ba'i don// mchog ni
239a7: dngos por brjod par bya/ / dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo// 'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de// mnyam nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid
239a8: bsgoms pas ni/ / mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod// de yi 'khor lo re zhes brjod// bsgoms pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid// 'dis ni don gyis brjod par bya// nga las 'gro ba thams cad byung // nga las gnas gsum po
239b1: yang byung / yis 'di kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong // de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes na// shin tu mnyam gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang // de ni 'grub par the tshom med// bza'
239b2: dang btung bzugs pa dang / / nyal dang log dang sems pa na// phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir yid kyis ma bsgoms par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad chos ni yo
239b3: shes na/ / bsgom pa nyid na bsgom pa mir// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang // na lag 'a khrel shing las migs pa// bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya// de rnams dam pa ga
239b4: yod min/ / rang rig bde ba chen po nyid// rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur// rang rig phyir na bsgom pa// rang gis rig pa'i 'gyur ba las// dman pa las ni las skyes te// rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis byed// rang rig rgyal po rang
239b5: gtso bo/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag doka dang // de bzhin gti mug brgyal nyid// de kun gnas ni nyams dka' bar// bcu dag gang yang mi phod do// chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang
239b6: bcas/ / thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum pa de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom ldan ci// de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang du ma bral ba ste// skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba//
239b7: rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di// ngag gi lam 'a yul te// 'i ma pa'i rgyur// bud markyen ye shes de lta bu// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang nam mkha' nyid dag ni// rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis//
239b8: kun gyis skad cig mi gnod de// mdo ris mi yul ba nga gi can la mni mjug sa gyur// rang gzhad ma yi rnam rtog gis// gnod pa nyid ni nus pa min// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang/
240a1: de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas// srid pa dag pa'i dngos grub min// yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// gang gis mi shes kye'i rje
240a2: rje de yi ral ba don med yin/ / chu bo'i rgyun ni rab 'bab dang // mar me'i rtse me rab bcings ltar// rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis// nyin dang mtshan du rnam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i
240a3: le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjed// phyi nas re rer dbye ba yis// rnams kyis ni brjod par bya// phung
240a4: po lnga dang dbang po drug/ skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyen mongs shes bya'i sgrib spang bya// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam gral yin// yul gyi dngos po dag gi//
240a5: phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po de kun dag pa ste// 'di ltar 'gre ba sangs rgyas bdag/ kye bcom ldan 'das rnam
240a6: par dag pa gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gzugs la sogs pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung
240a7: ba dang 'dzin pa gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// ni rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sgra yis tshor bar bya// lce yis re na tshor bar bya// dngos po lus kyis reg pa
240a8: bya/ / yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni// dag pas rus med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed
240b1: rdo rje mkha' 'grom/ / rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni// bang ga med nal 'byod ma gnas so// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// rang gi 'phar ma'o// de ras gyi'i 'phar ma bca
240b2: dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI/ / mer ni de bzhin ri grod ma// bden bral gdol pa mo bzhag cing // rlung du g.yung mo rnam par gzhag/ phyi na lha mo dkar po sogs// dbang dkar gshin rjer tshem rkun ma// chu bdag phyogs su re langs ma//
240b3: lus ngan par ni g+hasma rI// 'og tu ma spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha' sbed ma zhes bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// lha me 'di gnyis rnam par gnas// gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu
240b4: bshad/ / sbal ngom rkun ma rab grags// dri yi cha la ro langs ma// rol g+hasma rI rab grags// reg la sa spong ma zhes bshad// ches kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor
240b5: pas 'grub 'gyur/ / phyag gi dag pa stong pa nyid// bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid// rdo rje gsum gyis dag po'i sbyar// sa ni praka sI zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pa mo
240b6: sa brjod/ / ri gdam por shes par bya// drang cig yung mo rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma// 'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma// phrag rog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i dkar mo nyid/
240b7: gte mug de bzhin rdo rjer pa shad// zhe sdang las sogs rngam stong ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyegs la ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba// de dang des ni 'ching ba las grong
240b8: de nyid ye shes 'jig rted mi grol zhing / / de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de kyi dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med// de dang sems kyi rnam par dag pa med// reg med ches med thams cad rnam par dag/ rang
241a1: bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes/ / rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// cho ga rab tu ba/
241a2: ba bya// dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin spyang // 'bad pas hA las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni// dkyil 'khor
241a3: khang pa'i nang du yang / / dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs// rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras las sogs pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum
241a4: dang / 'the bong gsum ni lhag par bya// ded ni rigs snga las byung ba/ shim bzang mo rnam par gzhug / yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid// ji srid khu ba ldan gyur pa// de srid phyag rgya bsten par bya// phyag tu
241a5: gdod ni bcing ba dang / / thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no// bsten pa de las gang byung ba// slob ma'i khar ni btung bar bya// ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la yang bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur//
241a6: rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin du 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres// de nyid srog chags
241a7: rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de nyid 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// de nyid thams cad khyab pa po// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med de las byung // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams
241a8: dang / rnam par shes pa kun gyi tshul// skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba sems can dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang dag
241b1: dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de/ / gnyis pa'i grangs las pachog dga' nyid// gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang ni// rdo rje snying po las
241b2: sogs kun/ / mkhas pas de skad nges zos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// rgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i gzugs// de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' bral dga'
241b3: pa'ang 'gro ba nyid/ / gsum la lhan cig skyes pa med// bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pa// rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir// the tshom legs par sel ba ni// 'dod chags med cing chags
241b4: bral med/ / dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi phyir// lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdag/ yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por
241b5: mngon/ / dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs// dang po sprin dang 'dra ba nyid// grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur// nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi phyed pa'i// phyag rgya rnal
241b6: 'byor pa yis 'grub/ / ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs// gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid// sngo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste// do shal do shal byed pas brgyar// phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis
241b7: nye bar brkyad/ / rdo rje srid bu mnyam par ldan// me tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan// bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad la sogs pa ldan// de yang yal ga la sogs brgyan// 'grin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang /
241b8: rim chen pa'i so gzhag/ rnam par rgyal bshad sbyin// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs kyis ni// sar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa yi// srad bus shes rab can gyis gangag// 'khor lo'i bdag
242a1: po'i bzlas pa 'bum/ / dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par spyad// gong gi a sogs sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par
242a2: spred/ / ji ltar bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir// bsrung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba// rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin// mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de bzhin 'dir//
242a3: 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas// skur du dkar mo la sogs bri// shar du gri gug rnam par bri// lho dang nub tu'ang de bzhin no// byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni// bden bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no// dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs
242a4: pa/ / de lta de ltar 'og dang steng/ rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// phyag gnyis kye'i rdo rje sbyor bas// slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus// sna tshogs rgyan gyis
242a5: rnam par brgyan/ / hUM hUM snyems pa byas nas ni// hi hi rnam par 'jigs byed bdag/ phyi nas de nyid yang dag bshad// rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyad par cung zad yod ma yin// mchog dgar
242a6: bsgom pa med cing sgom pa po yang med/ / lus kyang med cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa 'ang med// sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshad dang gci ba'ang med// skrag bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang // chags med snga
242a7: bzed dang rmongs med phrag dog med/ / ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med// bsgom dang sgom pa po med pa shes dang dgra med cing // rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di skad gsol/
242a8: gcod nas rang bzhin med payi// sa kyi rang bzhin dag pa 'o// ji slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rngo can// mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/ thams ca
242b1: rnam par gnas/ / kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur ba'i phung po lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bo la gzhol sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni// sa ni de las
242b2: gyur/ / bAng sems su pa'i rnam pa las// chu yi khams ni 'thung bar 'gyur// stod pa las ni drod kye ste// 'gro bas rlung du rab tu grags// bde ba nam mkha'i nyid kyi khams// lnga po rnams kyis yongs su so//
242b3: gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de phyir bde ba de nyid min// lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa/ khun cog skyes par de brjod bya// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba
242b4: las/ / yo ga snying rje thabs su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbyer meng pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlal med dka' thub ming dang sbyin bsreg med// dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor la
242b5: ni med/ / de ni sngags bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin bsreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid // mdor bsdus na sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no// dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu
242b6: pa'o/ / / mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can// rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod// dbang gi lha stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i chal dgug pa nyid/
242b7: steng ras kyang ni gzugs dar gnyis// dbu ma rengs pa'i lha stangs nyid// sA yaM rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis// 'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed// rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yis
242b8: dkrug pa nyid/ / wi ni // rngon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// dbang ni matog rab tu grags// rdo rje'i shing la dkrug pa nyid// g.yo bcas rtsa la rengs byed nyid// zla drug goms pa'i
243a1: stong ba yis/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'di la 'khrul pa mi byas// sangs rgyas rdzu 'bul bsam mi khyab// lha stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni// mkhas pas sems can gzhug par bya// gsang
243a2: par 'di la bya ma yin/ / dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur// sems can sra ba spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni// phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de la dam tshig bza'
243a3: bya ba/ / rang dag ca dang po dang // mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i shwa// kye'i rdo rje sa dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'// kye yi rdo rjes mtshungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun pa de nas mchod// dga' bral dga' ba la spod
243a4: pa/ / lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang // dri lus gzi brjid chen po dang // de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// skad
243a5: cig las ni mkha' spyod 'gyur/ / kA ru kal+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya ste// gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis las// rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu// hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo na// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mda' dang gzhu yi lag
243a6: pam/ / ud pa la dang lpags kyu 'dzir// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang dbyed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten pal ba nyid// bye bas phrugs dang gdod sbyin
243a7: sogs/ / 'bum zag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba
243a8: ga pa'iHso/ / // 'jo gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po dag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// rim pa banan
243b1: babad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// cigasungs sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhengs pa dang // swa bar sa gzugs smad pa dang // sa gon la sogs byas dam ni/
243b2: ma ya bzhugs pa'i sangs kyis kun// sku gzugs sring khang rab tu ba ga/ rang 'dod snyamanyamanal 'byor pa// rab mthong sngags kyi pa la son// song bu AHhU~M swAH/ oM brdzun pa A thAn
243b3: a badz+ra ga swA/ / a badz+ra ga AHtrA kA ta// oM badz+ran weng+ge AHhU~M srA hA// sna tshogs ha ni rdzogs pa dang // me tog las sogs dbul ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas// mchod yon zhal
243b4: bsil ga ma bzhin/ / ni ba'i thab khring zlum po nyid// rgyas pa nyid kyi gruban pa// gas dpal ni grwa gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag ma bslab// khru gang dang ni khri byad nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin/
243b5: khwa do dang ni khragang nyid// byas pa'i steng dang 'og du brjod// sor mo nyi shu'am de yi byed// gsang ba'i steng dang 'og tu yang // zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur// rgyas par ser por de bzhin no// gsang ba la ni kha dog gam
243b6: dbang la dbang por rab tu grags/ / dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ gsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs// zhi ba til dang gyis la zho// gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no// sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher mar brjod// dpang
243b7: dang dgrag la lung pa / shA ya ma u0f7fdzas sanyam tha sA d+ha ka/ kAdz+ra r+tha gI ta sarba a s+tha ma smin sa rba hi to b+ha baN+Da/ me dgug pa'o// mam rin chen ma tshogs 'dzin// kye'i rdo rje khros mchod pa'i// lA ma
243b8: khyod ni dbang gang / / mag padag ni dkyil 'khar dz+ra// sa rbad+hU ba par d+harI sa d+he tig tu byai b+hu ka/ A ga mai ShA si ya hA kA lis tha sid d+hi ku ru sha ma/ me dga' ba'i sngags so// mtshan te// rim
244a1: yod kyi sngags so/ / oM na rA hA khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so// oM d+hing+ge lnga bshos kyi sngags so// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las brtag pa gnyis par ba gnas kyi le dres dang pa'o//
244a2: rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// nam mkha' lta ba'i chos kun la// rgya mchod ba ji lta bar// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs las ni// sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag
244a3: med rnal 'byor ldan pa'am/ / yang na he ru ka dpal brtson// gzhan pa'i sems kyis skad cig kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du sngags pa'i sems// gcig
244a4: mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i/ / gnas ni bzang po nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su// bdag nyid grub pa'i sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma bsgom shes rab can// yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs//
244a5: ka pa 'khrung dang zab dang // 'khor 'thang so rtsi za ba dang // tsan dan gyis ni la gnyed dang // skad g.yogs kyis ri gad 'gebs dang // 'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang khro dang rgod pa dang // bcom ldan 'das mayin pa ga/
244a6: shes rab rgyal 'gas can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor mni rnam par bsgom// gzhan gyi tshal gyis gang cig kyang // 'dug pa'i sems ni mi rigs pas// dngos grub 'dod pas dngos thang par// ma bskangs 'ab sa
244a7: mi gnas so/ / bsapa gtang nyon mongs 'jig byed pa// rdo rje snying po de yis bshad// brtse bas dngos grub don du yang // zla ba byed de yongs su rtogs// bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yi gzugs su
244a8: sems pa yis/ / rim gcig tu mchad par// bsgom pas yongs su brtag par gyis// rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir// 'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas// 'phral du
244b1: mngon dbyed pa nyid/ 'jigs sgo de bzhin sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba mtsho ba dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ches// sgrub pa po ni nyon mi mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// de ltar nges par shes nas
244b2: ni/ / ji ltar de ni mad cig kyang // rnal 'byor pa rnams ngu 'bod gnas// mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang // gzhan yang skye ba dman gad dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang / gzugs
244b3: ngan yan lag mtshang bas/ / bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // tha ma la gus dbang po dul// daN+Dal khro las rnam par grol// de ni shig nges 'grub 'gyur// rtag tu goms
244b4: pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig tu gsad la spyad// ji srid phyag rgya ma snyed par// gnang ba rnyed gyur sngags pa la// rnal 'byor ma yis bstan par bya// phyag rgya che ge mo
244b5: khyer la/ / sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par rgyan// sih+la ga pur yang dag ldan// byang chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang // dge ba bcu la brtsams nas ni//
244b6: de la chos ni rab tu dbye// lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni// dam tshig sems dang gcig pa nyid// zla ba gcig gis skal ldan par// 'gyur bar 'di la the tsom med// mchog thob pa'i bud med gang // rtog pa thams
244b7: cad yang dag spangs/ / yang na bdag gi rus pa yis// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin mi 'am ci las kyang // phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag/ de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad// bdag gi dal ba mngon du'i phyir/
244b8: gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs cad kyi// sto longs spyod phyir ma gsungs// yid ni btan nam g.yo'am ci// rang gi sems ni so sor btag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol paM/ bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/
245a1: phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod// phyag rgya phyag rgya gnyis dag gis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bud med gzugs ni spangs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das kyi
245a2: gzugs su bya/ / du ma spangs pa bo lar 'gyur// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// ze 'bru bo la can du 'gyur// lhag ma bdag nyid chen po nyid// dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs// he rA ka
245a3: sbyor skyes bu nyid/ / 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// 'chags pa 'jig pa dag gis kyang // thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur// gang phyir
245a4: thobs ni 'byung ba nyid/ / 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed// des na rab 'jig yod ma yin// de nyid la ni chags pa med// la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rdul
245a5: 'byor gyis/ / brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa bsgom// spros pa rmi lam ltar byas nas// spros pa nyid ni spros med byed// ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang // ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa// rtag tu goms par sbyor ba las//
245a6: dkyil 'khor nyid de de bzhin 'dod// phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur ba// ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po// 'di ni de yi byin brlabs yin// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cing bde ba ser/
245a7: bdeb dbang po 'ad ba dgang // ba ba ldang 'bed bsngo// bde ba rgya dang mi chu kun// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos po dngos med pa// rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod//
245a8: pos ma pa'i rdul 'byor 'ang // de yi bde babang chen brjod// rdzogs pa bsgom pa med pa ste// bskyed pa yis ni ci zhig 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
245b1: chub sems dpa' re// dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyams// lus kyi dngos med gang las bde// bde ba smra bar mi nus so// khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro khyab pa nyid//
245b2: ji ltar me tog la gnas dri// me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos med pas// bde ba nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur// dngos dang dngos po med pa de// dngos po rtogs phyir sangs
245b3: rgyas pa/ / gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes// rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs/
245b4: 'chang ba po de chos kyang nga// rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa nga // 'jig rten ston pa bsgrub byang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin du// mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni// /
245b5: mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus kyang yid ches kyis// btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du// ston pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad bcur ldan// khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas/
245b6: de med pas na bde mer 'gyur// bde ba med na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po med// de nyid dngos med tshul yang min// zhal phyag
245b7: rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid/ / mchog tu bde bas gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa
245b8: nyid/ / lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags phal pas so// dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// phye bo thams cad
246a1: 'chi bar 'gyur/ / drag gi de nyid shes pa des// ngag gis drag ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sde'u'i bza' ba stir// bzlogartags pa yis// rlung gis
246a2: dngal ldad par byed/ / nam rtog las ni nam tog dag/ srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag/ ji ltar na bar tu 'gas pa// chu gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed/ dam rtog kyang // dam par
246a3: ngas rang myung bar bya/ / de ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa yang // me yis kyang ni gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags mes tshig pa// 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya// skyebo mi yang ba mi las// gang dang gang gis
246a4: 'chir 'gyur ba/ / thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyis// srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol 'gyur// chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur ba// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i skom pa 'di nyid ni//
246a5: sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes// 'byung ba lta yi rang bzhin la// kun tu ru las lnga ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las// dbye ba lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags
246a6: gtagachos kyi phyir/ / gti mag rnam par sngar mdang brjod// gang kyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// gsher ba tshwa yi khams su brjod// chuni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir// de sang 'dren pa mi bsgyud pa/
246a7: stod pa'i skor ba las// drod ni rtag tu se bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// gak+ko lar mi gang zhig se mas// de ni rlung gi rang bzhin cad//
246a8: phrag dog de yod grub pa yin// don yong rlung las 'byung ba nyid// bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur// dga' ba ma mkha'i mtshan nyid te// nam mkha' se / sang ldan ma mkha' las byung nyid/
246b1: sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mchod// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las// stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid// de kyi pa'i dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog du rtag pa nyid// 'dod
246b2: chags la sogs sems lnga yi/ / dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// gang gA klung ni bcu yi bye snyed kyi// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams// de rnams
246b3: rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya/ / de rnams la yang 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams// bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams ni// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs
246b4: las byung ba rnams/ / kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la phab pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams la rmad thams cad kyi
246b5: gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang // de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang bza' ba las sogs pa// de la sdom pa bka' stsal
246b6: pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e ba ma rnam par rab tu gnas// e ba ma rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par bya// de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' la
246b7: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid// e ba ma rnam pa ci zhes brjod// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
246b8: yi dbyang bzang po gang // dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid// dga' bde las skye bar 'gyur//
247a1: skang cig shes ras bde shes pa// a ba ma rnam par rab tu gnas// sna tshogs dang rnam srin dang // rnam nyid de bzhin mtshan nyid bral// skang cig pazhi ri pa shes pa// de ltar ral 'byor
247a2: pas shes 'gyur/ / 'khrud dang 'o byed las sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i ye shes zab nyid// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par
247a3: par brjod/ / mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// dab smin la ni bachog dga' nyid// rnam nyid dga' ba dga' bral cing
247a4: mtshar bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid/ / slob dpon gsang ba shes rab dang // bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni// dga' ba las sogs rim shes bya// rgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid//
247a5: blta ba gsang ba de bzhin no// lag bcangs las ni shes rab nyid// gnyis gnyis 'khyud la de yang nyid// sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir// dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru ba nga/ dang blugs pa
247a6: zhes pa 'das/ / des na dbang zhes brjod par bya// shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud // rdo rje dril bu mnyam sa bas// sro / shin tu bzhin
247a7: bzang mig yangs ma/ / gzugs dang lang chos rnam par brgyar// mthe 'ong srin lag dag gis ri// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid du ni mnyam pa/ pa'i skad yul dag du bya// ston pas/
247a8: sa rab rab tu mchod// rjed par byas nas gtad par bya// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer// phrag dog kho brda pa spang ba pa'i// slong ma mer gyur shes na pa ni// stor pas
247b1: del gang ba da/ / zur cad gyis rdo rje 'dzid// jis dbang bzung gal ba khaba'o// slob ma'i bya ba bshang pabya// tham phrag rgya ldan mthang nas// sang rang ma zad brdzab na bya// bcam ldam
247b2: kye/ / dza rjeral 'byor gcig pa dad pa// pi byed phrag rma sgrub pa po// rdo rje ma 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod na bdag nyid che// mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba'ang
247b3: kyi tshogs dag tu/ / bying ba skabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // bal che mchog ma dan// bdug pa lta bshos phreng ba dang // dril bu rgyal mtshar thug pa yis// 'di rnams
247b4: mchod pa rnams kyis ri/ slob pas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod // mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// sna tshogs spangs pa'i skad cig la// ston pa sa smras pa sems dpa' che// bde ba chen po rnam par
247b5: zung / / ji srid byang chub bar du ni// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma snying rje can mthong nas// rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smra// 'di ni ye shes chen po nyid// thams cad lus la rnam
247b6: par gnas/ / gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang g.yo ba khyab nas gnas// skye ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i
247b7: thabs kyis ni/ / rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la bkod par gsol nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo
247b8: zhes brjod/ / sangs rgyas kun bdag grong byer la// bcom ldan bdag de 'phrul gyur pa sa// rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral pa// dkyil ni snying po rnas
248a1: brjod te/ / byang chub sems ni bde chen po// len par byed pas dkyil 'khor nyid// 'khor lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams// yul las sogs pa rnam par sbyong // bo la kak+ko la sbyor
248a2: bas/ / de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang / dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog
248a3: chags gsang pa dang / / brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang // khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // pha rol bud med bsten par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyir srog ni sems su
248a4: brjod/ / 'jig rten bskal ba zhes bya ba// brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags// btsur mo'i khu ba ma byin pa// gzhan gyi thang med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan
248a5: 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / yul de rnams kyang ci lags// dbang po rnams ni gang lags// skye mched ni ci lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags// khams rnams de yang ci lags// 'di rnams
248a6: kyi rang 'dir de ci lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin nyid// 'di rnams yul na
248a7: drug tu brjod/ / dbang po rnams ni drug pa ste// mig dang rnga ba snga dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mug rdo rje las sogs ldan// yul dang yul can dag gis ni/
248a8: skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga po gzugs la sogs// mthar ni rnams shes snying rje che// dbang po dang ni yul nyid dang // dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams go
248b1: phyir/ / khams ni bcwa brgyad rnams su bshad// rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bden min de bzhin du// thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes kyis// 'di lta ste//
248b2: btsub shing dang gtsub stan dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du mi skye bar 'gyur ro// me 'di ni gtsub shing la yang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la yang mi gnas// skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang ma
248b3: yin te/ / rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na// gcig na yang yod pa ma yin pas ma de yang bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin no// de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig/
248b4: de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med pa la sogs pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed/ kun tu rung
248b5: sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed/ bdud ci lnga'i ro yang 'thung bar byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyis
248b6: phyag mdzad pa'i/ / de nyid bdag gis gsang mdzad pa// rdo rje mchod pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur// rangs par gyur te/ pus mo g.yas
248b7: pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang /
248b8: bgrod dang bgrod min mi spang zhing // khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni rab tu spang // blo ldan sngags nyid mi bla/ sam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya// gnyid ni spang bar mi bya ste// dbang
249a1: po rnams ni mi dgag go/ / khal thams cad bza' ba bya// kha dog lnga la mnyam par spyad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya// mdza' bo sdug par
249a2: mi bya zhing / / de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid// rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// g.yung po gdol ba ko lpags mkhan// phyag dang mkhan sogs reg ring dang // zam
249a3: ze rgyal rigs rje rigs rnams/ / bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid// bdud ci lnga dang bu ram chang // drag dang nim pa bu btsas skyes// skar dang dngang dang skal sogs// kha ba lan dzA tsha ba dang // dri dadri
249a4: zhim mchi rtag dang / / byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni// mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin// rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni// pad ma'i snod du bzhag pa dang //
249a5: lung pa dang ni skabs dag gis// bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btang // smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang // ro segs thal bas de bzhin brgyan// me tog rab sod gnas rnyed pas//
249a6: mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya// de nas rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na// nges par dbang po drug gi grangs/
249a7: rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig la gti mug rdo rje ma// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sA la ser sna ma zhes bshang // kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma//
249a8: lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma// dbang po rnams ni dag pa'i phying // 'di yi ni gon sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dgongs pa'i skad ni tsa zhes bkyi
249b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par gsungs/ / rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos las sogs mi shes pa// rgong dang lta bdag gis dang // 'khrung dang de bzhin gnyis gnyis kyi/
249b2: chud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa// bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol// dgongs pa yi ni skad chen po// dam tshig brjeni rgyas pa ru// rdo rje snying po ngas bshad
249b3: kyis/ / khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// mngan chang ba la sha// 'du ba ma la yadzar brjod // 'gro ba khe Ta ro shrA pa thA// rus pa'i rgyun ni ni rashra// 'od 'akro khan du brjod// cang te'u kri pI Ta ru brjod//
249b4: skal med du d+hA ra zhes brjod// skal ldan kA liny+dza ra re brjod// reg min Di Na Di ma zhes brjod// thod pa pad ma thAM dza na// bza' ba tri p+ti ka zhes bya// tshed ma ma la tIn d+ha na// bshad pa tsa tuHsa mar brjod//
249b5: gci ba ka s+pha ri zhes brjod// rang byung si hA ra shes par bya// khu ba ka bA ra zhes brjod// sha chen shA li dza'is brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// rdo rje bo la zhes brjod te// pad ma kak+ko la zhes
249b6: zer/ / 'dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no// phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa nyid// g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// gar mo de bzhin pad ma'i rigs// rang 'tsher
249b7: mA ni drin chen rigs/ / skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// chos ma las kyi rigs nyid te// phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khu ba rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas bdud /
249b8: rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ba// de yis khyed la gang bshad pa// de rnams thams cad gus pas zung // kyai rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang // gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba// de yi dam tshig
250a1: nyams par ni/ / 'byung bar 'di la the tshom med// 'tsho ba dang shi na ma dang // gdon dang rims dang drag gis kyang // gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad// mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang
250a2: gi dam tshig rigs rnyed na/ / gal te tshig 'di mi smra ba// gnas bzhi las kyis rnal 'byor ma// de yi tshen khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyung thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad
250a3: ces bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad the tsom du gyur// yid gnyis su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol
250a4: to/ / bcom ldan the tsom bsal du gsol// spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa// glu dang gar ni dngos grub sbyin// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// klu ni ci lags gar kyang ci// lha'i le'u las gang gsungs pa//
250a5: zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams// de la bdag ni the tsom mchis// gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci// sngags btubs las gang gsungs pa// bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul par gyur// gang gi
250a6: sa bon sa bon gang / / rigs kyi le'u las gang bshad pa// bcu drug gnyis kyis bdag nyidaH// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas// de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
250a7: kal+la ai re thi ya bo la mug+ga Ni re ka ko lA g+ha DA ki pi Ta to tA kA u Ne ti/ a i na ro lA/ ha hi ba la khAts+tsha i gA Dem+ba a NA pidz+dza a i/ ha le kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i du d+hA ra ta hi bar+t+ti a i/ tsa u ma ma kA thu ri sat+si ka b+h+ra
250a8: ra lA aM a i/ mA la ai en+da na sA li dzata haM Ta du ShA i a i/ pro kha Na kha Ta ka ran+te shud d+ha shud d+ha na ma Ni a i/ ni rad shu aM ga tsa ha Da wi ta haM dza sa tsA bi pa Di a i me la yardze kun du ru kAT i Di tI ma ta hin
250b1: baN+Di a i/ drad pa mi 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas// he ru ka yi gzugs kyi ma gang// chags bral min goms sems kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis bsgom pa nyid// rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang // rnal
250b2: 'byor ma dang ma po yis/ / klu dang gar ni 'di dag gis// legs par glu thang gar kyang bya// 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs bsrung zhing // de bzhin pa dag kyang bkung ba nyid// 'dis ni 'jig rten dbang du byed// 'dis ni sngags
250b3: kyi bzlas pa nyid/ / gang du gus pas glu len dang // gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// de la dri ni mtshon por bya// sreg pa'i dri ni dang po nyid// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri// ga bur
250b4: ma la ya dza nyid/ / rang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya// ba lang tshe yi skra yang ni// phyi rol tshal du mtshon bya ba// glu yi byin brlabs batshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste// 'dis ni
250b5: rigs ni mtshon par bya/ / rigs 'tshol bsgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med cing sgrub po'ang med// zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma// gti mug phya gcas rdo rje ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid//
250b6: chags pas chum phyag rgyas gdab// phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha' 'gro ma// zhe sdang pa ga nas puka sI// gti mug phyag rgya sa ri khrod ma// seng sna'i phyag rgyas gdal pa mo// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid//
250b7: di dkang po zhe sdang las// gti mug phyag rgya chom rkun ma// ser sna phyaganas pa yangs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI// gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma/
250b8: dpas phyag rgya shes par bya// A li dang po bdag med pa// A li gnyis pa rdo rjem// Arnal pa dkar po nyid/ 'i rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drug pa brakra pI zhes brjod/
251a1: 6// bdun pa nyid ni khrong ma// brgyad pa sde ga can du brjod// dgu pa yang de gsung mo nyid// yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid// bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes bshad// bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod//
251a2: gsum pa Sh+Ta.A rI// bcu bzhi pa nis spyod ma// bcwalnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma// rnal 'byor ma yis bon nyid// rigs kyi la 'u las ca rnams gang // bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs// sa ni gnyis
251a3: gnyis rnal 'byor ma/ / re re rnam pa gsum du brjod// rkyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma// bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod// gang phyir bcu drug cha med pas// 'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spang // ci'i slad du zhen
251a4: don gyi bya ba mi byed phyir/ / bcwa lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub sems su 'gyur// bde ba chen po A li'i gzugs// rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi che// rdo rje snying pos gsol ba// rnal 'byor ma kun
251a5: las byung ba/ / lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid// 'grib med btung mchog nam mkha' nyid// ga bur nges par cis mi spang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying
251a6: pos gsol pa/ / thabs gang gis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni// rang byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang // kun rdzob
251a7: don ngam gzugs can gyi/ / byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med kak+kol bde ba can// e baM rnam pa'i rang bzhin du// bde ba bsrung ba nyid
251a8: kyi phyir/ / bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid// 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan
251b1: du ni/ / mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnam nyid do// 'khor ba zhe sdang la stsogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni
251b2: mya ngan 'das/ / rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor bdag pa na// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam tshul can no// shin
251b3: tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma/ / gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// sngo bsangs ngal la rigs bzangs ma// si h+la ga bur 'byung ba'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// skra bzang sgrub pa
251b4: po la dga'/ / de la chang yang btung bar bya// de nas rang yang bzung ba nyid// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// kun du ru byed brtul zhugs can/
251b5: der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i// ga bur mkhas pas mi spang ste// de ni lag du mi blang zhing // nya byis dung chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi mchi lce yis blang ba nyid// ga bur nyid ni bdag
251b6: med ma/ / bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags// rdzogs
251b7: pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las/ / de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma// de ni ring min thung ba min// gru bzhi pa yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das// lhan gcig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i
251b8: rnal 'byor pas/ / de yi bde ba za ba nyid// de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang //
252a1: shes rab nyid kyis spyad par bya// de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs// bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// de ni me long ye
252a2: shes gzugs/ / mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor tog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te// chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ma// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po dag/ de nyid bdag med rnal
252a3: 'byor ma/ / chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// 'khor lo sgom pa'i lam dang ni// lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsung na// sdom pa yang dag
252a4: bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor ma lus dbus nas su// a yi rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu che// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya phye//
252a5: rdo rje skye mched thabs chen nyid// 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis ni bstan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs ni brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pas
252a6: ni/ / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang // su gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi sems can gyi/
252a7: skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// de las sprul pa'i sku nyid yin// gang gis skyed dang sprul byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems ni chos kyi rang bzhin te// chos kyi sku
252a8: yang snying khar 'gyur/ / ro rnams drug gi gzugs can gyi// gza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po gnas// e baM rnam pa rgyu mthun nyid// rnam smin chos
252b1: kyi 'khor lo las/ / longs spyod skyes bu byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid// rgyu mthun sogs par rab phye ba'i// 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yi// las la
252b2: bcom ldan shes rab spyod/ / ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu sgrags// las byung 'bras bu che ba'i phyir// rnam par smin pa de las zlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// skyes pa skyes bu
252b3: byed pa nyid/ / gang phyir sprul pa gnas gtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas gtan nyid// chos ni smra bar 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod// gang phyir 'grin par kun bkur
252b4: phyir/ / longs spyod 'khor lo kan bkur nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas// bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde ba zhes bya ku ru brjod// lto ba gnas su brjod par bya// skye gnas 'dod
252b5: chags bral bar 'gyur/ / mngal gyi khru ma chos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan po nyid// mgo bor thal ma sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi zlas pa a dang haM// skye gnas
252b6: 'khor lo'i rnam pa a/ / bde chen gyi yang rnam pa haM// gcer bskra dang kha spu bregs// sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med//
252b7: ba bcu yangs rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang phyug go/ de nas bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste// spyan dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer
252b8: can dang / tsun da dang / paN+Da ri khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la stsogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog du ngo mtshar bar gyur cing brgyal ba
253a1: dang / / skrag pa dang / sal 'gyel ba dang 'drar bar 'gyur ro// yang rdo rje can gyis lha mod de rnams thams cad la gzigs nas bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par ston pa// sa dang chu rlung byin zar/
253a2: lha mo snod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sras kyang mi shes pa// de nyid dang yis spro yis nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams cad srog rnyed par gyur to//
253a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang blo bur dri mas sgribs// de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de
253a4: bzhin te/ / bden pa yang ma mchis shing brdzun pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa// btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs
253a5: spangs de nyid yid bzhin no/ / de yis de nyid yongs su bcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // kye yi rdo rje rangal bson// ma rig sogs pas mi 'dzin cing // gti mug las sogs 'ching ngas min//
253a6: rang dang rang gis gtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol song dang // lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa
253a7: lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang / / bde ba gang phyir mi shes pas// brtag du rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du yang // sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
253a8: nyid/ / sangs rgyas 8du bstan du med// gdol pa smig mkhan la sogs pa// gsod pa don du sems dpa' bo// de rnams kyi rdo rje shes na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// dbyes pa mi shes pas
253b1: sgrings pa/ / 'di yi bgrod pa mi shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar// gang zhig rmongs pa 'khor bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// kye yi rdo rje'i thabs rnyed pas// gang zhig yul rnams rnam
253b2: don tha mer skyed par 'gyur/ / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// sa ni prag sIr bshad pa// gang phyir gti mug sra ba nyid// sku ni rnam snang nyid gsungs pa// ji ltar mi bskyed phyag rgya lags/
253b3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems spangs nas ni lus kyis ni// mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying
253b4: pas gsol pa/ / rga khams ri khrod mar bshad pa// mi skyod khu ba'i gzugs can nyid// gtso ba bi skyong phyag rgyas ni// ri khrod ma la phyag rgya rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus spangs
253b5: nas ni sems kyis ni/ / gnas pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur// de phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur// thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// me ni gdol pa mor bshad pa// 'ang
253b6: chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo/ / rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na// ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang phyir 'dod chags khrag bshad pa// khrag ni rin chen 'byung
253b7: ldan nyid/ / drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 'dod chags ser sna phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid de// don yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid// don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la/
253b8: kaN+Da rigs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni// gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te// de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas g.yung /
254a1: mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// sngar gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis// sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid mi mtshom
254a2: nyan pa/ / de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang // de yi rigs pas g+hasma rI// ma log pa las phyag rgya'o// kye yi rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor ma che/
254a3: de la bdag med mas zhus pa// e ba rnam par bzhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa las// sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan// oM in+da dzam
254a4: dzalaHk+Sha/ b+hung badz+ri lA u // tsan+da sudz+dza mA ShaprAN+Da la bAtA la a rbas pA sA hA/ i ba li TaHdzi ga pra la d+ha pA k+Sha sa baM g+ha/ a b+ha sarbakaN+Da sa dra la d+hi khA ni pe Da gA da/ oM a kA ro mu kha sarbad+harmA NA
254a5: dArut+ma nAtwAtA oM AHhU phaT swA hA/ gal te 'dis gtor mas 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te// de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang // lha mo rnams dang /
254a6: 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jig pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gsad ba dang /
254a7: dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas par yang 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gis phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji
254a8: yang phyag rgya ba kyi/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs su phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus
254b1: pa ga das/ / sa stong ku yi phyag rgya can// 'og zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can// steng zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma// sems ni bdag med
254b2: tshul can nyid/ / sepas ni dbus kyi gnas su ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang // bshad kyis rnal
254b3: 'byor mnyang nyon/ / mi bstod nam snang rin chen 'byung // dpag med phrag dog rdo rje sems// zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni rim pas bsgom pa nyid/ rdo rje sems dpa'
254b4: spangs nas ni/ / phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs can gyi// thugs kyi bdag po rigs cig nyid// zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin
254b5: brlabs 'di/ / rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa
254b6: po/ / dpa' bo zod pa'i phreng ba can// bdag med mas ni mgul nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga ni 'dzin lha la// bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bcwo lngas yongs su bskor ba yi// bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad da// khyod
254b7: kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags/ / gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bdag med ma la'o mdzad nas// rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni// lha yi nu ma mnyes mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar
254b8: gsungs pa/ / dog sa ngogs rtsems rgyan// mtshams bzhi pa pasgo bzhi pa// rdo rje sred bus yang dag brgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// lhan gcig skye dga'i rang bzhin las// khyod dang lhan cig
255a1: yangags sa ngas nga / / 'al brkyang ba la zhabs pa'i pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis bgyur// badrang ba'i mnyam par mad pa nyid// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa'o// mgo ba'i phreng bas ngogs
255a2: 8/ / nyis bklags shing rol mor bcas// kha dag nag po 'jigs pa yi// sna tshogs rdo rje spro bar 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hA sa 'ang // thal bas las 'khrugs pa nyid// bdag med ldan cig mnyam stor zhing // @
255a3: gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas/ / dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde bzob// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas pa la ri kur du batshungs// g.yod pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa/
255a4: spyi bo'i zhal ri gtsigs pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che// lhag pa'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang // dga' bas shin tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs srung nas// shar gyi sku
255a5: yang dag garas/ / srab dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las/ cham rkun ma yang byung nas re// byung nas lho yaM ska ru ni// cha rkun ma ni sgo srungs ma// bol kako la sbyor bas// ro langs pa yang phung ras re// phung nas ba sko /
255a6: bdud 'joms ma ri rnam par gnas// dga' ba cher pa'i snyoms 'jug las// gras rI yang byung nas ni// bung ras byang gi kro la ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can pa nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bstod pa'i stor ba las/
255a7: sI yang thung ras ni// phyung ras dbang ldan pa tshams su ni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'tshed pa'i mtshams su ra khrod pa// srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa'o//
255a8: drang mi mtshams su gsung po nyid// de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khu bar gyur// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun snying rje'i yid bzhengs shig
255b1: dag la stobs/ / stong pa'i rang bzhin 'a spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhad mdzod// khyod mdar ni bdag 'gram pas// kye yi rdo rje khrod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// ri khrod ma
255b2: 'bras zab par mdzod / / dga' gtse 'jig rten 'gron gnye dang// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med phyogs dem 'tshal bas// gdol pa ma bdag 'a bar bgyid// bdag gis khyed kyis thugs 'tshal
255b3: mig 'phrul mda' ba khyod bzhengs cig/ gsung po bdag ni dran nyams pas// snying rje rgun chad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// me dang shar b+ha b+hi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa bcang rnams la/
255b4: sa 'brang las sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// rkeg cing dpa' bo ma sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul
255b5: 'angags rung ba/ / snying rjengam dang 'i ba yis// gar dgra'i dang ldan pa nyid// a~M dang hU~M gis rdo rje che// dra ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sa la rdebs pa dang // lha dang lha mar sngags
255b6: par ma / / gtsab b+ha ba shal Da~M/ 'di yis sa bo dbyung ba dang // bdag po'i sa bon dag gis re// oM hUM b+ha po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma ma'i 'khor lo grang nyams dgar// bdog nag po 'jigs chen pa/ Sha8/
255b7: meng bde ba srid pa po// gtsobo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid// dkar mo'i g.yas dgri gug ste// de bzhin g.yod na ro hi ti// chom rkun ma g.yas cad te'u ste// g.yod pa'i phyag phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas
255b8: sbal te/ / g.yod pa yis par ma'i sdong // b+has r-I yi g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pa rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon pa dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste//
